name: Superfood Gentle Antioxidant Refillable Cleanser
about: What it is: A non-drying, antioxidant-packed gel cleanser that gently yet effectively removes makeup, SPF, and excess oils, leaving skin hydrated and glowing...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness..Highlighted Ingredients:- Kale + Spinach: Rich in phytonutrients and vitamins C and E to leave skin visibly glowing..- Glycerin, Vitamin B5 + E: Complex know to hydrate + soothe..- Green Tea: Antioxidant-rich powerhouse that fights visible signs of aging..Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Healthy looking skin starts with clean skin. This pH-balanced gel-to-foam formula purifies without stripping skin barrier and improves the look of pores over time. Skin looks clean, soft, and glowing. This 4-time award-winning best face wash is suitable for combination, acne-prone, and oily skin.....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sorbeth-230 Tetraoleate, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Chloride, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Aloe Vera) Juice Powder, Brassica Oleracea Acephala (Kale) Leaf Extract, Spinacia Oleracea (Spinach) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), Glycerin, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Decyl Glucoside, Sorbitan Laurate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Gluconolactone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Gardenia Jasminoides (Jasmine) Fruit Extract, Fragrance/Parfum, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Glycolate, Sodium Formate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex (CI 75810)........The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use twice daily, in the morning and evening..-Wet face first. Put one to two pumps of Superfood face cleanser into wet hands, rub together into a light lather, and massage into face and neck for 30 seconds to activate the cold-pressed antioxidants..-Rinse thoroughly....Tip:.-For best makeup removal, massage one to two pumps of Superfood face cleanser into dry or slightly damp face and neck. Add more water gradually as you massage for one minute. Rinse thoroughly...Pair with our Superfruit Cleanser as a treatment at least 3x a week, AM or PM to gently exfoliate the skin for a smooth, soft + radiant complexion. ...Recycling Instructions:.-Take off the cap and dispose into its proper container..-Check your local recycling authority's guidelines to make sure you use the correct one..-Wash the glass jar thoroughly in hot soapy water..-Rinse, then dry. If you skip this step, containers may contaminate other materials in a mixed-waste stream, like paper..-Place in your recycling bin and voila! Your glass jar can now be infinitely recycled.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin, sometimes combo in the summer when it’s hot. This broke me out soooooo bad. My skin is usually clear/smooth to the touch, with occasional pimples if I’m about to start my menstrual cycle or am eating badly. But this gave me full on fungal acne - it was itchy, huge pimples in groups (it looked like cystic acne), red. Going from pretty good skin to how this broke me out was literally a 1 to 100. People I saw in my everyday life were asking me what happened to my face lol. I stopped using it and after a week my skin was almost back to normal. However, I will say that I didn’t read what it’s actually MEANT for before using it, and that is my fault so giving it 2 stars. The advertising & description for this product does state clearly several times that it’s intended for oily & acne skin, both of which I don’t have. I wanted to love because a lot of people talk about it being great, but my dry skin absolutely hates this. I will never again forget to read the product description because of this lol.

I do have extent sensitive skin and everything seems to break me out so I was even hesitant to try this product. So if you’re going through the same thing and you read this, TRY IT! I do have dry skin as well and it doesn’t seem to dry my skin out at all either. Best face wash I have ever tried, especially for acne prone skin!

I was skeptical because how can a face wash be so light and gentle but be so amazing?? But it is?? My hormonal and cystic acne people!! THIS IS THE HOLY GRAIL. I don't think I'll ever use another!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Sephora for the 10 Days of Sephora Beauty Community Favorites during Christmas 2023, with no obligation to review.  As part of the Sephora Beauty Community, I pride myself in writing honest reviews, no matter if the product was gifted or not.  At first, I wasn't sure what the big deal about this cleanser was...however, after a few uses, I noticed my skin felt softer and looked a little healthier! So, I kept using it and found myself always reaching for it!  This cleanser effectively removes makeup and makes my skin feel really clean, but not stripped! It feels so nice and refreshing on my skin, I actually really enjoy using it and look forward to it! I love that there's tons of antioxidants and other great ingredients for skin. I have no idea if any of the ingredients help repair the skin barrier, but I feel like the antioxidants may have helped because I get a tiny bit of redness on my cheeks...but now, it seems to have really calmed down! I really like the simplicity of this cleanser...just a great, no frills gel cleanser that lathers really well...so a little goes a long way!  And, I love that there's no scent besides a natural ingredient scent, at least not that I've noticed, so anyone with allergies to scent should be fine!  The glass bottle is a nice touch - yes, even the mini size is glass! And, I think it's great that you can buy a Full Size Refill pouch! The only thing that I didn't like about the Mini size is that you have to pour out the cleanser, which can be difficult while trying to hold onto a smooth glass bottle with wet hands, but that's a small packaging detail.  My skin is happy and healthy with this cleanser, so much so that I ended up buying the Full Size (with the Pump) so that everyone in my house could use it, and Everyone loves it! This cleanser will definitely always be a repurchase!

reviews.review_title: Will always be a part of my routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE HER!!!! This will always be in the my routine. I have EXTREMELY sensitive and acne prone skin, and this product is a very neutral cleanser. Does it completely clear away all acne? No. But does it make my acne worse? ALSO no. Anyone with sensitive, acne-prone skin knows that is a huge win in itself. After years of dealing with acne and using med spa lasers and medical grade products to finally get my skin to a really healthy level, this product remains a part of my routine. When I take makeup off, I use miscellar water on clean disposable organic cotton rounds, then cleanse with this, THEN go in with my medical grade products. It completely removes all residue from makeup gently without any irritation and feels amazing on the skin. Then I am able to target concern my skin on a blank canvas.

reviews.review_title: Solid workhorse product that does it's job.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive this product for free as a Sephora Beauty Insider Ambassador, however these are my own opinions. This is an effective cleanser that I've tried out a few times over the last five years. I do tend to prefer this in the summer months when my very dry skin is a more normal. While it's not stripping, it's certainly not hydrating either. I have a love hate with the glass bottle, it's quite pretty and I love that glass is so much easier for me to recycle. That said, it's also a jar that I won't keep in my shower, I'm not the most clumsy, but one wrong move and this bottle would shatter against my tile. I use this as a morning cleanse, something easy that I can still feel like I did a cleanse with, or as a second cleanse at night after using a balm or oil to remove most of my make up and SPF. I have in a pinch used this at night to take off my make up and SPF, however I do find that I have to really concentrate on massaging it into my eye area to get mascara off. This can at times lead to getting soap into my eye, so the double cleanse method is easier. I will say, I prefer to double cleanse at night for this reason with any cleanser. If I'm not wearing make up, this works fine to get SPF off on it's own. Consistency is great, comes out of the pump easily but is thick enough that it doesn't run everywhere. There is a scent to it but I can't really say that it smells like Kale, Green Tea or Spinach, it's more of a fresh green scent, reminds me of freshly mown lawn, but you really need to get your nose into the container to smell it. I do not notice the smell when I'm using it at all and I've used it to wash my hands to see if the smell remains. I can't smell anything on the skin after rinsing it off. Overall this is an easy product to use and purchase, I never regret spending money on it, but there isn't a big wow factor for me, but I'm not sure what kind of a wow I'm looking for in a cleanser either. Sometimes just being a solid product is good enough for me.

reviews.review_text: I tried this cleanser after receiving it as part of a gratis package from Sephora. It had been on my Loves list for a long time, so I was very happy to see it! I used it at the end of the day, to try it out removing makeup. I found that it took all the makeup off easily (no panda eyes this morning!), and left my skin feeling soft and clean. I also found that a little product goes a long way! It smells deliciously green, and although it was a tiny bit drying, it didn't strip my skin the way some cleansers do. A little HA serum fixed me right up. As soon as I finish my current cleanser, this one will go into rotation. Definitely worth trying if you're on the fence!

reviews.review_title: Not for dry skin; well suited for oily skin types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Youth To The People has some wonderful skincare products and this cleanser has a huge fan base. I had heard it had been reformulated so I was interested in giving it a try when I received it as part of a gratis package, hoping it might be less drying (or really, not drying at all) on my dry and dehydrated skin as the original formulation.   Unfortunately, that was not the case, though to be fair, it felt slightly less harsh on my skin than the original formula. After using it for a couple of weeks, I found the product to be too much for my skin type, and will be either passing this product on to a relative with oily or combo-oily skin for which this cleanser will be better suited or I’ll repurpose it as a brush cleanser.   This is my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.   WHAT I LIKE:  * Consistency - water based gel texture  * Lathers up nicely  * A little goes a long way  * Contains some good-for-your-skin ingredients   AREA(S) FOR IMPROVEMENT:  * Would love to see this cleanser be less stripping and drying on dry or very drying skin, maybe if there was a creamy, milky version of it?   FYI:  * Makes a good second cleanser  * Scent - faint, herbaceous, medicinal  * Glass bottle  * Best suited for those with normal, combination - oily, oily or very oily skin tones. Too drying for those with dry or very dry skin.   BUY 🛍️ or BYE👋🏼?:  * In the winter months, my skin is dry and dehydrated, and this cleanser is too drying for it so it’s a pass for me. BYE. However, if your skin leans more on the oily side, this cleanser might be worth looking into.

reviews.review_title: My favorite cleanser for years and more to come
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried SO many different cleansers, and I believe this is the best one. I’ve been using this cleanser since middle school (I’m a senior now) and am JUST beginning to run out of my last 8 Oz ( just got the 16 Oz for Christmas!). It’s last me way longer than any other cleanser, and I always get compliments on how clear my skin is (minus breakouts every now and then related to hormones and athletics).   PROS: It has a refreshing feel, minimal scent, foams really nicely, takes off makeup efficiently, and you really only need a small amount and a little water to get a good lather.   COMMENTS FOR DRY SKIN: People say this cleanser is too drying, but as someone with dry skin I disagree. As long as I’m only using it once a night, and follow up with a moisturizer (which anyone should do regardless of skintype!!)- my skin looks and feels great.  CON:  My only gripe with this product is the pump that comes with the 8 Oz. Sometimes I find that after pumping, it ends up leaking excess product, and that a whole pump is WAYY too much for my face. I recommend just using the cleanser as is, with the screw on cap and only pouring a dime sized amount onto your hands.  Even then, that’s not so much an issue with the cleanser, but rather just a minor packaging detail that is completely optional to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t give this a 1-star because I chose this brand for being cruelty free and not using animal products which is great, however it did not work at all for me. I tried the moisturizer and cleanser together for a few days and I broke out in a lot of pimples and all of my skin texture came back. I have oily skin but I found it to be stripping and the moisturizer wasn’t very great, and didn’t hydrate/made my skin look dull. I had a good skin care routine before switching but I found out that brand animal tests so I had to switch, and I was hoping that this would live up to the reviews but unfortunately not. It seems as though this line works really well for some people, but for people with acne and oily skin it might not be the best. I have a lot of acne scars and I found the moisturizer dulled my skin which made them more prominent. It smells very fake, like a shampoo you would get from a hotel and the price tag is just too high for what it is.   (disclosure: I am using prescription benzaclin cream and I have acne prone skin)

It is IMO comparable to a number of cleansers that I have purchased at my drugstore, of which some I would actually prefer. On the positive side it did not make my skin tight or dry like gel cleansers can sometimes do and had a nice soft lather. It does not smell bad, it smells nice and clean but it is in no way a standout either direction. The bottle is nice substantial glass (I have the refillable size). So if you have a lot of money and want a NICE cleanser …buy this. If you want to get a bit more bang for your buck I might look elsewhere.

I did not try it again untill 3 days later (why, idk. My life is a mess sometimes). But this time I've been very consistent and so far - 4 days later, I'm digging it..... reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have managed to get to 44 without having any problems with acne. However, the last 6 months i have battled crazy breakouts at least 4 times a month in places i never had zits before.. I cut out dairy & sugar, took hormone tests, tried salicylic acid, acne treatments, a different moisturizer, and nothing has worked. Not until this bottle ran out and I went back to my previous cleanser (Indie Lee) and BOOM! It's been a month of clear skin. Even the first day to switching back my skin already felt soft, and nourished vs taught and dry. Now its clear to me this must have been stripping that natural barrier our skin needs - especially if you exfoliate. This may be just fine for someone else but this was my experience.

reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It is gentle yet effective. It leaves my skin with this nice translucent-like glow! It seems to really dull redness and even skin tone -- surprising for a cleanser! It has a subtly wheatgrass-shot-like scent, but I like it. And, I won't lie -- I also dig how nice the minimalist glass bottle looks on my shelf.  I can imagine this would be good for a wide variety of skin types -- it's neither drying nor moisturizing, and it doesn't aggravate my moderately sensitive skin, but seems to soothe it instead. It does a really thorough clean with just one wash and doesn't leave skin feeling like a film is on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was getting electrolysis done for my face, and needed a gentle cleanser compared to Dr. Dennis Gross AHA/BHA Gel Cleanser. So I bought the Youth To The People Superfood Cleanser, and I couldn't be happier. It's so gentle yet effective in removing the surface oils/dirt from the skin. It doesn't strip the barrier from the skin, so your face doesn't feel tight, dry, or uncomfortable. To remove SPF, I recommend cleaning your face twice.  The best part is the clean smell, it definitely smells natural, so you feel good about using the product. In fact, I look forward to using this every morning and evening.

reviews.review_title: Skip if you have dry skin!!

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this cleanser but I think it’s just not for normal to dry skin. I’ve always had naturally clear skin but in the 3 months I was using this cleanser I was constantly experiencing endless breakouts that left scars and skin that always felt dry. My skin had genuinely never been worse. My skin isn’t even that dry, I think the product itself is just very drying! I didn’t even realize what the problem was until I started trying a different cleanser a week ago and my skin immediately cleared up. I would strongly encourage everyone with skin on the dry side to avoid this product.

Decided I liked this cleanser enough to order a bigger one, and was initially disappointed by the cost of the smallest size.  But now that I’ve received it, I’m pretty content.    I have sensitive, dry, and acne prone skin, so it’s been tough to find cleansers that don’t leave me with dry patches, and I’ve found some that are meant to not be stripping feel like they don’t clean very well, despite probably being just fine.  This one I’ve used nearly every night to wash my face before applying my nightly routine products, and it feels and smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin and large pores. I’ve never had “sensitive skin” and hardly any breakouts, maybe a small red pimple during my time of the month but that’s it. This was at the top of every list on Sephora’s website for those two complaints so I figured it was a no brainer to purchase it. This broke me out HORRIBLY within a week of starting to use it. I had painful, itchy acne that seemed to appear every day, the texture of my skin became a lot more rough/bumpy as well when using this. At first I thought maybe it was just a normal monthly hormonal break out and continued to use it hoping it would resolve itself— as my skin usually does. However, my skins condition got so bad that I had to visit a dermatologist and purchase prescription skin care. Needless to say, I‘ve discontinued using this. WEEKS later, my skin is finally starting to recover from whatever horrible reaction I had while using this cleanser and the moisturizer. I did not notice a difference in my oiliness/pore size while using this, it seemed to have the same affect on those things as my usual cleanser (which is half the price). Would advise caution to anyone who is thinking about purchasing, unless you‘re someone with money to throw away.

Full disclosure: I'm a snob with makeup and skincare (and a grocery list of other things). I'm careful about what I put on my face, near my eyes, etc. So I was content buying this because it had great reviews and clean ingredients. But like, $40?? Are you kidding me? There are so many other products you can buy. I've learned that you should splurge on serums. But a solid cleanser and moisturizer do not need to break the bank.

reviews.review_title: Expensive? Yes. Worth it? Also yes.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I saw people raving about this cleanser and was instantly sold… until I saw the price. I bought the value size because it made more sense price wise. Honestly, it’s very gentle on my sensitive skin and has helped a lot with my redness and acne. Overall the cleanser and packaging are very pretty and the product is very high quality so if you have the money to spare, I think it’s a great option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s super-gentle, highly effective and made with clean, skin-friendly ingredients. The plus point you’re getting a lot more product than most brands give you—a full 8 oz. instead of the usual 5 oz. It comes in a sturdy glass bottle with a pump, which  makes dispensing the gel quick and easy.

I’ve been using this cleanser for years and have loved it because it was vegan and cruelty free with efforts for sustainability. However, recently found out YTTP was bought out by L’Oréal, a muti-million dollar corporations that tests on animals and a huge cosmetic contributor to environmental issues. If you love this brand because of  it’s cruelty-free and has sustainability in mind for its packaging, don’t be fooled.

reviews.review_title: Works well, preps skin for products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a generous sample of this cleanser and it lasted so long and worked so well that I had to buy the full size. I have sensitive, acne, prone, oily skin, I use a lot of skin care, and I wear a ton of make up every day, since I'm either on camera or I'm on stage for work. I feel this is a superb product for a second or third cleanse, following an oil cleanse or balm, and I think it works best in the summer. Southern California has had disgustingly hot summers lately, and I love washing the day away and using this in the shower. My skin is clean and ready for nighttime skin care. I don't feel like it strips it dry. The herby smell took a little bit of time for me to get used to but it's all good. My husband says my face smells like a green smoothie after I use it. 😂 My dermatologist recommended it also. It's on the pricey side, and I'm glad I bought the full size with the travel combo during the Black Friday sale. I like it. I will continue to buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Only cleanser that has helped my acne

Ordered the trial size of this to test it out, have used it a couple weeks now & it's really nice. It foams up pretty good & I personally don't notice a strong smell, to me it's very light. I took one star off only for the price, although I do really like it, the price may keep me from repurchasing it as there are comparable cleansers with clean ingredients as well, at cheaper price points. Although rotating it with other cleansers & using around once a day/every other day, there is a good amount left after 2 weeks. It wouldn't last as long being used daily or as your only cleanser, but if you don't mind the price I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_text: I used this face wash morning and night. It didn’t dry my skin out completely, yet it does a good job at really cleaning dirt, makeup, etc. on my face. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product since it launched at Sephora (twice a day). It has immensely helped with giving me clear glassy skin. I recommended it to my family and friends; they love it as much as I do!!!
Worked so well and smells sooo good! Will def buy again once I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin look and feel so healthy and clean. It really improved my acne and overall complexion. Lasts forever too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: felt nice on the skin while cleansing but had a strong fragrance; my skin is usually not sensitive but this item made me skin really dry and patchy even after applying moisturizer :( had to use a heavy moisturizer for days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i always had troubles using cleansers for oily skin because it always made me dried even though i have really oily skin, but this one is great! it doesn't make my skin dry at all and it cleans  it really well, since the first use i promise it made my skin so bright! im not even kidding, and it helped with the texture of my skin too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite cleanser. Leaves your skin fledgling clean but not dry at all, would be good for all skin types. It is a bit pricey tho

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as VIB perk since I saw SO many rave reviews. It’s a nice cleanser, but it doesn’t beat my favorite that’s over half the price and doesn’t have added fragrance. I’ll finish up the tiny bottle I have but $36 is really steep for a product you have on for 1 minutebut

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not a great cleanser! There is are definitely better options. This didn’t improve my skin and actually made me break out over time. I went back to the origins frothy face wash and my skin has never been better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my 60s and although I have always had beautiful skin my skin tone has lacked the healthy natural pink ￼color, until now! I’m glowing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best facial cleanser by far. It actually cleans your face without leaving your skin greasy nor dry. I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face cleanser ever for matured skin with rosacea ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Personally, I really like this face cleanser. It leaves your face very clean and the scent is light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never written a sephora review before but I had to come on here to do so. I have very sensitive skin with rosacea and have to carefully watch the products I put on my face. I was a bit nervous about this but it feels so refreshing and my skin feels so so clean after each use. Will def try to get the bigger size when I run out of this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for 9 months and did not see a change in my skin. It also doesn’t smell very good. I thought this product would help my skin and it would glow but it didn’t and I am disappointed. won’t buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to cleanser, it doesn’t make my acne prone skin break out and I love the way my face feels after using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only bought the mini of this cleanser and it succeeded in its aim of making my want to buy the full size this coming VIB sale.   But gurrrrrrl, you're $47. I had vowed to never pay more than $20 for a cleanser because it's literally money down the drain. It just goes against my skincare philosophy. And like the Pacifica Kale cleanser is a perfectly good cleanser as well.... buuuuuuuuut, buuuuuuuuuut, my skin does undeniably feel more stripped when I use it. Also when this says you can use a first AND second cleanser, it's true you totally can. The eye irritation is minimal when getting off eye make-up. It's great for the days I'm feeling lazy about my nighttime skin care routine which is like ALL THE NIGHTS. And the smell! I feel so clean, so squeaky clean and like I just had a green smoothie before bed.  Can I get some halp here guys? What should I do? (in cart... outta cart)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this cleanser. I was a strictly Kiehls girl for years but tried this and it’s my new favourite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfectly fine face wash, nothing to write home about. Nothing wrong with it. Nice scent not to strong. Face feels clean. Didn’t notice any change (uneven or acne) nothing got better or worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this cleanser consistently for a month and impulsively switching to a different cleanser just to try new things I immediately returned the new cleanser to buy this again! Its just the best cleanser I’ve ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve repurchased this cleanser a few times now because it’s gentle but still cleanses my skin very well. If I’m wearing makeup, I use this after my cleansing balm and it takes everything off beautifully. On days I don’t wear makeup, I go straight in with this cleanser and it takes off all my skincare products and sunscreen very easily, but without ever feeling like it’s stripping my skin. I’m also a big fan of the packaging- the glass container makes it feel more luxurious and I prefer pumps over squeeze tubes for convenience. Personally, I don’t mind fragrance in cleansers and I found the scent to be very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is everything I was looking for. My skin feels amazing and I was so impressed with the nice glass bottling. I’m looking at all my other plastic container skin products and  shaking my head. Besides that though, this is legitimately my new favorite cleanser, ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite face wash. I've had this saved in my “loves” for several months to try one day. Then I saw Stehfunee rave about it on her youtube page, and I couldn't wait to buy it. It's my best  my best and favorite purchase this year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of my daily skin care staples! It makes my skin feel SO clean compared to other brands that I’ve tried. It smells good, it’s clean and works soo well. Buy this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser gets ALL the dirt and oil out of skin even without a facial brush. BUY IT. i will never use another cleanser again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last few weeks, I’m disappointed to report that I believe it was the source of my new breakouts :( looking to up my skincare game, I changed around a couple of my products. I thought i was just going through a “purge” but the minor breakouts kept coming (usually have relatively clear skin with maybe a couple zits a month, but was noticing multiple per week). I changed back to my cerave cleanser and the breakouts almost immediately stopped. I’m surprised and don’t know what exactly about this product was causing them. Hope this review helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great alternative gentle cleanser. I always switch it up with this, Dr Dennis, and anti aging Peter Roth. My favorite 3 cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product consistency is great but the pump does not work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staple in my skincare routine. 10000/10 recommend. It does not strip my skin or dries it out. I am on my 3rd bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this cleanser. I thought it foamed up nice and worked really well with my oily skin in the summer. The only thing I would consider changing would be reducing the amount of fragrance. I wouldn't recommend this to people with fragrance sensitivities, and even as someone without a sensitivity, the smell was a bit much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product is okay. I was always afraid this glass bottle would slip and shatter everywhere. Won’t purchase it again because of this impractical design.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does contain all the good healthy stuff but as someone who has acne prone skin it didn’t do anything for me.

reviews.review_title: makes me feel good while traveling
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I pair this cleanser with their evening leave on mask that's a great moisturizer. it's super perfect and a good travel size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whenever I need a reset for my skin I always come back to YTTP. It’s sensitive for when my skin is compromised but isn’t drying or stripping. I have oily/ combo skin and it balances in both winter and summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my skin felt so clean, got rid of the oils and gunk but my skin wasn't tight or uncomfortable afterwards and i massaged my skin with the cleanser for quite a while. smells a little like kale nothing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how awake this product makes me feel and my skin was moderately hydrated. I would not recommend for people who are trying to get rid of acne. This does nothing for acne.  So when I’m using this with prescribed acne products, I tend to skip out on this and use a more hydrating cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily/combo skin and this left my skin feeling VERY clean, borderline dry. It takes off makeup well without irritating my eyes. The smell is very fresh and it foams well. A moisturizer is a must when using this product especially if you have normal to dry skin. I am on day 3 of using it day and night and have not had any negative reactions yet so it might just be my new go to cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser takes off my makeup the fastest out of the cleansers I’ve tried also leaves a light glow to the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After watching iamsherkab on You Tube talk about this product I wanted to try it and I love it it smells really really good and my face feels clean and hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I first purchased the Youth To The People Cleanser as a travel size but as soon as I ran out, I right away went to buy the bigger bottle due to how much change I saw in my skin. I have suffered with Acne my whole life as well as very oily skin. I always have an issue with cleansers due to how dry they can be or how oily my skin can get after using it, but i found my new favorite holly grail. It’s helped a lot with my hormonal acne as well as reducing the appearance of my acne scars.  I do recommend not going crazy with it since it can dry out your skin just a tad bit but nothing a moisturizer can’t help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it definitely took off makeup but it dried my face out and made my acne worse in the process.definitely not made for dry-normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nope. Teen son used it and broke out then I used it and also broke out. Might as well had used Dawn dish detergent. Very stripping! Didn’twork for us.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good. Got the mini size and I fell in love with it and just bought the full size. Smells refreshing and cleans well!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product, it really get in there to clean my pores and my skin does not feel tight when I rinse it off. I have sensitive skin and it doesn’t break me out, so that a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. It is gentle, but still does the job. Has a fresh scent and I genuinely feel like this is a great product for my skin. I have redness and oily skin and this feels like it calms my skin and provides many benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truthfully the best cleanser I’ve used! It doesn’t leave my skin dry at all and my face feels so refreshed after each use. Amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combination skin which drifts more to dry skin. I always test new cleanser by not applying any skincare products after washing my face to see if it feels tight or gets drier later and this cleanser didnt make my skin dry or oily, no tightness. I washed my face last night and just slept without applying any other thing & in the morning my skin was normal... no dryness.  I had gotten mini size first and then got the bigger size. I am using it for 1 month and so happy. The only thing I was skeptical and I am still now is it has fragrance which I avoid but so far I have not had any issues but would love if they could remove it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will always keep repurchasing this cleanser it’s so gentle yet powerful enough to take off any dirt or makeup. My skin never looked this amazing
Bon Oil Clenser! sent bon. quand même cher pour la quantité. fonctionne autant qu’un autre!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. I used it for a month. All it did was ruin my skin. It kept creating breakouts for me no matter what. Going back to good old Aveeno and Clinique :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the cleanser itself however the pump is abysmal. It causes so much product to leak out. I’ve bought three of the regular size (237mL) cleansers and each time the pump is faulty. I only buy the refillable as its better for the environment. Customer service is no help as as soon as your 90 days are up they won’t do anything about faulty products. I don’t need a new cleanser it would just be nice to get replacement pumps especially when the cleanser is not cheap. Won’t be repurchasing sadly as it’s too expensive to have this much product going to waste. You can see in the picture i had to put paper towel under the cleanser as that much product is leaking and going to WASTE. Not only is it annoying but also an eyesore to look at and it is wasting paper towel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this cleanser.  I was looking to change up my routine and tried this.  There is no going back to my old cleanser now.  I love the spell and the way it lathers beautifully,  Buy it, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never been better!!! Every since I started using this consistently my skin has been flawless! It also is so refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely one of my go to cleansers now. I’ve been using it for a little over a month now and I think the pictures speak for themselves.  First picture I was using my CeraVe foaming cleaner (teal bottle) and I thought this was the best my skin could get but I was obviously wrong. It was flaky, oily and definitely unbalanced.  Second picture is a month and a few days in. I still have blemishes, but they aren’t angry, infected and dry anymore. They heal so fast since using this cleanser as well.  I get hormonal acne HORRIBLE and this cleanser along with my SolaWave tool has saved me beyond words. My skin is typically really dry and very oily and now I’m hydrated and glowy. I only got the small bottle and I’m def going to repurchase the big one bc wow. I’m a huge skincare fanatic and I’ve used SO many different cleansers. This is the one. If you’re hesitant, get the small one. But thank me later. Your skin will love you.  I also use the ELEMIS superfood AHA cleansing balm beforehand because while this does remove makeup somewhat, it struggles with my mascara.  I hope this is helpful! <3 Note: I got fillers in my lips, I promise these pics are both me lol!!

reviews.review_title: Great for oily skin, beautiful product.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 2 months now, and I'm absolutely obsessed. The scent is stronger than I was used to at first, but it's honestly really subtle once you've used it a few times. I love the way it lathers and how you can use it with varying amounts of water to make the exact lather you prefer for your skin, and as someone with oily and acne prone skin, being able to foam it up in my hands before applying tends to be my preferred way of cleansing. The packaging is lovely, just like with all of this brand's products, and I will definitely repurchase once my bottle is empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser so much!! after trying so many different cleansers my search is finally over. it’s so gentle and makes my skin feel so clean. Go buy this rn you wont regret it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: has a very strong fragrance, I got used to it after a while. but the product is great for my combo skin and didn't feel stripping at all.

reviews.review_title: Great choice, but beware of dryness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now, generally I love to find staple products via review, as do many. This is no different, and honestly I quite enjoyed this cleanser, but I definitely think that it can be stripping for an everyday and night cleanser, if you’re looking for a cleanser that will really cleanse the skin, I recommend this, but it did cause flaking on my more combination and dehydrated skin with prolonged use  for a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin that usually gets angry when I try a new face wash. Not this time!! So gentle yet still cleanses well (I use this after my oil cleanser). Love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It smells great but not too overpowering on the skin. It also feels nice and luxurious on. After months of use, there weren’t many differences anymore and my face got used to it. That’s why I don’t think it was worth it for a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Dried out my oily skin. The smell is great. I don’t love the packaging as it makes it hard to dispense (would love to see a dropper maybe?)

reviews.review_title: put this in your skin routine neow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After a week of using, I’ve noticed a difference not a huge one but i’m not getting breakouts as often my and skin is soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: saved my skin… best thing ever. super hydrating and kept my skin feeling nice and not dried out after like most other cleansers   10000/10

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a refreshing spa day!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To start with, the packaging was very thoughtful. They put it in a brown box that's giving the clean vibe. They also provided 2 caps (handy when traveling)! Not to mention the fact that the color and smell is amazing. It does make my face feel tighter, refreshing, and clean- however, I have a dry skin, and this make my skin feel tighter in a dry way afterward (you can see the flakiness below my nose). I would say it's a bit overprice for its quality. I don't feel that much different. Another thing is that it doesn't effectively remove my makeup. Especially, eyeliner. I can see why though. This is a gentle and clean cleanser, so nothing surprising. I found that by using cotton pads to wipe of the foam help removing my makeup (a great way to see if there's any makeup left or not). If you wear light makeup, you'll be fine. For anyone wearing waterproof or somewhat lots of makeup, consider purchasing a makeup remover. Overall, it's a great product! It did what it supposed to do. So that's why I'm rating it 4 stars. Oh- did I forgot to mention the fact that it's clean and vegan (+ no fragrance)? I'm in love with how effective it is compares to the other gentle cleansers out there. Just 1 star off for overprice and unable to remove all my makeup :))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this having really high hopes. It’s okay as a cleanser, particularly in the morning when I’m washing off what I applied the night before. However, I found that this didn’t remove my makeup very well. So, I’m keeping it, and I still use it now and then, but once the bottle is empty I likely won’t repurchase. Just my personal experience, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Me and my husband both use this face wash a love it! We both have said how we have feel how clean our pores are!!! We both have super sensitive skin and this wash doesn’t not itch, burn, dry out, make us break out, none of that. It really gets in there and cleans your skin!!! Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will admit that it feels great going on and leaves a clean refreshed feeling,  but I noticed that I started breaking out more after using this for only a few days. My search for holy grail cleanser continues...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I have very sensitive skin and a scent sensitivity. My husband has a skin condition that makes it hard for him to find a good face wash. This product works well for both of us as a daily use. I notice major improvement in his skin with less blackhead when he uses this face wash. Guys have it easy. The smell is nice and clean like green tea (duh). I cannot recommend this superfood cleanser enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use cerave hydrating cleanser but this one is so much better, is a little pricey for me but my face like it! I recommend to sensitive skin like me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is perfect! It foams up just the perfect amount and smells light and clean. It leaves my skin feeling refreshed, plump and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve seen many skin influencers rave about this cleanser, I admit it feels nice going on the skin. The smell is awful in my opinion. But I find the cleanser makes my pores even more noticeable and clogged. I really wanted to love this cleanser because of how much hype it has, but it didn’t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite cleanser so far, smells nice and natural, feels and clean and hydrated after wash. Love the ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser because it was recommended to me by a friend who also has dry skin like myself. After the first few uses I didn’t notice anything wrong with the cleanser but as time went on it dried up my face like crazy! And broke me out. I typically use the first aid beauty cleanser and had no issues. I also find after cleansing with this and using a cotton pad with toner after I’m finding that it does not remove dirt/oil from the face. It’s honestly influenced hyped up, mid cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare cleanser for over a year, but within the past few months have had some of the worst breakouts that I've had since I was a teenager. I decided to give this cleanser a shot to see if maybe changing cleansers would help and the healing that this cleanser did within a week is INCREDIBLE. To preface, I get comedonal acne and I also get cystic pimples (usually related to stress and hormones) and I also have oily skin. So far this month I haven't had 1 cystic pimple related to hormone changes which never happens and the only skincare change I've made is this cleanser and a couple weeks later adding in another YTTP product. This is definitely a new holy grail cleanser for me and I plan to continue repurchasing this whenever I run out.

reviews.review_title: I’m on my third bottle and I’m in love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For someone with oily skin this cleanser is perfect. It comes to a nice gentle lather and leaves my skin soft. Has a light scent, not overpowering at all.

reviews.review_title: Skip for sensitive skin tbh (or eczema)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo/acne prone/sensitive skin and i get eczema sometimes on my body. I tried this cleanser bc I heard great things about it and after I used it 3/4 times I even rated it 5 stars because it cleared up some of my acne! However, after a few days I noticed my skin was far more sensitive than it was before and I started getting eczema flare ups even though I have never experienced them on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product it self is beautiful, the packaging and everything and I believe it was over hyped. I thought I enjoyed this cleanser up until it was drying my skin out so much that it started flaking and i have an oily T-zone! It made my skin 10x more oily due to the fact that it was stripping off my natural oils. I went back to my original cleanser, nothing wrong with it I just wanted to try something new, but will continue to use my tarte rainforest of the sea cleanser its the best for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this with the ingredients and ethical aspects of the company. When I first started using this, I loved the light scent and the sudsing quality, but I noticed breaking out easily, which is uncommon for me. My esthetician suggested letting my skin get used to a new product before giving up. Unfortunately, the cleanser turned cloudy and the scent changed. I still used it and noticed less breakouts, but still bumps. Unnerving that the color changed and it seemed to not be as good, so I’m switching to a different cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Try the mini size first! Caused contact dermatitis
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many of Youth to the People's other products and liked them all, so I bought the full size of this assuming I would like it also--and if I didn't, well, it's a wash-off product, so I could use it up and then switch to something else with little harm done. Big mistake. My skin is pretty resilient--in fact, I can't remember the last time a product caused a reaction like this--but the Superfood Cleanser gave me a bad case of contact dermatitis. I had scaly, dry patches above and at the corners of my eyes, my eyes themselves were irritated, and I had an itchy rash on my chin and around my nose. It had to be caused by this product, because I introduced nothing else new to my routine. I have to wonder if some of the people in the reviews who say this broke them out also were suffering from contact dermatitis, since sometimes it looks like little whitehead pimples. After a few days of using cortisone cream, my previous First Aid Beauty cleanser, and Cerave and Skinfix moisturizers, my skin is finally doing better, but I feel far more wary about Youth to the People as a brand now. I normally steer away from fragranced products like those by YTP and am put off by brands attempting to make money by using trendy but meaningless terms like superfood, but I gave their products a try because I appreciated the mostly glass packaging, which is more recyclable than plastic. I will use up the YTP products I already own but will think again before buying more.
