reviews.review_text: The product is nice smelling but overall it made my skin break out in places I’ve never had break outs on before. I also haven’t had a breakout in years until using this consistently. Do not use if you have sensitive skin because it’s very drying and causes red pimple/white heads.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely loved this cleanser! I have super sensitive and acne prone skin and this has done wonders for me! love how this feels when I use it, and feel like i really got a good deal for what i spent. would definitely recommend this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is very gentle and doesn’t make my skin feel squeaky clean (which a cleanser should never do or else its way too harsh!), and smells really good :) its helped clear my skin so much and after a month my skin is clear and my acne scars are fading ! i have oily acne prone sensitive skin and so far i’m loving this cleanser. i bought the mini size in early june and to this day i still have half of the bottle left. i already bought the full size and i truly recommend this to anyone who’s looking for a new face wash or just starting to get into skincare :D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face cleanser! It leaves my skin feeling so clean and really helps with excess oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash!! I feel like it really makes me skin feel clean, and it foams easily. It is not over drying either, and my skin has gotten so much better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is the only fave wash i’ve bought more than once.  i got my grandma to use this and even she loves it.  i got it in trading product after not having it for a while and i can’t believe i ever stopped using it.  my skin is acne prone and some cleansers make my skin feel stripped but this one leaves me feeling clean but not dry.  this is my go to recommendation for clients who want a good all around cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, superficially speaking, I adore the glass bottle and light green soap... and it keeps its nice look after months of use, as you can see from my picture.  I've used this once a day at night time to  remove make-up, sunblock, or the two combined.  With make-up I first use LANCOME Bi-Facil to get my mascara, eyeliner and/or eyeshadow off.  Then two applications of this soap works beautifully to remove the rest.  Only a faint make-up residue from my hairline areas is leftover on my white face towels.  In the mornings I find I don't need to wash my face usually; slept in my face creams and ready to add to.  I do get adult acne extremely easily.. macne and you name it.. as well as flakey in some patches.  This leaves my face clean and soft.. and hydrated.  No acne side-effects.  And has light green tea lovely scent.  Can you tell I'm a fan?!!  I like it :D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and this is a great cleanser for me. Makes your skin feel super clean and fresh. Also I love the glass bottle !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really liked how soft it feels on my skin and has been seeming to be really nice. the scent is slightly leafy which is expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I have oily, acne-prone skin. for me this is great! I used to wet my face and leave my hands wet, and then apply the cleaner. this creates a lot of bubbles. so now, I wet my face, dry my hands, grab the cleanser and then apply to a wet face and it changed everything! I have way more control of the cleanser. very gentle scent, leaves my face feeling clean, soft and doesn't make me feel like my skin is stripped of all of its oils! love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This legitimately is the best smelling cleanser I have ever purchased, I was not expecting that at all. It smells so unbelievably fresh, and is a great cleanser. I have dry skin and this did not dry it out - felt hydrating and my skin felt smooth. Will definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BEST cleanser I have ever used. Big fan of the vegan milk one as well but this is my go to daily cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser has helped my skin a lot and is great for my sensitive and acne prone skin expensive but lasts because you don’t have to use very much at all and it’s nice to treat yourself especially when it’s something that is good for your skin and your health with clean ingredients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For years I had used the cetaphil daily face wash and was able to achieve such amazingly clear skin with it. However, once they reformulated the product I found that it had become irritating for my skin causing breakouts, thus starting my search for a new cleanser. With all the good things I had heard about this cleanser I had so much hope but was sadly let down. The sent is quite pleasing and it forms a beautiful lather but those are about the only good things I have to say. This cleanser caused me to beak out in several places I have never gotten blemishes such as my jaw, chin, and across my forehead. This product simply didn’t work for me, nor do I think it’s worth the price tag!  (I have normal-oily, blemish prone skin!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I get older I’m finding my skin has been changing some. Where I used to have more oily/combo I find my forehead has been more dry than it used to so I tried this in a sample and loved how it balanced out my skin. My forehead is less dry and after I wash I don’t get that super tight feeling that a lot of cleansers tend to give me. This has become my ride or die.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a small container of this and liked it. I felt like it left my skin clean and residue free. So I bought the 8 ounce size. First, the pump wouldn’t work, and I was going to return it. It functioned as a mediocre cleanser for a while. I was away from home for a while and came back to see that the remaining cleanser leaked out of the spout and emptied itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i came across this face cleanser in Sephora and it caught my eye so i bought the small bottle at first to give it a try , fell in love with it . it feels light when you are using it which i like and it leaves my face feeling clean . i don't know how it works to remove make-up because i don't wear it . i love the fact that it has what they call superfood antioxidant in it and that is what caught my eye . i have bought this more the once but now i buy the bigger bottle .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was fine for actually cleansing and cleaning my face, but the next morning my skin was super oily and greasy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i am usually skeptical about trying new things on my face because i have sensitive skin, but i heard all the good reviews to i decided to try. this makes my skin feel so soft and smooth and using. i feel refreshed and i haven’t broken out and i’ve been using it for a bout a week- morning and night. def should try!

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser but travel size cap doesn’t close
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser!! But the travel size bottle is not good. The cap does not tighten all the way so it easily spills when traveling. I’m glad I had mine in a plastic bag, but it still spills all over my other liquid products which was just annoying. Please fix this problem with the cap because I love the cleanser and want a good travel size that I don’t have to worry about traveling with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combination skin, and it works perfectly for me. Been using for about 3 years now and don’t even consider switching. Makes my skin feel super clean and does not dry it whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin that reacts to a lot of face washes. Until now, I have only been able to use cerave. I tried this on a whim and absolutely love it! It does not strip my combination skin, and it’s super refreshing to use in the morning. I have noticed that my skin looks glowy and I have fewer breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this cleanser because so many people enjoyed it but it just didn’t work out well. Personally, after cleansing my face flaked and felt tight. Along with that the bottle would not stop leaking which was likely a problem with my pump, not an all over manufacturing issue. Anyway, I gave it to my mom to try and she complained of the same problems with her skin feeling tight. I thought for 8 oz you get a lot of product with phenomenal ingredients, but unfortunately I will not be repurchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is not my favorite cleanser ever. It kind of leaves my skin dry and tight afterwards (and I have really oily skin). It didn’t really help prevent any breakouts for me, if anything it might’ve been the cause for some. I do enjoy the gel-like texture of it and it lathers up nicely on the skin (in a way where it doesn’t create huge suds but just nice small foam bubbles). It smells clean/refreshing. The packaging is super sleek. That’s pretty much all I have to say about it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, it so gentle and great for oily/acne prone skin. It smells like a green juice? Which isn’t the best but not bad either. The bottle leaks anytime you lay it down but other than that there’s no issues with this cleanser. It’s a bit pricy but worth it!

reviews.review_title: surprisingly worked for my acne combo skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the duo cleanser and vitamin c 10 days ago from this brand and my skin did have a small breakout with 3-4 pimples which healed relatively fast. The cleanser has a really nice texture and works well for my combo skin. It’s not stripping and it has a very nice lather. It’s smells like vegetables but not in a gross way. I say give this a try for about 2 weeks if you have combo/normal/oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw everyone posting about this so i finally gave it a try, but my skin felt super dry and tight after using it and it didn't do a great job at getting off my makeup. pretty disappointed since it was expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face wash! I love the smell and my face feels really clean after using this. I have acne prone skin and this has never made me breakout. I use this once a day so an 8oz bottle usually lasts me around 3 months. It is a little drying so I would recommend using a good moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser played #1 role in helping clear my acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Like the natural goal of this product, I don’t feel clean after, if anything I feel ashy and dry. Doesn’t help with acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I actually just bought the full size bottle. I have acne prone skin and this works wonders. My skin has never been so clear. I love the glass packaging, and the product itself is amazing. I definitely would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has seriously never been so clear. I have very acne prone skin so to find a cleanser that truly works is awesome. The packaging is so nice, I love the glass bottle. And the product itself is amazing. I will continue to re-purchase. I definitely would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dry sensitive skin - not for me broke me out very badly  Clearly it’s not for sensitive skin

reviews.review_title: Worked in Florida, not in San Francisco!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty normal, (not dry, not oily) acne-prone skin and when I first tried this cleanser in San Francisco, it was intense and felt like my skin was squeaky clean, stripped of all moisture, so i thought that I hated it. However, when I tried this cleanser in Florida, I loved it! Left my face feeling really clean and fresh after a day of sweat, sand, salt, etc. so I think this cleanser works best if you don’t have the elements working against you (I.e. a dry climate). If you have dry skin and/or live in a dry-ish climate, I don’t recommend, but if your skin is more oily and/or you live in a humid climate, then I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So gentle yet effective, great for unpredictably Combination skin-type that's oily/dry at different times of the year!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how instantly refreshed and smooth and clear my skin looks after I use this face wash. The only thing is that the smell / fumes it gives off stings my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne prone dry skin and are looking for a cleanser that will refresh but not leave you dehydrated, this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is sooo amazing and foams up greatly and I rlly think that my skin loves it

reviews.review_title: Definitely a staple in my face care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face cleanser!!! I started out with the mini/ travel size. This cleanser DOES NOT dry out my face like others that “suds” up. I was using Ceravè face cleanser because of how gentle it is but this one is just as gentle on my skin so I decided to switch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin so clean and soft, I’ve repurchased this countless times

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product I have really bad acne so I was kinda scared to try it but I am so glad I did my skin got cleared in almost a week and I been using it now for a few months it’s the best I ever tried you either love it or hate it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser I’ve used in a decade - this will leave your skin feeling so clean and ready for the next steps in your routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never been into “expensive cleaners” and always thought the cheap ones did the same thing, but WOW I have very oily acne prone skin. And this has cleared my face tremendously. I also have used the masks from this line and it’s all a 10/10

reviews.review_title: Fair warning to those with sensitive skin…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this sooo bad bc the reviews and it smelled really nice- buuuuut after using it for around a month my skin is so dry, irritated, and breaking out really badly for the first time in a couple years!! Before buying it I thought this was in the same realm as a gentle cleanser and it absolutely isn’t.. So fair warning if you have sensitive skin DON’T USE THIS. I don’t think it’s all bad, but it’s not for everyone and definitely not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser smells really good. It foams really nicely and it is gentle enough to use everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser yet! The product somehow is able to deep clean my skin giving me all the suds without leaving it dry! It’s amazing, could not recommend enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this product no stars if I could. It is extremely harsh and drying and NOT GOOD for sensitive skin at all! It made me break out for months and because of the reviews, I never thought it was the cleanser but as soon as I took it out of my routine, my skin cleared up completely. It irritates your eyes and your skin so the point where it starts flaking. Nothing that smells like detergent and burns your eyes to the point of watering can be good for you skin. Stick to CeraVe. This expensive product caused me to break out and left me with hyperpigmentation afterwards. DO NOT RECOMMEND.

reviews.review_title: I like it wouldnt recommend tho.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive had this cleanser for about a month now and i just wanna say becareful where putting it cause it does make a mess!! its not for traveling, very drying sometimes leaves my skin a little irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the small bottle to see how my skin would like it and I have very sensitive skin. After trying it my skin felt so refreshed and clean. It did not irritate my skin at all and did not leave it dry after. I also like the feel of the glass bottle. I will definitely consider buying a larger one next time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've seen so many people rave about this product but it stings your eyes and leaves your skin extremely dry afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing, love the ingredients list. Always leave my skin feeling fresh and clean, the perfect cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser. Not irritating to my sensitive skin and removes makeup well. This will be my third purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly can’t tell if this is making a difference or if my whole skincare routine is just better in general. But overall, I think it’s a good cleanser and have continued to use it for at least the last year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it is soft cleanser, it doesn’t leave your face tight and dry. as well it removes dirt and oil well. for the price point i was hoping for more cleansing in my pore. has not refined them, or cleaned them out much. will finish, but won’t be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This may be the cleanser I use for the rest of my life.  I have always had super sensitive skin when it comes to face wash and this doesn’t stink, irritate or dry my face out at all.  I always get red rashes around my eye whenever I use another wash but never with this stuff.  I know others have had different experiences since everyone’s skin is different, but I highly recommend at least giving this product a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive, combination skin. This cleanser is the only one I’ve been able to find that has cleared my skin after one use, and keeps my skin under control all around. It’s gentle, but really deeply cleanses without over stripping it. I keep coming back to it time and time again.

I have normal to combination skin. I use this cleanser and the air whip moisturizer at night. It has made an incredible difference in my skin and does not leave it feeling stripped or compromised like other cleansers do. It’s also a good price for the amount of product you get since you only use a very tiny amount. I will repurchase this cleanser for as long as it’s available!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard such rave reviews about this cleanser so I finally bought it, and now I get it. This cleanser makes my face feel squeaky clean, and has a nice scent too. Changing up my cleanser plus a couple other things in my routine, I've already noticed a big difference in my oiliness and acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is one of my absolute favorite skincare items! It cleans really well & my face feels so fresh afterwards. I definitely feel like it has improved the clearness of my skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It is very gentle and feels great on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a simply incredible cleanser. It effectively cleans without feeling like it strips the skin. It works well with my sensitive and dry skin. I love that it comes in a glass bottle and has such great clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great if you have oily-acne-prone skin. It is very foamy and it cleanses very well without drying. It helps calm down redness and makes my skin feel great. I pair it with the moisturiser and oil from the same brand and it works wonders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing face wash! I double cleanse first with the Clinique balm and this washes everything off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne-prone skin. This is a great cleanser that doesn't dry out my already oily skin. the price is a bit much so I will have to buy a cheaper alternative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t believe how much I love a facial cleanser. Wow! Really gives you a squeaky clean feeling that’s also hydrating??? What is this sorcery! I don’t even need to pre cleanse or use a makeup remover or anything. This is my new unmovable ride or die!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. One pump is all you need. I use this every evening, and I feel like my skin has never looked better. After cleansing with this cleanser though, I go immediately into my skin care because my face does feel dry after using this. That’s my only complaint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HEAVENLY. i love this cleanser so much! i use it every morning because it’s not too drying or anything. also smells a bit like spinach but i don’t mind, it feels more natural that way!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product been using it for about a month and it doesn’t break me out and clears my skin this and the moisturizer are amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been trying other products in YTTP brand for quite some time now.  Love this cleanser. The fragrance is good and leaves my skin super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t been able to buy a full-sized container yet, but the 59 ML bottles hold me over for a solid month so I can pick up a small one once in a while.   This cleanser is heavily concentrated, which is why it lasts so long for me. Just a dime size drop foams up enough to cover my whole face and using a face scrubby ensures product does it’s job.   This cleanser does not leave my face feeling dry or tight, but not oily either (something some cleansers do) and sometimes I forget to add moisturizer after washing because it leaves my skin feeling THAT good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love… this cleanser has absolutely helped my skin so much. i have combination skin and have gone through so many cleansers and this one has by far been one of the best ones. it’s a bit more pricey but worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is my ultimate favorite. I have combo oily skin and this just cleans my face great. I feel refreshed everyday washing it!

reviews.review_title: perfection and fits for whatever type of routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and i feel like this balances it out. I feel glowly but at the touch its not greasy or anything afterwards. I am absolutely in love with this product. A clean and vegan brand are my favorite things to look towards when buying a product

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my face luminous and has a nice clean smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I accidentally ordered this product when I was trying to buy something else by the same brand but i decided to keep it anyway, and let me tell you this stuff is phenomenal!! Any cleanser I've used is a little harsh on the eyes but this particular one is so gentle, smells amazing and gets ALL your makeup off - even the stubborn eyeliner and mascara. It doesn't dry out my skin or cause any breakouts. I've only been using this stuff for about a week now (day and night) but my skin looks and feels AMAZING. I'm so happy I accidentally purchased this. You need maybe half a pump for your whole face and it'll do wonders. Big bottle with a ton a product that will last you a very long time. I'm pleasantly surprised with this cleanser, it'll be my new go to! I use about 2-3 other YTTP products and they always leave me very impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for more than 3 months now. It cleans my skin with one application and it does not dry my skin. I have sensitive acne prone skin and I use it as a non-invasive cleanser in combination with other face washes that have active ingredients like salicylic acid.

reviews.review_title: left skin feeling dry but not clean..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t like it from the first use, but I thought I would give it 3 full weeks of use before I decided how I actually felt about it. I honestly thought I just needed to give it a chance since I was loyally using my previous cleanser for about 3 years.  I have tried twice a day , once a day , a full pump , a half pump …. Nothing I do seems to help get my skin actually feeling clean… within minutes of getting out of the shower, my skin just feels tight and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser! Even after clean my face with micellar water i have to wash my face with it! My skin is always soft after

reviews.review_text: It smells nice and feels very gentle on the skin but I feel a filmy soap residue on my face after using it no matter how thoroughly I rinse it off. Hasn’t benefitted my skin in any way either.

reviews.review_title: The favorite child of my skin care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this cleanser for the first time last year and when I tell you I cried after each month, believe me.  I have struggled with facial cleansers since my acne started in 5th grade. There was always 1 wrong reaction and 2 things that were average beneficial.  This cleanser  Calms, hydrates and for the first time unproblematically cleans my skin.  The container is a clean, minimalist and esthetically pleasing glass. The scent is not overpowering and smells natural and fresh. And a half pump washes my face and neck so it last forever with me. Simple yet luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Jai adorer ce cleanser la sensation est wow je feel comme si jsuis super propre

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works great for my combo acne prone skin. I feel super clean without feeling dry. Great scent. Worth the splurge!

reviews.review_title: Pricey but best cleanser I’ve ever tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of different cleansers - some of them pretty expensive ones like tatcha. I love this cleanser because it is so gentle and gets the cleansing job done without ruining barrier. Word of warning - I have found a pump of this product is way too much for me and enough to be drying. A half pump is plenty to get the job done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! It’s gentle, but extremely effective. I can feel it take off any makeup and oil I have on my face but it’s not too stripping or harsh. It has a mild scent that’s perfect for the morning wake up too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this soap. The only reason for the 3 star review is I hate the bottle and the pump. It leaks everywhere, makes a mess, and is just a waste. Please please please fix the bottle+pump. I love this soap, but given how much leaks out it's just a waste and I can't stomach it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not someone with sensitive skin. I use intense actives every day and have no irritation but one week of this product and my skin barrier was destroyed. Over several days my skin got super dry (this is weird because I have oily skin), red, and irritated. Even my soothing moisturizer burned when I applied it. I stopped using this and my skin got better. I yet again tried this out (because I did not want to waste it and it was too late to return it), same reaction. It destroyed my skin barrier. I ended up throwing it in the trash. I know this works for some people but I recommend caution with this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m absolutely in love with this cleanser. It was recommended by Arnell Armon I think on either her YouTube or IG, I’m not sure, but I genuinely love it so much. It doesn’t have a strong scent in my opinion to the point where it’s overpowering, but it smells so so good. Another thing I love about it is how it feels on my skin like I can’t recommend this cleanser enough.

reviews.review_title: leaves skin feeling refreshed. very gentle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve used. Leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. It smells good and lasts a long time. Gentle on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so heavily fragranced, you can tell they tried really hard to make it smell like greens, but it’s just fake fragrance. Nothing special. Just seems like a marketing gimmick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: good cleanser but it’s not great for the price. idk if i will repurchase, might try another one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best smelling cleanser/PRODUCT I’ve ever used. It’s so light and fresh I wish my whole life could smell like this. On top of that it has really cleared up my acne prone skin, it’s not perfect but I can see a difference after a little over a week. It’s gentle but my fave definitely feels clean. Probably my favorite cleanser I’ve ever had and I’ve tried a LOT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product after hearing about it through varies social media platforms. I love it and I would definitely recommend it and it’s helped my skin look a billion times better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this cleanser because Hyram, the skincare guru, constantly raved about it.  Then I realized he was sponsored by YTP.  Now I get it.  This cleanser is just a cleanser.  There's nothing special about it and it's definitely overpriced.  Skip this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Giving 3 stars because it effectively cleanses, smells pretty good, and the texture is nice (lathers up nicely). But it is not anything special and definitely overpriced in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it, but I didn’t think it did anything life changing for my skin. Smells refreshing and a little goes a long way, so it will definitely last you a while ~6 months for me). Perfect if you don’t have any blemishes/problem skin. Does what a cleanser is meant to do, but I don’t think I would purchase again since I’m looking to target more skincare concerns.
What an obnoxious Marketing photo!! They should improve the unfriendly, snotty look!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SOOO GOOD! This is one of the best cleansers I’ve used, I feel so clean after using this and my skin feels so refreshed and nourished. Highly recommend, I love this brand so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I love this cleanser, my face feels so clean after using this product, no film or residue left on the face. I can not recommend this enough! I love this so much I even bought the mini for honeymoon trip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this! I have acne prone combo skin and while this is too strong to use twice daily, I use it nightly after oil cleansing to remove makeup and it is a really great clean. If you’re combo like me I recommend to use it once daily and in the morning use some kind of toner, I use micellar water and or a Lush cleanser some days in the mornings instead as they’re not a strong cleanser. But yeah love this honestly, my skin likes it better than the Cerave foaming cleanser (that was too stripping)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I bought the travel size to try it out and I love it! My pores have reduced in size and my skin looks so clear!

reviews.review_title: A great product, but not for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For dry skin, this is not for you! It tried my skin out badly. It smells good and feels clean, but this is only for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t have too much hope for this, I was sure it was over hyped. I truly thought I wasn’t going to like it but I have been enjoying it for the couple weeks I’ve had it. I have very sensitive acne prone dry skin with dermatitis(chin) and eczema flare ups. So far it seems this is actually improving my skin. I use this as my second, and morning cleanser. It smells nice and gets a decent lather. It is non drying and I have had no reactions to it, and I would know the morning after first use if I would. I’m also prone to CC’s and everything has been going great in the respect as well. It leaves my skin clean but soft and bright. I got the mini to try on a whim and I plan to purchase the full size when it’s gone; I like it that much. If you have an allergy to any of these ingredients I would of course avoid it. I mostly use Asian exclusive skincare and have yet to find a cleanser I truly like that’s not in that category until now. Very excited and the full size has a pump!! Could not be more excited about this product and it makes me want to give more of this line a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser I have oily sensitive skin and I found this works best for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not great for dry skin, it’s too stripping. Your skin will be begging for hydration. Maybe this is ok for the summer when ur face is oily but the tatcha cleanser is so much better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. Very fresh smelling. Purchased this for a second time. This is a staple product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser! It smells incredible and it does a great job cleaning my skin without drying it out. I have been using it for the past two years, morning and night, and any time I try to switch, I always go back because nothing else works quite as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only had this product for about three days but my face is extremely dry and irritated. This is the only new product in my skin care routine and it completely destroyed my moisture barrier in a matter of days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and effective at taking off my face makeup and most of my eye makeup. Also love that it's fragrance free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this face wash for about a year and it is amazing. It doesn't leave the skin feeling stripped while still feeling clean. It is hydrating and the glow it gives my skins is insane. Also the ingredients are amazing, I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing face cleanser! Has a very light, refreshing scent. Does not leave skin stripped or overly dry feeling. Would highly recommend for all skin types!

This gel cleanser feels effective, has a subtle, fresh (almost grass-like) scent. A little really goes a long way with this. I don't find it drying like other reviewers, but my skin does lean SLIGHTLY oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have normal-dry skin but I break out a good amount so this has helped. I don’t use it everyday because it does dry my face out but every couple of days I do and my whole existence feels so cleaned. Especially my nose area feels so clean and nice. It is quite pricey which is why I opted to trying this as the mini first. It is very thick and I use just a bit which is perfect. :) I think I will be purchasing the 36 dollar one heehoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i love this cleanser my face feels so clean when i wash it off.it totally smells like kale

reviews.review_title: THIS is your sign to add to cart & BUY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You know how we are supposed to drink our daily greens? Well, think of this cleanser as a dose of “super greens” but for your skin. It leaves such a clean feeling to the face, and is very gentle! Add this to your daily regime and the results are guaranteed. The only regret I have is not finding this product sooner! Don’t think, just buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this stuff on vacation after I left my usual cleanser at home. I’ve heard great things about it and decided to give it a try! Unfortunately the extremely heavy fragrance just did not do it for me. My skin also felt stripped and dry after using it. I wanted to love this face wash because the glass bottle is so cute, but it wasn’t for me. If your skin is sensitive whatsoever to fragrance or imbalance in your moisture barrier- beware!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product! It is a game changer in my skincare routine. Although it’s a little pricey, it is completely worth it. I even bought the full size bottle because I love it so much. You really can do a half pump morning and night and it cleanses so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought this twice and love it. It makes my face so clean but not over drying to the skin. I also like that the ingredients are clean so i’m sure i’m not putting chemicals on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this prior to the hype and loved it for a couple years. But I stopped using it when I decided to try a different (more affordable) face wash and realized how drying this made my face feel in comparison to the new one I tried. I think this cleanser is a decent one but the Aveeno Oat cleanser works better and is so much more affordable for me at least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is nothing special. It’s nice if you want a gentle and simple cleanser. It does not remove makeup well, and you can find cleansers at the drugstore that are just as good or better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, believe me I DO love it. My skin, not so much. I'm pretty sure my face started breaking out after daily use. I do love how it makes my skin feel afterwards but not loving the reaction I'm having to this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cleanser! I cant say enough good about it. It doesn't strip the skin and has such a nice cooling feeling. I wasn't such a big fan of the smell but I got used to it.

reviews.review_title: Not the best for normal to dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance is amazing and it definitely feels like a luxury cleanser. I do think that it is more suited to oily skin types and isn’t the best choice for normal skin that leans slightly dry. That’s not the fault of the product, though, but I do wish that the description below didn’t imply that it’s for all skin types. It’s a great option for oily/combo skin that wants a very purifying cleanse, though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A simple cleanser that didn’t over dry my skin.  Also really liked the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love YTTP and was so excited to try this cleanser - it claims to be for all skin types but I have dry skin and as soon as I towel-dried my face off my skin basically started cracking. It left me sooooo dry that I had to loooooad up on moisturizer. Ended up using it a few times before returning. Sad :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: But not quite sure it cleans it all. I had some pimples since started using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ah, I bought this because the sephora employee mentioned it was a cult fav & very popular. They mentioned that they personally use it & love it.   & I have to say, I've had this for over a year now. I can't use it every day because it really strips my skin & leaves it dry. I don't find the smell to over powering though not an every day cleanser & disappointed as the price & reviews would of lead me to believe it would of been a better product.   Better luck with the next cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely the best cleanser i have ever used. i am never going to switch!!!! love it!!!!! amazing for my dry skin and it’s just so refreshing and smells very natural and just a great cleanser overall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed to find that this product has fragrance in it.  Not only that but it quite literally smells like your dads favorite bar of soap. Very lackluster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my sensitive skin! I have never loved a face wash as much as I love this one. Just this brand in general...the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t strip skin, love the lather and skin feels good using this once a day for over a year now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product broke me out, I tried it a few months later and it still broke me out yet again. I really wanted to enjoy this product because I heard very good things about it but sadly it didn’t workout for me. Smells great though lol. Gave me red itchy bumps on my face and a lot of irritation.

reviews.review_title: FABULOUS cleanser! Fresh, soft and no tightness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gosh darn I love this stuff. I have been an EXCLUSIVE Lush skincare user for 9 years and I’ve finally started branching out. This one is one of my favorite cleansers ever!! You’re face feels clean, refreshed, yet hydrated just enough to feel no tightness and smooth as silk; especially after my Farmacy makeup melt away balm! Those two are a winning combo before bed after wearing makeup. I’ve been trying all sorts of cleaners but I find myself going back to this one day and night. I will say I do not JUST use this, I use it as my second wash. I alternate between the first wash and then use this after. But it’s awesome! If you’re more minimal I would still say you could use just this and adore it just the same. I have more oily, terribly acne prone skin that gets red easily and this helps with all of the above. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like to switch up my cleansers and this is a great go to if you have a happy face. When my face isn’t so happy (blemishes etc.), I switch to something a bit more robust to help with my troubles. Wish this could be my one and only though that keeps my happiness. Can’t have it all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It’s gentle on my rashy skin, and when I have the energy to keep up my skincare routine, this pared with other products seem to help with the rashiness.   My issue is with the container it comes in. I love the style of the container, but when the container and contents are in a warm environment (like a hot steamy shower or an non-airconditioned bathroom) the pump acts as a siphon and large amounts of the product are lost overnight. This cleanser is not cheap, and it sucks to lose a third of the product to the shelves in my shower rather than my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this facial cleanser! I’ve been using it with a silicone cleansing pad and my face feels amazing after. I got the mini size because I typically break out when I try new products and wanted to see if I would with this.. after a week using it, no breakouts and my face feels so soft.  Also, for a mini size, this cleanser lasts awhile! I will definitely be investing in the larger size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product! I’ve been trying to find a good cleanser for my sensitive, acne prone skin for so long. Finally tried this one and can’t get enough! I struggle with bad acne, redness, and pores… this hits all those targets. I have combo skin and it helps with my oils and acne without drying out the skin. A nice glass bottle with a pump, easy to use, and smells amazing. My skin loves this product and I will continue to repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect MAIN cleanser for my skin I feel, this product really does what it says & cleanses everything off of your skin that isn’t good for it to be there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live by this cleanser. I will never ever switch. This is the perfect formula for my sensitive skin, it is one of the few cleansers that cleanses without stripping! Also love the large glass refill bottle, i just refill my pump bottle that i bought way back when, so much more eco-friendly! I can’t stop praising Youth To The People to everyone, my favorite skincare brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it so bad. I wanted to like it because of how fresh and clean it smells and glides on to the skin. However, after using it for a whole month, I’ve experienced the worst breakouts of my life. It often left my face very dry, which is a problem I have never encountered with any cleanser before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cleanser morning and evening for a month and it caused me to breakout with white heads.

reviews.review_title: Causes breakouts/ skin irritability for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out the first time I tried it, it was the only new product in my routine. Tried it again a couple months later to see if it really was this product that breaks me out and sure enough breakout again after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser!!! It’s my favorite one to use every morning. It’s feels so nice and refreshing on my acne prone skill so it just leaves it feeling clean and good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sampler. It just moves my makeup around enough so it ends up on my towel. Not impressed.

reviews.review_title: Great daily cleanser for Oily/Combo skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thoroughly enjoy this cleanser! I have Oily/Combo skin. This face wash gives my face a perfect clean without feeling like I’ve completely stripped my barrier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended by a friend. I bought it without much thought and then used it! I love the smell. It feels like a little private spa moment at the beginning and end of my day. It also is a good facial cleanser, but I will buy it again because of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love YTTP and this cleanser has changed my skincare. Since the first few days my skin has started to feel less oily cleaner and softer. I'm a sucker for clean beauty, and the scent on this is amazing! I have a really really oily T-zone and dry cheeks. But this doesn't strip all of my moisture either. I really love this product and will be buying the bigger Bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice cleanser with a cute, minimalist and recyclable glass bottle and pump with a great price tag for a vegan product. It works well on skin, however it doesn't lather in my opinion. Smell is super light to no fragrance at all and has lasted for 3 months with no issues. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels amazingly clean and not stripped.  Fresh “green” feeling - is that just in my head?  Gorgeous.  On my third bottle and love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this cleanser. I have used at least 3 full sized bottles and it is amazing. And the fact that it is clean beauty is an added bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been debating on splurging on this cleanser for over 2 years, I finally just made the purchase and I kid you not, I regret not buying it two years ago when the thoughts came into mind. My skin feels so plump and hydrated after washing my face, it’s truly the best cleanser out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: in three days i broke out with huge red bumps. was the only new skin care product in my regimen. i stopped using it and my skin cleared up. idk a cleanser has never made me break out. not sure how “clean” it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin’s texture awful, got blind pimples which I usually never get. Switched cleansers and now my skin is doing a lot better. Try at your own risk, most likely isn’t for everyone. My skin is normal type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by-far the best cleanser I have ever used! A little goes a long way, and it has a nice celery smell. My face feels smooth and clean after I use this cleanser. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product, but the top of two different mini bottle fell apart and I purposely go these bottles so I would know what product I was using (I know I can just transfer it to a reusable travel bottle).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my skin has been breaking out lately which it never used to do (thanks bc lol) so ive been trying new skincare products for my face. this has been raved about so i wanted to give it a try! my face has drastically changed and this is the only new product i introduced into my routine!! highly recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This produce is so boujee and smells so expensive. I love that is comes in a glass bottle and has made my skin feel so clean and has it looking so healthy! I feel like I have my life together when I use this. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good cleanser, and it smells pretty good in my opinion. However, it doesn’t do anything special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for about 6 months now and i love it!! It does not leave a sort of residue and always makes me skin feel fresh and clean. i wish it came with refills so i wouldn’t keep getting more big glass bottles though. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: broke out my face after a few uses don’t recommend - this product is a skip for acne prone skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute fav cleanser. It doesn’t strip my skin and it feels so clean after. I’ve repurchased several times already

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell, I love the texture. It’s smooth and it leaves my skin soft, clean and brighter !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal and sensitive skin with an oily t-zone, and my face felt completely stripped of all moisture after one use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my face feeling really clean. I have fewer break outs. I suggest a really good moisturizer though because it can be a bit drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It is the best water-based cleanser I tried but it's too expensive for a cleanser. You can get the same results with cheaper ones.
