reviews.review_text: This product is so highly recommended that I had to try it. I hate to say this but it irritated my skin. Not only that, but the smell to me is overpowering. The spinach/greens smell is too intense. I would use it if it worked for me, but the irritation obviously just isn’t worth it. Somehow, even when keeping my mouth closed I get this nasty taste in my mouth when using the product. I’ll stick to my aveeno calm and restore cleanser. It’s much cheaper and does a better job for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser! I use it every night before bed as part of my skin care routine. It leaves my face feeling so clean and refreshed. I feel good purchasing YTTP products because they are committed to no animal testing. I love their products. I like that it comes in a glass bottle. My cleanser initially came as part of a set. I definitely recommend trying their sets. It’s a great way to try out the products. Now this cleanser has become my go to cleanser every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleaner made my face breakout a little and it didn't help my blemishes at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i did like this cleanser for awhile. it wasn’t until a couple months ago i noticed my skin was SO dry after using it. it completely strips my skin and makes my face feel tight. i’ve switched to another one now and my skins doing much better. woudnt recommended for that reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t dry me out and I love the refills. If you wear eyeliner or mascara, I find I need to use an oil or cream to break down the eye makeup first before using this cleanser. I’ve purchased all sorts of cleansers from Sephora and this is my favorite, I’ve been using it for the last two years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings about this cleanser. It’s very aesthetically pleasing (love the glass bottle, the fresh smell, the color and the healthy sounding name) When it comes to the actual product I was underwhelmed. I think it’s mostly because I prefer more of a foaming aspect in a cleanser, and this one hardly foams at all. My face just doesn’t have that clean feeling after which is important to me. Luckily I only purchased a travel size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fave face wash. This has really cleared my skin. I find it very relaxing and lathering. Super recommended. This has a light natural green natural scent. I really love this scent actually and it smells so good! Coming from someone picky with scents too and has headaches with perfumes. Loved this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Drying. Dried my skin out so much it itched. Stripped the oil. Teenagers or those with oily skin, may prefer this cleanser. It did nothing for me except cause my skin to cry and itch from dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made me break out but doesn’t make my skin dry I usually never get pimples and i have a lot its been a few months already i thought it was just purging but no

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best facial cleanser in the market. I have tried a lot of cleansers and nothing compares to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only cleanser that cleared up my skin, my only problem is the glass container. Mine fell off my counter and shattered. Once I stopped using it, my skin flared up again with acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this cleanser! I'm a big smells person and this has just the most refreshing and intoxicating smell. As a cleanser it is fantastic -- does the job of taking makeup and oils off without any stripping of the skin. Paired with the YTP Superfood moisturizer, my scent buds and skin are in heaven!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For this price point I was expecting a little more I guess…I wasn’t impressed. Smells great, but my face just didn’t feel clean afterwards. I will be finishing it since I paid enough for it but won’t be repurchasing or recommending.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. The smell is so earthy. This is by far my favorite face cleanser ever. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay, this cleanser has a lot of benefits it seems like but it doesn’t do what I hope a cleanser does which is wash away any and all makeup, oil, dirt I have on my face. This could work with double cleaning (using a cleanser balm and this) but it still doesnt make my face completely clean. I recommend Vanicream Facial Wash (way more affordable as well) :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I get the craziest amount of dirt on my face everyday, and have been struggling with acne and finding an everyday cleanser that cleanses my pores thoroughly until I found this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. It's very simple and to the point, cleanses the skin without leaving it tight and dried out, and a little goes a long way. I have the large size with the pump, and the travel size, which I refill for trips as needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this face wash. In the past I have only used CeraVe because I was nervous that anything new would break me out, but I heard such great things about this face wash so I wanted to try it out. I’m so glad I did because it’s my new favorite. It works so well for my skin, my face feels so nice after I use it and it smells so clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The feeling this gives my skin after each use - is amazing! One of the only cleansers that doesn’t leave my face feeling stripped of all oils while still noticeably clean and refreshed. I use the small, travel size and it lasts me forever! Due to the nature of the product, you only need a tiiiiny bit of the cleanser before introducing water and it becoming a workable lather. I know it’s easy to skip the directions, but it’s totally worth it to massage the product into your skin for the suggested time. Doesn’t break me out, doesn’t smell bad, and I LOVE YTTP for using glass!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing! Leaves my skin feeling super clean and is great for sensitive skin! It has really helped even out the redness in my skin and my skin really feels brighter! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a free sample of this from Sephora a couple months ago and completely fell in love! I love this face wash. Love that’s it’s clean beauty. I have now Bought the full size. Definitely think it works. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: literally the only face cleanser I can use, my skin is very very sensitive and I would either have flare ups of red splotches (dermatitis)  when using any other type of skin care but this face wash and really this entire line has saved my skin. Very little fragrance at all- smells fresh

reviews.review_title: Made texture and acne look worse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I would have read some of the reviews closer before buying. I was so upset with how my skin looked after use. It dried me out, and I am SUPER oily. It made my hyperpigmentation and acne look so much more pronounced and emphasized my texture. I’m glad this works for so many others, but this is a skip for me. There’s products that work much better for less!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’m on my second bottle & i love it SO MUCH !!! this cleanser is legit & makes my face feel all nice & clean without it being stripped & dry !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried to many different cleansers and this one is so far the only cleanser to actually clear up my acne. I still am getting minimal hormonal acne but I see a significant difference in my overall acne, skin texture and brightness of skin. I have repurchased this product twice now and plan to do it again!!

reviews.review_title: not the best for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the worst cleanser, I appreciate the glass packaging and makes it easy to refill/ reuse. I have already dry skin, and after using this with an oil cleansing balm, my skin is extremely dry after washing my face. For the cost of how expensive it is, I would say dry/ combo skin beware.

reviews.review_title: BEST face wash for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this face wash! My face has never felt so clean before, I’ve noticed I haven’t been as oily as I typically am and my face has a nice glow to it. I was worried about the slight fragrance it has to it but I wouldn’t worry if you have sensitive skin like me, I would’ve had a breakout now and it’s been a week since using it! I would highly recommend this to anyone with oily and acne prone/sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really enjoying this cleanser. It’s really subtle and the smell is refreshing. I use it mostly in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice cleanser. It lathers/foams up easily, has a nice scent, and feels good on the skin. I would give it 5 stars but I don’t think there’s anything SUPER special about it to warrant the price point. I don’t notice any difference in the look or feel of my skin but it does the job and doesn’t break out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a mini size a few years ago and my skin felt so amazing and clean after using and it helped with my acne, but I did not repurchase due to price. Recently I decided to splurge and repurchase because it had worked so well for me then, but this time around my skin was dry and tight and after a week of using it I had breakouts all over my cheeks :( disappointing because it used to work nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It feels nice on my face, but it’s horribly drying. And it leaves my skin feeling squeaky clean which I don’t really like. My skin is on the dryer side naturally so it leaves no oils. I’m about halfway through the bottle but I wouldn’t buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is an amazing cleanser. I use it as the second step in my double cleanse otherwise it's not enough to remove my makeup, but otherwise very soft and gentle on my dry skin.

reviews.review_title: One of the best cleansers on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good product for acne prone/oily+combination skin. My face feels clean and fresh without feeling like the moisture has been stripped out of it. I noticed less breakouts as I kept using this cleanser and its safe enough to interact with all my other skincare products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells lovely and fresh and a nice gentle cleanser. I personally need a stronger cleanser for my acne prone skin but this would be a great gentle cleanser for other skin types. Is a bit pricy though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously such a great cleanser, I have super dry and flakey skin and struggle with acne and redness. This helped with my redness and fade a bit of my acne scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this cleanser for nearly two years and it is absolutely the best cleanser I have found for my skin. I have mildly oily/acne prone skin. The cleanser leaves my skin feeling clean but not stripped of all moisture. On the rare occasion that I do try a different cleanser I find that I’m not satisfied and always come back to this one.   As much as I love this product, I would NOT recommend it for someone with dry/sensitive skin. I think it is best suited for people with oily/acne prone skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin, and this cleanser does not cause my skin any irritation. It does not strip my skin of any moisture, and leaves my face feeling clean and refreshed. There is a slight smell to it, so if you are sensitive to fragrance in your skin care, you may want to be careful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product for sensitive skin! It's a game changer. Hepls a lot all my zone where i had imperfections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash. I’ve always struggled to find the right products to actually clean without causing dryness or that left my face still feeling dirty. This face wash definitely cleans your face without leaving it dry. A little definitely goes a long way and it’s worth the price. My oily skin has never looked better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a game changer. I have been using it for 5 months and all my dark spots are gone! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: fav cleanser i’ve ever used. i have acne prone skin and it keeps the acne away and doesn’t leave my skin too dry or oily after. i use it for the morning and nighttime. my friend and i in the photo both use this and neither of us are wearing makeup in the pic

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Two words... FREAKING AMAZING!! Love how a little goes a long way with this product. Also, It doesn’t make my skin feel dry after I cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many products on my skin and I get irritation with so many products. I have tried so many dermatologist recommended products and they all broke me out. This face cleanser is my holy grail! It makes my skin feel so clean, hydrated and glowing. No irritation at all. The price is a bit high, but at this point I will pay the price to have a product that works amazing on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not necessarily what I expected I think it is an overhyped product in my personal opinion. It didn’t foam up the way I would of liked it to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!  I find is works great as the perfect neutral face wash.   It doesn’t make my skin better but it doesn’t make it worse( I already have really great skin but it’s very sensitive  )   So in my books that’s a win ! I love it and buying my second bottle already !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cleanser bc everyone said it was rlly good but it made my face break out so bad, i’ve never seen my skin look so bad in my life. I’ve only used it for a few weeks, hoping that it will clear up but its only got worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product.  It is amazing at removing make up (even double wear foundation from Estee Lauder).  It reduces redness and enhances the natural glow.  I have rosacea, so redness is a major issue.  I'm so happy.  I feel like I have met my forever cleanser.
Excellent cleanser, my latest favorite and I have been using it for months now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product, doesn’t leave my skin dry after. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser!! And a little goes a long way so this mini size has lasted me months. I will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Day 3 of Usage:  Product has a mild spinach & kale scent (which are listed ingredients). The scent can be unpleasant but it’s very mild so it doesn’t bother me and feels fresh.  Foams nicely once lathered.  Effective with cleansing the skin and does help remove excess makeup.  Skin doesn’t feel oily, dry or like there’s a residue after using.   I have positive feedback and do recommend the product but nothing truly stands out about this product for me YET. It’s just another cleanser. I do prefer my Philosophy facial cleanser which is also cheaper. I will continue giving this a try though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this cleanser right when I turned 30. I found that it really helped with my dry, sensitive skin. It doesn't feel drying but still does a really great job at removing makeup. It gets really sudsy easily and you only need the smallest amount of product to clean your face, which is nice, because it is a bit on the pricier side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly disappointed with this product. It was by no means terrible but for price and the hype around it it was a very basic cleanser and was nothing special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is my HG. Anytime I stray from it, I always come back. I’ve lost count of how many times I’ve repurchased. I have combo skin that gets oily through my T zone. I use tret at night as well. This cleanser keeps my oil under control without over drying my skin. It also helps keep my sebaceous filaments on my nose under control. I can use this year without issue. I recommend this to all of my friends who have combo or oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite face wash. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry. It leaves it feeling soft and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just ok. Nothing special. I don’t get the hype…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells really nice but doesn’t feel like it cleans my face at all. It’s really hard to get any makeup off and kinda feels like a soap BAR and leaves your face feeling like that too. I’d recommend the bounce cleanser by glow recipe I’ve been using that the past 3 years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Do not use if you have very dry skin, I used to only have dry patches on my forehead but now my cheeks, chin, and forehead are extremely dry now. I’m having to apply moisturizer 5 times a day to keep it at bay. Overall a good cleanser in general but not for dry skin

reviews.review_title: infiltrated its way into my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This snuck up on me. Transparently I didn’t find massive differences in my skin from using, just that it didn’t break me out. It’s pretty good at removing makeup, has a very nice smell and isn’t drying. The lather is lovely and the packaging is fairly sturdy (the lettering can come off over time which is a peeve of mine.) I originally bought the travel size and used it while going abroad. I was delightfully surprised at how much I enjoyed using it and how much my skin liked it. I’m a bit of a skincare junkie so once my trial size was finished up, I moved on to another brand. But then months later found myself missing this so I ordered the full size! Just finished the full size and will be restocking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this cleanser! This is one of those products that I always rebuy. It's so gentle on the skin and leaves you with a clean feeling. i like to use it after a makeup removing balm to make my face feel clean and striped of any excess oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used a travel size/sample of this YTP cleanser. Overall it is a nice product and a little goes a long way. I was nervous that as a gel it wouldn’t work well on dry skin.  It didn’t dry out my skin or make it feel stripped. I wasn’t sure about the scent at first (as someone else mentioned it does smell like a green tomato plant) but I ended up enjoying the smell. But I won’t purchase a full size. I just feel like there are other cleansers that just as good or better and more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes i like this product but no i dont think it’s a game changer in any way ….

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like the freshest of spring days. It’s so packed full of amazing ingredients I adore this cleanser every single time I use it! Some find it a bit drying, but I find it leaves my skin clean without being dry. I use this as my second cleanse when I feel my skin needs a refresher, kind of like veggies after a night out drinking. Good for the body! I’ve bought the massive refill bottle to keep this topped up at all times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s expensive.  It didn’t do anything for me… It didn’t worsen my skin nor made it better. I really wanted to like this facial cleanser. However, I LOVE the glass dispenser. It’s very chic and elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to cleanser. I’ve repurchased done many times. The smell is so refreshing and it has definitely helped my skin so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I ever used. I have combination skin and it gives me the best results. I won’t left my face so dry but neither so oily….. LOVE IT!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s so funny, I used this like 2 years ago and at the time I thought it didn’t agree with my skin (I thought it dried it out too much) but then realized I was using it wrong. Nowadays I rub it between my hands for it to foam a bit and apply. My skin is nice and supple when I rinse, all ready for my next steps. Get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Went into Sephora looking for a new cleanser. I have pretty clear dryish skin and i wanted something that wouldn’t be too harsh. Was recommended this by an employee and can i just say i freaking love it. Leaves me skin feeling soft and smooth. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product receives a lot of mixed reviews, divided between people who think this is a holy grail product & others who claim that it's stripping & dries out their skin, between the two I lean more towards the former in terms that I thoroughly enjoyed the product but probably wouldn't repurchase because of the steep price alone. That being said, I got the opportunity to test the mini version of this cleanser through YTTP in exchange for my honest opinion & it lasted me much longer than I thought it would. An amount smaller than a dime is more than enough to create a beautiful silky lather that feels so soft on the skin. Each person is different so I by no means want to say other's experience with this cleanser is wrong but I have normal-dry skin & this cleanser did not strip my skin in the slightest, rather it left me feeling fresh faced & soft. I wouldn't categorize this product as moisturizing nor like previously stated, drying, but it gets it's job done. If you've been eyeing this product but are hesitant on buying it because of the mixed reviews, I'd honestly say it's worth a try...buy this mini & test out whether it's for you or not :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: sosososo good im in love!!! Best cleanser ever and lets not even start on the smelllll its amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely feel super clean after using this. I as surprised tho as it is a bit drying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin, and I thought this was going to be too intense for me, but it’s actually not at all! I love this stuff, I use it once a day and it makes my skin so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for about 2 years now and haven’t looked back. A literal green smoothie for your face. A perfect cleanser for my oily/combination skin girls and boys! For me personally, cream cleansers are just too heavy on my skin and prefer this gel like formula. I look forward to using the every morning and night and will be repurchasing this for the 5th time:))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for oily skin, but slightly stripping for dry skin. I have acne-prone skin that gets dry in the winter. I wanted to hate this but love how it keeps the pimples away. However, it definitely dries my face out when I use it daily at night. Great product, suitable for my sensitive skin, but probably better for oily skin. Also, I have lots of skin allergies, especially with fragrance, but this one didn’t cause any reactions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using this for years. i’ve tried every single cleanser for acne out there and went to the dermatologist. i got this as a free sample and the little bottle changed my skin. i recommend using it at night to start off to see how it works for u. i truly recommend it. wish i had before and after pictures
My favorite cleanser of all time! It gets your skin very clean but doesn’t make it feel dry. The perfect combination. I will never use anything else.

I’ve never written a Sephora review before. But this cleanser is incredible. It’s the best I’ve ever had. I love how gentle yet cleansing it is. Not harsh, clean ingredients. It’s amazing. I’ve turned a bunch of my friends onto it also. Also, the bottle looks beautiful on a counter which is a huge plus :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I use this cleanser I breakout so badly.  I ran out of my normal cleanser so I’ve been using this for a week and my skin looks HORRIBLE.  Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My first bottle was defective and slowly leaked from the nozzle nonstop but luckily I was able to exchange it! This gentle cleanser is very hydrating and works well for all skin types. Leaves your skin glowing and smelling fresh. Perfect for sensitive skin if you are following up with actives!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: amazing product, leaves your skin so soft. i think it works best if you have oily skin (i do) as it reduces my oil a ton! pores feel/look smaller and smoother. love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful cleanser- love to use it at night as the second step of a double cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I live laugh love for this specific cleanser. I’ve been using this cleanser before it “got recognition” and it deserves every ounce of recognition. It always brightens my skin whenever I use it, I love the way it glides on my skin and does not irritate it either (my skin is very sensitive) Beautiful 5 stars  KEEP IN MIND THOUGH: one of my biggest mistakes in the skin community is believing everyone has the same skin, please see if you have oily, combo, dry, normal and etc skin!! Know your skin to treat your skin properly :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I I brought the travel size version because I wasn’t sure what to expect even though the reviews looks good,( I’m an skeptical person), but I ended up loving it. It felt nice on skin, I didn’t feel like my face was dry after using this and personally love the smell. I love that it made me feel like I was glowing afterwards. Plus it made it easier to remove my makeup, I will admit that I had to keep lathering it into my face to get all of the makeup off but I didn’t have to get more product to remove it. But overall love it and will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_title: Did not live up to the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I only use it at night and that is if I used makeup.  It really cleans I will say that.  But dries me out in the AM.  I heard such good reviews about this product.  Just sad it did not live up to the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It doesn't make my skin angry, it helps a ton with my acne (especially the blackheads on my nose which nothing ever seemed to help with), and I'll probably stick with it until the end of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the kit with the vitamin c and moisturizer with this. Made me break out horrible sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it’s my favorite cleanser that i’ve ever tried and will definitely repurchase in the future. it smells good, feels soft while applying, and makes my skin feel great (plus it doesn’t leave a sticky feeling on my skin like a lot of other cleansers i’ve tried). the only issue i have is that i don’t get a pump with the mini size so it’s a bit difficult to get out, but that is something that can be solved by buying the full size which i will in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Kale, Green Tea, Spinach cleanser.  In the winter time, my skin tends to be dry , so I just use a little bit of it at night.  It tends to dry out my skin during the winter time because the weather in Canada is so cold and dry.  Use it along with the Kale + Tripeptide 5 Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Superfood firm and brightener serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, acne-prone skin and a minimal routine, so I really need a cleanser that fights acne as well as cleansing, and this one does a great job! Love this stuff, my skin always is considerably less red, plus I wake up the next day and my face looks and feels noticeably better! You look forward to using it if you have any kind of irritation. However, after consistent use, though my acne was nearly gone, my face began to feel very dry and tight. A thicker moisturizer or oil would probably compensate, but since I'm sensitive to heavy creams, I ended up switching to Krave's Matcha Hemp Cleanser, which feels the same but doesn't foam, so is less stripping (and a lil cheaper lol) Still, I recommend this one to anyone who asks, especially if you are on the oily side! I think it's the best cleanser at Sephora and still might come back to it in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pleasant smell. My skin feels clean and calm after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser, my skin feels super nice after. I like to use it in the morning, it smells so fresh and clean! I knocked off a star because I tried to take it off at the end of the day ( sunscreen, makeup) and it didn't do as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser! It’s so refreshing and makes my skin feel so clean! I have oily skin and love how much this foams and cleans my face without making it feel dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser and have been using it for a while. It isn’t really drying and has made my face feel cleaner and smoother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this cleanser for about the last year ever since seeing it hyped up on Tiktok. After trial & error w/ hormonal acne this really is one of the best cleansers if your skin is easily irritated. Other brands like Cerave give me deep pimples with no head for example, but this doesn’t irritate my skin like that. BUT I do not think it’s effective all on its own. I recommend The Inkey List oat cleansing balm first, and then this for everyday if this face wash works for you too. I think this is just a normal, nice, decent face wash that most anyone could use !! I still struggle with acne so personally i will be switching it out of my everyday routine for something that will target my problems better, but i will forever keep it in my routine for when i need a nice gentle cleanse <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favourite cleanser of all time! I just purchased another travel size for my vacation because I can't go away without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this ! It’s so clean and fresh feeling - makes my face feel super clean ! Smells delicious too !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended to me by an employee when I was looking for a new face wash. I love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser mainly because Youth to the People are known for their ingredients and performance when it comes to skin care. However, 'this didn't give what it was supposed to had gave.'  It's  almost like this should have been a step 2 in a double cleanse process and not marketed solely as a cleanser. The pump never worked which really defeates the purpose of its entire packaging. Overall I'm not impressed and it's not something to recommend at least not for me anyway. I am a black woman with combination normal to oily skin for some insight. I'm going to continue to use it simply because I paid for it but it really doesn't do anything super spectacular for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and leaves my face feeling clean without any dryness. Will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! My skin is sometimes a bit oily and this product keeps it fresh and hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser!! Very fresh smell, made my dry, sensitive skin feel clean without feeling stripped. I bought the mini to try before buying the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser was GREAT the first couple of days, but then I noticed that my skin was starting to breakout. At first I was sure that it was because my period was coming but as that came and went, my skin was getting worse. I skipped using it one night and the following morning I noticed my skin was looking way better. I’m not sure what ingredients caused my skin to breakout because I’ve never had a product break me out before. Make sure to test this before you use it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser! I've repurchased 2 or 3 times now and every day I use it. It's a gentle cleanser that doesn't strip the skin, but it still gives you that perfect cleansed face. It's wonderful!

reviews.review_title: Made my combo/oily skin break out much more.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a few times and didn't make full connection that this cleanser made me break out when I normally don't.  I would make excuses thinking it's probably my period coming or I ate too much junk etc, but now I tell every time after I use it, while it did clean it, it also cause me to have much more breakout.  I'm not sure which part of the cleanser is doing this but it didn't work with my combo/oily skin and it took me a while to figure it out but I'm pretty sure now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was really excited to try this product, but it made me break out more and I already have acne prone skin. It also felt like soap to me which I didn’t really like. Not my favorite product, but I wish it worked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve re purchased this a few times now I love it, I have dry sensitive skin and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling super dry and leaves my skin feeling soft and clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product but sadly, I don’t get the hype from the other reviews. This feels like regular soap and my face doesn’t feel that cleansed after. Kind of feels like there’s a film left over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect cleanser for my oily skin. Not too drying but still cleans thoroughly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The search is finally over! I’ve been looking for a gentle cleanser for my sensitive skin for a long time! It leaves my face smooth and removes makeup like a charm! The price is well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes the skin feel very clean, but not drying! Has a lovely light scent, reminds me of ivory bar soap!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Would have been nice if the pump from the 8oz bottle just fit this size. Also wish I’d known that before I threw the original bottle away and kept the pump. Otherwise love the cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have you ever woken up in the morning and the air is heavy and thick with heat, and you dread having to wash your face with warm water? well this face wash will honestly make you want to get up and out of bed. after using this for the first time last summer, i was very exited to use it every morning, or after spending many hours in the lake/ocean. Its refreshing, cooling and dare i say brightening? the smell alone makes me smile. my acne didn't scar as much either during the months i used this... idk if that has any correlation. its so GOOD

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews and I really wanted to love this product for the hype but this is the second time I buy this product expecting different results. I have oily skin so dry skin is rarely an issue but immediately after using this product my skin dries out pretty badly, especially around my mouth area. it's such a bummer but it just doesn't work for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few weeks now, followed by the YTTP Triple Peptide Cactus serum and YTTP Caffeine serum in the morning. I'm not sure if it's the cleanser, one of the serums or a combination of the three, but my skin has never looked better. I've struggled with my skin for a longgggg time. I've been on Accutane twice and tried most lasers out there to remove scarring but something about the YTTP products have changed my skin in the best way and I won't be going back! Scars seem less visible to me and the compliments have just been pouring in. TRY THIS PRODUCT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn't a game changer. Felt a little overhyped. Wasn't stripping and had a lighter thinner gel texture. Loved the pump and was good for everyday use. Foamed up well, but honestly wasn't amazed or anything. Will use up but probably will try something else after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was too drying for my sensitive, combination skin; however, I can see how it would be great for oily skin. And I love the concept of the refillable glass containers. Wish it was a better match for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels softer and more supple after I wash,  which hasn't happened since the first time I used Dr. Brandt back in the day.  Other cleansers left my skin feeling stripped, like sure they cleaned my skin,  but didn't provide any protection or nutrients.   I am so glad I tried this cleanser. I will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser but I don’t give 5 stars because the pump spills all the time and it is a waste of product. You need to change that kind of pump. The cleanser is fantastic and smells so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This cleanser is definitely a must have! It did clear my skin very well + it’s natural. I used to have bad blackheads on my nose and a little bit on my cheeks and none of face washes would get them out. I used to have origins frothy face wash and it did clean my skin very well but it didn’t get them out, this one did. I followed all the directions and massaged it for like 15 seconds before washing and it really works. I was skeptical in the beginning bc I’m used to more foamy rich, more hard cleansers and I thought this wouldn’t work very well but it surprised me definitely. It does leave your skin a little bit dry but it’s not a problem at all if u hydrate and moisturize right away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin feeling cleansed without it feeling stripped. Works great on my dry breakout prone skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product with great results. I would highly recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went with the smaller bottle to try it out and was very happy with this product not only is it perfect for my combination skin the mini bottle last for a long time using twice a day. Will be purchasing full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love the way my skin feels! i got the small size not knowing if i’d like it, and i’ll definitely be getting the bigger size when the time comes! has a nice lather and scent, and doesn’t feel drying on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just recently got this and only got the smallest size to try, It’s pretty small but will last awhile. It made my skin feel so fresh but unlike my previous face cleanser it doesn’t take off my makeup (I know I should use a makeup remover anyways so not a negative thing) this made my skin feel so good and I can’t wait to see the difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only been using this for a few days. It only takes one small drop for it lather up and have full effect. Makes my skin feel so silky and gives me a glow. I love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always been the girl with acne, this cleanser leaves my skin clean and glowing. I love the smell, I strongly believe it’s helped me with my acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample and it broke me out immediately all over my chin area where I normally don’t get pimples? Only used it a week and it was making my skin get worse! As soon as I stopped using it my pimples stopped as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser and use it daily. Especially love the pump packaging. Makes it so easy to use.

reviews.review_title: It makes your skin feel squeaky clean.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser.  It's great for oily/combo skin.  It is balancing and is good for pores.  If I double cleanse, I like this as the second step. I have had fewer breakouts since using this.
I have combination skin, this product leaves my skin smooth and not dry. Best cleaner I've used in my life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I heard so many good things about this on youtube and tiktok but this cleanser stripped my skin dry and left it red and sensitive, especially on areas where I am more oily. I tried it out for 3 months and I used it every night. Now my skin barrier is damaged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this cleanser, after hearing the hype about it. The ingredient list is good but I found it really stripping on my skin. My skin is prone to dryness but this cleanser made me flake up no matter how many hydrating serums and thick creams I used afterwards. I think this cleanser would be better suited to oily or normal skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this! Best cleanser I have ever used. My skin feels super clean after and still hydrated; my skin has never felt tight and stripped of oils after using it. It also smells amazing and only a small amount of product is needed so it will last a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It feels so hydrating and leaves your skin so smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeeee this product! I’ve been using it for 2 years now and wouldn’t change it. The packaging is glass and it’s  very aesthetically pleasing. Whenever I use it doesn’t leave my face feeling tight and works perfectly with my sensitive skin since it has no added fragrance. They also sell the refill bottle which is slightly bigger than this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried countless facial cleaners and this has been by far my most favorite yet. I feel like it truly cleans everything I had on and my face looks nice and fresh there after! I highly suggest this facial wash!

reviews.review_title: Gentle and doesn’t dry your skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this face wash. I’ve been using it for a year now, it’s helped cleared my skin up so much! It’s super gentle and foamy, and lasts for a long time! I have the 8oz bottle and use it twice a day and it lasts for at least 5 months! Highly recommend this face wash!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone in my house keeps stealing my facewash from me. I blame Youth to the People for making them do it! Honestly though, whenever I'm at Sephora I find myself picking up a bottle because I know there's no better cleanser than this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I tried different brand but cleanser is the best

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly love this cleaner! It has good quality ingredients, and for what you pay for, you get a lot of product. 8oz of goodness! I have repurchased this cleaner 3 times already. I don’t think it’s leaving my skincare routine anytime soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser it’s gentle and effective. It has a light foam and leaves my skin very soft. I purchased one for my mother as well and she loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It leaves your skin feeling so fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to AM cleanser all year round. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and plumped. One of the best gentle face cleansers on the market. Go for the BIG bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for over a month now and my pores are less noticeable, my skin texture is improving, and the discoloration I had is slowly fading! It doesn’t feel too drying either. Probably my fav skincare product now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my 4th or 5th bottle and I am obsessed. The price at first made me want to look for cheaper options however after the first bottle I’m hooked. This stuff cleans your skin so good and is an amazing start to skincare. Love Love Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product but the glass bottle itself is frustrating. There is no easy way to dispense the cleanser and I end up using a lot more than necessary just because it’s difficult to get out. The full size likely doesn’t have this issue but I wanted to try it out before committing to a larger version. I really like the way the cleanser smells it is very fresh with a hint of spinach. This cleanser feels gentle on the skin and not stripping. I do really like it. However my favorite cleanser is from farmacy and is a little bit cheaper so I think I’ll stick with that product instead. Overall this os a great product and you won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like running through a field of fresh spring foliage under a bright, blue sky. A little goes a long way and it froths up nicely, but it's a little on the thin side. I don't wear much, if any, makeup on the regular so this does fine cleansing, but wouldn't use it for makeup removal or any heavy lifting. Great as a daily morning cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This makes my skin feel so soft.  It is the best cleanser and works with just a small amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have strictly used Cetaphil Gentle Facial Cleanser for a long time. I purchased this face wash after seeing it trending across social media and it has not disappointed me. My face does not feel tight or dry after I wash with this cleanser!

reviews.review_title: You need to pre cleanse with this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a creamy, foaming cleaner. This is not it! Not enough lather and needed to pre or post cleanse. My skin never felt clean. I'm using it as a morning cleanser now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations for this product, but it really didn’t smell great and left my face tight after washing…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this cleanser because of all of the rave reviews I read. But all and all. It’s VERY average. Nothing particularly special and I didn’t see any differences in my skin. I will say it did last me quite a while though! Almost 6 months using it morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product is great… but am I missing something with the refill size? the pump from my other bottle doesn’t fit on the refill size…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Made me break out so bad & took forever for my skin to return to normal ! What a waste of $36 !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is not bad! Smells great and definitely calmed my acne down but is a little drying and leaves my face feeling tight after washing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well for oily skin! If you have dry skin or even combination I might skip on this. Even my super oily skin has to get used this face wash because of how powerful it was. Took a star off because I didn’t even get to the second use of this product before the pump broke and I have spent about 2 months pouring the product out each time I want to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used my points to get a sample and am soooo happy I did! Absolutely love this face wash. Makes my face feel clean without stripping it and making it feel dry and tight. Ordered myself more and am stoke to see how things go long term!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every since I’ve used this soap my face got so bad I’ve got tiny red pimples on my cheeks and my skin texture got so bad I never break out on my forehead and every singe using this I’m and there also red and tiny it’s giving me pimples like that all very over hyped!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good! I’ve been using for almost a month and can really tell how calmed down my face looks. I have some red skin/discoloration and dullness but this has brightened my skin quite a bit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love this product until they changed the formula. It doesn’t foam anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I’d give it a 4.5 if I could, it’s such a nice gentle cleansing product that has helped clear up some of my forehead acne. However the acne on the more oily points of my face tend to stay put for a longer period but mostly due to mask-wearing. Price is a little exorbitant but my skin has been feeling so fresh and glowy! Not to mention it smells so clean and good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke out my oily skin SO bad! It even took my skin from extremely oily to super dry and flaky! I stopped using the whole line and immediately my skin cleared up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Saw a bunch of youtubers using this so i decided to give it a shot and wowww its definitely lived ip to its hype. I used to use the drunk elephant cleanser but i felt like it was too expensive for the amount i was getting. This one doesnt dry or strip my skin at all and leaves me feeling smooth. Anyways love this and would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It smells lovely and leaves my skin truly clean without stripping or drying; it also lathers really nicely, which isn't always a guarantee with clean products. I'm 48 with sensitive skin (touches of rosacea), and this feels incredibly soothing. I also love the packaging: The bottle is glass, and one pump is the perfect amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It doesn’t leave me stripped or tight and feels great on the face. It has no issue removing all the sunscreen and dirt from my face at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product itself but the pump sucks it up when not in use and just slowly leaks it out of the pump spout. Unfortunately I didn't realize that is what was happening until it was too late to return to Sephora and contacting Youth to the People has gotten me nowhere, such a shame because this is NOT a cheap cleanser yet so much of it is being completely wasted by poor packaging. I guess you could transfer is to a new bottle but you shouldn't have to do that when you are paying 40 bucks for a face wash. At least one other person has commented about this and there is a reddit thread from like a year ago where people are having this issue, so it's a long term issue YTTP aren't solving.

I unfortunately have to leave a negative review despite enjoying the product. Similar to other users, the pump leaks everywhere after use. I tried contacting Sephora and they wouldn’t do anything since I placed my order over 2 months ago. However, the product was working well until the pump started leaking which didn’t start until several months after purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. Didn’t like the salad smell at first but grew to like it. Works good for my skin. It doesn’t remove makeup tho so u need to double cleanse with makeup remove or micellar water first which is a bit annoying.   The packaging sucks tho. While I appreciate what they trying to do with them being glass instead of plastic, it makes them a bit dangerous. I don’t like having to worry about dropping it bc it gets slippery when wet. Also according to reviews their pump design is awful and i don’t like the screw cap either. So i solved that problem by buying some cheap plastic 6oz bottles with flip top on amazon to store the cleanser in and then just refill it from the ytp cleanser bottle. I would suggest ytp use a plastic bottle with a flip top on it for the smaller size and then only use glass with screw top for the large refill bottles.
