reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this face wash about 2 weeks ago. And at first I loved the way it made my skin feel but now I’m breaking out really bad which is uncommon for me. I don’t know if my skin is purging since is it a pore minimizer or if I’m having a reaction of some sort. Has anyone else experienced something similar after using this face wash?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This clears out my pores without overstripping my skin. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: REALLY LOVE THIS CLEANSER FOR OILY SKIN. Love the foaming action and would definitely buy the bigger bottle next time. You only need a small amount to cleanse. I use this day and night. Plus, I like the green smoothie scent it has. It’s very refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is not bad, it actually leaves my skin soft and hydrated but the pump does not work. You just can’t press it all the way down so it’s impossible to get the product in this way, which is very annoying. There are good cleanser out there with better packaging so I recommend buying another one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It smells so good and creates a beautiful lather. One pump is plenty, so I feel like it will last a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle on my sensitive skin. This is my new go to for face wash!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this facial cleanser. I switch up products from time to time but I will probably stick with this one. My face is combination but mostly dry right now and this leaves my face clean and clear. My lady who does my facials has commented on how amazing my skin has been looking since using this (in combo with Clinique moisture surge)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it’s a love and hate relationship with this cleanser. adored the smell because it reminded me of a facial or a spa. the only two things that didn’t work about this is: didn’t feel like it cleansed my face fully and the pump it came with never worked. depends uniquely on each person, if it didn’t work for me, it could be possible to work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is OK to use on your face a little goes a long way if you have sensitive skin you might want to consult your dermatologist before use I have  sensitive skin in this product was fine for me but personally I didn’t see a lot of a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser makes your face shiny and soft. It comes with a travel cap, which i absolutely love. It only takes one-two pumps. The smell is clean with a hint of spinach, it’s perfect for a everyday cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the eco friendly packaging and glass bottle but the pump came broken??? A more annoying inconvenience than you would think… but anyway I’m really enjoying the formula so far and I like how you can slightly smell the presence of the ingredients- just reinforces how clean and natural the cleanser is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does what needs to be done. This is my 3rd purchase and I don’t think I’ll drop it from my routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful bottle, great cleanser. But am I the only one that had issues with brown stuff accumulated inside the pump? The goo itself doesn't touch the actual cleanser and hasn't affected the quality but it's so bizarre and I can't figure out what caused it! I keep removing the brown stuff but it keeps reappearing becaude there is more on the inside of the pump that I can't get to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser there is! I used to go to a dermatologist because of my severe acne and was afraid to use any other face wash other than the one my dr recommended. However, I received a small 1oz sample of this face wash one and my skin loved it! Every since then I’ve been using it and I am not changing! Ive used it for over a year now and I’ve even recommended it to my sisters and bf from how good it is. Love love it!

Best face wash I’ve ever used. Reason for that is the instant freshness this cleanser provides along with deeply cleaning and respecting the skins surface. So nourishing and incredible. Ladies get this for your guy if you want him to start getting into skin care. It’s impossible not to like and you can both use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hated it made my skin dry don’t get the hype for it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face wash it doesn’t have a very strong smell and I was kind of scared to get it because I read some reviews saying that it was really bad for dry skin(which I have) but I still wanted to try it and in my opinion I don’t feel like it drys out my skin it’s a really nice face wash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this product out in their mini version test kit, used it for a month and fell in love!! My skin is very sensitive but this cleanser did not irritate it at all, it is so gentle and smells very fresh. I feel like it actually cleans my face which is an obvious perk!! I purchased the big size and will definitely be a loyal customer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! I recently experienced an acne flare up and this has helped clear my skin up. I’ve also noticed a glow to my skin. I will be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to cleanser for years now! Gentle but very effective, it never leaves behind any makeup residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite cleansers, lasts a good amount of time. Super gentle on the skin, great AM cleanser for a light weight clean feeling. Can be a bit drying but if followed by a good moisturizer it’s amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not for me. Heard the buzz around this and tried it out but it dried the heck out of my skin :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me tell you....this stuff right here!  This is it!  My skin literally inhales this stuff and after using this product my skin looks bright, tight and glowing. I have been using it twice a day for about 3 weeks and I'm not even halfway through the bottle. One pump is plenty and creates a good lather. I don't wear makeup often so I can't honestly comment as to whether its effective at removing makeup products, but it definitely leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed.  This is my new fave and I'm so glad I found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I would sell my soul, give my life… for this cleanser.  Kidding? Or am I. But this cleanser literally saved my skin. I use this with the Cleansing Balm from this brand and let me say- I. Am. Obsessed. My skin has never felt more cleansed. The lather is beautiful, the ingredients are clean, and the smell refreshing. Buy this, it’s worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to find a cleanser that cleans but doesn’t dry out my dry skin for yearsssss and now my quest is over because I have found my holy grail!!! This cleanser is it!!! It cleanses my face soooo well and I never get that dry feeling that makes my skin hurt. If you have dry sensitive skin but love a good clean face, get this one you won’t regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This skin cleanser has completely changed my skin from really bad acne to now looking the best it has ever been

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s my favorite cleanser! I use it everyday and it works for every skin types.

reviews.review_title: one of the best I have tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a really good face wash, light but effective and it smells really good. I also love the dispenser and the packaging. Maybe I am looking for something a little stronger but I would still recommend it to anyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It does not strip your skin and it gives such a nice, fresh feeling after washing your face. I use this everyday and this does not disappoint. All you need is one pump in you hand with a little bit of water to really get a nice lather. It is also a really nice price point considering the fact that you are getting 8oz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t foam, dries out the face, you’ll need to moisturize a lot after

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing! I feel so fresh and clean after using it. Love the packaging and the glass bottle! I apply it with wet hands to make it froth up a bit better.

reviews.review_title: why did anyone say this was good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this cleanser because a certain someone raved about this cleanser and how good it was for oily skin and oil control and for me cleansers just,, cleanse like i dont have a holy grail cleanser because every cleanser just does the same thing some worse some better but this cleanser. holy wow was this cleanser bad, it didn't smell good at all, the pump at the end had huge issues for me and the cleanser started to accumulate around the pump and turn brown and become unusable. the cleanser itself dried my skin out so bad and my skin is an oil mountain, just a never ending stream of oil and for a cleanser to leave me feeling so tight and dry was pretty much unheard of for me. The person who recommended it said that it would leave your skin not stripped and refreshed....no. my skin felt so stripped afterwards and i was rushing to put on my toner each time i used it. used it up, never again, no please go spend a good $36 dollars elsewhere, personally i like the inkey list salicylic acid cleanser or the tatcha deep cleanse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite cleanser, only thing that works for my sensitive acne prone combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I’ve ever used.   I have combination skin, tending more and more towards dry everyday plus the gift of rosacea. It doesn’t take much to cause my skin to flare. Not once has it had an issue while using this product in the AM and PM. My skin feels refreshingly clean without that tight, stripped feeling. The fresh, floral scent is something I actually look forward to as both a “Good Morning” and a “Let’s Start to Relax” part of my daily routine.   It’s such a relief to have a go-to product that is gentle on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to use in between my acne cleansers and absolutely love it. It did not break me out and made skin feel so clean & bright. I love the scent too! Next time I will definitely be buying the full size bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was super disappointed by this product. In my opinion it smelled good but it made me break out REALLY BAD almost immediately after using it. I usually have good skin and I didnt change anything else in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just no…this contains fragrance which you should stay away from in your skincare. It has the worst smell ever I can’t even describe it but it makes me want to puke!! The lather is nice but it just doesn’t do anything great for my skin. It’s a no from me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clean the skin but a little drying. Tried a mini and won't buy it anymore, but it's a good cleanser after all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this cleanser. I have very sensitive skin and breakout from everything. This makes it feel hydrated and clean. Only reason why I wouldn’t give it a 5 star is because of price because it’s easy to go through fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I wasn’t going to buy this cleanser because of the price but a lot of people were recommending it to me so i purged and bought it and I definitely don’t regret it. I have dry skin so i have trouble finding a cleanser that wont strip my skin and this does just that! Amazing at taking off makeup including waterproof mascara! Will be repurchasing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser feels wonderful to use and is very good for my skin.  Where many cleansers dry out and strip this one definitely does not.  It is not a deep cleanser or a good night cleanser if you wear makeup as I have noticed that it did leave behind some makeup and dirt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product comes in a thick glass bottle, which is strange for a everyday cleanser. I had the not so pleasant experience of this bottle breaking and shards of glass ending up all over my bathroom floor. Then customer service refusing to return or resend a new one after spending close to $1500 on purchases for the month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought that a face wash would be my favorite part of skin care till I used this. It leaves my skin super soft and refreshed. I love the reusable packaging but super worried about breaking the bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had my eye on this cleanser for over a year now and was super excited to get a trial size of it. Unfortunately my hopes were dashed. While the packaging is beautiful the cleanser itself was a disappointment. My dry skin felt like all of the moisture had been sucked out of it. The scent was much stronger than I expected and quite unpleasant, bordering on bitter. If it wasn't so heavily fragranced I would consider saving it to try again in the summer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i was gifted this cleanser and after using it for ~ 2 weeks i'm in love! i have quite hardy skin, and this cleanser leaves my skin so soft after i use it, even before i put on my moisturizer.  it works great as a second cleanse as well! i'm usually not a fan of scented products, but this cleanser has a really gentle fragrance that hasn't irritated me. as someone with oily/combo skin, this cleanser has been great to keep my skin moisturized during canadian winters, and i'm interested to see how it will affect my skin in the summertime. for now though, i'm absolutely in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect cleanser for anyone that wants a good cleaning without stripping. It’s gentle enough to use as a double cleanse or as your second cleanse. I also love that it really has little fragrance but smells clean? Minimal suds but still soft on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been trying to give this product a chance as I’m only on my 2nd week of using it but I’ve never had a product dry my skin out so much before this. I was excited to try it because of the hype and the ingredients but sadly I’m disappointed. I have combination skin but this definitely has brought out more dryness than usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for about a week and already see results. My pores are smaller and my skin is much softer. I understand what the hype is about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose this as a sample with an order I recently purchased and the amount given is good enough to see if you like it or not. Now, I don’t know about it’s claims to “remove makeup or prevent pore buildup”, this review is solely based on it being a regular cleanser. Based on that alone, I love everything about this cleanser except the the price which is unnecessarily high. It really does smell like green veggies and that scent doesn’t linger after rinsing. Although it’s a gel cleanser, it also reminds me of a cream cleanser in the way that it doesn’t heavily foam. It does become white and slightly foamy when lathered. I had it around my eye area but never felt any burning. It cleans really well without drying out the skin which has been refreshing for me since right before using this I was sampling the AC Collection foam cleanser by CosRx which often left me feeling on the dry side. I’ve been using this every AM/PM for almost a week now and I would honestly buy it if the price wasn’t so high. Hence, the reason why I takeaway a star.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a 15 ml sample with another order. It might last me about 15 face washes, so comparing product to price it’s darn expensive. That said, it’s a gel face wash that lathers up nicely. It has a “grass juice” smell to it, and having had grass juice before the smell makes me nauseous; don’t think I could be cleansing with this everyday. The after feel is nice; it’s got a matte, clean feel without overly drying. Decent face wash, I don’t think I’ll see benefits face wise from a face wash, so for the price point I don’t think I would be purchasing this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this face wash! leaves skin feeling super clean and ready for next steps. foams up nicely and have a mild pleasant smell. I enjoy using this every morning as part of my routine. I think its worth the money. I believe it has made a difference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really cleans my face. Leaves it feeling silky smooth. Would get this again. Love this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this product! I've watched many skincare gurus recommend this cleanser. I choose it for its vegan/clean reputation, sleek appearance, and gel-based formula (ideal for us oily gals!). It just wasn't worth the hype. I have very oily skin, but am prone to dryness and zits. I did experience some breakouts with this. For reference, I previously used Clinique all about clean liquid facial soap oily skin formula. You can save roughly $17 on your cleanser! I am now using Clinque facial cleanser, and I find it suits my needs more. However, if you really prioritize a clean/vegan formula, this might be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is terrible. It doesn't lather up at all. It feels like you're not really washing your face. I don't understand the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a regular buyer of this product for many reasons. Always leaves my skin feeling clean and not overly dry. Absolutely love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as i heard good things, my skin is combo so it really dried out my skin! My skin now is flaky and dry, don’t recommend for people with combo skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the sample size and liked it, but after purchasing this and using it over a couple months consistently I feel that it's too drying for me (combination skin). It didn't break me out and has a really nice fresh scent, but I didn't notice any benefits to my skin. Overpriced if not part of a major sale. Spend most of your money on serums (which sink into your skin), not cleansers (which you wash off immediately)... Won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for about 2.5 weeks. I have oily skin which isn’t very sensitive and felt it was too drying for me. I also noticed more breakouts than normal in places where I usually don’t get pimples. I just don’t see the hype about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for about 2 weeks straight & I absolutely love it. The smell is refreshing & it doesnt dry out my skin. I always am weary of cleansers that foam because those usually make my skin dry & tight but this doesn’t. Definitely see this being stocked all the time in my shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is absolutely amazing! I often find cleansers tend to leave my skin very dry but this cleanser doesn’t and leaves my skin feeling refreshed. The cleanser works really well to balance your skin tone and smells amazing! Definitely on the pricier side but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I got a sample of this in my glam bag and was hooked after the first use. I went ahead and brought it now it’s my favorite morning face wash. It cleans without drying out your skin or making it too oily. I was pleasantly surprised and impressed so I’d recommend this product for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Rich gel cleanser with light green tea scent. Didn’t make my skin dry and taught after cleansing but definitely removed all makeup; not one trace left! No tingle. Pricey for a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser for how it smells and how great it feels on the skin but I had to take a star off because it contains phenoxyethanol which I did not notice upon buying. It can be an eye irritant which makes me nervous about a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how lightweight it is going on and how my skin doesn’t crack after it’s use. just not sure why it’s so $$$$

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I have very sensitive skin and I’m always afraid when I try any new skincare product but this doesn’t irritate my skin at all. I love the way my skin feels after using it. I like trying mini sizes of products first so I don’t waste money but I’ll definitely be buying the big size of this. I have very dry skin and it doesn’t dry me out at all. It leaves my skin insanely soft! Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser really surprised me, the gel texture turned into a light froth that was incredibly pleasant and moisturizing. I also love that it comes in a glass container, easy to recycle anywhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really gentle, yet does a wonderful job of cleaning my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was wildly disappointed with this cleanser! Given that cleanser is literally money going down the drain, I didn't have any outlandish expectations, but this felt the way a highly surfactant SLS-containing bar soap might feel.  It made my face feel squeaky-clean and not in a good way.  And I have quite healthy, normal, balanced skin.  I also used a tiny bit because it does foam well.  There are a dozen other cleansers (foaming ones included) at half the price that do not strip the skin of its natural oils. The glass bottle and green color are eco-friendly and look beautiful in the bathroom, but the cleanser is in no way worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing, my skin feels so clean and soft, totally worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this new cleanser for 2 weeks and I am breaking out. Also my nose is now full of blackheads. I know it's this product because I haven't added anything else to my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every night and it helps me feel so so clean after a long day. The smell is nice, kinda earthy but not overwhelming. Doesn’t dry out my skin which is a MUST when it comes to cleansers as my skin is Sahara desert dry I kid you not. It can feel a bit stripping if you use it more than once a day so be careful. If you travel a lot I recommend the small ones to take with you. Fun tidbit also: I live in a place so cold your eyelashes freeze, and I forgot a bottle of this in my car for a few hours, so it obviously froze. Good news is the bottle didn’t break and it melted back to normal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to try this since I really enjoy the deep moisture cream. Face feels clean but a bit dry. Like the fact it is vegan. Can’t get over scent -has strong spinach scent usually scent doesn’t bother me. Would say this is just average face wash price seems high for the quality you get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good lather, rinses off well and leaves your skin feeling clean without stripping it. Well worth the money, such an amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easily the best cleanser out there. It leaves skin feeling clean and refreshed. I’ve tried almost everything for my acne prone skin and nothing compares to this cleanser. 100% worth the price.

this definitely improved the texture of my skin. my nose and chin have gone back to feeling really bumpy since i ran out of this cleanser and switched to another. i feel like i could entirely stop using toner and maybe even other products if i continue using this cleanser. still can't believe what a difference-maker it is. i have to knock off a star because of the price, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this cleans my skin but doesn't strip it or make my skin feel tight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i went in to buy shampoo and i walked out with this as well . i love youth to the people Mini Superfood Antioxidant Cleanse . you don't have to use a lot and it feels light on your face as you are washing it i also love that my face feels clean , after all that is the whole point . i was using a face cleaner from lush before finding this gem . i have bought this 3 times already .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product lathers wonderfully which is something I look for in a good cleanser. I have sensitive skin and this did not irritate me at all. I love that this product is clean beauty and have already recommended it to others. 10/10!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. It leaves my skin feeling so clean but also not too dry. The ingredients are simple and make me feel good about what is going on my skin. I previously used very expensive cleansers because I I thought they would work better, but this affordable product has changed my view. Love the entire brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser isn’t going to take your face makeup off so beware of that. It does however feel nice on the skin and gives it a good clean on makeup free skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To start, I’m extremely picky when it comes to cleansers. For reference I have oily, and sensitive skin. THIS CLEANSER IS EVERYTHING. It makes your skin feel refreshed, the cleaning power on this is magic, without making you feel stripped. It’s a must have for me, the ingredients are beautiful. I didn’t break out or have irritation what so ever, which is always discovered for me on the first time use. It’s now been a full week and a half, and my skin is still loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

In two short weeks, my breakouts have cleared up, my skin is so hydrated, and my complexion is looking so even. The smell is subtle but I really enjoy it, and it doesn't leave my face feeling stripped.   If you are like me and find that your skin needs a period of adjustment, don't give up! It is so worth it. I will definitely purchase the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this cleanser for a while and finally took the plunge but discovered it’s pretty underwhelming. For how expensive it is, it hasn’t made my skin any better. In fact, it’s made my skin more dry and I break out more often. I gave two stars for its ability to remove makeup pretty well, but I do go in with a micellar water as a first step. With that being said, this cleanser claims to prevent buildup in pores, yet I still have clogged pores, despite always double cleansing, exfoliating and taking great care of my skin. I know that just happens to many people no matter how great their products might be, but it’s an odd claim from a cleanser that also doesn’t claim to be non-comedogenic either. It seems to break many people out, myself included. For almost $40 I’m not impressed, and once again, gentle and basic drugstore brands have it beat. I’m not sure what to do with the remaining product because I really don’t want it to go to waste, but I also cannot afford to keep breaking out and feeling dry. :/

reviews.review_title: Sensitive skin that hates creamy cleansers

reviews.review_text: Love love love this! I’m someone who has always struggled with finding a face wash that works for my skin. I’m quite fair with sensitive and dry skin- also, I have a lot of weird allergies (like soy) that are usually in skincare products. I’ve never been able to use the sensitive skin cleansers because they are usually too creamy for me and cause a break out. This stuff is amazing! I’m already on my second bottle of this face wash. It is sudsy enough and gentle enough without totally stripping my skin. Of course, if you get the odd blemish, you’ll need something a little more aggressive. However, this has been the perfect everyday cleanser for me.

Just one thing I don’t think it works very well with dry skin more with oily but it’s an awesome cleanser. Definitely a repurchase and love the other products this line sells!

I have super sensitive dry skin, and products with fragrance never fail to break me out. This product has not! It's actually helped clear my skin, and does not leave it feeling stripped/dry. Overall just a wonderful product.

reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for almost a year now, and I’ve purchased the larger refill too. However, I am someone who splurges a bit on skincare and I have a routine with multiple products to treat my skin concerns. If you’re looking for cleanser to give strong and obvious results, I don’t think you’d find it with this. I wouldn’t buy this product unless you already splurge on skincare, it’s also a bit pricey BOTTOM LINE: If you’re looking to get rid of acne or for a SUPER cleanser to change your skin, I’d look elsewhere. But, if you’re a fellow skincare enjoyer and you’re looking for a gentle, refreshing cleanser to calm your skin and hydrate it, try it!

I also felt like this cleansed by skin a little too well, if you know what I mean.  I'd be concerned that with prolonged use this might dry my skin out. My skins has been getting a bit dry in the winter so I do tend to sub this out for a creamier cleanser in the winter, but if your skin is oily ir normal, you may be able to use this year around.

reviews.review_title: WOW! Never loved a skincare product like this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All I can say about this is get it in my hands! My skincare journey has not been an easy one, and I’m always struggling to keep my skin in it’s best shape possible. Let’s be honest, we all struggle with this, right? Well, my skin is combination skin and I find it that if I use a moisturizing cleanser, my skin is so oily!!! Switch it up, to a cleanser for oily skin, and my skin is SO dehydrated! Yet this cleanser is my holy grail to anyone struggling with any skin troubles. I’ll start with technicalities of the bottle design. Few people say they have troubles with the bottle leaking, now I’ll let you in on a little something… it’s very unlikely for that to actually happen. I mean, there’s so many people that it hasn’t happen to. Don’t let that be the reason you don’t buy it. The design is really smart actually. It looks very nice sitting on the counter, and one pump is the perfect amount to completely wash your face nicely! Now, for the actual cleansing. It is so amazing. I love to have a cleanser that you can feel clean your face, but not strip your skin of any oils. This is great as long as you throw on a moisturizer on after (as you already should be doing), so I can’t complain about it drying your skin. Also, it really gets in your pores and sucks out all that dirt and leaves your skin feeling neither dry nor oily. This honestly is the best cleanser I’ve ever used and I’ve used too many to count. Something else people comment on is the smell and I don’t know why? The smell is so pleasantly clean and natural, not irritating or fragrance heavy. I honestly love every aspect of it. The glass bottle is so nice, the smell is lovely, and it not only works but it preforms BETTER than other cleansers. The price is justified as it will last, so if you’re considering purchasing this product I hope it’s no longer a question. Buy it, you’ll have no regrets!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been loving this product so far! Heard great things so I snagged it during the Sephora sale. Feels very clean, one pump does an amazing job at removing my mascara and brows. Leaves my skill feeling clean and fresh, very cute packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff…. Holy Grail. Seriously. I’ve had trouble with clogged pores and acne since I was 11 years old, and I’ve tried so very many products with almost no success. I resigned myself to dealing with constantly clogged pores forever. Enter this amazing product about a year ago. What a change in my skin!  I was amazed from the very first use at how well it had cleansed my pores. Full disclosure, I used to spend SO much time in front of a mirror, squeezing my poor face, trying to extract all the sebum. Daily. I do still get some blackheads, but it’s nowhere near the level that it used to be. My skin is so much happier now. I do have combination skin and struggle with dryness around my nose and mouth. The only time I have ever felt any sort of tightness after using this product is at the height of winter when my skin is just parched anyway. I have shared with several friends, and after one use they are in love as well.

reviews.review_title: Too Fragrant & Left my skin feeling tight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of the Kale + Green Tea cleanser and was very disappointed.  I'm 45 with normal, T-zone skin.  I usually clean my face with the Cerave cleansing bar and have the standard reduce as much aging as possible concerns.  The first thing I noticed about this cleanser was the smell.  It had a fragrance as soon as I opened the package.  Still I continued to use it, the cleanser just got more fragrant as I used it.  Some people might like the smell, but a lot of scents can trigger migraines for me so I stay away from them. Luckily I did NOT get a migraine from this scent.  The other thing I noticed after using it was how tight my skin felt afterwards.  That I really didn't like and doesn't happen when I use my Cerave bar.  Needless to say I will not be using the remainder of the sample.

I use it as a second cleanser on my routine and it helps taking my oil/balm off as well as getting rid of any makeup or sunscreen left. I can’t get enough, I just wished it wouldn’t be quite this expensive…  it’s really my only qualm with it. Otherwise, you should definitely give it a shot!

Really half a pump works but I do a full pump or pour on my hand because my pump jams. Only downside is my pump jams. Pics of my skin no filter ! And my neck is completely free of pimples I have problems with my left check and chin the most but the rest pretty clear only some light light scarring.

I also initially started to break out, but I took the advice on the YTTP website to massage the cleanser on my wet face for an entire minute and breakouts were quickly eliminated. I had visible redness from irritated, dry skin and this cleanser has greatly decreased this. Overall I love it and will not use anything else!

reviews.review_title: Ok, but not worth the price

reviews.review_text: My esthetician recommended this brand to me in the summer. I liked it then because I was already getting facials for my acne/blemishes and the sun mixed with the heat already inflames my skin. So I would recommend this product for people with sensitive skin and if you live in a hot area where you get a lot of sun so I think its a good summer product. I'm giving 3 stars because it hasn't done anything for my skin tbh my acne is the same my redness is the same. Been using this for over a month now and I just want to get rid of it. If you have clear skin I would recommend it, but it's not beneficial for my acne gworllls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time fave cleanser, goes very well with my sensitive/combination skin, doesn't irritated.

reviews.review_title: Avoid if you have sensitive skin !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this , but unfortunately it made me break out after only two uses . I would avoid or be cautious if you have sensitive skin !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great. Left my face feeling clean without feeling stripped of its natural oils. Loved using after a night out wearing heavy makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best gentle cleansers on the market, there might be dupes but I haven’t seen a cleanser do so much for my skin without stripping off harsh chemicals. I purchased 4x times the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is okay.  Pros: -smells nice  -foams nicely  -glass bottle  -refillable  -makes your skin look clean   Cons: -pricey  -didn’t help with my breakouts  -seemed to make my skin more oily   I feel like some drug store cleansers work better than this one. But if you have the money for it and want to try it, I hope it works for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't often write reviews but I wanted to for this product because it has really helped my skin. I'm 45 with combo skin. This has a light vegetal scent, has a rich foam, and leaves your skin feeling clean but not stripped. I use it twice a day and follow with Drunk Elephant Protini in the morning and DE A-Passioni and DE B-Hydra serum at night.This combo has radically improved my skin's texture (my skin was rough with old acne scars and dark spots), evenness, and glow. I have very sensitive skin and this does not contribute to redness and I don't have any reactions to it. I've tried a lot of Youth To The People products, and most are meh, but this is the only one I truly love. It's a little pricey but lasts a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is a good cleanser, very subtle and leaves the skin hydrated and plump like a moisturizer. Had to take off one start only because of the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cleanser! I tried it as a sample at first and then bought the full size because it worked wonders on my face. I have sensitive skin so it has been difficult finding the right cleanser for me, but now I can finally say, I’ve found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolutely favourite [clean] cleanser! I certainly recommend using a moisturizer after, but this cleans so well. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser was hyped up, but sadly didn't live up to my expectations. As someone with sensitive skin I have a hard time with finding cleansers, and with all the reviews I thought this would be a great option but it leaves my skin feeling tight and itchy. Make sure to try a sample before purchasing the big bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect cleanser. I don’t even feel like I have to try new ones. Refreshing and replenishing. My skin has never been healthier or more clear! I recommend x 100

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! It’s the only one I’ve used for the past several months. I initially got the trial size, and ended up enjoying it so much that I purchased the full-size with pump. I have very sensitive skin and am prone to allergies, and this cleanser is so gentle and doesn’t aggravate my skin. I also love that it’s in a glass bottle. I love how it makes my skin feel. I like that it also has a slight barely-there scent. I have a minimal skin care routine and this is a staple. I have purchased several as gifts too. When it runs out I will purchase again!

reviews.review_title: Youth to the People- Green Tea Spinach Cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product because I was looking for a clean, gentle cleanser, well for me this was not it. My skin did feel clean however, I have combination dry skin so this cleanser just dried out my skin and caused irritation. Know I know to go for more of a creamy cleanser. I think this will work great for oily skin. The glass bottle is great for the r environment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 16 oz??? This will last me a year. I’m going on 9 months with my 8 oz. Great deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle low-foaming cleanser with fresh aroma. I like to start my morning with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and this product has been perfect for every day use. It does have a very light scent, but it’s not overbearing. If you’ve been wanting to try this, do it. It leaves my skin soft and balanced all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very satisfied with this cleanser. It gives my skin life. And even though I keep it in an area that's not very warm or cold, every time I apply this on my skin I feel like it cools it down. The consistency is rich and thick and it lathers very well. Never stripping of oils. Grab it! It's worth it and the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleaner. Third time now I’ve bought it. It smells so fresh and leaves my skin feeling clean but not stripped of all moisture. I’ve never had a breakout from this wash because it’s so gentle. No idea how they do it, but I’m a fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser is good in a way that it cleans and not dry the skin out. However, it contains fragrance which I was not aware because of its natural branding. Sensitive skin be aware.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is both mine and my daughter's go to face wash. It does well with both my older skin and her teenage skin. I always feel like my face is clean without stripping away everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I freaking love this cleanser. I was worried that maybe it was all hype but I went into Sephora after mimosas one day and impulse bought anyway. It is sooo pleasant to use!! Has not broken me out at all, and my face feels really clean and soft after rinsing off. I usually use SR ceramic slip and will continue to use that one, but I see myself ordering a refill for this too once it runs out. I’m excited to try other YTTP products now. If you like to indulge on a cleanser this is a good one to try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's better for summer months. I find that this dries my skin out during colder months. I have combo skin though so a cream based cleanser is better for me but this works when there's moisture in the air.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin clean without stripping the moisture. This is one of the best cleansers I’ve used. I also appreciate the glass packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this cleanser for 3 years and it’s perfect for my combination skin. The best random purchase ever! I bought it on a whim and my skin is at its happiest!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've gotten many compliments for this product after using it for just a few days. My skin looks clearer and the staff at Sephora both online, and off, were extremely helpful! I love this product and will stick with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle facial cleanser by a trusted brand known for clean skincare. It leaves skin clean and smooth. Not super smelly either, which is a bonus. Good for my dry, sensitive, middle aged skin, but I think this is one of those products that can be sued by literally anybody. Good bang for the buck!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This may be a great cleanser, I don’t know. It was recommended to me by a Sephora employee for my combo-dry skin to clear my pores. One use dried my skin out so badly that even after the heaviest moisturizers I have in my Arsenal, in the middle of humid summer, my minimal serum and powder makeup was flaking off my usually oily t-zone. Ouch. Returning it. Maybe good for people with really oily acne prone skin? I don’t know, bc it dried out even my oily zones so badly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels nice and I like the smell but it is slowly drying my skin out wash by wash. I have drier cheeks and an oilier forehead and now my nose is peeling. Bought the big bottle due to great reviews and can no longer use it :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really swear by this face wash. I’ve been trying to find a face wash that was going to sit well with my very sensitive skin for about four years now. I found this Vichy cleanser with with Salicylic Acid that I really enjoy.. but this Youth to the people cleanser is my number one favourite !!!! I love how gentle it is yet extremely effective. The smell is amazing & it helped with my little blemishes when it’s that time of the month. Worth the money YALL ☺️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would NEVER recommend. It’s probably the worst face wash I’ve ever tried. My face has been broken out with cystic-style acne and the only thing I’ve changed in my routine is adding this face wash. My skin has NEVER been this bad before. I don’t know Not a fan of the smell either, it has a very strong spinach scent that I can’t get over. I had to hold my breathe to wash my face with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Smells so good, but not over powering, and is gentle yet effective. It’s now my daily morning cleanser, and I got my mother-in-law using it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is great!!! it leaves my skin feeling really nice and clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought the mini size, finished it after a couple months so this full size should last a long while. I personally use a dime-sized amount for my face and neck. Double that if I’m using it on my chest and shoulders. I actually feel clean and soft after this whereas other cleansers can leave a film or strip you dry. It’s okay as a makeup remover but I don’t mind double cleansing with another product because of how much makeup/sunscreen I sometimes wear. Also! Works better if you lather it in your hands before applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: made my skin amazing! even helped my acne....my skin is ~~glowing~~

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this. It smells nice. Seems gentle on my skin. It’s hydrating and my face actually appears more clear. Price is a little high for me, sadly, but I feel like it’s worth it if you aren’t looking to use the same product every single day, which I don’t typically.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is worth the money!!! Been using it for a week so far every day in the morning and when I’m done washing my face it feels so clean. Finally a cleanser that didn’t break me out! And I have oily skin! Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received a generous sample with my order and here is my two cents. The product feels great and my skin felt great for about 20 minutes, my skin is oily and after about 20 mins my skin was so greasy that i had to rewash it. i will try it again in the winter to see if that helps but to me its an ok cleanser that got way overhyped by a youtuber that gets paid by the company and its way overpriced. I'm gonna stick with my cerave foaming cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great cleanser!! My sister bought this for our shower and wow , I started using it 3 days ago and can already tell a difference. My skin is so much more hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do I think this is too expensive? Yes Will I keep buying it because it does a great job of cleansing my oily, acne prone skin without drying it out? Also yes. I appreciate the glass packaging too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It didn’t get rid of blemishes but it definitely smoothed the area of the skin where I had no acne. It immediately makes your skin feel soft after rinsing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my top favorite cleanser. My favorite time to use this is in the morning to wash off my nightly skin care and start wi th a fresh clean face without my face feeling dried out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super clean cleaner! Comes in a reusable glass bottle which is very sustainable!

reviews.review_title: Full size is on the way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a mini from YTTP. Love in since day one. It smells so nice and lather really well. I have combo skin and this cleanser doesn’t dry my skin out at all. Already got a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so good for sensitive skin! The ingredients are very hydrating to the skin and help with getting rid of build up of dirt and oil! I absolutely love this cleanser! MUST BUY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased the mini to try out since I hear so many great things. I’d say it is a very nice face cleanser. The smell is glorious (fresh, green, raw, not synthetic). I am skeptical about how beneficial kale, spinach, and others green really are as a wash off face cleaner. While it is pricey, I’d say it does a good job, smells great, and leaves my skin feeling surprisingly hydrated. 4-starts because the $ (likely driven the origanic greens ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best cleanser. worth every pennyy. I hate fragrance and I was so happy to find out that there is none in this product. seriously worth the hype.

reviews.review_title: Forever part of my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The hype is all true. This cleanser is gentle and leaves my skin feeling soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser. It doesn’t dry my skin out and it makes my face actually feel clean. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: not good for sensitive, oily/combo skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, combo skin. Immediately the cleaner made me breakout, worse than I’ve had it. It clogged my pores quite badly, especially on my forehead. It does have a scent to it, which smells good, but fragrance is terrible for my sensitive skin. I would not recommend if you have oily, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very acne prone skin so I was hesitant about utilizing this product. Let me just say, this worked so well. My skin has never been healthier and has yet to break out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gonna be wishy washy on this one:  Have gone through several bottles of this, and am feeling a bit blah.  It’s lathers beautifully, smells nice, skin feels fresh, and it comes in a glass bottle which is a huge plus.  However it can be a bit drying, it doesn’t do much for calming or redness, and I’m pretty sure it doesn’t help acne when I break out.  Not looking for a miracle, but have noticed a different face wash was working better for my needs.  I’d say give it a chance if you are looking for a face wash that lathers well, and doesn’t leave any residue.  I’m going to use it up as it rinses off without much effort, and really does feel nice, but don’t think I’ll keep buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First bought the travel size which I loved, but when I bought the full-sized version, I couldn't get the pump to work (and had three people try to open it as well) so I had to return it.

reviews.review_title: Break out CITY!! No no no
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way it made my skin feel but it broke me out. I had suspicion it was this, since it’s the only thing I changed in my routine because so many people recommended this. The minute I stopped washing my face with it, my skin cleared up in 3 days. So I gave it to my sister since normally things that don’t work for me will work for her. She broke out within 2 days of using it and immediately stopped and now over night after washing her face with her regular cleanser her breakout went down significantly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this product! I’ve been using it for about three weeks and my skin feels soft and well cleansed… and it doesn’t dry out my skin like some cleansers do. Great lather too. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this stuff - great for taking my makeup off, makes my face feel happy. (used to use DHC Deep Cleansing Oil, this is comparable / better)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only cleanser I use! It’s such a great daily cleanser for any type of skin both my husband and I use it. It also Pat quite a while. If your looking for something for daily use and that does what it says then this is definitely it. No weird smells or feeling after just cleansed skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Surprised at how clean it left my face while still maintaining moisture! Very hydrating! Love pairing it with the superberry serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On a quest for the perfect non-drying face cleanser that will work for my combination skin, and will also do a decent job of removing makeup.  I don’t wear heavy makeup, but I do touch up eyebrows, use some concealer under eye on most days, and wear mascara.  I don’t want to always have to use a makeup removing balm or similar product before using a cleanser.  I like this Superfood Cleanser.  It foams up a bit, which personally I like. It definitely does not give a stripped or drying feel. It does a good job of removing makeup, though if you wear a full face with eyeliner, eye shadow, full coverage foundation, etc this may not be enough on its own for you. The smell is pleasant (a clean smell, if that makes sense, as opposed to a floral fragrance).  Having said that, I personally like as little fragrance as possible, so I gave this 4 stars instead of 5, just because of my own personal sensitivity to strong smells.  Lastly, how awesome that they provide this in glass, with a pump.  Perfect packaging in my opinion and I wish more products came this way.  Overall, this is a great product I think and I would really recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great but did nothing for my cobination skin. I've used it for well over 2 months and I see no difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser. Maybe I’m on my fourth bottle now. Doesn’t break me out, cleans without stripping, and the scent is refreshing. I tried a couple other cleansers in between— drugstore and one from biossance. Returned the biossance cleanser to exchange for this one, it’s just superior (for my skin).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser feels extremely refreshing and contains great ingredients. Only have used it a few times and my acne has cleared up a bit as well as my skin having a brighter look. Definitely worth the money and although the mini size looks a bit small it actually does look like it is going to last me a while! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t want to like this, but I really did. It’s refreshing and lathers nicely, but it’s too thick or dense. I am loyal to Cetaphil, but I’ve been using this every-other day in the morning. It’s a great morning face wash to wake you up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for well over a year (even though YTTP sent me a travel bottle recently in exchange for my review) and I really like it. Washing my face at night with the Superfood Cleanser feels like a deep cleanse. Using it twice a day without moisturizing thoroughly can make my skin feel a tiny bit dry, but that’s usually not an issue. I also like the earthy, natural scent. Overall, this is definitely a solid cleanser by a brand that cares about skin health, as well as the environment and social justice, and I love supporting YTTP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm writing a review after using the superfood cleanser for 4 months and while using it, I've used my Tactupump cream (adapalene and benzoyl peroxide) at night. I have extremely oily skin with black heads on my nose and cystic acne on my cheeks. However, this product has really helped with clearing my acne and keeping it from looking dull while using such a drying cream. Today, I no longer experience breakouts and I do believe that this cleanser has been the backbone of my entire regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my face feel so fresh and so clean without being totally dried out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this on my back and it works great because it is strong enough to help and has great ingredients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I like this cleanser. It does a good job of cleansing without stripping my face which is combination dry/oily. It suds up well and smells nice but isn't overpowering. My only complaint is that the pump on the larger bottles tends to leak and ends up wasting a lot of the product. YTTP should fix this considering the very high price point for this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The good news: this smells nice and clean, and it does not overdry the skin.  The not good news: this caused me to break out. This was the only product I changed in my skincare routine, and I gave this a try for about two weeks. I can't give it any more time unfortunately because I don't want to continue to get new pimples. I actually got acne on my cheeks and that never happens. I also noticed when I wash my face with this at night, when I wake up my face feels like an oil slick.   If you have combination oily skin I'd skip it or try a small size first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not the biggest fan of this product and maybe it’s because of my skin type. I have combination oily skin but I also struggle with ezxcema so I can get dry as well. It’s a struggle bus let me tell you! Like anything else there are pros and cons.   Pros: simple ingredient list, vegan (so pretty natural based ingredients), barely any fragrance, does feel pretty clean after emulsifying and then washing face   Cons: pricey (I don’t mind spending the money on good products for my face and I love how this brand does use nice ingredients and is recycle friendly but that dollar amount) even though there aren’t any harsh chemicals or soaps to dry out your face. My face felt tight and dry after drying but still felt dirty in the t zone. For that reason alone is why I won’t be repurchasing. Doesn’t last as some other face washes I’ve used in the past from other brands. Maybe that’s because of the feeling of not being able to get my t zone to feel clean and refreshed idk.   I would reccomend this product if you don’t have sensitive skin, acne problems, oiliness, or use makeup daily. This cleanser is very much for the non problematic skin type to wash out dirt, oil & sunscreen. If that’s you, hit add to bag!! Hope it helps!! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic cleanser! I finally understand all the hype around this product! It is a perfect balance between deep cleaning and gentle cleansing! Does not feel stripping and does not leave my skin tight! Ive seen improvement in acne scarring and in overall tone and appearance of my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like skincare that is easy to use, smells good and doesn’t harm the environment. YTTP’s facewash is all that and more. This is a concentrated cleanser that was gentle enough for my sensitive skin. I like the fragrance and the recyclable glass bottle.

reviews.review_title: Not enough for my acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was reeeeeally excited to try this product, but I don’t think it was right for my skin type! I have oily, acne-prone skin, and after a few days of using this (instead of my salicylic acid cleanser) I had a few small breakouts.  On the plus side, I actually LOVE the scent (very fresh & green), and it felt really nice on my skin. It felt very calming yet deeply cleansing!  Overall, I still really liked the cleanser, and think I will use up the rest of the product, but I might need to incorporate a salicylic acid serum to curb my acne!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: only used it a couple times and it caused little bumps ALL OVER MY FACE. so mad i wasted my money. don’t buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: YTTP is known for their commitment to making conscious, eco-friendly, and inclusive products that reflect the diverse planet we all live on. It’s always great to support a brand with these ideologies and even better when the products actually deliver. I’ve purchased pocket-friendly and expensive face washes over the years and this one is definitely top 3! Olive oil bar soap has become my go-to but there are quite a few days out of the month (hello cycle/hormones) where my skin needs both gentle and effective. This superfood cleanser is a powerful kind of gentle - it’s gets rid of the dirt + keeps breakouts at bay without leaving the ph of your skin out of whack. Remember the 60-second rule washing your face at night. It’s def worth the investment! YTTP doesn’t miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is refreshing and makes my skin squeaky clean. Love the scent and it’s not over-drying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! I have combo to oily skin and it feels amazing after each use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product! I have dry/ acne prone skin and I would definitely recommend this product. Doesn’t not dry you out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I had a ton of expectations from this cleanser, reading all the reviews and watching YT videos. So decided to give them a go. The face wash itself is good. The bottle though, not so much. I tried to open the pump but it was already broken. How am I supposed to use the bottle now without the pump it is just getting so messy! huh so much for the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A game changer in my acne journey. I recently ran out of this and figured I would be okay but I started getting a little bit of acne and as soon as I repurchased it cleared up again. Give it a try, it'll change your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very solid second cleanse for me! It works well on its own, but I do find it a bit stripping for my skin. However, I love that it's a strong cleanser because it's PERFECT after a balm or oil cleanse and makes my skin feel fully clean after heavier makeup days. I consider this a 'special day' cleanse since it is more expensive, but I love the brand's mission and the way this makes my skin feel after a balm/oil cleanse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have really oily skin and it made my skin so clean in the morning. It also smells really nice and suds nicely! Definitely buying again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this but it DESTROYED my skin. I do not wear foundation, usually tinted moisturizer and some bronzer, this cleanser caused me to breakout like I’m 14 years old. The pimples are deep, painful and taking forever to heal. I have to use concealer, foundation(which I had to purchase specifically to cover all the marks) and setting powder. I haven’t had a reaction to any beauty product like this ever in my life, I’m a couple days shy of 37. Maybe overly “clean” products are not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample from YTTP. I really enjoy using this product! It is wonderful! It really does cleanse my face very well! It has a pleasant smell, not too overpowering at all. I will definitely be buying more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me begin by saying that I love this brand! I received this as a gift directly from Youth To The People and I really like how gentle this cleanser is, it removes makeup and leaves my skin hydrated. I use this and the entire line of their skincare for my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combination of oily and dry skin, and this product is great for exactly that. If you're thinking about trying this product I definitely recommend trying it out! I would recommend buying the travel size, just so you know it's perfect for you, but I am sure you'll fall in love with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle, great suds, fragrance is perfect. A treat to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this product is amazing I’ve gone for three bottles now, it piqued my interest because I saw how many you tubers were reviewing it but wow genuinely good :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this cleanser in January when my face was dry and peeling, my face is usually combination and very sensitive. It made a difference on my dry skin leaving it feeling clean and hydrated, and I am able to use it now that my skin is back to its usual state and it is gentle enough to use daily on sensitive skin like mine. This cleanser is so wonderful, it is powerful enough to make you feel truly clean but doesn’t dry out your skin. It leaves my skin feeling cleansed, refreshed, and super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the suds, the smell and the natural goodness of this cleanser, but for my dry, dry skin it just wasn't the one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing! It smells really fresh and leaves my skin very clean. Ive tried to use other face washes but this one suits my combination skin best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works fine and I like the fresh scent (kind of apple-y, definitely smells like leafy greens), but the lather was too sudsy/bubbly for my liking and I felt like it got in my eyes, mouth, and nose, which is obviously uncomfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this cleanser! I double cleanse at night, so I use this as the second step after using an oil-based cleanser first. This cleanser is pleasant to use, suds up well, has a fresh, clean, earthy scent, and doesn’t break me out or irritate my skin. I like the glass packaging - though be careful to keep it somewhere safe! It seems implied with glass, but I have broken a bottle. I also wish the plastic pieces (the bottle tops) were a little more durable, as I have broken my travel size cleanser lid (and one from another product as well). Just be careful with the packaging. But this is currently my favorite cleanser, I look forward to using it every night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used to love this until I realized how drying it can be... If you have dry skin like me, I wouldn’t recommend. I use it like once every week+ now.
Love it.  It doesn't dry my skin but it really feels clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cleanser as a free sample. Cleansers aren’t a place in my skincare routine that I like to spend a lot of money, so I was dubious about this one. In the past I’ve used Origins, Ordinary, etc. cleansers so that’s my reference for comparison. This product has a fantastic texture on the skin, and washes away quickly, easily, and completely. I also love the light, natural scent. I didn’t realize how good this product actually is, though, until I had a reaction to a different clean beauty product. Within seconds of putting a different product on my face, my skin started to burn.
