I thought even washing my face would probably further the irritation because my skin felt so irritated in that moment. I reached for this superfood cleanser and within seconds my skin was cooled and soothed, all reactivity gone. This does more than clean—it restores. I’m a normal-to-dry skin type and I can use this cleanser twice a day without any issue. In fact, my already-healthy skin seems to become happier the longer I use this product. I do wish it was a little less expensive, but there’s no question that it’s a fantastic product, and it does seem that a little goes a long way so the bottle will probably last long enough to warrant the price. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for over a month and I love it! Its super gentle so my skin feels clean and fresh without that tight/dry feeling that other cleansers tend to have. I'd definitely recommend using for any skin type but esp if you have dry skin bc it doesn't strip away your skin's natural hydration while cleansing

reviews.review_title: ACTUALLY HYDRATES WITHOUT STRIPPING THE BARRIER!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for about 2 full weeks now to really get a feel of it before reviewing it and trust me, IT'S WORTH IT. It does exactly what it promises. It removes heavy product (like layers of it and SPF) and cleans the pores while still hydrating and without stripping the skin. I've tried plenty of hydrating cleansers and this really is one that's actually hydrating. I do think it's a little overpriced compared to other over the counter swaps, but I still give it a 5/5 because it really is a great overall cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser so far! I broke out from using Sephora Collection’s cleanser and made a switch over to this one and noticed an immediate difference. My skin looks and feels brighter and ACTUALLY feels clean; I hate cleansers that feel like they’re leaving a layer of film on my skin. Also this glass packaging in a shower looks SOO cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! It is gentle but still provides a deep clean. Anytime I use it to wash off make up it absolutely obliterates it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have moderately oily skin, and I've heard so many great things about this product, but once using it for about a week, I'm very disappointed. It's very stripping and makes my skin feel extremely tight and dry even after I apply serum and moisturizer. Although it smells nice and lathers up nicely, I'm sad that it didn't work for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser. I first purchased it in january and am just now having to replace it! I also have ridiculously sensitive skin and because this is a clean product, my skin has never been better. AMAZING

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone, combination skin and this cleanser does a really good job at deep cleansing! I like to use this cleanser when washing up at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the targeted combo to oily and acne prone skin. This product works pretty well with a salicylic acid exfoliant and basic moisturizer as it did help clear the majority of my acne daily well. The reason I am giving it a 3/5 is because I don't know how well it would work by itself with no treatment for a specific concern.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product so so much! It made my skin feel nice and clean after using it, it has such a nice texture to it, and on top of all of that it smells great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely cleanser, skin always feels soft and hydrated after using. However, the smell is intense, like a shampoo from my childhood. And no matter how little I use or how I apply it, I always get some in my mouth; it foams up a LOT and the taste is terrible, truly awful. Without the smell and taste, I would give this 5 stars for how my skin feels after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my face cleanser for over a year now !! My skin has never looked better. You get a deep clean without it drying you out ! And the values of the company make me feel like I’m using the best for my face and I’m helping make a difference for earth and communities !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried everything from Dermalogica to drug store skincare  but this cleanser is my holy grail! I have sensitive skin that is red around my nose  so I need to be careful what I put on my face and this cleanser just does everything for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I literally LOVE this product! The best face wash I have ever used, helped me with my skin concerns as well as a little goes a long way.  I have to be super careful with face cleansers as I get allergic reactions but this worked for me perfectly. A must have to your skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is simple but doesn’t really leave my face as squeak clean as I’d like. Not a bad product just not my fave.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been my favorite cleanser for over the past year because of multiple friends recommending. I love how easily if foams and skin does not feel stripped and dry after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 2oz sample of this in exchange for an honest review. My skin type: sensitive and mostly dry, prone to eczema. I think this is a great cleanser - I'm too lazy to use a suite of products so I used just this to wash off makeup/sunblock on my skin and it worked great. It smells nice, lathers easily and works well without particularly drying out my skin! I think I would prefer something a bit more moisturizing for my skin type, but it's definitely a good choice for an everyday cleanser. A little goes a long way - I used the 2oz container on a 2-week trip and only made a small dent in it. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser was pretty much a game changer for my skin! I have pretty sensitive combo skin. I had tried many different brands and in the rare chance they didn't irritate my skin they also didn't do much to improve it. This cleanser changed everything and I've been using only YTTP for the last year. It leaves my skin soft, clean, and refreshed. Overall my skin tone and texture has improved quite a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product wasn’t life changing for my skin but it was horrible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cleanser. I have oily but dehydrated acne prone skin and I’m never using another cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this product for nearly a month now and have noticed an improvement in my skin. I love how the product lathers and the smell is refreshing. Smells healthy and fresh! Would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a purveyor of all skin care products.  I am a self-admitted product junkie!  I absolutely love LOVE this cleanser.  First off, I am 53 with combination skin that goes very dry in the winter.  This cleaners cleans without stripping my face or leaving it dry at all.  I only use it to wash a non-madeup face (when I wear makeup I use a cleansing balm).  The smell is faint.  The feel is smooth.  It leaves my skin feeling wonderfully clean and ready for my treatment.  Will by again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Truthfully, I was skeptical about this product at first, but now I get it. I don’t really wear face makeup anymore now that I WFH, so I don’t really need a heavy duty cleanser, but my skin is dry so my rating is based off that. I use it in the morning and it leaves my face feeling fresh but not stripped. It’s also very gentle, for those of us who have sensitive skin (sometimes, or all the time). It was the only cleanser that didn’t burn or irritate my face when I had food allergy-related skin issues for a month. I sound like a paid cheerleader when I talk about YTTP but I honestly just love how much my fickle skin takes to their products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Don't get the hype, tbh. Quite drying for a cleanser. It didn't do anything bad to my skin but also didn't do anything good? So not worth the price at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had such high hopes for this face wash after hearing the good reviews but it wasn't for me. Made me break out so badly, got big pimples all over my face. Had to return it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this it has a nice sent that was fresh like kale it cleanser my face very well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite cleanser! So gentle and really helps remove any dirt on my face. I always buy it and this cleanser lasts me at least 6 months! A little definitely goes a long way for sure

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this face wash recently and it smells clean and nice. It's def not drying like I assumed it was gonna be. It's actually very gentle. I guess my only thing is that it's kinda too gentle for what I'm looking for. I want something that deep cleans a little bit more. I think this is good tho for someone with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally caved and bought this to see what all the hype is about. This is a great, every day cleanser. It forms a great foamy lather and is gentle on the skin. Leaves skin so smooth and doesn’t feel stripping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for almost two years.  It doesn’t leave my skin dry or tight.  It’s a great cleanser and you use very little of it each time.  It does last quite awhile.  The only reason it’s not five stars is because of the cost.  Having said that I will still continue to use it because it works well for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser. I have repurchased it several times. It is great for removing mineral sunscreen and is not stripping. My skin is really happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pricey but worth the cost. I love the scent and it feels fresh and clean after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice packaging. Smells Good Do not see the difference from. other cleansers;  I prefer the Fresh Soy cleanser  & I'm switching back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing!! I have super sensitive, dry skin and this isn’t overly stripping but still makes my skin feel clean. I also love how eco conscious the company is, so I recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I was offered a free sample in exchange for a review, but I have been using the cleanser for over a year now ( I originally bought it when the pandemic started, which is when I also started a skin routine). It has a very gentle, natural smell which I like. It lathers really well and only need to use a little bit at a time, so it does last a while. I have combination skin and it  really works for me. It is gentle but gets off all my sunscreen and make up off in one go leaving my face feeling clean but not extremely stripped and dry like other cleansers do. I also love that it is it a clean product, that the packaging is eco friendly and that I can reuse the container for other things.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it for a few days and it’s a no for me. My face has been breaking out since I’ve started using it and it wanna of those product that you just know it not work. I’ll try it for a few more days and see but as of now it’s a no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this broke me out so much, I even tried to take a break to and then when j used it again it broke me out again so sad I wanted to love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great 2nd cleanser. Smells amazing but could definitely be a little to stripping for dry skin. I probably won’t use it during the winter when my skin is more dry, but for the summer it really cuts through the sweat, oil and sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle and effective! It is not overly stripping and doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry. This product removes my makeup and sunscreen. My skin has improved already over the span of a few weeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash I’ve ever used! And I’ve used a lot. Foams up great, smells great, leaves my skin feeling crazy soft but never stripped, beautiful packaging, and last sooooo long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! To be honest I’m not sure if I noticed much of a change in my skin once I started using this but it makes washing my face so enjoyable! The scent of this makes me feel like I’m at a spa and it leaves my face squeaky clean but not dry. It’s definitely pricey but totally worth it for the quality of ingredients and packaging! Thought I’d try out a different cleanser before repurchasing this again and I miss using it so much! No other face wash will ever compare!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this cleanser out for the longest time last year, but due to its popularity (by being out of stock constantly), I moved on. However, in a recent Sephora order, I got a sample size (15mL) in a deluxe sample bag. I have been trying it out for about a week, both in the AM and PM. I don't notice a difference at all. It does what it's supposed to do but nothing exceptionally well. I would never drop $30+ to $80 on a simple facial cleanser like this one. I am happy to have received a sample, so I didn't have to waste my money to find out I wouldn't have liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try this cleanser for awhile but because of the price I held off. I was offered a free 2oz sample and WOW! The first use I was hooked. the scent is so refreshing, it lathers nicely and a little goes a long way. I will definitely be purchasing this cleanser once I run out.

reviews.review_title: Does it’s job, but kind of pricey
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice cleanser. Didn’t make me breakout or make my skin feel right after use. Smells light and fresh, almost nostalgic to a soap or cleanser I used in my teens. Took away a star for the price… pretty pricey for being nothing super special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical to use this cleanser bc I've always used more aggressive cleansers for my acne prone skin. After doing some research I realized I was probably drying out my skin and making my acne worse. For the last three weeks I have only used this cleanser and my acne has calmed down significantly. I sometimes wash my face twice if I have stubborn sebum but this works wonders! I use it in combination with the YTTP Dream Mask and Kombucha toner and my skin has never been softer, and free from general redness. I'm hopefully this will completely clear my acne in another few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cleansers. Super lightweight. My skin feels clean but not tight or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like many great things in life, this cleanser was love at first sight! It only took one use from my friend’s bottle to know that I had to get my own. Unlike many other products I’ve used, I can wash for YTTP’s recommended 50 seconds (twice daily) and not have over-dried, irritated, or “tight-feeling” skin. I can’t recommend this cleanser enough for all people, but particularly those with very sensitive skin should consider. All and all, great brand, and great product!   PS: The cleanser also stacks exceedingly well with their other products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin, and I love YTTP products because they don't cause breakouts. I've bought the superfood moisturizer and the old vitamin c serum countless times, and I'm just finishing the up the new vitamin C serum and will definitely repurchase. This face wash is good, but gel is not my favorite texture for face wash, so it's not my go-to. If you like a gel face wash, highly recommend this one! It works well and has a nice, light scent and, like the rest of the brand, is high quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this cleanser makes my skin feel. I have sensitive skin that can dry out if a cleanser is too harsh, but this leaves me feeling fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair
reviews.review_text: I loved this product. It made my skin feel clean without feeling overly dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best product ever and don’t irritated my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buying my 2nd bottle as we speak. I bought my first 8oz in February, after trying two of the travel size ones. This cleanser is perfect for my skin in all seasons. I have combo skin that can get very red and irritated with hormonal breakouts. I've loved jelly cleansers for a while now - I started with The Blueberry cleanser from Glow Recipie, Bestee Jelly cleanser from Drunk Elephant, and then Awake Beauty Jelly Cleanser, and now I've moved onto this one, which is by far my favorite!

reviews.review_title: THIS CLEANSER IS A MUST TRY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 2 oz complimentary sample of this cleanser to try, however, I’ve been using this cleanser for over 2 years. I’ve tried other cleansers such as Grown Alchemist, Fresh, Biossance, and Drunk Elephant, and none of them come close to being as effective and gentle as YTTP Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser. This cleanser leaves my skin feeling clean without having it feel stripped or dry. I am in my mid 40’s and my skin tends to be on the drier side. I use this product to remove my makeup, even my mascara! The cleanser doesn’t burn or irritate my eyes. In addition to the effective of this cleanser, I love that the ingredients are clean. I feel safe using this product as I know what it contains. I also used the sample of their Superfood Air-Whip Moisture Cream which was provided. It was enough for 2 days. I did feel my skin more moisturized and glowy. The sample didn’t contain enough product for me to use to give a thorough review of its effectiveness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the best cleanser money can buy. It smells fresh, makes your skin baby smooth, you feel so energetic after using this stuff! It wakes you up in the morning and calms you down before bed. This is honestly a miracle cleanser and I can’t recommend it enough! I tell all my friends about it so often I’ve turned a few onto it. Ive searched years and years before finding this perfect cleanser. It makes your skin look and feel younger and hydrated. I feel so confident after using this cleanser. The smell alone will have you sold. Ive been using it for over two years now and I’ll never switch cleansers again. I will tell people about it for the rest of my entire life. It really is the greatest cleanser ever created and I really hope every single person reading this tries it. At least try the 2oz sample one to see if you like it! Every single product they release is a fountain of youth in a bottle gold mine. You will feel and look younger and gain more confidence. Use it before your first date, before your big interview, before the first day of school or college, before a party, anytime you need that extra boost of confidence this cleanser will 1k percent help you out!! I personally guarantee you will fall absolutely head over heals over youth to the people not only with their superfood cleanser but ALL of their incredible products. I promise after you buy their face wash next thing you know you’ll be instantly addicted and your cart will be FILLED with all of their immensely INCREDIBLE skin care products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this like everyone else. The smell is so pleasant and refreshing and the packaging is so pretty. But even with my normal-slightly oily skin, this made me feel like I was losing the moisture I worked so hard to finally establish in my skin. Like it  Cleansed a little too well. Also I can’t justify the almost $40 price tag. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. Perfect for everyday use. It is not drying. Helps to get makeup off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love YTTP but this product is kinda meh.  The bottle is really good quality but the pump arrived broken, which was kind of a pain.  As for the actual product, it does the job but isn't anything special.  I was using the Neutrogena hydroboost face wash before this and I'll probably go back to it when it's done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail product and brand! I’ve bought this in the past, and recently got a free sample. The two pictures below are a week apart. You can see that my skin looks much healthier, less aggravated, smaller pores, and less acne. This face wash takes off all makeup, no need to use a balm or separate cleanser. It also smells amazing and feels so soft on my skin. Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been one of my go-to cleansers for years now. Feels super refreshing every time I use it, and is not drying or irritating for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve got very sensitive skin and live in a very dry climate. I’ve got trouble zones and constant mask-wearing doesn’t help my issues with breakouts. This face wash keeps my skin balanced and clear. It’s mild, foams nicely and keeps my skin from drying out while. I hope they make this product forever and ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser makes your face feel incredibly clean without making your face dry. My new favorite cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Good for oily skin but not right for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can see how this would be good for oily skin hot it's really too soap-like for my normal skin. It's not stripping but on the edge. I also would prefer the natural scent to the fragrance they added; it's sort of perfume-y. I will still finish it but it's. It my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is my favorite! it leaves my skin feeling noticeably cleaner and refreshed and I could've sworn my skin seemed brighter after the first couple of uses. it is slightly drying so I only use this once a day but it has definitely become part of my regular routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly was not expecting how much my skin loves this product! Leaves my skin nice and clean without feeling that feeling of tightness in the face. Great to use twice a day.  Other things to note: -YTTP always hits it out of the park with the packaging, I love the glass. -The consistency was much thicker than I expected (not a negative) -The scent is nice and gentle   If you’re looking for a great cleanser that does the job without being stripping, this is the one! Will be rebuying once I finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser, I received a free trail size and have loved ever since. It helps get off all my remaining makeup and leaves my skin feeling so clear always, will definitely be purchasing full size when I run out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Definitely gives a nice clean feel without being too drying. Gave it 4 stars because it might be a little drying in the winter. Love the fragrance, not too strong!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: very refreshing after the face wash, thoroughly cleanse my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Does what it says. Leaves my face feeling calm, thoroughly clean and nourished without stripping away natural oils. Haven’t been using long enough to know whether it will continue to balance my skin (hence the 4 stars), but so far so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So nice but more towards oily skin, i have dry skin and it was kinda drying (but nothing to worry about)

reviews.review_title: Good for oily to combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great and has helped my skin alot. It does a good job at cleaning my face while not stripping it. I personally love that it comes in a glass bottle as well. (disclaimer : I got this free from youth to the people) I have also gone ahead a purchased a full size which actually lasts you a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m pleasantly surprised by this cleanser! I had seriously considered the move to it, but I was hesitant because I have sensitive and acne-like skin. But it’s working really well! It doesn’t dry my skin out and keeps my acne at bay. I love it! This was sent to me for free but I’m absolutely hooked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I’ve used it for years and do not plan on changing anytime soon! It’s light, clearing and I love what YTTP stand for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: honestly my favorite face wash at the moment, gentle yet very effective. great for my sensitive skin

reviews.review_title: This luxurious cleanser punches above its weight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser. I've got combo skin, and my husband deals with some eczema. This cleanser has absolutely helped both of our skins get back to a clean base; it's virtually eliminated the red splotches on my husband and has balanced the color of my skin. I've tried a handful of high end cleansers to really do the job, and ones that are even pricier than this haven't done a thing. With this, I really feel luxurious and I know I'm now taking deep care of my skin.  Texture: It's a truly luxurious lather and silky smooth feel; it smells wonderful (nothing like it) and provides a real spa-like feel. So nice to use this after a work out and reset.  Quality: Ingredients are high grade and worth the cost. The bottle and pump is extremely high quality; I end up reusing the bottle for a ton of things.  Routine: My skin care routine is pretty minimal now since this takes care of so much of it. I usually finish it off with their peptide eye cream and I'm good to go. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product really clears up my acne, and so refreshing. My daily go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The goat cleanser! It’s so gentle but effective, takes all of the layers of sweat & sunscreen right off. I have sensitive skin and this is my favorite cleanser ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great gentle cleanser! The smell is great and it does a good job cleaning the skin without stripping it! This is the perfect morning cleanse or for days where you don’t wear much makeup or sweat. On days where I do, I prefer something that is a little deeper of a clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this cleanser is a 10 out of 10, it reminds me of the holidays or a forest. It’s lovely! I love the way it lathers and it does not leave my face feeling dry whatsoever. I will enjoy every last drop!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove the smell. It also leaves my face feeling super clean! I've gotten some for my mom and sister because its truly helped my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a holy grail cleanser for me. It leaves my skin feeling very clean without feeling stripped or sticky afterwards. Now I don't tend to use it every day, I rotate my cleansers. If you haven't tried it, I would 20 out of 10 recommend giving it a shot. A little bit goes a long way and even a mini bottle will last you a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes your face feel actually clean! My fav face wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got as a sample in my most recent Sephora order. Sample got me 1 use. I always review my samples so I know what I want to buy in the future. I wanted to like this a lot more than I did. I know it’s a cult fav and I see why. I loved what it did when I added water. The smell was very pleasant. The price is pretty reasonable. However, I personally just can’t get on board with how watery this product is. I don’t wear a lot of makeup so the makeup removing component, I didn’t get to see in action. I am a skincare minimalist and I only buy products that make me go omggggg when I use them. But at the end of the day, I’m just a gel cleanser girl

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Youth to the People line. The cleanser is no exception. It makes my face feel fresh and clean. I do not wear makeup so I am not able to share how it works removing it but just getting the day to day off, it works pretty well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice smelling and lathering product, cleans well. Pump disperses wayyy to much so you are wasting product ! Wouldn’t purchase again, a bit too pricey for what you are getting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. It is so gentle yet cleanses thoroughly. I used this after a day at the pool to remove sweat, sunscreen, and chlorine on slightly burnt skin. It felt great and I was squeaky clean after one wash. Just a little bit goes a long way and lathers up nicely. It's also easy to rinse away and has a nice chopped salad smell. I finished off with the Superberry Hydrate & Glow Dream mask and my skin felt so clean and refreshed. I wanted to bathe in the stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for around two months now. Whenever wash I wash my face, my skin feels so soft, clean, and fresh. It's definitely working for me and my skin. One of the best face cleansers I have ever used. It also takes off the heavy layer of sunscreen without stripping away my skin's natural moisture. I am really happy that I gave it a try and now I have found my favorite cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to choose my skincare products so carefully because my skin reacts to nearly everything.  The cleanser cleans and SOOTHES! A little makes a nice larger that gently and thoroughly cleans, leaving my skin calm, happy and clean.  My 2 kids in their 20s also swear by it for a gentle squeaky clean.  Try the Dream mask (I use it as a cream) at night and your skin with thank you by morning! Disclaimer: I received this product as a free sample but have been using it and loving it since long before :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I was cleansing my face twice every night to make sure my skin was clean but since I started using this I feel the second wash unnecessary. It thoroughly cleanses my skin and removes my make up in one step, I have found my new go to cleanser!

reviews.review_title: Clean but not overdrying on normal-to-oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for two years and find it does an excellent job as a second-step cleanser. It is not overdrying on my normal-to-oily skin when used in rotation with another cleanser (I use YTTP Superfood in the shower and another brand at my bathroom sink). I use only one pump and it is PLENTY. The 8oz will last me a year and I will continue to repurchase! I love the recyclable glass packaging as well as the brand's guiding principals of inclusion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this cleanser DON’T GET ME WRONG. However, the dispenser leaks so bad and i’ve lost so much product because of it, and it’s extremely frustrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used it for 2 days now, twice a day! So it’s honestly too early to give a proper review. It feels very rich and lathers well. My skin does feel clean after use. I like it so far, even if it’s just 2 days. Definitely will continue use and hopes it will do my oily acne prone skin justice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best cleanser. it’s the only cleanser that makes my face feel clean without over stripping it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It makes my skin feel clean and refreshed without feeling like I used a lot of chemicals with it. No sticky residue like some other products I've tried from other brands. I also love that the brand is committed to sustainability and uses glass bottles for the product to make them better for the environment.

reviews.review_title: One of my all time favs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I tend to have oily-er skin in the summer and this cleanser has been helping control that extra oil. It also lasts forever! Love YTTP products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin felt refreshed and clean. I’d be interested in trying the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seems like what works for everyone never works for me! I wanted to love this so bad i eyed it for weeks and I finally got it and my skin did not like this. Super bumpy and inflamed. I did like how it made me skin actually feel clean and I absolutely love the packaging, but it just didn’t work for my sensative skin unfortunately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this face wash! My face feels instantly clean & smooth. A real game changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is so bad made me break out and it’s just like really sticky idk how to explain it would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser did not disappoint! I use it twice a day and it doesn’t dry out my skin. After using it, my skin was so soft and refreshed! I will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I was hesitant about using it because my skin is easily irritated, and I break out whenever I change. However, it was a pleasant surprise that the cleanser caused no irritation or breakouts. It smells great. It’s gentle and leaves my skin feeling clean and soft. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is my go-to every morning. It’s light and gentle but my leaves my skin feeling incredibly clean. The scent is fresh and green and SO GOOD. I’ve used YTTP products for a couple years now and this is definitely a staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my favorite cleanser, it removes all makeup and debris and leaves my skin feeling so fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one product I found so far that does not make my skin feel dry after rinsing. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good cleanser but not worth the price. With my skin type, I needed something stronger

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this cleanser for the two times I used it but the pump came broken. The top of the pump comes right off when you touch it, but still pumps out the cleanser. I was going to return it to get a new one and the next day my boyfriend was cleaning and tried to pick it up by the pump to move it and knocked it over shattering the glass bottle. Definitely can’t return it now.

reviews.review_title: kind of in love with soap?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I actually had purchased some of this a couple years ago, enjoyed it, and then did not repurchase since I got distracted by shiny new skincare things. Just got the travel size of this cleanser and forgot how great it really was! This time, I followed the advice exactly on cleansing time and activation and GOODNESS. My skin is feeling softer, my nose pores are not as noticeable to me, and the face feels cleeeean. Won't forget to repurchase this go-around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this product. I really feel that it removes the dirt and grime from the day. My skin is very smooth after using the cleanser. This cleanser is what made me fall in love with a lot of the YTTP products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser! A little goes a long way.  I use it in the morning and at night and it always leaves my skin looking smooth.

reviews.review_title: Nice simple cleanser, but not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has a fresh light scent that doesn’t linger, foams up easily, and rinses away without any leftover residue. The glass bottle is a nice luxe touch. My skin isn’t stripped of moisture afterwards, but I do try to follow up with toner/serum/moisturizer as soon as I can to avoid drying out my skin. However, although I enjoy this cleanser for the most part, it just seems like a slightly fancier version of the CeraVe foaming cleanser for a much higher cost. I don’t plan on repurchasing, but it was nice to try out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this cleanser in the midst of a chaotic skin freak out. Having just given birth and staying a few days in the hospital, my already sensitive skin was flaking, breaking out, and even developed a weird rash. This cleanser smelled so fresh and lathered so well. A little bit goes such a long way with this product. This cleanser managed to take out all the grime from my face after being stuck bedridden for nearly a week yet soothed away all the irritation as well. I have pretty sensitive skin so it’s very difficult for me to find a product that doesn’t cause my skin to react negatively, so this cleanser was a very pleasant surprise. After only 2 uses my hormonal acne started to clear and my rash and other redness is starting fade, my skin feels soft. This is a little bit more drying than the usual cleanser I use but I just used a bit of a heavier moisturizer and everything seemed to balance out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: incredibly stripping….it was like using that neutrogena grapefruit wash..be wary of this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I am oily acne prone skin. After stripping my face with all kinds of cleansers with active ingredients I had to reset my skin barrier with this cleanser & I haven’t looked back. Leaves my skin feeling soft, clean, and not stripped. Super gentle. Can’t recommend enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is light and clean.  My face felt clean but not dried out afterwards.  The smell is pleasant and doesn’t hang around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels amazing on skin and leaves it glowing. Rinses off easily and doesn’t leave a film

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t feel like this product cleans my face yet somehow my skin feels SUPER dry after using it. It smells great and the packaging is glass which not only makes it feel very high end but also better for the environment than plastic. Also bonus points for being clean beauty however it does nothing for my skin’s texture or cleanliness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works great and leaves my skin feeling soft and not too stripped. It’s pricey and not super amazing or anything but still worth it in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing cleanser. It feels so nice on the skin, smells amazing, and doesn't leave my skin feeling dry and tight after washing it off. It's absolutely perfect and I 100% recommend to anyone who is looking for a cleanser. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_title: Gentle cleanser, leaves my skin soft and clean!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great!  I have been using YTTP moisturizer for years and recently added onto my routine w their eye cream and this cleanser. This cleanser is fantastic,  it leaves my face feeling soft and clean. I love how it foams up nicely for a gentle but thorough clean.  My skin is sensitive and this doesn't irritate me in any way. I also love the scent, light and fresh and not at all overpowering. A little goes a long way, also! So I think the price is well worth it considering how long it should last. I use it ever night before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pore clearing, extra gentle, non stripping effective and vegan! This an overall amazing cleanser (I also love the glass bottles!) highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love,  super nice plus the mini lasts forever and not expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleaner for 2 years and have gone through 4 bottles. It is absolutely amazing! It cleanses the skin thoroughly without making me feel too dry. Everyone I know that has tried this cleanser loves it a lot, it is a must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been loving this YTTP cleanser! My face feels so clean after cleansing and knowing it’s a clean skincare product makes me love it even more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! I’ve been using it for about a year and it continues to be my favorite. I try out other cleansers every now and then but this one reigns supreme in my heart. I like the light smell of greens and herbs in it and it never irritates or strips my skin. This is my forever cleanser. Almost everything else in my skincare routine has changed over time but this is the one constant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. My skin feels so much cleaner/brighter after using it for a week. Plus the smell is so fresh!

reviews.review_title: It’s worth it + my reasons why!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Must have!! Seriously if you are looking for a daily cleanser that won’t dry out your skin but feels like it’s actually cleaning your face this is it! This has been apart of my daily routine for a while, i have combination skin that’s pretty sensitive and it works great. It leaves your skin feeling refreshed and healthy. I definitely noticed my skin looking a lot more vibrant and healthy which is saying a lot since I definitely fall victim to fatigued from staring at a laptop all day. This cleanser is just one of the many youth to the people products I use. Honestly every item I’ve purchased from the brand has now become a staple for me. Def worth checking out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the pump but hate the glass bottle, not a fan because I’m prone to dropping things. Cleanser does an ok job but doesn’t fully remove makeup. I have to do 2-3 cleanses before I feel clean. I do wear a lot of makeup, so warning for the full face makeup wearers, it will take a lot before your washcloth or face cleansing brush runs clear. I’m usually left with black smudged eyes. I will choose something different once this is gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough about this cleanser.  I have combo (though slightly more on the oily side) skin and this cleanser has made my skin even, soft and brighter.  I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a gel so it doesn’t create too much lather.  Even so it does feel pretty luxurious and the smell is clean and fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all YTTP products! I've been using this cleanser for over a year.  The cleanser works great for my combination skin. It doesn't dry my skin out and provides a good, pore clearing clean. It does not have a harsh fragrance and has never irritated my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. I have normal skin that leans towards oily depending on the weather, and this stuff is perfect. First it’s a gel, but not too liquidy that it tries to fall through your fingers before you get it on your face. And it has a great lather, not overly bubbly but you can tell you’ve reached everywhere. I really like the vegetable smell too. And when I rinse off I don’t feel dry or any residue- it’s great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it on my skin. The smell is great and the bottle will last you a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser  has a refreshing scent to it. it's not overwhelming, but has a light clean smell to it which I like. This cleanser lathers  really nice and quick. my only issue is that it is super drying afterwards. It takes every ounce of oil off of my face to the point its squeaky clean and dry afterwards. At first this did not impress me, but as I continued to use it, it's starting to grow on me and I'm leaning more towards liking it. But it definitely  will take every single oil particle from your face from today and tomorrow , so be careful on that aspect. 4.5 stars for me.

reviews.review_title: Yep - it’s as good as they say (and more!)
reviews.review_text: It really is that good. I love the scent. I absolutely adore the Fresh Soy Cleanser, but I struggle with the smell of cucumbers. This one is gorgeous and just enough, without that smell. Cleanses and lathers well… 10/10 for me and my new go to cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how my skin feels after using this product. It feels like your skin is breathing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this cleanser as a free sample but have purchased it in the past multiple times and really enjoy it, I love the smell, it’s such a fresh clean scent. It’s been great a morning cleanser or as my second cleaner after all my makeup is off for the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample bottle in exchange for an honest review. I love this cleanser, it smells so cleans and fresh. It’s a little too stripping for my oily combo skin, but I use it in rotation with my other cleanser and it works well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 4.5 stars! This cleanser is so great. It has a nice,  fresh scent and lathers beautifully without stripping your skin. I tend to have skin on the dry side and this has never dried me out, but still gets me squeaky clean! I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this cleanser leaves my skin feeling. Have been using it for a while and v happy with the results!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Cleans well, feels and smells so fresh, and doesn’t dry out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee this product! I have very dry skin and Cerave’s Hydrating Cleanser has been my go-to #1 cleanser for a while now. When I received this, I wasn’t sure if it was going to leave my face feeling stripped like most other cleansers do, but this one is amazing. It cleanses well and leaves skin feeling soft and moisturized. I haven’t worn any makeup since starting this cleanser so I’m not sure how well it works for removing makeup but overall definitely good and I will continue to use this while alternating with the Cerave cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It is so amazing for my skin. Smells like a green smoothie! Filled with amazing ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This clean cleanser is amazing!! I’ve been using it for years and love that it’s made without high heat so that all of the nutrients and antioxidants remain in the cleanser. It keeps your skin clean without feeling dry and easily takes off makeup. It’s my go-to, along with pretty much the entire line of YTTP!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a travel sized version of this as a free sample to try it out by youth to the people themselves and I hate to say it but this cleanser caused me to breakout really badly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I literally love this cleanser! It’s helped clear my breakouts, remove my makeup, and overall keep my skin glowing.

reviews.review_title: Great Product for Mature and Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I may not be the normal reviewer; I am turning 46 in 2 months, and I have EXTRMELY sensitive skin. I am allergic to everything and have lived in very sunny areas most of my life.  I do not use a lot of makeup; I do not use a ton of cleaners and I do not know much about products because it is all painful and damaging to my skin! I tried a sample of Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Oil from a monthly makeup subscription and it was the first time I was able to use something consistently without it burning the skin or causing any irritation. I was excited but was still leery of their other items, but I tried the Kale + Green Tea Spinach Vitamins Superfood Cleanser. The smell (which is a big issue with products and my skin) was light and calming. I had no burning; the skin was not red or irritated at all. Sometimes it hits after a few days, but I have been using it everyday with no issues. The skin is clean and soft. My pores look amazing. My skin is healthy and happy. I would HIGHLY suggest this cleanser for any one with sensitive skin. It is nice to be able to have something that I can use consistently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use the clean and clear morning burst cleanser, my skin is sensitive and I break out easily when switching products so I was worried about branching out, I was also worried about switching cleansers and not getting the same squeaky clean feeling when using something more organic. this cleanser is everything I needed and more! I haven’t had any major breakouts since using it (for the past year and change) and a little bit goes a long way. I’ve permanently converted to this as my daily cleanser, I recommend it to everyone I know:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore the scent of this! It smells fresh and green (like rolling down a hill on a perfect spring day- without the itching and stuff in your hair after). My skin is combination and it never dries me out. It helps keep my breakouts at bay. This is one of my very few repeat beauty buys.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really liked the sample I tried a while back so was very surprised to find my skin so flaky after using this cleanser for just a day or two. Nothing has ever dried my combination, acne-prone skin so dramatically, and I don't dare use the rest of the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So in love ith this cleanser but the $$$ is not worth a repurchase especially with all the less expensive options out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic product. I am in my mid 50’s have never been able to find a cleanser that made my face feel clean but not dry. Wish the travel size was in a different type of bottle, consistently over tighten  and break the cap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would highlt recommend this cleanser. I was not expecting that this will sort my skin issues like other products i t worked in just one use. Loved it

reviews.review_title: Was skeptical but now totally into it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical that a cleanser could have much of an affect on my skin but I was wrong to doubt! I’ve been using the cleanser for about 2 weeks now but almost immediately I noticed visible changes in my tone and texture. I used to use the super food serum before they discontinued it, and I’m so happy to see that the same ingredients work magic in this cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Does everything you want it to do
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice product. It leaves your face feeling perfectly clean, not stripped or dry or tight, but still adequately cleansed. A little bit goes a long way, so although I’m not a fan of the $36 price tag, it’s a really solid product and price per use might actually be appropriate.   My review is based on a free sample, but I was already interested in the product. The small sample bottle I was given will last a long time. I likely will purchase a full size when it’s empty.   I took a star off because the fragrance can be bothersome if you’re really sensitive to scents (I think people are about 50/50 on if they like the smell), and because of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It never leaves my skin feeling dry and tight, it smells so refreshing I use it every night and after massaging it in and washing it off I can see my pores on my nose are less clogged

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite facial cleanser of all time. It cleans without drying out my skin and works well with the other products in the Youth to the People line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love the ingredients, love the reusable glass bottle.   (I plan on bringing it to my local refill shop after I'm thru with the cleanser.) This cleaner makes my skin feel so clean. I'm working harder at washing for 30-60 seconds just to that all of these superfoods get down deep into my pores!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser.  Feels great in your skin. Not sudsy. Just clean. I swear my pores look smaller afterwards. Don’t hesitate. Buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! The only drawback is honestly the price tag. YTTP is such a lovely brand. The wash gets the daily grime off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have searched high and low for a good cleanser  for my oily skin. Everything is either too heavy or too stripping and leaves my skin dry, which causes even more oil to produce. This superfood cleanser has been a miracle! My skin feels clean but not stripped, my acne is under control, and my skin is brighter and I find that I don’t have to wear as much makeup! I will never need another cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. It perfectly foams in your hands while takes off all makeup and oils. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser it’s hydrating! It’s calmed my inflammation a lot and left my skin so soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this smells and feels. My skin was peeling and inflamed when I decided to use this cleanser, and it has helped so much. It’s gentle on my skin but still really cleans your face well. It doesn’t leave my skin dry or tight. My skin is already doing much better, and I’ve only been using it for a week. I just love YTTP so much, their products never disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love this cleanser! It comes in a glass container which can be repurposed or recycled! The scent is light but crisp and clean. I enjoyed how refreshing and clean it left my skin! I have oily and acne prone skin for reference! Definitely a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is sooo good. It smells so fresh and feels so good on the skin. Makes me feel super clean without my skin feeling tight or dry. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the small size to test out and I am really happy that I did. I’ve had issues in the past of certain cleansers drying out my face after washing, this one does not leave my skin over-stripped. I love how it foams up really nicely and hydrates my skin and leaves it feeling so clean and refreshing! I will definitely purchase the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry skin and I find that I get along well with this cleanser.  I use this product 2x per day and It does not leave my skin feeling stripped or stiff after use.  The scent is clean and veers towards a very slight sweet green tea.  The texture going on is a little sticky and requires a little water to spread it around.  This is one of a few soaps that really gets nearly all my makeup off with just one was versus the two-step cleanse.  This is one of my favorite YTP products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for about a year now and it is my favorite cleanser! It leaves my skin feeling clean, but never stripped. I do use an oil cleanser at night to remove makeup and then use this to double cleanse. I also use it every morning. I love that the company uses glass jar packaging instead of plastic.

reviews.review_title: the only cleaner I use now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleaner checks all of the boxes for me, it’s “clean”, it feels lightweight & I can use it across seasons. I suffered from acne and have sensitive skin so finding the right cleaner has been super important to me. Once I switched to YTTP I haven’t looked back, it’s been about 2 years that I have been using this cleaner and i don’t feel like I need to switch up my regimen in winter like I had to in the past. I recommend this to all my people... I’m a fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser. It feels so refreshing and like it’s really gotten in there to strip everything away. I also love that it allows me to use a really thick moisturizer afterward without it feeling too heavy. Smells amazing, feels amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser as it has gotten so much hype lately. I don't know if I am allergic to an ingredient or something but I notice that I always break out after using this cleanser. It feels gentle while I am using it but I need to follow up with a toner right after or my skin I'll be tight and dry. Its a good option for when I need a really deep cleanse like after the gym or something, but I don't see myself reaching for this. I have combo/dry acne prone skin for reference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It feels nourishing and my face feels so refreshed using this cleanser! It smells like a juice cleanse, which is not a bad thing. I could see this potentially being too drying during the winter but right now my skin is just loving it. My face feels clean and fresh after using it. I definitely enjoy using this cleanser and think it's worth at least a try. You might end up loving it like me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A lovely cleanser. My skin doesn’t feel stripped or dry after using. Definitely one of the best I’ve ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this cleanser, but it wasn't for me! I have dry skin and this cleanser made my skin feel even drier and super tight each time I used it. I really liked that in came in a reusable glass bottle, though!

reviews.review_title: This Cleanser Keeps My Skin Balanced!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so YTTP has totally revolutionized the way I look at my skin! I get patches of over dry skin that then over produces oil and this is my go-to cleanser to keep that whole situation at bay. I’ve noticed that the Superfood Cleanser takes the day off my face but doesn’t completely strip it, which would otherwise kick off the overproduction of oil. I use this with the Kombucha Power Toner because the two products work really well together to calm my face down. It’s a great AM and PM product and when I get back break outs from exercising I bring it in the shower and they clear right up. Huge fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down this is the best cleanser I have ever used. Everything from the herbal smell to the way it makes my skin feel is perfect. It’s slightly foams and leaves your skin soft and plump with no dryness at all. I use it morning and night. I have combo skin and it never leaves me feeling greasy. I will definitely be purchasing the full sized version ASAP. Highly recommend this kale superfood cleanser and any other yttp product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! A little goes a long way. This face wash cleanses and his gentle on the skin. It’s comes in a beautiful reusable bottle. I recommended to my brothers and they are raving about how good their face is. I purchased the biggest bottle which is a little pricey but I don’t mind because it works well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE this product. Love that it is in a glass bottle and recyclable. It cleanser has a very light scent and takes all the makeup off my face with the first wash. My skin hasn’t dried out at all. I will definitely keep buying this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had started using YTTP Vitamin C Serum, Super Berry Dream Mask and the Superfood Moisture Cream, but hadn't tried the Superfood Cleanser before now, but I love it!!  All these products feel so nice and fresh on your skin!  The cleanser does not dry out your skin whatsoever and leaves your face feeling wonderfully clean.  This is the perfect addition to my new YTTP routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can’t say enough good things about this cleanser! It’s a great balance for my oily skin, and I love how soft and clean it makes my skin feel even after just one use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. It has a fresh smell. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling right or dry but I can tell it’s clean. I will be using this product going forward as my cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only face wash I will use because it is perfect for my sensitive skin. My skin has a tendency to turn red, it can get dry and sometimes can get oily on the T-Zone area.  After I use this face wash, my skin is soft and clean. It does not irritate my skin and it does not make my skin red. It also allows my skin to retain its moisture so it doesn't dry it out. It smells amazing (very delicate yet refreshing scent) and I love all of the healthy ingredients. Highly recommend this face wash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this cleanser. Foams up quickly and my skin feels so clean. It doesn’t totally dry my face out like other cleansers. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have complicated skin: combo/acne-prone/dry/sensitive. Finding products that don’t irritate or leave my skin feeling dry or blemished has been a challenge. This cleanser has been amazing - it leaves my skin looking clean and bright and feeling smooth and nourished. It just takes a little to create a nice lather and feels great. This will definitely be a part of my ongoing routine. Very happy with this cleanser :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a licensed esthetician so I’ve used a lot of cleansers on my skin as well as my clients’ skin, and this is always one of my favorites. It has a nice light scent and is gentle yet leaves the skin nice and clean. I love the natural antioxidants to help fight free radicals and the vitamin k makes this great for even the most sensitive skin. It’s really great for rosacea as well. I recommend this cleanser to most of my clients, even over the professional only products I sell in my spa. I love that YTTP is pro grade but available to all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for almost two years now. What started as Sephora sending me a sample with an order has led to a love story! I’ve ordered this multiple times already (even as gifts for family) and love referring people to it. I suffer from hormonal acne and unfortunately my skin has been left with dark spots over the years. I had tried so many dark spot correcting products and turmeric masks but nothing helped. Until I started using this product. My face has cleared up significantly, and my dark spots fade quickly after breakouts. I use this product twice a day, only half a pump - a full pump each time and follow up with the Superberry Hydrate & Glow Mask every other night. Both smell lovely. I also love that the brand is vegan as I began my vegan journey almost three years ago. This cleanser has also given my skin a glow and I no longer feel the need to wear makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly cannot rave about any yttp product enough! I have every product they make and I love them all. This cleanser leaves your face feeling so clean and fresh. I have sensitive skin and the wrong thing can make me break out even if I just look at it. But with yttp products and this cleanser specifically, they help me to keep the redness at bay and help calm down my acne. If you are on the fence about this product just buy it and you'll fall in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Only need a small amount for a nice lather. Smell is not too strong. Makes skin have a little glow. Pair with the super food air whip moisture cream for best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser of all time is this superfood cleanser, it’s gentle but cleanses deeply. It has a lovely light scent without having fragrance in the ingredients and I love that you can repurpose the jar. The fact that you can even remove the writing on it because the ink is vegetable based is just incredible. This is the cleanser that I will use forever, it’s the very best and it has done wonders for my normal to dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’ve been using youth to the people products for years now and love how clean and sustainable their ingredients/packaging are. i don’t have to worry about what i’m putting on my skin! the superfood cleanser smells so good, and is great at removing makeup. i always follow up with the superfood moisturizer for extra skin love - also smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin cannot go without the Superfood Cleanser. My skin feels so clean and refreshed every time I use it. It clears all of the impurities on my face without leaving me dried out. Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using an oil based makeup remover, I follow up with this cleanser to get that fresh clean feel. Cleansing, but not stripping!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually received a sample of this years ago and have been buying it ever since. I love it, I had been looking for a cleanser that didn't have a bunch of ingredients that would react with serums and things I used after (i.e. cleansers with acid so I can't use retinol etc). I use it for both regular everyday cleanser and part of a dual cleanse after makeup removing. Smells lovely, very light and fresh. The lather is great and it doesn't dry out my skin- I have combo skin for reference. I LOVE trying new skincare and constantly changing up my routine but I always keep this one around, it's been the only product I keep on hand always. Also bonus points for YTTP using glass!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried many different cleansers and finally found my holy grail. My skin is sensitive and dry. Other washes, even if they were gentle, they didn’t clean my face well, or they dry me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
