reviews.review_text: It’s not for dry skin . Make  flaky to your skin.Worst experience with this product…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My review would be closer to a 3.75, if I was able to do that. I have oily/acne-prone skin and this cleanser is nice, but I did experience a massive surge in pimples and black heads after I started using this. I’m not sure if this was the “purging period” for it, but, my skin did look nice after it went away. I think that this would definitely be more of a summer cleanser for me because it does an excellent job of taking away my sweat/whatever grime I’ve collected on my face after being outside. Overall, it’s a good cleanser. Not the best and not the worst.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ABSOLUTELY love this cleanser I have been using this for 3 years now and the entire line as well it’s a game changer !!!’n
I have combination skin and this cleans great without overdrying. Smells wonderful too

reviews.review_title: great for sensitive and acne prone skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this product for my sensitive and acne prone skin. There is a noticeable difference when I use it and don’t. It makes my skin much softer and helps bring deeper pimples more towards the surface which makes it easier to extract. Overall love this product. Another thing to add is that my skin was so damaged from chemicals so the clean ingredients was a plus and helped amazingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. It has a fresh, natural scent. Cleans my face without overly drying it out. It makes me look forward to washing my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser!  It smells clean, light and fresh.  Not drying to my skin but feels more like it cushions my skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face cleanser smells amazing! I use it in the morning and at night, it’s very gentle on my eczema/rosacea prone face. It’s even helping hydrate some of my dry areas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good everyday cleanser. Gentle and cleans well, smell isn’t bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for roughly 2-3 years and I am still so absolutely in love with it! I'm heading into my 40's, hormonal acne is still a thing, mix that in with my combination skin and my living nightmare is a reality. That being said, using this cleanser day and night brings me such satisfaction. It helps keep my breakouts to a minimum (I'm a real person with real skin and it's never going to be perfect) and it helps me feel more secure with my natural face. All without stripping my skin, and bonus, it smells amazing. I also love what this company stands for, what it represents, and how vested they are in a better tomorrow. I'll be a user for life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan at all. I wanted a cleaner option within ingredients and figured this was the best option. I tried it for a month and it made my skin dry, dull, broke me out and Made my skin a lot more sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser leaves your skin having the perfect balance of clean, nourished, and hydrated. I have sensitive aging skin  You don’t need much, so it will last you a long time! My other YTTP product is their super berry hydrate and glow dream mask!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this cleanser for years! From the glass bottle to the clean ingredients, it is the perfect product and so gentile on my skin. It also lasts a long time, making the value more than worth it. Thank you YTTP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for the past four months, although Youth To The People sent me a free sample after I initially started to use it. The cleanser is a bit pricey, but it will last you a LONG time. I'm still on my first bottle after four months, although I use it only in the mornings. It smells amazing and lathers super well. I have oily/combination skin, and I have not experienced any breakouts or dryness as a result of using the cleanser. Youth To The People makes pricey but quality products, and I would recommend this to anyone wanting a more luxury cleanser experience with a great, fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Adore that’s it vegan, in a glass bottle, and is both gentle and powerful. If I didn’t immediately moisturize my skin right after thought it would feel a bit dry though about a minute after cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved a free sample from YTTP. This is by far my favorite cleanser. It can be a little drying so I only use it at night.  It smells amazing as well.

reviews.review_title: There’s a reason why this is a cult favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was recently sent a travel size of this cleanser and I was reminded why it’s so popular. This is one of the first cleansers I purchased when I got into skincare.   Some gel cleansers can be stripping for my dry skin but I found this to be extremely rich and gentle. My skin was clean and hydrated after use. Totally adding this back into my routine.  I love the earthy aroma!

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend if you want a light cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is super light and refreshing.  It left my skin feeling soft, but not dry.  It is not a harsh cleanser and does not exfoliate, but I did use it with my small silicon scrubber and it was perfect. I also did use it at night with my Hydrate & Glow Dream Mask which I adore (this product was the one that got me introduced to this company).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice cleanser. It smells great, is really soothing, and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. A little goes a long way, so it should last a long time. I typically use CeraVe hydrating cleanser at night since I am prone to dry skin. This superfood cleanser doesn't dry my skin out like other cleansers but is not quite as hydrating as the CeraVe cleanser.

Love this cleanser.  Disclosure: while I have been using this for over 6 months, recently YTTP went me a sample for review which I was happy to do since I’m already using the product.

reviews.review_text: This stuff saved my face. I am almost 30 and still struggle with some breakouts (I had cystic acne from 18-23). I am on the oilier side of normal skin. This makes my skin feel clean without feeling stripped. It has reduced my breakouts immensely. I won’t go back to anything else. It helps to cleanse twice with this, but DEFINITELY recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this cleanser so much. Smells delightful and feels so refreshing in the morning and night. Literally my favorite product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YTTP always win in my book, so I was pleased to receive a sample of the Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser in the mail. This cleansed the skin beautifully (as my second cleanse) and did not leave my skin feeling stripped. The scent is not overbearing and does not break me out or cause any irritation. For the price point, it’s a decent amount of product as well (and we love glass packaging!). All around a great basic cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: a really good basic cleanser. light clean scent. I like this cleanser as an everyday because the ingredients are clean. I trust YTTP products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser smells wonderful.  it leaves me feeling fresh and clean.  i also like the glass packaging and the bottle and packaging are recyclable/reusable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! I like how simple and clean the ingredients are. I really enjoy the smell of the cleanser and how it lathers on the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many cleansers over the years and love this one. Face feels so clean but it’s not harsh and smells great.  I will continue to buy this cleanser!  I did receive a free sample to try and review but I actually had already bought the cleanser elsewhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for a year now and my skin has never looked so good. I have acne prone skin making it hard to find a good cleanser that doesn’t make me break out. This cleanser is the answer! I love the feeling of it, my skin feels amazing afterwards and ready for topicals without any residue from the cleanser! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the GOAT. My holy grail cleanser. I legitimately look forward to washing my face every day because of this. Smells so light and fresh and really cleans while not stripping or drying. Also YTTP is a bomb ethical company that I am glad to support! (ps THEY FIXED THE PUMP praise)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have finally found a face wash that I am completely happy with. This doesn't strip or over dry my face, but still busts through dirt and oil (combo skin). It has drastically helped with my complexion that really took a turn for the worst from having to wear masks at work 8-10 hours a day. I'm so grateful that my coworker recommended this and I recommend it to everyone I know, my mom even uses it now and loves it for her drier skin. I've been a repeat buyer for about a year now. A huge bonus that it is designed with minimal environmental impacts and all natural benefits (striving for that plastic free lifestyle). I love that you can even order the larger refill bottles to limit waste even more. Even better, this supports a small business based right in Los Angeles. I recieved a travel size of this cleanser from Youth to the People in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will go a long way and I love the way it feels on the skin before and after. I use other cleansers as well, so I cannot say how long exactly, but a little bit is needed for each wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this cleanser for over a year and recently received a sample in the mail - love love love it! I use it both morning and night and it gently removes my sunscreen and everything else I put on my face without stripping it! A staple in my skincare routine for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had been using first aid beauty's face cleanser for a few years. However, recently during my trip to NY I tried this cleanser for around 2 weeks and it produced amazing results. My only complain with the first aid cleanser was that it did not reduce the texture on my skin. The YTTP  cleanser evened out my complexion, reduced texture, and left my face feeling hydrated. It is now an essential in my 3 step skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, not too overpowering, cleans well, and leaves your face feel fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a year now and love it!! Very gentle and leaves my skin feeling soft and supple while still really cleaning it. It has a very pleasant scent and a rich lather. Overall, super pleased and love their message or clean, vegan products with earth friendly packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a light refreshing cleaner. I really enjoy the feeling of using it! It's not harsh on my sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. I've been using this cleanser for only a couple weeks, but I'm very happy with the results so far. It's a very gentle cleanser and has never irritated my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely adore this product. It feels good on my skin, smells really fresh and has never dried out my face. I use it morning and night (one pump) and it works really well at getting off makeup and sweat. I’ve tried other cleansers but I always come back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Perfect cleanser doesn’t dry out your face. I have very sensitive skin and it’s perfect for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to cleanser! The gentle lather feels so soft on my skin and when rinsed off it makes my skin feel clean without being stripped or dry. If you're feeling conflicted on whether or not to try this product. I would recommend giving it a shot! It's definitely worth the price (and a little cleanser goes a long way!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing for sensitive skin. I always seem to get bad sun rashes on my face which results in a lot of tiny bumps. As soon as I was my face with the Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser the bumps on my face completely disappeared. 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I love YTTP brand! I’ve been using them for a while now! I haven’t had any issues with any of their products that I’ve used or been using. This cleanser is one of the best I’ve used since changing. It seems like all other cleansers dry my already dry skin out and I can feel the tightness and itchiness in my face with others even after all my serums and moisturized etc. the faint earthy smell of this cleaner I could smell all day! I wish it was a candle or air freshener! I love the way it lathers up after rubbing it in your hands and then onto your face. I feel like you really get a good clean if you’re lathering it up right on your face for 60 seconds. Your akin just feels clean after you’re done and can feel it. So smooth and soft like ready for the day! I’d recommend this product to anyone looking for a good cleanser that doesn’t have chemicals and is vegan and cruelty free! I’ve actually turned my brother onto the brand and he loves this cleanser! He bought the giant bottle and when I went home about a month ago he was already half way through it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser I’ve ever tried. The price is obviously not accessible to everyone, which is unfortunate, but you really do get your money’s worth. Skin feels totally clean without being tight, and it helps keep my acne away. Smells fresh but not strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a refreshing and gentle cleanser that gets the job done! I really enjoyed this cleanser & would buy a full sized product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YTTP’s cleanser is my favorite cleanser ever! So much so that I went through two small bottles and then ordered a full-size bottle. YTTP recently sent me a small bottle in exchange for this review, and, since I already had been using the cleanser every day, I was happy to oblige (meaning that my opinion regarding this cleanser is not shaped by being sent a sample). I have combo skin and use this cleanser morning and night (and as my second cleanser when double-cleansing after wearing makeup). This magic in a bottle feels great and leaves my skin fresh and clean without feeling stripped. I will keep replenishing this cleanser for as long as YTTP makes it!

reviews.review_title: I love YTTP products! It is a must have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. It really does what it is supposed to do. I use twice a day with the toner and moisturizer. I am absolutely in love with this brand, I love not only their products, but also their values! I have pretty much all the products, they are completely vegan, sustainable and their ingredients are very clean. I’ve been using it for approximately two months and my skin is glows! I had a video call with a Youth to the People specialist and she told me about all the products and how I should use them. The products are not expensive and they are amazing! I am saving so much money, because now I don’t need get a facial every month. If you not sure if you should buy it, definitely do! Buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard so many good this about this cleanser and so i decided to give it a try. I have combination skin and prone to breakouts, this has made my skin clear up so much! it doesnt leave my face feeling tight, but it does make the dry spots worst.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i was super excited to try this product, especially due to all of the hype that social media gives it! it smells AMAZING, despite fragrance not being on the ingredient list! it gets my makeup off like a charm, and doesn't strip my skin at all. it's not a miracle worker, but it is an amazing cleanser and gets my face nice and clean. 8/10, worth the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love YTTP. They are such a cool conscious brand. This product doesn't disappoint. Works well to remove makeup and dirt from the day. The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is that the smell is a little strong for my liking. It smells good just strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only cleanser I ever use now. It cleans the skin without overly stripping it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful cleanser. Cleans gently but removes all traces of makeup and grime. Non-drying and doesn’t make my skin feel tight. Lightly scented and hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It cleanses well. Leaves my face feeling very clean. It has a slight chlorophyll smell which is taking some getting used to. Love the mission of this company and use some of their other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash makes my combo skin feel clean but not stripped. I love the fresh light scent as well. This is my new go-to for cleaning my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly my tried and true cleanser! I’ve tried many cleansers and none of them do what this cleanser does! I mean it when I say this will cleanse your skin completely without stripping or drying! This is my holy grail and I promise I’m not steering anyone wrong here! Highest recommendation for a cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this for two days and can honestly say it’s one of the better skin products I’ve ever used. My face feels so clean afterwards. I’ve been using another product for years, this blows it out of the water.

reviews.review_title: no stripping or drying for my dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser so much! It really does wonders for my skin. Leaves my skin feeling so clean and fresh without the dryness or stripping from other cleansers. Everything at YTTP is amazing, but their tried and true cleanser is the holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go-to cleanser for almost 2 years. Cleans without stripping. Love the ingredients as much as the company. Product is natural and doesn’t like extreme temp changes and will self-dispense or leak from the pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried sooo many cleansers and always come back to this one! Does it’s job without drying your skin or making it feel tight and weird. Good for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! Works into a nice lather, slight tingly fresh feeling. Makes your face feel super clean after and not drying, like a clean slate for other skincare products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Smells amazing! It’s so lightweight that you only need a tiny amount to apply to feel like your face has been thoroughly cleaned. My face feels hydrated and soft and not dull or dry after usage. I love that the bottle is glass and not plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser! It is gentle but still leaves my skin feeling super clean without any drying. I use a nickel/quarter size amount on damp skin & hands. Lather it up before applying then massage my face for a full minute. It removes all my makeup easily. Youth To The People is also my dream brand- sustainable, social justice oriented, vegan & accessible! Give this cleanser a try, you will not be sorry! I also use their Superfood Air-Whip cream & Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask. Both are phenomenal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for several months now. The lather is creamy and gentle, yet removes all of my makeup including mascara. My skin never feels tight afterwards. I’m 61 years old and I was looking for a skincare company that uses great ingredients and this line uses superfoods which I find very innovative. I’m also using their moisturizers and I’m thrilled with those too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does a gentle job of cleansing, but for my dry skin it felt a little more stripping than what I would have wanted. I think this may be more suited for normal to oilier types. Also, the scent is not my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser since 2017-2018 and it’s the only cleanser that actually leaves my very sensitive, acne prone skin, feeling clean, hydrating and doesn’t feel like it’s stripping the oils off my face. It’s great as both a morning wake up, and in a double cleansing routine, which I do almost every night. I’ve tried other cleansers but they don’t leave me satisfied as much as this one has. A staple in my line up without a doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice cleanser for nighttime. I have dry skin and it did strip my skin a bit so it might be better for combination to oily skin maybe even normal. I think maybe for the heat of the summer it would be okay. I don’t hate it though!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this cleanser! It actually takes off all my makeup and you don’t even need to use a lot. A little goes along way. Skin doesn’t feel dry afterwards either so worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It deep cleans SPF very well, and the texture is light enough for my oily/combination skin. I don’t wear makeup often, but when I do, cleansing makeup is always a struggle for me. This cleanser makes that super easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I’ve been a Tatcha Skincare junkie for a while but it’s pricey and I needed something more affordable. This cleanser removes the Better than Sex mascara by Too Faced, Rare beauty foundation + concealer and Huda eyeshadow! I love the fact that all I have to do is a double cleanse and my skin is completely clean. I don’t have to buy makeup wipes anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best clean feeling! Keeps my skin feeling smooth, and doesn’t dry it out. Less breakouts! Great vegan product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! I have very oily skin that gets dehydrated during the Midwestern winters and this cleanser cleans my skin without stripping it. I'm obsessed with the smell and use this every day!

reviews.review_title: I’m never buying any other cleanser..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really struggle with finding the perfect cleanser that doesn’t leave my skin dry and doesn’t leave a “film” like feeling. I struggle with combo skin (more on the oily side) but get terrible breakouts when I don’t have enough moisture in my routine. I’ve tried so many different cleansers and I’ve never found one as good as this one. The clean yet soft, hydrated feeling is amazing. I will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Gentle and effective for a full cleanse!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and effective! I have dry skin with hyperpigmentation and the occasional breakout. This cleanser is light weight, doesn’t make my skin feel dry or tight after rinsing, no residue, and no burn. I wear full glam almost everyday and this is the second step in my double cleanse. Gets everything off and no irritation! Love and recommend to everyone even my teenage daughter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash. During my pregnancy it was the only thing I felt safe using that actually worked well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gentle yet cleansing face wash. It doesn’t dry out my skin nor does it have a strong scent. Although I really recently received a free sample I have been using cleanser for a few years ago and haven’t tried anything else. The single pump dispenses just enough allowing the bottle to last you a little while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a couple of years now and it does not disappoint. When I was contacted by Youth to the People to receive a sample and write a review, it was a no brainer. It leaves my skin feeling fresh and soft. I have sensitive skin and allergies and I do not react to anything in this product. My skin has looked and felt better since using this product. I love how it’s 100% vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I been using this cleanser over two years now. I have tried all kinds of cleanser's (really expensive one's as well), but nothing works as good as this one. My face feels fresh and it looks bright. I use to have really oily skin, but when I started using this product it stopped. I would recommend it to everyone even to people with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Best Face Cleanser I Have Used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser for about a year now. I am 40 with combination skin. For many years, I used The Body Shop’s Tea Tree Oil Cleanser, but it really started drying my face out. I have never experienced dry skin with the Youth to the People Cleanser. My skin stays clear and doesn’t feel oily or dry. It is the perfect balance and feels so refreshing. I love this cleanser so much that I now use several other products by Youth to the People. The products are a little pricey, but a little goes a long way. I try to wait for sales, like Black Friday. I would suggest trying the travel size before purchasing the larger sizes. I, however, plan to continue using this brand as it has done wonders for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I needed a new cleanser for my face and this did not disappoint! My face did not feel dry afterwards and it felt so fresh and clean! I was a bit unsure if it was going to work with my sensitive skin, but it’s been wonderful

reviews.review_title: Gentle, water based cleanser & doesn't strip skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great water based gel cleanser. It foams, but not too much & is super gentle on my skin. I have dry & sometimes even flaky skin & I like to use their Dream Mask after cleansing for a boost of deeper hydration. The best way to use this is to apply to dry skin after getting a little bit of a lather in your hands with cool/tepid water. Gently massage 1- 2 pumps for ab 1 minute, adding cool/tepid water to your skin as you go (helps increase lather & efficiency). Rinse with cool water & if skin isn't too dry, I follow it with their Power Toner & Adaptagen Mist, then use the Air Whip Moisture Cream or their Adaptagen Deep Moisture Cream. There is fragrance listed in ingredients, but it's at the bottom of the list. Honestly, I can't smell anything with any of YTTP products. All of the YTTP skincare comes in glass jars, which can be upcycled or recycled. The glass is thick & hasn't broken on my tile floor. I have dropped it & it hasn't chipped or cracked. The cleanser comes in a mini, regular & jumbo size. I use the mini for traveling, the regular size (which comes with a pump) stays on my counter & the jumbo I keep stored & use it to refill the other 2 sizes.  I've tried other water based cleansers that make my skin feel squeaky clean, but not this one. It's great as a 2nd step in a double cleanse too. FYI: This is a cleanser, it won't reduce pigmentation or fine lines. It IS packed with vitamins & calming ingredients that help keep skin clear & in a more normal range. * #gifted but YTTP hasn't asked for anything in exchange*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this product!! It has a very clean scent and makes my face feel clean afterwards. I don’t know if it does a good job of actually taking off makeup 100%, but it does do a good job of getting the majority of it off. It also doesn’t fry out my skin after using it, which is very important to me. Overall, I think it would be a good face wash for most skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Superfood Cleanser was my first introduction to the brand Youth to the People. This cleanser is considered a cult favorite amongst skincare junkies and I was incredibly excited to be able to try it out for myself.   As the name would suggest, this cleanser is jam packed with a bunch of “superfood” extracts including kale, spinach, green tea, alfalfa, vitamins C, E, and K. This cleanser has a thick gel consistency and doesn’t foam up too much.   While the upfront cost of the cleanser is quite pricey at $36, the cost per oz isn’t that bad at $4.   Since this cleanser is more so marketed for those with oily/combo skin, I was concerned it might be too stripping for my extremely dry skin; however, I was pleasantly surprised to discover that this cleanser worked for me! It thoroughly cleanses my skin without leaving my skin feeling tight and squeaky clean. This is probably the “strongest” cleanser that I can use without making my skin overly stripped. I like to use this on days when my skin is feeling a bit oilier or more congested than usual or when I’m wearing a lot of makeup to ensure that my face is completely clean.   I’m a big fan of the Superfood Cleanser!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser regularly for about two years now and it’s the best facial cleaner I’ve used yet. I have sensitive skin so I was drawn to the brand’s use of natural ingredients and have not had an issue with breakouts or drying out. The superfood antioxidant cleanser leaves my face feeling the cleanest and freshest it’s ever felt and I could not recommend Youth to the People enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been on the hunt for a gentle and effective cleanser and here it is! It smells great, lathers nicely, and gently cleans my skin. After the first use, I was a little worried because it cleaned so well and my skin was kind of tight/dry. But after using it daily my skin started to feel clean, moisturized, and glowy. I even got my boyfriend to start using this product and he loves it! It may seem a little pricey, but a little goes a long way. I received a free sample of this, but have also purchased it a few times.  I use this every single day and my skin is looking so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the Superfood Cleanser for over a year now, and it keeps my skin really glowy and soft. It's absolutely worth the money. The only thing it lacks (for me, in my specific acne situation) is the ability to reduce acne size. It softens pimples and blackheads, but doesn't shrink them. It does, however, help tremendously to keep acne from appearing (again, for me in my specific situation). I love it, and recommend it to everyone I know who is looking for new cleansers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail cleanser! I've never been impressed with cleansers but I love this one. It is so good for my oily skin and doesn't make my face feel stripped or tight. It also has such a pleasant scent that I love. Will definitely continue using this one going forward!

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser for AM and PM
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoy this cleanser! Doesn’t strip my skin, has a great lather, and love the smell.   It’s a great cleanser to use morning and night to use with other actives, or steps in your routine.   Worth giving a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! Everything about it, the glass bottles, the brand, the refill option, locally made, vegan. It’s gentle enough to not strip your skin while still being effective enough to clean everything. There’s nothing not to love about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that is sensitive and prone to eczema breakouts along the jaw line and chin. All of my life I have tried different products that claim to be great for sensitive skin and cetaphil was the ONLY cleanser I was able to use until I picked up this cleanser by YTTP. I’m extremely impressed on how gentle it is for my sensitive skin and how clean it makes my face feel after using it. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite cleanser - it doesn’t irritate my skin, leaves me feeling actually clean, and keeps my skin clear and glowing. I absolutely adore it - I’ve been using it pretty much daily for a little over 2 years now and can’t imagine using anything else at this point! I know the price can seem a little high, but a little product goes a long way and the bottles last me nearly a year tbh. Every YTTP product I’ve tried (and use) has absolutely been worth the cost.   My one complaint isn’t with the quality of the product itself but with the pump/packaging. I love the glass bottle (I’ve reused for plants, shampoo, etc), but hate the pump. If I’m not careful and don’t lock it after use, I noticed product drips out. I’ve gotten around this by “depotting” my bigger bottle into a smaller, travel-sized container, which works fine. Since I would only take off a half a star, I’m still giving it a 5/5. It works amazingly for my skin which is my primary concern.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Living in the dry desert and having sensitive-dry/normal skin, I was hesitant to try this foaming cleanser but I am sooo glad I did! You only need a tiny bit and when water is added, it makes lovely creamy bubbles. The scent is very light and fresh and non irritating and afterwards my face felt very clean and not stripped at all! Give it a try, you won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. It cleans my face so well, without leaving a tight or dry feeling. It also helps a bit with my redness. The scent kinda reminds me of freshly cut grass, which I don’t mind. I honestly would recommend this cleanser to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I use it in the morning in the shower and again in the evening at the end of the day. It has a fresh and clean scent, a good lather, and easily removes my makeup and sunscreen. I also love that they use glass instead of plastic and have all their products in travel sized minis. I love being able to take my favorite products with me on the road without having to move them to new containers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: BEST face cleaner! Leaves my skin feeling silky smooth and bright! The texture of the cleanser is buttery soft and smells clean and fresh. Have been using this face wash for 2 years and I would recommend it to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample from YTTP and after trying it out for a good time, I have incorporated into my daily routine. I love how gentle this cleanser is. It's not harsh or drying and has been good to my skin! I have acne prone skin and as long as I keep it hydrated it works! I use this morning and night too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this product a while back and thought this was great! I felt healthy and I thought it was really gentle. I bought a bottle of this and my skin has since changed it’s mind. I have been dry, broken out, almost irritated and just overall lackluster. It’s really disappointing. It’s like it’s too harsh for my skin for some reason. I haven’t seen any benefits from using this and, honestly, I’m just finishing out the bottle because I don’t want to be wasteful. I will not be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect cleanser for sensitive skin. Use a tiny drop and wash for 60 seconds. You can immediately see the glow and it does NOT dry out my skin. I have tried so many expensive and inexpensive cleansers but this one does the trick. It keeps skin clean and eve removes any trace of makeup left. I have been using the whole line for a year and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! Definitely the best gel cleanser that I have tried. It smells great, and has the perfect amount of lather. I have had it for well over a year now, and I still have a good amount left. (8oz) I use it as either the second step in my double cleanse, or in the morning.

reviews.review_title: BUY IT BUY IT BUY IT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a licensed Esthetician and when I tell you this is the best cleanser I’ve ever used, I MEAN IT. I bought this off a whim back in January of this year as I had heard lots of amazing things about it. It came in good packaging (100% recyclable) and the bottle itself is glass and came with a pump for easy product distribution. It’s a foamy cleanser and a little goes a long way (I’m talking half a pump is enough to cleanse your whole face and even your neck lol). Does a fabulous job at cleansing all impurities that accumulated throughout the day such as sweat, makeup, spf, dirt, debris, etc. WITHOUT drying your face out. The best part in my opinion is that the product lasted me a whole 7 months which no other cleanser I’ve used in the past has lasted that long.
I didn’t like the fact I had to use this product more than once to even get my makeup off of my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far I am loving this cleanser, it does not dry out my skin and it leaves my skin soft and very clean. It removes all my make up.I use one pump and it lathers perfect for full face coverage. The smell is mild too. I noticed the difference in a week skin looks brighter. Very happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin loves it tbh i’m glad I didn’t have any bad reactions

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like that it has a light scent it’s gentle I brought the Illini to test it out and I loved it it’s amazing :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! My skin feels so nice and smooth after using this cleanser :)  Will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! love love love. Highly recommend! It has gotten rid of any redness, pores, and definitely made my face brighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the gentle scent and my face feels so squeaky clean. You really really need to take time to rince I find it takes a little longer to completely rince off than my other cleansers but still love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: great smell but not for acne prone skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser cleared my acne, I don't have sensitive skin so I use it twice a day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favourite cleanser, I use the moisturizer too and they’re an essential part of my routine. I’ve always struggled with acne and oily skin and this cleared me up so quickly. If you’re conflicted, go for it! This is your sign!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good cleanser, but in my opinion it’s a very basic cleanser. It has cleared up my breakouts though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for 3 months now and it’s a game changer!! My old cleanser didn’t make a difference at all but this cleanser left my face soft, it got rid of most of my textured skin and cleared up my acne. I would have pimples here and there but would be gone the next day when using this cleanser. Highly recommend

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser, just not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser but it’s not for me unfortunately. The scent is amazing and very light, it’s refreshing, and has a nice lather. It would be a great choice for someone with oilier skin! I have normal to dry skin, and live in a pretty dry climate, and this cleanser just dried me out too much and my face felt really tight and parched after using. I’ve found I do a lot better with creamier and more hydrating cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice and love the texture it helps with pores and I would recommend to many

reviews.review_title: This is your sign to buy this!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite! I have been struggling with hormonal acne for about two years and after about a month of using this, along with The Ordinary niacinamide 10% and zinc 1% my skin was SO much healthier looking and feeling. Just as a reference my skin was so bad that I don't even have pictures of it because I was so insecure and embarrassed. I went through 2 of the 2 Oz bottles in 7 months and just purchased an 8 Oz. A little product goes a LONG way. I definitely recommend, especially for sensitive or acne prone skin. I have also noticed that it has evened out my skin tone and helps with redness!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t have enough good things to say about this cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formulation of the product and it seems to agree with my combination acne prone skin. However, the pump attachments I’ve received (come with the glass bottle) do not work. I’ve spent a great deal of time trying to open the nozzles and despite my efforts I cannot switch it from a closed to open position. Although Sephora has been wonderful when addressing my concerns, the manufacturer needs to consider new packaging and a new way to dispense the product. I’ve seen many multiple reviews online about issues with the pump. In the meantime, I’ll be refilling my sample bottle so it’s easier to handle. If you are interested in this product, save yourself the frustration of the 237 ml bottle and start with the sample size. Beyond that, you’ll have to get creative with how to dispense the product out of the larger bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dried me out like nothing before. I’ve never had my skin be so tight and dry after a face wash. I have combination skin that leans oily. Skin still felt dry and awful even after a toner and moisturizer. Patch test this 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

I think this cleanser would be better suited for someone with oily/ combo skin rather than my normal dry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started out with the smallest bottle and ended up noticing the biggest difference so I leveled up to the big boy , a little goes a long way . It’s so fresh and subtle but makes such a clean and purifying difference. I loved it so much I now own the matching moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only facial cleanser both my boyfriend, sister and I have been able to share. He has acne prone skin while my sister has dry skin and I have combination skin. This cleanser cleans your face without it being stripping, without irritation, and the fragrance is very soft and natural so it’s not gendered. Love love love. I tried going back to my Soy facial cleanser and it just didn’t measure up at all. Will definitely be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

I didn’t love it. This cleanser is so hyped I was expecting extraordinary.. not quite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

I do understand the earth friendly idea, but  difficult to use as I have arthritis. The product is great: refreshing and leaves my skin hydrated, without oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely in love!! i love it so much, i can’t even express it. highly recommend ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: my favorite cleanser!! doesn’t feel too stripping or make my skin feel tight when i use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lathers well, nice sent, just a really good cleanser. My fave!

reviews.review_text: This is definitely in my top 5 cleansers. It is so nourishing and like a warm blanket for the face. The texture and bottle are so beautiful. I find the bootle lasts a long time and love the clear bottle to see when It is near empty.

I combine this with other Youth to the People products for my full skin care regimen and I have never been happier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently purchased this to try something different and I love it! it's gentle on my skin and does the job. I used it with the Sephora grey scrubber/massager thing for excellent results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try the free mini of this, because it seemed like a high-end version of another cleanser I already love, Pacifica Kale Detox. The smell in this was disappointing, less like a green juice and more like a green... water. I have sensitive, oily problem skin, and this cleanser was a bit too gentle to really do the job on its own. It also doesn't seem to go as far, either because there's less lather, or because I found myself needing to re-wash my face. I also think the glass bottle isn't a great idea for slippery bathroom areas with hard floors. It may work for you if your skin is more dry and you don't wear much makeup or SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. it's a little bit drying but it keeps my skin clear and bright!! and love the was it smells!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser since a year, previously I used to have oily skin and this made my skin so soft and smooth, recently after getting my skin oils under control, now my skin is more dry, but this cleanser this stuff good for my skin, I get no reactions from it, at all. Will recommend if you have combo skin and want something gentle. The scent is nice and light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t mind this face wash, gets the job done, leaves my skin feeling clean without a tight super dry feeling afterwards, however I like the first aid beauty cleanser more. This one leaves my skin feeling a bit more dry than first aid beauty, and I can have pretty dry skin, so overall I prefer that one. However for people with oily skin, this is a good option, smells good, not to expensive, and a good size with a convenient pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldn’t try this if you have sensitive skin. I really gave this a try for like a week when I was looking for a new cleanser. It dried out my skin so bad that like an hour after using it, my face would become so so very oily in reaction to it. It also made my acne break out so bad. Two stars for using glass packaging, more brands should do that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I swear my skin has a different glow when I use this cleanser! It has quickly become my new favorite skincare product! My skin is sensitive, combination and acne prone. A lot of products are irritating, drying or just cause breakouts all along my cheeks and jawline. BUT not with this! My skin absolutely loves this product. Please never stop making it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly can’t stop using this. I bought the trial size that Sephora has as their picks and fell in love. This time around got the 8oz and my face feels so clean and smooth after I use it, doesn’t make your face red. Literally gives you like a clean jlo glow, it’s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Very gentle with your skin and I immediately started getting compliments on how clear my skin is and how much it’s glowing! I would buy this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ive never absolutely loved a cleanser before I found this! they were either to drying or normal. this cleanser makes my skin feel fresh and clean, and smells like salad (it doesnt sound nice but it is quite lovely) even my husband loves this cleanser so much I had to buy an extra bottle for the shower!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic and easy a.m face wash. My morning routine is super quick because I’m always late and running out the door so it’s wash/moisturize and go. I love that this smells so clean and fresh, it’s really nice first thing in the morning. It’s super gentle so I don’t feel the need to put a ton of serums/essences on my face to combat any harsh ingredients but I’m not sure I would like this product so much if I didn’t use a separate face wash in the evenings that is more designed to combat acne/oiliness/etc. I love the clean ingredient list, the limited use of plastic, and that it’s a family owned local brand (for me at least since I’m in Ca). I bought one for myself, then immediately turned around and bought one for my mom and my brother who will otherwise wash his face with shampoo. Literally, the only negative I have is that I’m too scared to buy the travel size since it would be a glass bottle rattling around in my suitcase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I really like this product. It makes my skin feel really clear and balanced. Would recommend!

reviews.review_title: it’s okay, but not worth its price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it for about half a year and it’s okay but not worth the price. I loved the smell and it left my skin feeling clean. One pump is way too much and it wastes a lot of product to the point of having to refill my bottle twice. I only used it twice a day and still it didn’t last long until I finally realized I could use half a pump and still get the same clean and foaming feeling. It’s probably best for people with oily skin since it can be stripping if you use an entire pump, but there are probably cheaper options to get the same results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser but not too overly stripping. Light fragrance smells fantastic

reviews.review_title: Going to keep buying the refills!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very picky with my cleansers but I must say this is my favorite I’ve ever tried! It feels sooo nice! I always feel like my skin gets too dried out but this one doesn’t do that to my skin. It makes it feel so clean and not dried out 10/10 for sure. And I think it smells delicious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser, my new fav! It feels so luxurious and beautiful on the skin, and cleanses my skin without stripping. My face feels balanced, clean and ready for moisturizer. Would buy again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best facewash. My skin feels so good. Just pump seems bit hard

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I have normal skin & use it daily following a toner, & moisturizer. Also it helped get rid of my dark spots and cleans my face to the T!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have, it still leaves your skin feeling moisturized after cleansing. I love it so much and my skin is looking better and bright. I’m just scared about the bottle breaking since it is glass and I can be clumsy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice and gentle cleanser but haven’t seen any results yet. On the more expensive side for what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not notice any difference to my skin after using this for 3+ months. I found my skin felt a lot better when I was using the biossance facial cleanser. Was pretty disappointed as I had read a lot of positive reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I have sensitive skin that breaks out fairly easily, but this is the worst it’s been since I was in my teens. This cleanser dried my skin out and made it peel. It felt so tight and now I’m trying to heal breakouts from it. I used this cleanser once a day for 6 days and my skin hates it. I attached pictures of my decent skin before and the pictures of after using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Had a pretty bad reaction to it—which is odd because my skin isn’t that sensitive. Dried out my skin very bad and I have normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I quite like it but not love. It’s a good cleanser and it removes makeup quite efficiently. I have combination skin sometimes dry patches but this doesn’t leave my face stretched nor dried, I like that it feels gentle. The smell is nice. This bottle last a long time:D   But! I think there must be something better out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! i’ve been using the fresh soy cleanser for years and recently i felt like it made my skin feel too tight afterwards so i got the mini size of this and i love how it makes me skin feel! it also smells great! love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: overall pretty good, just doesn’t cleanse fully so best for a double cleaning system but as someone w dry skin, doesn’t dry it out

reviews.review_title: The best thing that's ever happened to me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has changed my life. I've always suffered from acne/hormonal acne and this cleanser has helped with my sensitive, combo skin. This is perfect for people with sensitive, oily, combo skin without a doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have the large and this one for my travel bag. i have acne prone, sensitive skin and use this in the morning and even in the evening if i dont have a full face of makeup. lol its great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've never used a cleanser as irritating as this one. If you have dry and/or sensitive skin, please proceed with caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Where was this my whole life? I’m 26 and dealing with hormonal acne, oily skin, and live in the desert. A week and a half before I went to Vegas (what were the odds, I’d be going from one desert to the other), my skin cleared up!  This and Tulsa purifying cleanser are my fav.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: the bottle pumped it’s self empty

reviews.review_text: I don’t usually write reviews but for a product that is a little pricey I’m very sad the body was more then half full a few days later it had leaked all over its sled and empty all the way out it looks like it pumped out through the nozzle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this cleanser everyday and it’s amazing! It’s gentle, lightweight, and doesn’t feel sticky! It has helped soften and clear up my skin in just a few weeks! And it’s a really good size for the price, I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this more than I expected!  It's pricey for me for cleanser but worth it.  I was dealing with very sensitive skin from anti aging products and this is gentle enough while still cleansing.  No breakouts.  Smells great too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good cleanser but, won’t be purchasing again. The aesthetic of the container is great but, mine kept leaking and coming up through the opening after I used it. Most of the cleanser was wasted down the side of the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never would I think I’d spend $36 on a cleanser, but I was compelled to try this & I am so impressed! It smells so refreshing and clean, lathers up immediately & doesn’t leave my skin feeling tight or dry after- even if I double cleanse. I have combo/oily skin and this works wonderfully. My skin feels soft all day, no excess oil and I’ve noticed my breakouts fading away as well. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Feels really great on my oily skin, and washes off my facial SPF no problem. I hate added fragrances, but even though this has a pretty strong vegetal smell it actually smells SO NICE. It washes away cleanly so you're not left smelling that way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is marked to dry skin, but it’s definitely too drying to dry skin. Made my skin look and feel parched.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As an Esthetician I would recommend this for sensitive, combo and oily skin types. I have combo skin so oily t-zone normal on cheeks and this cleanser does not strip my mantle harshly like others do. Scent is lovely too, like a fresh plate of veggies. Always patch test on your inner arm. Happy cleansing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product because I suffer from fungal acne and this one is recommended for clean products. To be honest I tried it on and off for a few months and I didn't see any reason to continue using it. I've been using a $12 cleanser and my skin feels and looks a lot better. My boyfriend and I like it as a hand wash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Over hyped!! It’s good at getting foamy and removes makeup well but if you have acne prone skin I wouldn’t recommend! The smell smells like artificial GRASS. It’s not as natural as it claims to be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser did not work for me at all. I have pretty normal skin and this was so drying. I tried it about 5 times and then had to give up because of how dry it made me. If you have very oily skin, this would probably work for you, otherwise I would give this a pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this out because of Skincare by Hyram and OMG. I don’t really have bad acne just a breakout every now and then and minimal texture. I did however have little bumps on my forehead that bothered me that would never go away. I saw a HUGE difference once I started to use this face wash. LOVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wish I had the pump for this one, this cleanser is amazing everyone. The benefits of the ingredients is enough, but the smell and packaging takes it to the next level.  YTP just knows!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a new cleanser for a long time and this one was recommended by a friend and truly does not disappoint! It smells great, lathers well and leaves my face feeling refreshed, soft and moisturized! I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a clean, easy to use cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not amazing for my normal/dry skin. It didn’t feel like it was hurting my skin but it also didn’t feel like it did anything remarkable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yea i agree yes same  Mhm jtssngdbkgiiycycitcti Heckljjioooooo

reviews.review_title: only thing I will use now
