reviews.review_text: i love this face wash and it is the only thing i will use. at first, i thought it wasn't worth the money, but it totally is. will continue to buy! i also love how sustainable Youth to the People is!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing I love more than green juice and getting to wash my face with it is ahhmazing! I went to my esthetician and brought the bottle for her to check it out. She read over the ingredients and told me that it’s a good product for my oily/combo skin. Will it cure my oiliness? Probably not. But it doesn’t dry me out and it doesn’t break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say? It does the job. Smells like fresh salad and cleanses without stripping. I’m on my second bottle. I love that plastic is minimal and you can refill your pump bottle. I use day and night and have dry to combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t leave a dry feeling after applying it, my skin feels hydrated and clean. One of my favorite cleansers

reviews.review_title: Hands down the best cleanser I've ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had seen people rave about this product so I decided to try it on my hunt for the perfect water based cleanser. People always talk about how their skin loves a cleanser and I always wondered how you would know if a cleanser works because most cleansers I have tried more or less felt the same. WELL... this was a skin changing cleanser. I know now what people mean because the moment I started rubbing it on my face, I could feel how good of a cleanser it was. There are no words that can explain how I knew but I know. This is my nighttime cleanser for double cleansing and I will never change from it. It is a pretty good price for 8 oz, most cleansers are only 6 oz and slightly less money. You don't need a lot of the cleanser either as it foams quite well- just make sure to rub on your face for at least 30 seconds!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i had to try this being that i have sensitive skin that sometimes breaks out. I am so shocked at how good this cleanser is! After washing my face, i noticed my skin wasnt really dry, it felt nice and clean and smooth. I think people with sensitive, dry, combo and oily skin can use this. I love the texture and the ingredients of the cleanser too! It smells healthy and it feels like a dream. Try it out for yourself! Im glad i got it and will be buying more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this cleanser by a skincare YouTuber name hyrum. This is an amazing cleaner with so many good ingredients for the skin. This cleanser literally takes all of my pimples away. When I run out of the cleanser I can  totally tell the difference. My first week of using it I could already tell the difference within my skin. Also I recommend you getting there moisturizer to go with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The only thing this cleanser has going for it is the smell it’s very nice. I was expecting this to be a deep cleanser and it definitely is not. I have very oily skin and this cleanser made me dryer than the Sahara! This would not cleanse my skin I would still have sunscreen on after scrubbing for 30 seconds. I felt like washing normally made me so dry I was having to wash a second time to get everything off which made me even dryer. This is a no for me dawg

reviews.review_title: Good but maybe not for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this cleanser smells amazing and does a good job of getting makeup off. But I have to say it does seem to dry my skin a bit. Not terribly. But enough that I probably won’t buy it again. This is probably great for oily types. My skin has been especially dry since having a baby and turning 30. I tend to prefer a cleansing balm or a cream cleanser, and that’s just a preference, but since this cleanser advertises that it works for all skin types I knocked off a star. I think it’s a bit pricey as well, for being a pretty basic gel cleanser. However, a little goes a long way. If you bought the big bottle it would definitely last a while. If it replaced your makeup remover and your cleanser it could be worth the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin so smooth! Definitely recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally a bottle of gold. I used cerave and it made my skin break out bad. I didn’t think my skin would ever recover again. I was debating between this brand and tatcha and I’m glad I went with this brand . It made my skin so soft and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thought I loved it, but started to breakout my skin with cystic acne and completely stripped my skin....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a great gentle cleanser, i think it would be perfect for people that don't have oily or combination to oily  I'd probably give it 4 stars if it wasn't for the price. If your skin is slightly more on the oily side and acne is a concern i'd just buy a cleanser with salicylic acid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, smells awesome, works well, doesn’t dry out my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! I love a good, non-stripping, foaming cleanser. The smell is amazing, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have such sensitive skin and i have used 100’s of cleansers and most of them irritate me or make my skin oily/dry. this cleanser is AMAZING. it makes my skin so soft and clean and doesn’t irritate. but if your skin gets irritated by fragrance i don’t recommend. but for me it’s amazing and life changing !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser I stop using it for a while and switched to the aveeno cleanser the was the worst mistake of my life it made me break out so bad like I’ve never broken out that bad before but then I stoped using that and started using the youth to people cleanser and all I got to say is this cleanser saved my skin those bumps had either went down or completely faded away but this right now u need it in ur life trust meeee and it’s espicaly good for teens

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever! It smells amazing and I noticed I am getting less acne especially during PMS. I like how gentle it is and leaves my skin extremely soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever used! It’s perfect for me because I have dry areas and an oily t-zone, and this cleanser works so well for both areas. I usually double cleanse at night and single cleanse in the morning, and my skin is always left feeling so refreshed and clean; never stripped! I’ve switched my entire skincare routine to exclusively Youth to the People products about six months ago and I am loving the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations but it takes a lot of product to get any bit of lather and I felt like I had to wash twice to get my face clean. I am going back to my clarins face wash

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying this is an average cleanser. I bought it because everyone hyped it up and said it was a holy grail product. There’s nothing special about this at all. It also left my combination skin feeling dry and tight afterwards. I won’t be purchasing again.

reviews.review_title: I got it because Hyram on YouTube said so!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the mini size first and it lasted quite some time. I believe I had it for a month and a half. I have combination skin that’s more on the dry side. This cleanser really does a great job, but please be sure to use a moisturizer if you have dry skin. Love the product and I bought the midsize bottle for myself and mini for my son to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser just feels as clean as it looks in the bottle! Super crisp smell and lathers well—you don’t need much, so it lasts a long time! I wish the mini had a dispenser of some type, but it’s great for travelling. Love how fresh it leaves my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It feels gentle on my skin and lathers nicely. It smells very organic and it lasts a very long time. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: REALLY wanted to like this one but it was not for my sensitive, combo, acne prone skin. It left me with red irritation marks all over my face. I used it for about a week to be sure it wasn't another new product, but when I went back to my regular cleanser the irritation went away almost immediately. Definitely not worth the price either. A real bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have super oily skin but this cleanser caused my whole face to be dry and flaky :( I wanted to love this product and continued use for about two months hoping it was just purging but still continued to have dry patches of flakes. It’s been about a week since I stopped using it and my skin is almost back to its normal state.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

I use it twice a day (morning and night) and use the Farmacy Daily Greens as my moisturizer...my skin is soooo soft!! I have combination skin that's been breaking out to everything recently and this cleanser has been perfectly gentle for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin, and this cleanser was totally gentle. Love it. Will definitely purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it ❤️  It’s on the expensive side and you have to wash your face a few times if you have makeup on. It’s great on a bare face and didn’t dry my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best face cleaner and totally worth the price! It will last you forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is good. Not great, but good. I feel that it cleanses well, but you don’t feel that clean feeling that other face washes have. I like this bc it is on the clean skin care, which is a plus. It is one of my few fave, but still looking to find a better cleanser. Took away a star for the price of it being only 2oz and no control of how much comes out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this cleanser. It completely dried out my face, and I STILL continued using it because I hoped my face would adjust. My face went from being oily, to severely dry and flaky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Huge improvement in my skin adding this to my routine. For years I was making the mistake of trying to fight acne with my cleanser until I realized the best routine is to have gentle cleanser and moisturizer and then treat issues with serums and masks. Since switching to that philosophy (and to this cleanser) my skin is so much healthier overall! It doesn’t strip like normal cleansers and smells amazing. I use it on its own in the am and after a balm as a double cleanse in the evening. The bottle is huge too so it last a long time. Love love love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleaner! My face feels so fresh after using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It cleans my pores so well and doesn’t leave my skin dry at all. I have very oily skin and It’s been one of the only cleaners that have truly cleared up acne after being used. The smell is subtle and I love the packaging it comes in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My acne-prone skin LOVES this cleanser. It’s gentle enough for everyday use but still feels like it does a good job at deep cleaning. It lathers beautifully but doesn’t leave my skin feeling stripped or dry. The bottle lasts FOREVER. Yes - it’s expensive, but it’s actually a decent value - the 237ml bottle is ~100ml more than other comparable cleansers at Sephora (they’re typically ~150ml). I love it so much! (As a disclaimer, I received this as a gift from the brand, but I have purchased it in the past and will continue to repurchase!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cleanser for many reasons and most of them have been mentioned before. It works well to deeply clean your face if you use a full pump and I doesn’t leave my skin feeling too tight. However, another reason what I like about it is that it’s a great investment. I got my first bottle in January and I’m barely almost done with it. Considering the price and how long the product lasts, the price may seems overwhelming at first but it’s a great investment. When using the larger refillable bottle the cost per use decreases a bit; making it a good investment if you enjoy the experience. That’s all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve ever used and I’ve tried A LOT. Very gentle and not drying. 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite cleanser! So gentle on my skin but always helps keep my acne away!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: use every day!! have finished many bottles i love this cleanser! will keep buying but when getting the medium size, it sometimes leaks from the top of the bottle I lost a lot of product so I suggest getting the biggest size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way, I've had the same bottle for well over half a year now and still have over half the bottle left. (I wash my face twice daily too.) The smell reminds me of green tea and it has a light lather. I think this is a great option for people of almost any skin type as it's not too stripping or irritating.

reviews.review_title: low quality for what it’s advertising
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve heard such great things about this and was really excited to try it but unfortunately it did not live up to the expectations. First, i couldn’t get the pump to work which is disappointing for the price of this that the pump isn’t functioning. The cleanser itself made my skin feel very stripped for the first few washes and I have oily skin. I also noticed my skin breaking out more when I started using this after my skin had been clear for a few weeks. It does smell very good though but as far as a cleanser goes it didn’t do much for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser. it’s so gentle and smells great… it’s not stripping or drying and leaves my face feeling baby butt smooth… 11/10 recommend

reviews.review_title: in love with this face wash!!!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive combination skin so it’s hard to find a face wash that doesn’t burn my skin. I love this because I’ve never had any problems with it, it does exactly what it says and I love it! I also love how it’s in a glass bottle so I can either re use it or recycle it! Can’t say enough good things about this cleaner, if you have been looking to try this I definitely recommend you do. They also have a mini size which is great to try it out then use it as a travel container!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh, natural, very light “green” scent that I find refreshing. Beautiful glass container w/ an easy to use pump to dispense the product.Non-drying, clean rinsing formula. Gel texture, light lather; a gentle cleanse that works wonderfully as an AM or second cleanse.  I think many people would love this cleanser! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so almost done with my first bottle. Within 4 days of using went and purchased one for my boyfriend too. It is so clean, so light, so gentle!!!! Love it. I have normal OVERLY sensitive skin, my boyfriend has oily skin. I wanted a good cleanser and he wanted to minimize pores. It's working great for both of us.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry skin; with my skin being driest in the winter. I tried this product in the spring and after using for a week or so, my skin was tight and dry as a desert. It took me a week to bring back my moisture balance. It may work if you have oily skin, but dry skin run far away from this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this product! I can smell the greens as I wash my face. I wear makeup and this melts it away - no residual on my toner pad. It lasts a good amount of time because a little goes a long way. While I love the glass bottle, I will not give it 5 stars because of the leaky pump. I realized that I kept seeing residual product on the glass, so I kept an eye on it. It eventually stopped when I closed the pump. I lost a considerable amount of product before I realized what was happening. Other than that, I love the face wash itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Almost half way through the bottle and I love this product!! Totally leaves your face feeling fresh  and clean. I don’t find that it dries out my skin at all, maybe sometimes around the nose but I typically rub it around there the most since that’s where I’m most oily. Would recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product i’ve been using it for about two weeks now and I definitely notice my skin glowing but I don’t notice it helping me with my pores that’s why I took a star off but hopefully if I use it a little bit longer it will work better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve ever used! A little pricey but well worth it!! I love the way it makes my skin feel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My face is super sensitive, and very normal to oily or dry depending on what I was using but this face wash is my go to forever. It makes my face very bright and even, gets rid of acne and doesn’t irritate your skin. It works so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To say I love this stuff would be an understatement. This has transformed my skin. I used to get hives and irritation and acne from other cleansers and it was so frustrating trying new stuff all the time in hopes that something would help. I’ve used this for the past month and my acne has cleared up, I no longer have hives on my face and it has helped with redness and irritation. I can’t wait to try their other products because this product has made me so happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently ditched my entire old skin care routine and bought this along with the dream oil and moisture cream. My main concerns were large pores, dullness, and signs of aging (I'm 28). I've used this for about a week now and already see my pores shrinking, my face is bright and not as oily. I did notice the first few days i was going through it quickly, then realized i did not need an entire pump of the cleanser and now i have started only pushing the pump down no more than halfway to get the product and that has been working for me. There is a very faint fragrance but it just smells like fresh kale/greens.. in a good way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It really cleans your face, one of the best cleansers I have used. I would definitely definitely definitely buy this again. It’s a good cleanser for people who are just getting into skincare products

reviews.review_title: Love this but beware it does have a strong Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My Skin has never looked better! This stuff is amazing on my oily skin. It doesn't dry me out or strip my skin. Feels luxurious every time I wash my face. I feel super clean. But the downfall is it does have a strong scent. If you happen to get it in your mouth while washing its terrible! If this was completely scentless I would give it 5 stars. Other than that it's an amazing product. Also lasts a long time. Glass bottle, tons of product and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I went through 2 bottles of this before, then for some reason I went through a phase where I wanted to try different washes. I came back to this one. I love it! It’s my favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice cleanser. It cleans without stripping the skin. My only complaint is that the scent is pleasant but too strong in my opinion. That being said the smell does not stay after it is washed off so I will continue to use it. If they had a lighter scent or a unscented versioning would be five stars for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is okay with my biology. I used it for a month with not issues but then randomly started breaking out. Since I had been using it every day for a month I didn't think this was the issue and had to eliminate a product a week for another month until I figured out this was the culprit. Its a good products just not for me. I'd recommend going into a sephora and getting a few samples (you can get three free samples when you go shopping fun fact).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My oily skin is finicky, but really likes this cleanser.  It cleans without stripping, keeps acne at bay, and promotes a healthy glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so when I first tried this my skin looked worse, but as time went by my skin improved. I think this takes all the impurities out of your skin but with time! I was going to stop using it but I told myself to finish it just so it wasn’t a waste of money. My skin was dry, a little textured and some pores. Now it’s glowy, smooth and so soft. It could be my whole skin regimen, but this definitely plays a huge role. Try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and often cleansers either strip my skin or doesn’t make it feel clean enough. This one is perfect.

reviews.review_title: Ok product, just not for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me, this was just ok. I have sensitive/combo skin. I am used to a more hydrating cleanser and this was slightly drying but, a “clean” feeling. It didn’t however irritate my sensitive areas that typically would sting/burn causing red splotches. If you are looking for a hydrating cleanser I’d pass for something else.  Overall the product was priced reasonably, had a good fragrance, and left skin with a clean feel.

reviews.review_title: I was skeptical, but yeah I’m obsessed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There’s a reason everyone loves this product! I have dry, sensitive and acne prone skin & my skin DRINKS THIS UP! It’s so incredibly smooth, gentle & effective! This product is literal perfection for me. Product is THICKKKKK! A little goes a long way, does not break down & fall apart but can withstand when attached to moisture & water when cleansing. I love it. Follow up with a great moisturizer if you have dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Expensive....... and it didn’t improve my skin :/
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily acne prone skin and this cleanser was not worth the $$$. Yes it makes your face feel very clean and it smells great, but my acne did not go away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for the perfect cleanser and I have finally found it. My skin is incredibly difficult (reactive, acne prone, dehydrated). Nothing ever works with my skin - products are usually too drying or not cleansing enough or they break me out. BUT NOW I HAVE FOUND THE ONE. If you are not sure, try it. You will not regret it. It cleanses perfectly but does not leave you stripped. This has saved my face!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: so far I am liking this cleanser. the lather is nice and it doesn't dry out my skin. I am having issues with the pump it comes with since it will not open and it has been quite inconvenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this cleanser. It’s so gentle (can go right over your eyes without stinging), and the thick gel really goes to work taking the grime off your face, unlike some other gel cleansers that seem to slick right off the surface of your skin and leave traces of makeup afterward (so annoying). I keep this in both my bathrooms. My fiancé uses it once in a while and loves it too. A girl at the store once told me that her husband uses it too but she had to teach him to only use a half to one pump because he would put several pumps in his hand at a time. Lol! A little goes a long way. It also foams up a lot as you wash, which is rare for natural cleansers! Can’t sing enough praise for this. But take note, if you don’t like grassy/earthy scents, then this may not be the cleanser for you. I personally love it. Bought a bottle for my mom as one of her Mother’s Day presents!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser it feels so good on the skin it helps with breakouts and blemishes I would definitely repurchase this

reviews.review_title: The best cleanser I’ve ever used.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is very gentle, but it offers a really deep cleanse into the pores. I struggle with blemishes, dark spots & acne and it has really improved my skin.  Already after two weeks of using the product I noticed a huge difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth it. This is worth the hype and the money. This smells like a lovely cucumber water. It has lots of larger but it’s not stripping AT ALL. Trust me. I think lather and I link it to dryness but not this. You don’t need a lot of this either. I will be buying the largest size!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a solid gel cleanser. It smells good but not in an overly fragrant way, which is good because my skin hates fragrance. I like how my skin feels clean and soft after using it. The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I don’t feel like it did anything particularly unique for me compared to previous gel cleansers I’ve tried in the past. I will keep using it, but I don’t know if I would repurchase. It’s worked very well for me though and I have combination sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you can’t use oil cleansers or makeup wipes, this is a really good gentle alternative to remove makeup. Although, you probably have to double cleanse to get off all the mascara. I have really sensitive skin and eczema and this has never bothered me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to cleanser. It isn’t stripping and it’s perfect for my very sensitive skin. I use it morning and night and it just feels very cleansing. It doesn’t do much, there aren’t any amazing qualities about it other than it just provides a nice cleanse that helps me start my morning or night routine. Plus it’s so much product

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to like it..but no..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this cleanser so much!  I read the ingredients and I loved it, which made me want to buy it. But I used it for 5 days and I started to get texture in my face and I broke out a little. I also have oily skin to. But I mean it could just be me because when you use a new product it can cause purging I think that’s what it’s called but yea. Try it but risk it if you want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I looked forward to trying this! after the first use however, I was sorely disappointed -- my face felt stripped and tight! it gave me that squeaky-clean feeling, which isn't actually good for skin. after a couple more tries with similar results, this now sits in my rather large stash of skincare letdowns. it did have a lovely texture, and maybe if I had more face grime to cleanse (no make-up, inconsistent SPF user) it wouldn't leave me so stripped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An amazing, hydrating and soothing cleanser that will start your mornings and end your nights on an amazing note. I use it twice a day and and never left feeling dry or stripped at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cleanser a lot. I like a clean-smelling, gentle cleanser that feels effective and this is a good one. I use it as my second cleanse following an oil-based cleanser and it works well. Definitely gentle enough for morning/evening use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldn't say this is a standout for me but it's a reliable cleanser. It smells nice and it's gentle for everyday.

reviews.review_title: Excellent cleanser and excellent customer service
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely cleanser. I have been using it for about 3 months in my daily regimen. I have fair colored skin that is combination/acne-prone. My skin never reacted badly to this cleanser, and I have noticed some positive changes in my skin’s texture and evenness of skin tone (I.e. reducing redness). I had the same problem with the leaky pump that other users have noted, but I was very pleasantly surprised with YTTP’s customer service. I will continue to shop from this brand for the quality of their products, for their mission and values, and for their stellar customer service.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It was recommended by Hyram in one of his youtube video. So I got the small size to try on and I loved it and ended up ordering the full size. Since last year it is my favorite face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love. Lathers amazing and leaves my face literally feeling squeaky clean. I also love the smell. Only complaint if that the pump I received with product didn’t work right from the start (annoying but I’m sure that’s 1/1000).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser!  Both my daughter and I have been using daily.  After very first use, skin feels clean and soft.  No residue of any kind is left.  Skin feels rejuvenated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not great for taking off eye makeup but okay overall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! i have been using it for about a moth and a half and i used to have pretty bad acne and this cleared it for the most part! a lot more confident now and my skin feels so soft! only downside it is a bit pricey for me but a need for my skin to stay clear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I love gel cleansers and this one lathers very well. A little goes a long way and it leaves my skin feeling squeaky clean.

reviews.review_title: Dried my skin and came with defective pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Every skin type is different. When I read the reviews I got very exited that I found a good cleanser.  It came in with a broken pump so I had to open and use directly from the bottle . Smell of it nice and it feels good when I wash with it first.  But then it dried my skin bad . I tried one more time next day but it gotten worse :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Based on other reviews I thought I would love this product. Unfortunately it has caused one of the worse breakouts I’ve ever had. I am pretty sensitive to fragrance and this product seems to have a pretty strong scent so I’m assuming that’s why it doesn’t work for me. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It cleansed my face and didn't leave it feeling stripped. I could not open the pump. It's a little annoying to pay this much for a cleanser and not have the pump work. The glass bottle is nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the smell and the lather however it dried out my face badly. I used my usual moisturizer after the cleanse and my face still felt super dry. I had to apply my moisturizer twice and still wasn’t enough.  This cleanser isn’t for everyone. Didn’t enjoy the cleanse and I’m glad I bought a mini size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was literally everywhere and highly talked about by many skin care influencers and I just wanted to love it but it made my skin sooooooo dry. It smells good and is in beautiful packaging but it's just so drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t had a single break out since switching to this cleanser 6 months ago. I use daily and it doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry or tight. I have combination skin and have been searching forever for a cleanser that doesn’t irritate my skin while delivering tangible results. This cleanser is my secret skincare weapon!

reviews.review_title: Don't use if you have acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Makes your skin soft and helps pores but does absolutely nothing for acne, i got noticeably more acne when using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this product since I am a fan of many other YTTP products, but I don't think it has really done anything to improve the appearance of my skin. I have tried both this cleanser, and the dupe made by Pacifica, and I actually prefer the cheaper Pacifica Kale Detox cleanser. It's also vegan/cruelty free, cheaper, and really made my skin appear brighter and smoother. Would recommend that product over this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleaner is one of the few that doesn’t strip my dry skin and keeps my acne at bay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don’t buy cleansers above the $30 CAD mark, and I think that this purchase has made me less inclined to do so again. It’s a cleanser, a decent smooth cleanser. It was an okay experience, and I noticed no new changes to my skin after a couple months of use. I found it smelled a bit too strongly of fragrance for my tastes. If you’re looking to shell out a pretty penny for a cleanser and you’re curious about this one, I recommend getting the mini first. It’s not really special or more effective than other cleansers, but that’s just my experience. It’s also glass, which can be a pain for using it in the shower. I don’t want to step on broken glass or have the heavy bottle land on my feet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this soap so much. i switched to this after using clinique for the longest time ever. what a difference in my skin and appearance. this soap made my face feel instantly amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing cleanser, one of my faves! I have been looking for a new cleanser and this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this cleanser since November and it’s May when I’m writing this, Hyram sent me to this cleanser and I bought it on a whim but it’s safe to say I’m never going back to any other. This is the best of the best when it comes to cleansers and ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t leave my skin feeling stripped and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. I have combo skin and always moisturizer after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It did not strip my skin at all as it did for some others.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love it so bad but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser dried out my skin so bad (I have oily skin). I also broke out which was odd. I’ve tried purchasing this cleanser for over a year but it was always sold out. I’ve never had such a bad reaction from a cleanser in my life. It’s so disappointing since I bought the largest size, but I’m definitely returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to get the full size version after I used the travel version. But if I can’t get the pump to work and one of the biggest marketing of this brand is their sustainable packaging. If your packaging doesnt work, you unfortunately just lost a customer to your competitor. Yes the actual cleanser is great but when I waste so much product pouring it into my hand, I will not stick around

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this cleanser, going on for 2 years now. It helps me with my sensitive, dry skin. The other cleansers I used before, they make me irritable to my skin. I use this along with my first aid beauty hydration moisturizer and my unscented serum. I only use all these products in the night time after my shower and brushing my teeth. However it's very precise and youth to the people did a great job on this product. Thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m absolutely in love with this cleanser.  My skin feels so clean!!  I do have dry skin and I can tell if I’ve forgotten to moisturize after using it.  I don’t feel this is an issue as you should always moisturize after cleansing anyways.  Couldn’t recommend this enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honest to god this is a great cleanser. It did wonders for my skin. It got rid of my acne and blackheads. A problem that I had with with cleanser is that it dried out my skin way too quick. My skin is already dry as it is. So if you have dry skin and would like to purchase this item remember to moisturizer. So I would recommend this product to anybody who have combo and oily skin but not necessarily for dry skin folks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DONT even hesitate this cleanser changed my life I used to break out so much it wasn't even funny now I feel more confident in my skin. It is a little pricey but its worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought the smaller size of this because it caught my eye in the check out line at Sephora. I love the how it targets all skin types (my skin is oily/ combo). I associate super foods with youth/ anti aging so I feel that it’s a multi purpose cleanser. It feels nice, I feel refreshed every time I wash my face and have purchased it 4 times already and also gifted one to my sister for her birthday. The price is amazing for the amount of product it comes with. I have used $50 plus dollar cleansers because I believe I should put the money into what I’m using on my body so this feels like a steal. It doesn’t have a lot of fragrance, and have started trying other products in this line. Very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Says it works for oily skin but it dried mine out. I also have sensitive skin so that is something to consider.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, and leaves my face feeling great. Beware you must use moisturizer afterwards or your face will be awfully dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My review is based on a one-time use of a sample.  I have normal to dry skin, and while I find this is a good cleanser (didn't strip my skin)... I don't think it's worth the price. I always start with an oil or balm cleanse then follow-up with a second cleanse and I think there are a lot of affordable alternatives that are just as good. But this cleanser is meant more for people with oily or combo skin - so if that's you... you may find this worthwhile. As someone with dry skin, there are lots of other hydrating options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A simple cleanser that has only done good for me so far! It’s gentle and the smell reminds me of a fresh cut lawn. Also, amount a half a pump is plenty, so this bottle lasts for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WHAT is with the packaging change?? For an almost $50 (CAD) cleanser, I expect a pump that doesn’t break and the ability to lock the cap for easy travel. So disappointed, what a lousy way for this company to try and save money on an already expensive cleanser. I like the product itself and have rebought extensively but am feeling pretty frustrated towards the brand right now. YTTP BRING BACK THE ORIGINAL PACKAGING. We deserve better for our money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It's simple and gentle enough to clean my sensitive skin. I've already purchased this a few times and although it doesn't treat my acne, it has never broken me out or aggravate my acne prone skin. I don't use it everyday because it's on the pricier side compared to my other daily cleansers but I use it on days when my skin is feeling a little sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The actual product is really great. Cleans my pores out really well without stripping my skin or making it feel dry or tight. I would have rated it 5 stars but the pump sucks so much! I literally was twisting the top for 5 minutes (maybe even longer) just to get the pump to release. Then after I used it the first time it leaked constantly. I do love this cleanser and feel like if the pump was fixed I would rate it 5 stars. However with this pump it really does waste so much product all the time, and there really is no solution to it. If you take the pump off and keep the twist cap on it you over pour and waste product. If the pump was fixed I would 100% repurchase and recommend but at this time I can’t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I have dry skin and I can only do this once a day or I even skip a day, but hear me out this stuff is great. I love the kaleish scent it makes me feel fresh and energized. I love the company and that it is a clean product I am comfortable using often. Yes, it can be drying, but I have had far worse drying face washes before. I always use mositurizer right after and it has worked just fine!

reviews.review_title: Smells amazing, but not for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the smell, smells very clean and fresh. I wanted this to transform my skin or be amazing, but it was just okay. I have more normal to dry skin and it dried out my skin a bit. I could see this being great for people with more oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: when I use this face wash, it makes my skin feel so smooth and soft. I wish the pump didn't put out so much especially since it's not that cheap. but overall its a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cleanser! I smells so fresh and leaves your face feeling so clean. I’m a product junkie and always like to try new things, but I have no desire to try another cleanser. This is my cleanser for life now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took a chance bought this as an alternative to the Drunk Elephant Beste cleanser, as this cleanser is a better deal for the price. I’ve already noticed it’s not as drying and doesn’t make my skin itch or flake. The Beste cleanser is still good, but this happens to be a step up for me. I’ve noticed my skin is sensitive to cleansers for some reason, and it’s been a long journey to find one that doesn’t instantly make my face shed. I think I have officially been converted to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a guy who doesn’t wear make up but I work 12 hours a day in oil refinery. Can you get imagine how greasy my face gets? It does the job and smell like my morning blended smoothie.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hate to say it but this cleanser was definitely a let down. It says it’s okay for dry skin but every time i’ve used this my skin feels very tight and dried out after. It also doesn’t do a great job of taking my makeup off unless I use it like twice and that dries my skin out even more. I like the consistency and how it’s in a glass bottle but it’s not worth it in my opinion. If you have dry skin I would probably stay away from this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser that leaves my skin feeling very clean, and it has a clean, gentle list of ingredients! It for sure smells kind of earthy/like vegetables, but I actually quite like it.  I feel like a lot of people buy this product because Hyram says that it's fantastic (and it is!) and more particularly that 'it's not stripping' – this is true and not true. It is definitely less stripping than many other cleansers I've tried, and I will probably buy it again because of that, but I can't use it to cleanse once a day or my skin *will* slowly start to feel a little bit dry and tight. I don't think people with more resilient skin would have this problem, because it is *very* gentle, but if your skin is super difficult with cleansers then don't expect it to be a 100% hydrating miracle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash. I use it morning and night. A little goes a long way. It does not dry out my skin and it well prepares my skin for my daily/nightly routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser after hearing Hyram on YouTube recommend it. It's a good cleanser, don't get me wrong. I definitely works and removes makeup, dirt, sunscreen, and doesn't feel super drying. However, it just didn't wow me. It worked and was fine, but for the price, it wasn't worth it for me. I have used other cleansers in the past that I continue to repurchase and this isn't it. I suppose I prefer a more gel consistency, such as a the Matcha Hemp Hydrating Cleanser by Krave Beauty. I also love the LHA cleanser from Skin Ceuticals more than this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to help with my acne from my mask and it is so good if makes my face feel clean and tight and it is clearing  up after a few days of. use I wish I bought this sooner

reviews.review_title: broke me out after the first wash
reviews.review_text: I am really not sure what the hype is about this product, but I wasn’t a fan. I was encouraged to try it by an employee, and was told it’s great for acne prone skin. The moment I put it on my skin, I could smell a very strong scent, that just didn’t seem natural, even though they are advertised as “clean”. I washed, and my skin felt semi-clean, & not stripped of oils from my face. I woke up to big pimples. I had clear skin previously! My skin wasn’t purging either, because I’ve been using natural skin care. I was disappointed, and I didn’t use it again. My face cleared our right away! I wish it worked for me, since this product seems like a holy grail for those with acne prone skin.

reviews.review_title: Amazing cleanser that doesn't dry your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser. I got this as the mini travel size as a gift and after just one wash, I could feel the quality of my skin improve. I have rosacea which causes my skin to be oily/combo AND dry all at the same time and this cleanser leaves my skin feeling soft, glowy and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this a couple of weeks now, and my skin feels incredible. I love the fresh scent, and I feel clean and soft without it drying my skin out. I’m not looking like an oil slick, and it’s keeping the pimples and bumps at bay even through shark week. I will definitely keep using this one!

reviews.review_title: caused me to break out right away
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I saw so many good reviews about this cleanser but it just didn’t work for me. It caused me to break out really badly and not alot of products do that to me. Only used a couple times because of how bad it caused me to break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle and refreshing! Doesn’t strip the skin but each pore feels very clean. There is a natural kind of scent to it, but it’s not overwhelming and doesn’t stick around. This stuff also lasts forever. I first purchased the smallest size and using it once or twice a day, it lasted for about 8 months. I haven’t ever bought the size with the pump so can’t speak to the leakage issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser so bad but it just was so horrible it made me break out horrible it had a very strong scent to it it dried my face up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! Hands down my favourite face wash and always a repurchase. I looove using it with my Vanity Planet facial cleansing brush to get extra clean. 100% recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I will say this is def worth the hype. Over the past year I've had breakouts along my chin (maskne, hello!) and this really improved the overall look and feel of my skin. I was skeptical because influencers push this cleanser so I got the travel size and was amazed how it cleared up my skin. It is a little pricey, but if your struggling with maske, or irritation this really helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Gentle and doesn’t make my skin feel super tight and dry after using. My only complaint is that my bottle leaks, a lot, and so I lose a lot of my product. Does anyone else have this problem? I’ve noticed this happening with two different bottles now and am really frustrated by how much leakage there is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever! I have beeen using that cleanser for the past two years meanwhile I was trying other cleansers but I was always coming back for this one! I have sensitive, oily skin, acne-prone skin and this is the only cleanser that never irritated my skin, smells amazing too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cleared up my acne in a matter of days. This is the holy grail product. Worth the price, especially for cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best facial wash I’ve ever tried. Very pleasant smell. Doesn’t make my face break out and I have very, dry sensitive skin! 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Fine, but not worth the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the 2 oz size, so I can't comment on the pump that so many people hated. As far as the cleanser goes, it's fine. Nothing special. You can get a cleanser just as good (or better) for a fraction of the price, so why not do that and save the splurge for something more worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and tried to love this but couldn’t. It dried my skin and I didn’t notice any beneficial results. Was not worth the money to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I understand what all the hype is about. This is so worth the money! It lathers up beautifully, smells amazing, and cleans the skin without stripping the natural oils. I have nothing to complain about! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the actual product, but the container is SO bad that I have to rate it 2/4 stars. The pump leaks excessively, so much product is wasted, and it is not inexpensive. What is the point of offering a glass refillable jar when the pump is absolutely terrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just needs a new pump! preferably one that can close and lock. mine spills frequently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard so many great reviews about this cleanser that I wanted to try it.  After two weeks of use, I started to get big pimples on my forehead that I had never had before.  So I stopped using it and three weeks later I can tell my skin is back to its natural state.  That just wasn't the product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing! I double cleanse with this to get all my foundation off and it leaves my skin so clean! My skin is sensitive and very dry. This is a must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: too drying for my skin. no breakouts and very lightly scented but I think it’s better suited for normal to oily skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It all started with a sample and now I've purchased about a gallon of this cleanser! Love everything about it- the minimal, modern packaging, light herbal fragrance, and it does such a great job removing makeup. Doesn't strip my skin and I'm prone to dryness. I buy the big bottle and then keep a 2oz bottle in the shower that I refill when needed. This way the product stays fresh and I don't need to fuss with the pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser! It definitely cleans my skin but it is not drying or stripping. I can use this morning & night and my skin still feels soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I use one pump (which is enough) to cleanse my face. My face feels clean and all the dirt and grime from the day is off. Don’t use more than 2 pumps because that dried my skin out. I’ve been using it for 3 weeks and I’ve noticed my skin feels cleaner and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly this isn’t really the best cleaner for dry skin. Even when I moisturized I felt my skin was pretty dry. I like the smell and consistency to it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin used to be prone to a lot of little breakouts, and for years I was using Kiehl's Facial Fuel Energizing Face Wash, which had done a fantastic job of helping my skin get clear and healthy. Now that I'm in more of a maintenance phase, I wanted something gentler, but still full of things to help keep my skin clear, glowy, youthful, healthy, and fresh. This herbaceous little cleansing elixir was exactly what I needed! It smells great, it's powerful but gentle and soothing - my skin never feels stripped of oils after I've used it, though I always feel super clean - and I love the glass bottle it comes in. Glass packaging always makes everything feel just a little bit more luxe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive, acne prone, textured skin and this makes my skin feel amazing. I use it every morning with salicylic acid products and it lasts SO long. The 2oz bottle isn’t even finished and I’m on month 3. Buy the big size before it sells out again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. Especially good for people with dry skin but still have issues with acne and blackheads. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a light gel consistency that feels refreshing. 1pump goes a long way, I'll use 2 if I'm wearing makeup. Amazed with how well it worked to cleanse my skin without feeling tight or dry after. I used this morning and night and also gifted it to my sister. I have sensitive skin and this hasn't irritated my skin at all, infact throughout this week my skin has felt comfortable (which is so nice to experience when you have reactive skin). My sister has combination skin and this hasn't made her more oily or dry but kept her skin feeling balanced . It's been a great addition to both our skincare routines. I'd recommend it if you're looking for an effective, gently cleanser to remove build up without stripping skin. Another plus is it's a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful cleanser. Cleans my face without stripping it. This product has helped tremendously with my acne.  This is going to become my regular purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good cleanser! It does such a good job at cleaning my skin without over stripping it. My skin feels so fresh afterwards. I’ll typically go in with a first cleanse then use this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the cleanser.  smells great, cleans good and doesn't dry my skin out.  however....the bottle pump leaks. also not a fan of the glass bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanser is great! It has a good smell, doesn’t dry out skin, leaves face feeling clean.  That said, the pump on the bottle sucks and leaks product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeeee this cleanser! Smells like fresh salad and leaves my skin feeling clean and hydrated.   I’ve been using Peter Thomas Roth Anti-Aging Cleanser for about 6-7 years now and I’ve transitioned to plant based and cruelty free products and I used this Superfood one once and noticed a big difference.  I have combo skin, but more on the oily side and this is perfect; doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry or stripped. It is a thick gel formula and a little goes a longgg way so the 16oz is probably going to last a while.  Def recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser, it doesn’t leave my face feeling dry & stripped after washing. I wouldn’t recommend it as a makeup remover though, I don’t use waterproof makeup, but it still took a few washes to get all the makeup off. But as a normal cleanser, I’d definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Smells great and leaves my skin feeling clean and hydrated too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product. My skin feels so clean after using it and no tightness to my skin at all. The texture of my skin is so much smoother. And it smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this gentle cleanser , smell soooo fresh it doesn't give my skin tightness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just used this for the first time. It does have a scent but I think it’s light. Upon putting it on my face no reaction, rinsed off nicely. No residue, no film. Non drying. No redness or warm skin after. I’d give this an A. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Has me feeling squeaky clean but doesn’t strip the skin

reviews.review_title: This middle aged woman is pleased...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to face wash. I have used Obaji, Skinmedica and others, and I feel that this is the least stripping and is my favorite foaming cleanser. I double cleanse (DHC Oil) with this. No break outs, soft skin, not dry. Winning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has a faint scent which I love. It’s consistency is great and it lathers well for those with oily skin. It felt smooth on my face and afterwards, my skin didn’t feel tight or dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a very good cleanser. Cleans my face really good. Kinda dry after but that’s ok! The smell is natural. I would 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser!! Leaves skin feeling so clean without tightness or stripping

reviews.review_title: Love the formula hate the bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just finished my first bottle and I am conflicted. It’s a pretty good formula, but the bottle leaks and wastes a bunch of product. I hate to see money literally washing down the drain but if that doesn’t bother you too much I recommend because it didn’t break me out or dry out my skin. Not sure if I will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Great product for oily, acne prone skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is absolutely amazing! I love how it leaves my skin feeling nourished and bright! I have very oily, acne-prone skin and deal with hyperpigmentation as well, so usually a lot of cleansers do not work for me. However, I decided to try this cleanser after hearing about all the hype, and I can TOTALLY understand why! Whenever I finish washing my face with this cleanser, I can see and feel my face being nourished, hydrated without looking oily, and very bright and balanced! An amazing product that I will continue to use and recommend! (P.S. I do not use this day and night 24/7! I use it every morning and about 3-4 times at night per week! I have it paired with The INKEY List Salicylic Acid Cleanser to help with my acne.)

reviews.review_title: Hey you, you oily? Then this is for you.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for dry skin. Can be repurposed as a body wash. Scent gets top marks from me. Thanks YTTP. Y’all are doing cool stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best cleansers I have tried. I was worried it was going to smell funky but it smells great and is very gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle cleanser. Not very fragrant but pleasant smell. It makes my skin feel nice after cleansing, it is not too tight nor over stripping just very fresh and clean. This is my most repurchased cleanser. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite face wash. I've used many different washes, most with chemicals because they'd leave my face feeling squeaky clean. But I tried this one out,  and I still get that complete squeaky clean feel without exposing my face and skin to harmful chemicals.

reviews.review_title: great product but not for everyday use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry sensitive skin and my skin felt amazing after using this! I noticed that after using it for a few days in a row my skin really started to dry out so I switch between this product and a moisturizing cleanser. Definitely will be repurchasing and using just 2 or 3 times per week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All i need to say is buy it! If you’re thinking about it just do it. Ive always been hesitant on buying a new cleanser... im so glad i caved and bought this one! I’m already purchasing my second refill size bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I could give this 1,000 stars if there was that option. I have super sensitive skin and have tried multiple different face washes and nothing does it better than this! Transformed my skin and prevented my breakout. Definitely a must have must have especially for sensitive skin people out there:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I consider this cleanser to be “luxurious.”  It has a light wonderful scent, feels nice in the hands and on the face. It gave me very good results: my skin felt clean, refreshed and ready for the next step. Highly recommended for an all-around positive experience if you feel like it’s a chore to wash your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination leaning towards more dry acne prone skin and this helped clear my acne and did not strip my skin! I don’t find the scent to be overbearing like some. Will continue to use this, worth every cent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin (lean bit more to the dry side) and very sensitive to products. This face wash is great because it gives a deep clean but doesn’t dry out my skin. I like cerave too but at night time when I’m double cleansing I want something a little more strong to clean as my skin is more dirty and makeup built up. So I use this at night and in the morning cerave since my skin isn’t as clogged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This is an amazing cleanser! I seen so many recommendations for this cleanser. Took me awhile to finally try it! And I am completely in love and mad at myself it took me so long to try it! My skin felt very clean I double cleanse daily. I love how this suds up. Others said they experienced a tight feelings after using this but I didn’t. This is my new staple cleanser and I only switch them every couple years.

reviews.review_title: Great gentle cleanser but bad pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle but effective, leaving my skin soft and clean without it feeling stripped. A little goes a long way and it lasts forever! I love the glass bottle but unfortunately like everyone else, the pump started leaking after some months and I had to switch out the pump lid for the cap lid and then just pour it into my hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good foaming cleanser that doesn’t leave film or make your skin feel stripped. The smell is fresh and unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best Cleanser I have ever used!!!! It’s gentle on the skin yet my skin feels so refreshed after using it!! I have sensitive skin to plant based ingredients but this made my acne clear up!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has a weird combination of being extremely drying for my skin (which is saying something because I always follow with an essence + serum + moisturizer) also didn’t cleanse my skin properly (left behind a weird film).  The pump head also leaks which I thought was a defect with my bottle but after reading other reviews this seems to be a trend. I don’t recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry sensitive skin and this product still worked very well for me. It did not dry out my skin. It did not cause any redness. After using this my skin is cleansed very well. I like how this product tends to make my skin brighter. The packaging is also beautiful. It leaves my skin feeling healthy. The only thing I didn’t like about this product is the smell. It really does smell like Kale. However, I still would purchase this product again because it works very well!

reviews.review_title: Doesn't live up to the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not as good as the cleanser I was using before. The next morning after using for the first time I was broken out all over my face.  The soap leaks from the pump.     I'd return it but I ordered online because I rarely get  the chance to go to a physical location.  I gave it 3 stars because it's in a nice bottle. And works better then Neutrogena. I will be going back to simple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got a sample size of this from a subscription box. I LOVED it and now I'm well into my second bottle. My skin is combination, and I live in NY state, so my skin gets really dry in the winter. This doesn't dry my skin out, and it is actually something I can use year round. It makes my face feel so clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If i could give this 0 stars I would. I've heard amazing things about this product and before I made the purchase I did my research about the ingredients and seemed a safe cleanser. From the first time I used this my skin turned red and dry, the smelll is strong and it takes any moisture I have on my skin. It also made me brake out. I would not recommend this product if you struggle with acne or have combination skin, it will destroy your skin.

reviews.review_title: Wish they could change the pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser it amazing if you have oily skin. It sucks all the oils, sebum away and leaves your skin super fresh. It has a slight smell of veggies. Yes! Veggies! It’s really original. The smell is pleasant. I bought it because of Hyram on YT (and I suppose there are many others like me) He was right! This cleanser has something special, unique and amazing. My only concern is that I hope they will change the pump because it’s leaking and I’m losing its precious content.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the cleanser - I have oily skin and it suds up nicely to get all the dirt, sweat, makeup off of my face (I use morning and night) but my biggest complaint is the bottle it comes it drips ALL the time!!
