I was so confused why the front was sticky and thought it dripped from me being careless but I’d wash the glass with hot water and it would be leaking all day - I finally had to leave it titled in my shower caddy so it would stop - resulting in wasted product - great cleanser - defective pump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PLEASE FIX THE PUMP. It is a very pricey product and is dissapointing they have don't invest in a better design. Every morning, I see a huge puddle of product on my counter, it leaks everywhere. I had to spend another 15$ on a better bottle so I could use the product. The cleanser itself is very pleasant and not abrasive to the sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing all of these reviews I decided to buy it and try it out, after a couple of days I started to break out super bad and my skin became very textured. I have oily skin normally but it caused me to have flakey dry patches. I was really hoping it would work for me since it seems to be a holy grail product for a lot of people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best cleaner I’ve used, my skin didn’t feel dry, tight or . I’ve gone through 4 bottles now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Though the product is very good for getting dirt off the skin I didn’t like it. It made my face burn to the point I didn’t wash my face 2x a day like I’d like to. Made my skin raw. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination to oily skin and this is my FAV cleanser! It is very gentle and doesn't irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't love it, didn't hate it. It didn't break me out which is a plus but otherwise it didn't do much for my skin. Better cleansers out there for a more affordable price. This one is nothing special - spend your money elsewhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: An amazing cleaner that doesn’t strip your skin. Your skin feels refreshed and clean after. A holy grail product that is a staple in my routine!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product for my dry skin, good pump and last long so I don’t have to think about cleanser for some time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s not a bad cleanser but there’s better ones out there, it cleans extremely well but after using it for a week my skin started flaking and dried it out it feels very stripping broke me out a little in the beginning, but I hate the way it makes my skin feel after using this. I definitely prefer the Herbivore pink cloud cleanser or the Tatcha rice wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! received as a sample from a reward and cannot wait to purchase the full item. I love the anti oxidants and green tea in this, very calming and helps with breakouts. skincare staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my favourite cleanser. I’ve bought it over and over again. I’ve tried a bunch and this one is just really great. It’s light, my skin feels so refreshed afterwards, and the tint/bottle design is also super cute. Overall, it’s a yes from me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I've used. It reduces the redness and my skin feels clean - there's no residue and my skin doesn't feel stripped after.   Only problem is that it runs out of stock often.

reviews.review_title: BEST CLEANSER YOU WILL EVER OWN!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for about a year now and I am absolutely obsessed! The liquid formula is so gentle on your skin and doesn’t dry you out more which is what I’ve found with other cleansers. It also gives a deep cleanse which is a plus for me! I love the fact that it suds up and the bottle has the pump for easy use! My skin overall has become clearer, brighter, and overall more radiant. YOU MUST TRY THIS!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's my favorite cleanser. only cleanser I use. cleans very well my face doesn't feel stripped after either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells super clean, good ingredients, love the glass packaging, the pump is awesome, fungal acne friendly, good for all skin types! This cleanser is one of three cleansers that I will use on my skin that actually works. Esthetician approved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed by this time quality of the product. I loved this product and I've been used this product since 2018. However, this time, the product was not the same as I used. The bottle seal was missing, and I feel less material of oil components and more amount of foaming media. I feel like it's just a cheap foam cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Combo skin here.   This product is very much overrated!  Didn't even feel like it cleansed my skin and absolutely nothing special about it.   Much better is out there, experiment and try other and you won't be disappointed.  Only reason it's not a 1 star is because my skin didn't get breakouts or a rash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry skin that normally feels so tight immediately after washing but not with this stuff!! It feels and smells so refreshing and my skin feels and looks amazing! I will be buying the full size!

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser; cleans but doesn't strip
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this cleanser. It leaves my skin clean but never feeling stripped. A little goes a long way (I use a pea-sized amount to wash my face morning and night), so the bottle lasts a very long time. After trying a pile of cleansers, I've ordered my second bottle of this one. I'm done trialing. I found my product.

reviews.review_title: didn't love it, meh for its price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this due to its hype and hyram's recommendation, and I have oily acne-prone skin and I didn't love it. Didn't make my face feel super clean after or hydrated. It is an okay cleanser, maybe it didn't work for my skin type, and it will work for yours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Normally I get super red after I wash my face with a product but not with this one! It’s super gentle and makes my dry sensitive skin feel amazing! I’m honestly in love with this cleanser and it’s now a permanent staple in my skin care routine!

reviews.review_title: I now know what the hype is about
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After waiting and waiting for this cleanser to finally be in stock again, I finally got my hands on it. I do have to say that the hype was worth it! My skin feels refreshed without the over-stripping of moisture. Pleasantly surprised at how good this product is! The only default is the pump! This pump loses like half of what you press therefore the 4 stars instead of 5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great on my sensitive skin. Leaves skin feeling clean and moisturized ! Love love love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this I have acne prone skin this gets the dirt out and all of the gross stuff I got the Mimi size to test it out it’s so good I use it for two weeks I see a huge difference

reviews.review_title: Will be using this for life!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this face wash on a whim one day and have been using it ever since. My skin truly feels clean after using it also you really don't need alot to clean your whole face,  I am a person on a budget and that makes it more worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser. I use it in the morning and it leaves my skin glowing. I really like that the bottle is glass and you can buy a refill of the cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanses well but leaves my skin feeling extremely dry. Does not effectively remove concealer that has been set with loose powder. Had to clean with micellar water afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! After using it, it makes my face feel so fresh and clean. The bottle is quite big so it'll last a while and personally I only need 1 pump max. I use this cleanser first thing in the morning and it definitely makes me look less like a sleepy zombie. I feel like it really energizes and wakes up my skin <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS MAGIC. This is the kindest cleanser I have ever used! Little to no scent, it does not leave a cast on your skin once it dries, you can use it with or without an exfoliation tool and still feel like your skin is equally as clean and refreshed, my face is brighter and I have not gotten a single breakout in about 10-13months. I have bought about 3-4 of these and use it daily, it literally keeps my face under control!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face soap!! It’s mild and not stripping at all. I use this every night and I’ve never had a breakout from it.  I love the reusable bottles too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 would definitely repurchase! left skin feeling clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t have dry skin but I HATE when cleansers leave my face feeling tight and that’s exactly what this cleanser does. It also has a floral scent to it which I’m personally not a fan of. I would look past those things if the cleanser did anything special to my skin but it doesn’t and for the price I just can justify it! Aesthetically this is a beautiful product though :( I prefer the Krave cleanser + wish Krave was sold at other stores !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! My skin feels clean without feeling stripped. This is my go to cleanser for when I’ve had a long day and my skin feels really gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean but not stripped. It's a great cleanser as part of a double cleanse or as a stand alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not worth the price... I have combination skin and this cleanser made my skin feel dry.

reviews.review_title: So good my husband stole it from me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser. It worked so well with my Clarisonic too. My husband totally stole it from me, and I can NEVER get him on a  skincare routine. He’s a roofer and is in the sun all day and he said he loved how it made his skin feel, and I saw a visible difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gave it 3 stars since the pump leaks and it wasted a good amount of product!! :( ... other than that, the cleanser did work on my combination skin and I loved the smell of it. However I’m not sure if I would repurchase. For the price I would expect a pump that doesn’t leak and I don’t wanna take that risk of product going to waste again...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cleanser, my skin feels great after using and has cleared up since I got it, a bit difficult to take off heavy makeup and mascara, but a cotton pas and a double cleanse does the trick

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: doesn't dry out skin and doesn't get too foamy, it's just right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say, if you have dry skin, this probably isn’t your go too. It’s an amazing cleanser but left my skin feeling tight and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser smells great and cleanses really well. I feel refreshed when I use it. Again, another YTTP that may not be sensitive friendly, but if you have combination-oily skin, it's worth a try. I like the refill system and eco-friendly approach. My husband uses this too and loves how soft and clean his face feels after. Keep in mind he hardly has an opinion about anything. Make sure you have a good moisturizer because it can be drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it for my niece and I. My niece has pre-teen acne and she wanted to try it cause I have it and she loves it! She said it has really helped. We have combo skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a cleanser to leave you feeling fresh , this is the one for you! I can’t express how good my face feels after using this cleanser it’s so good. I feel like I just left a spa after using it. It also works amazing on pore sizes and acne !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if ur sensitive to fragrance do NOT get this. it broke me out and really irritated my eye area. If ur ok with fragrance I'm sure it's great, but it's not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Eh, not a fan. This is too drying and makes my skin feel tight. Everything else by YTTP I adore so this was disappointing. I think it made me breakout as well, but I’m not 100% but it was the only thing I changed in my skincare routine. I prefer Fresh’s soy face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle cleanser that left my skin feeling very clean but not stripped down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loved everything from this brand and this was the last thing i had to try. unfortunately, i have not broken out so bad from a product in the longest time. i believe it’s the vitamin c in this product because i am sensitive to it; so keep that in mind if you’re also sensitive to vitamin c. also made my face feel tight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have an oily/dry face. I thought this would help, but it strips everything from my face and makes it dry. I like the smell though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle leaked in my bathroom,  And It doesn't clean that good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I have combination skin and I am so glad that I bought it because of Hyram. It makes my skin feel clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely incredible; I really could not love it more. I actually look FORWARD to washing my face in the morning (I only use it in the morning, I use an acne cleanser at night). It smells like fresh-pressed green juice! So fresh and so CLEAN!  I do want to mention however, that it leaks? Not sure why, not sure how to get it to stop. I keep a cotton pad under the nozzle to catch anything that drips. Does anyone know how to solve this issue???

reviews.review_title: idk if it’s really worth it…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: okay so hyram made me buy this and as i’m finishing my first bottle i feel that it is incredibly overhyped and it’s a very good but very standard foaming gel cleanser i’m sorry but it had to be said

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Se siente muy  limpia mi piel y me agrada su aroma

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my mom who has oily combination skin and she lovesssss it and have used it for about a month now and is still in love with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for a few months now and I absolutely love it!! In the past, cleansers have left my skin feeling rubbery and stripped but this cleanser is so gentle while helping to clear my skin. Definitely buying again

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product leaves my skin feeling so clean ,I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this based on Hyram’s recommendation. I have oily, acne prone skin and was expecting this to be my new holy grail face wash. Are used this at night and woke up to red, itchy, bumpy, scaly skin all over my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a while ago and was very pleased with it  and felt my skin was clear and free of acne. But I thought it was too expensive and I get other products sent to me through my body charm subscription and gave other products ago. I noticed my face stares to have small breaks outs again. So I went back to this cleanser for the $12 bottle and like magic it cleared up my skin again! I know this cleanser works for me and now I don’t care about the price so much cuz it gives results! I paid it with their yellow vitamin C brightening mask and my face is clear from dark spots and hyperpigmentation. They are a staple in my skin care routine. A little goes a long way because it foams up a lot with just a dime size amount so the bottle lasts me a month or a lol more. I see ppl say it strips their skin, perhaps their is an ingredient that does that for some but I always use this at night and apply their face mask with is very moisturizing. I say try them both out. One is 12 and the other is 15...take a risk!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my first cleanser after micellar water, and it makes my skin feel light as a feather. My skin is prone to breakouts and this has not inflicted upset with my skin.

reviews.review_title: A bit expensive for drug store quality
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading about their all natural skin care, I decided to try the YTTP line for myself. This product wasn't what I expected - for some reason, maybe because of the packaging, I expected something that was very thin. This is a nice thick facewash. That being said, I don't think it's worth the price. It's good, definitely, but in my opinion it's no better than something you can get in a drug store for $5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write reviews ver but this product has been wanting me to open my account and write a review. I just love this product and it makes my skin clean, clear and fresh. I feel so good using this. Have tried so many products but nothing as good as this! :)n

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and i love this! It cleans my skin without overly stripping it ✨

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the idea of this cleanser. I just got it and was so excited. But the perfume is so strong in it. Why add so much to a product and what exactly is added behind the word perfume.  I find that this product is drying out my skin as well. Not overly impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser!! I shared this with my family and found that it works for all skin types. The smell is so fresh and clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: cleared up my skin and i noticed a difference within the first week

reviews.review_title: Amazing, but not to found of the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser. It's pricy, but worth the price. I have normal skin with dark spots and it incredibly reduced the darks spots on my face. At first use it instantly reduced the redness of the few whiteheads on my face. After 1-2 weeks, I noticed it made my skin brighter. When I cleanse with it, it doesn't strip my face afterwards, it kind of leave it moisturized. A little goes a long way and it foams up pretty quickly. At first, the smell was really not pleasing, but I got used to it and now, it really doesn't bother me. I think it was only when I opened the bottle, but now the smell always faint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect everyday wash for normal/dry/sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leave my skin dry and tight after using - not what I expected at all from all the rave reviews!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is by far my favorite of all. Cleared all my little bumps on my face in less than a week !

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it but I can’t
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had read about this cleanser a lot before purchasing the small bottle. I don’t believe it’s worth the price. I’ve purchased other cleansers with many natural ingredients but this one strips my skin after using it. I tried it for several weeks and I know it was this because it was the only change in my skincare routine. Don’t know why but it strips my skin :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down best cleanser I’ve used. I’ve struggled with acne for over 10 years now and this cleanser has helped a lot with keep my skin under control! Typically foaming cleansers will make my skin feel stripped but their cleanser is so gentle and effective and a little bit goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The way this worked in literally three days, normally I’d find a cleansers and it’d take a few weeks for my skin to get used to it, but with this cleanser, my skin automatically adjusted and this godsend did its job, it’s not over stripping, has a tolerable scent almost like pressed juice, but overall a really good cleanser, cant recommend this enough!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a gentle cleanser and this is it!! It smells so good, for starters, and doesn't strip the hydration from my skin like some cleansers I've used in the past. Definitely one of my new skincare favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's good. Going through my 2nd bottle. It's been for my combination oily/normal, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser it seems to be the only thing that works for my combination skin! The fragrance is very strong though hopefully it can be formulated without it in the future. 4 stars because product leaks out from the nozzle:( I’m sure it would last longer with a different kind of packaging. Big let down for something this pricey. I do like that the bottle is glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this cleanser but was left disappointed, I have combo acne prone skin and didn’t find it was effectively cleaning my skin and pores, and it didn’t really feel “clean” after using. Also not the biggest fan of the glass bottle, in the evening I wash my face in the shower and was so terrified the Bottle would break.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I thought people overhyped this product, but I couldn’t be more wrong. Having used more cleansers than I can count (both expensive and drugstore brands), I really wasn’t expecting much from this... But my oily skin loves it! One of the very few cleansers that don’t dry out my skin at all, and it’s even made the bumps on my forehead disappear! It foams a lot too, so I only use half a pump (which helps make it last longer). It smells fresh and not like fragrances that are too overpowering or chemical-like. It’s only been about a week but I’m already noticing my dark spots are fading, and my face feels more hydrated and plump after every wash. Would highly recommend giving this a try (but would suggest getting the mini-size first considering its on the expensive side)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser.  It leaves my skin soft and refreshed without making my skin dry and irritated.
Made my skin break out, ended up returning it! Read the ingredients in the product and research them as well. Not all of those are meant to be on skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product but the pump leaks!!! I lost a lot of product because of it and it leaves a mess all over my counter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bon produit, j'ai une peau qui fait des tâches d'eczéma. Je l'utilise donc une seule fois par jour . Le soir et ensuite je mets une crème hydratante. J'ai constaté une bonne amélioration de ma peau. Je vais racheter ce produit.

reviews.review_title: Unnecessary fragrance not good for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It seems like an amazing cleanser.  Does not strip the skin of it's essential oils and left my skin feeling soft and plump however, I am highly sensitive to fragrance so I had to return it.  Giving it 3 stars for the unnecessary fragrance.

reviews.review_title: A nice one BUT the pump leaks
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser works well on my combination skin, I adore the ingredients and the way it foams up, not too foamy or too lotion-like. But the only complain I have is that the pumper leaks. It gets so annoying and disappointing how this pricey cleanser leaks like that. I really hope the company will take this seriously and fix this issue!! Because whenever the pump drips down, the bottle gets soapy and it’s hard to hold. I do recommend it once they fix this problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is light and clean, I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the squeaky clean feel this leaves, I absolutely love the texture and the smell, it smells like green goodness in a bottle, very refreshing and plant-like. I love that the bottle is glass as well.  BUT it is very very drying.. I will only be using it on my body not my face.  It is probably meant for those who have oily faces, not so much for people who have dry faces like me.  Nonetheless, I still really like showering with it, I feel squeaky clean and smell amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing spectacular, I think there are cheaper cleansers that deliver the same result. A small amount goes a long way though and it does clean the skin nicely without being overly dry. Won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves my skin feeling soft, hydrating, and clean, without feeling stripped and tight. I definitely recommend this product. I use a dime-sized amount with my foreo and it foams up nicely to cleanse my entire face (sometimes neck too!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE for my oily skin! I’ve been through five bottles now, I just keep coming back to it! Truly awesome worth the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My face feels clean and fresh after washing with this cleanser. Skin feels soft which I haven’t felt in a looong time. I’ll definitely buy again!

reviews.review_title: only good for oily skin, really bad pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so much - I have combo skin (oily t zone & normal to dry cheeks) and this always makes my oilier areas feel fresh but make the rest of my face feel stripped. I wish it was gentler. Also, every morning after using this the night before, I’ll see that the bottle has pumped out a few drops of the cleanser. It’s not the “excess” dripping off - it’s literally something inside the pump, maybe the air pressure (??), pushing the cleanser out. Never had a pump behave like this. I’ve literally witnessed the cleanser moving out of the pump on its own. Super disappointed with the quality of the bottle and won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nope. Not for dry skin. After a week of using, my face had dry patches and was tight. I have better results from using an Olay soap bar.

reviews.review_title: Beware my sensitive & dry skin people!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not for sensitive or dry skin. I used this cleanser three times and immediately my face felt so dry, flaky, and tight. I also got very itchy and a red blotchy rash all over my face. I wanted to like this because of the nourishing ingredients and eco-friendly glass bottle. I am glad I listened to my skin and discontinued use and my skin is much better. Now the quest to find a cleanser made for sensitive and dry skin continues...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love it... but, it really did nothing for me. I’ve been using it religiously for over 3 months now and my skin has never looked worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really has been a game-changer for my skin. I've been struggling with severe hormonal acne for a year now and it has helped immensely with the inflammation/irritation. Lathers up nicely, cleanses, but doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped. I also love that the bottle is glass and reusable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made me break out :/ i have somewhat sensitive skin so i just figured I was going through the purging stage, but it lasted way longer until I just realized my skin didn't agree with it. However it does smell good and it's not too drying to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, but it was too drying for me. If you have dehydrated/dry skin, this aint for you, especially not in the winter. I thought my skin was gonna be fine, so I gave it a shot, but it did exactly what the reviews said. It's sad because the product feels so fresh on your skin and it smells good (for those complaining that the smell is gross, it smells green but in a fresh pleasant way). I have really sensitive skin and it didnt cause me any trouble other than the dryness.   You can also use half a pump to wash your face, its plenty, otherwise you will go throught it quickly. A bit overpriced in my opinion. I'd say its better for combo/oily skin. Theres better options out there in terms of price. Too much hype around it I think. Will probly just finish the rest of the bottle this summer, when my skin goes back to normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: honestly thought I would love it, I bought a small bottle and I’m so glad I did. I’m not even half way through and I know it’s a no from me dawg. I’ve been using it for three weeks and the first week & 1/2 my skin felt great it felt so clean and started to see my skin clear up a bit but now my skin is peeling like crazy, my skin feels so tight and awful breakouts. Really wanted to love it, but would recommend trying this for yourself because I have extremely sensitive skin so it’s just a matter of how your skin is going to react

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. I heard of this product from hyram on youtube and decided to try it out. My first high-end face wash and probably the only one I’m going to buy from now on. This face wash will make your face FEEL clean but not stripped in the slightest bit. It makes me feel like I applied moisturizer before I actually even do

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a fan. I didn’t like the earthy smell, I didn’t feel clean and refreshed and I didn’t get that freshly clean face feeling after use. I’ll use it until it runs out or give it to my hubby to use but I won’t be rebuying

reviews.review_title: I wish it worked for me :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got the travel size just to make sure I liked it before splurging on the larger bottle. I loved it so I ordered the full size after about a week of using the travel size. The first couple weeks, it worked wonders for me & my skin honestly never looked that good. After a few weeks, my skin started to get very bumpy, which it hasn’t done in almost a year. I think it may have just caused sensitivity (which I usually don’t have a problem with), so I’ve switched to using a gentle CeraVe cleanser in the morning & this one at night, but I haven’t seen any improvement since I started doing that about a week & a half ago. In addition to this, the pump lid leaks horribly, so I wouldn’t recommend traveling with that lid on if this face wash does work for you. I’ll probably use the rest of this bottle just because of the price, but won’t be repurchasing. Keep in mind though that everyone’s skin is different, so what caused problems for me may still work for you :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i am so in love with this face wash!!! i recently went on a road trip and realized i forgot to bring it, i immediately drove to the nearest sephora to pick another one up. i can not live without this it’s incredible! makes my face so clear, so soft, and more evenly toned. never switching up my face wash ❤️ absolutely love youth to the people!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly best face wash I have ever used...within a week my break out was completely gone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So happy I found this stuff! I’m in my early 30’s and struggle with sensitive, dry skin and acne on my chin and around my nose, and this product has done wonders for me! It smells fresh, and my skin feels clean but not stripped of moisture. A little goes a long way, but I will definitely repurchase, because my skin is looking better than it has in years. Also love that it comes in a recyclable glass bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Too stripping! Face felt super dry and dull after a few weeks of trying this product. If you have dry skin stay away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great gentle cleanser for people with sensitive skin. Did not help clear the acne on my skin but it did not irritate it at all. Not stripping or made my skin feel tight whatsoever. Left my skin feeling clean and refreshed though. I used constantly twice a day and went threw the whole bottle in about three months. Overall a good cleanser and would recommend for everyday use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser ever !!!! Gives me glass skin. I took a break from it because I heard good things about the inkey list salicylic acid cleanser but my skin doesn’t like it and it doesn’t make my skin as clear as this one so I had to go back to this! I will never stop buying this stuff my skin loves it! It’s literally a green juice for your skin. I’m telling you from an esthetician in training that’s about to graduate just get this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my face feeling super clean, and isn’t harsh or drying. Great daily cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the little bottle first to try it based on everyone's review, also based on YouTube reviews. The first month was amazing. I was excited I had found a cleanser for sensitive skin. I bought a big bottle; my skin become dry and flicky, so I had to stop using and went back to Cerave and my skin back to normal.

reviews.review_title: Great every day, no frills cleanser.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had to look back in my purchases to determine I’ve been using this cleanser AM and PM for over two years. I love it, a little goes a long way, and it doesn’t dry out my dry to normal skin. Clean product with a light but nature’s scent. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is very refreshing and has a slight scent of kale and almost like a salad but I love it. It’s a thicker gel and washes off my mascara with ease. Rinses off very well too. I have oily acne prone skin and the cleanser doesn’t dry out my skin and make it feel tight like some gel cleansers tend to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE IT!  After using it my skin is feeling so clean and it’s not drying the face ! I have combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t know what to rate this. I first got this back in November and I gave up using it because it really dried out my skin. I have fairly dry skin and after washing my face it felt like it stripped the remaining moisture on my skin. I don’t know how other dry skinned people have said this is hydrating because it’s not? If you had oily skin this would probably work better for you, just not me. Smells fresh and lathers well. I literally just use the remaining amount to wash my hands because it doesn’t work well with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Just an amazing product! Smells great and works perfectly for my oily skin. It deeply cleanses my skin without leaving that harsh tight feeling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely give you a good clean, but is drying if you have sensitive or dry skin. I will start to only use this after being sweaty or just every couple days for a deep clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There are not even enough words to explain how good this face wash is. I have dry and sensitive skin and the way it hydrated is unreal. Sometimes I even find myself wondering why it’s not washing off my face only to realize that’s just how hydrated it makes your skin feel when you rinse it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think most people bought this because of Hyram (Youtuber). Upon application, it seems moisturizing, however, if you have dry skin, you will feel a little tight after you rinse it off. I think if they had some ceramides in it it may not have been as drying. Also, it's a bit expensive in my opinion and I feel you can get the same  result from Trader Joe's dupe for $5.99. Or even better Cereve's SA cleanser for $15.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just doesn’t have enough oomph to actually accomplish anything for me. Also not a fan of the glass bottle. Expensive and not sure if it even does anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First tried this formula in a sample packette and then immediately went online and bought the bottle version. Love how it foams and lathers without stripping the skin and is at a friendlier price point than other fancier brands (Glamglow, Tatcha). One star is knocked off because of the packaging. As there is no pump, the open bottle sometimes pour out more product than needed. I remedied this issue by decanting it to a small glass bottle with pump that I had on hand. Just wished this version also came with a pump or sorts!  FYI this cleanser isn’t super beefy to take off waterproof mascara or sweat proof sunscreens, but is a good foaming and gentle cleanser for days where only light makeup is applied (some blush, tinted moisturizer). Personally, I use this as a second cleanse after my Heimish All-Clean cleansing balm for full-makeup days, or my regular cleanser for chilling-at-home days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face wash! It really cleans and make redness disappear! I can also see my acne scars fading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to daily face wash.  I use this every morning, it feels really nice.  Does not agitate my acne prone skin, and just the right balance for combo skin.  The ingredient list is lovely, and I have noticed a shift in my skin health over all.  I do not use this at night, I use a cleansing oil and/or First aid beauty pure face cleanser to remove makeup and sunscreen.  A couple of notes: -if you are dry, this may be stripping to your skin, or leave it feeling really tight. -I would use this in conjunction with a pre cleanse oil or balm, this will not take off all your makeup and clean your skin.  Unless you use it twice, but that may be too stripping. -The glass bottle, although nice, is not travel safe or good to keep in the shower, can get messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Helped me through the worst acne of my life! I am absolutely obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is my all time favorite face wash for my oily acne prone skin. It makes my face feel clean without drying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honey this is IT. Best cleanser on earth. Doesn't dry your skin out, gentle, and super effective. This is the only cleanser for me! (it also smells so good)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is extremely oily and this cleanser leaves my skin clean but not complete dry and dull. I highly recommend this face wash for people with oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looks radiant after using this cleanser. It was my first time trying out the brand, and it didn't dissapoint. I'm prone to getting outbreaks and have dry skin. The cleanser does not leave my face oily which is a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this. It really feels like it's clearing my oily pores after a long day, but gently. It doesn't feel stripping and doesn't dry my skin out. I definitely think it's helped my acne after prolonged use (6 months +)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Apparently I’m one of the few people who can’t tolerate this cleanser. Every time I’ve tried it my skin feels stripped and I develop deep, cystic acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great aroma but it tights my forehead and skin very much even after applying my moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the product - hate the fact that bottle doesn't have mini pump or better top for easy use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Def recommend getting the smaller one. Try it out if it works buy this one. Didn’t work for me ... might work for you though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i've been using this cleanser for only about two weeks and its already helped with the texture on my skin and keeping my oily tzone in check :) its nearly perfect but with my dry combo skin it is quite stripping especially after i dry my face. would so recommend though! amazing :}

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: By far my new FAVORITE face wash. I have tried other natural face washes, and this one is by far the best. You can smell the clean ingredients and it leaves your face feeling SO clean. I have average oily skin. This helps keep oil from building up and breakouts!!! I am a nurse and this has also helped with my mascne!!! I  can't say enough good things about this product

reviews.review_title: NOT BAD BUT NOT WORTH THE HYPE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing, it feels so fresh and luxurious to wear, however it strips my skin a little bit. I have combo skin (so, not even extremely dry) and it felt stripping so i feel like it you have very dry skin it’s not worth it. If you’re really curious about it, try the mini size.

reviews.review_title: Don’t buy it, doesn’t work for everyone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser with a set a while back, I have dry combination skin and was shooing this product and other youth to the people products would make my skin better then what it was. However I got the complete opposite, my skin broke out a lot and never got better I used the products for 32 days and nothing changes so stopped using all the products instead of the cleanser as I bought the full size! But my skin still remained the same, once I went back to my old skincare my skin was almost back to normal in 4 days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is absolutely the BEST cleanser i’ve tried (and i’m a self-proclaimed skin care junky) it deep cleanses the skin without stripping moisture and leaves the skin feeling cleansed but not right

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash. Very gentle and not stripping. It is a nice 2nd step in a 2-step cleansing routine. Gel based and not thin. Wonderful smell but it does contain fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. I was hesitant to buy because of the price but after success with the sample size I bought the 8oz. I use less than one pump to wash my face and it has lasted for months, almost a year actually, so it is worth it for me. It’s not for removing makeup but good for the second cleanse following your oil cleanse. Leaves my skin clean, not tight and dry. I use it with my cleaning brush at times and it really gets my skin super clean. I have normal to sometimes oily, sensitive skin and this works great for me. It smells nice too, green and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. I love the way it makes my face feel after it's washed. It's helped me to get control of my surprise break outs that I get from time to time. I'm hooked and completely satisfied

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: cleanser is AMAZING, cleans your skin without making it feel tight & also cleared up my acne. The product leaks out through the pump tho like when somebody gets too excited.... makes a mess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for myself after the hype went around for it. I expect a cleanser to leave my skin feeling refreshed, however, I know that a cleanser will not stop me from having breakouts because that is not the point of a cleanser (at least this one). I have combo acne prone skin and realllly like this. Compared to the soy face cleanser, its more purifying and deep cleaning. I do NOT use this to take off my makeup and the times I tried at the beginning of using this product it did not go well. As a 2nd cleanse it works great. Would not recommend this cleanser for dryer skin as I felt it to leave my skin deeply cleansed and on days I felt dry I'd have to go in with a hydrating toner and mist after this. Smells amazing, like a green smoothie!!! But a light enough scent that it doesn't over power my sensitive skin. Everyone with combo/oily skin should give this a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made me break out in small painful red spots in areas that I never break out in, like right next to my eye. Skin look super congested and I even got some whiteheads, which never happens. Worth noting that I have sensitive and acne prone skin. Returned after 3 days, so disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a very gentle cleanser that leaves my skin feeling soft but not too dry. It also has a lovely scent. It’s just a bit too pricey for what it is. I do like that it comes in a refillable glass container, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Cleaners surprised me. I have very sensitive skin. I was scared that this cleanser was going to hurt or dry out my skin. But it did the opposite it doesn't leave me feel tight or dry it just makes me feel clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not a bad cleanser, not a great cleanser. It did the job of an average product. I wish there was more to it for that price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! I have dry skin and this makes my skin feel great and not dry at all

reviews.review_title: DO NOT USE ON ACNE-PRONE SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU HAVE ACNE-PRONE SKIN!! I’ve struggled with fungal acne for a few years now and for the past 12-14 months my skin has been improving immensely. But, I still wanted some cleanser that would keep my skin at bay and I totally caved into the Superfood Cleanser hype on social media. The packaging was a bit much but was kind of eco-friendly and the smell was amazing. I put so much faith into this product, but even after a few days I started noticing my skin was NOT liking it (I am a combo-type; dry/oily T-zone). However, I tried to blame it on the fact that it might have been in initial reaction to the detoxification, but decided to reach out to customer service on their Youth to the People website anyway and they were rude, blunt, and negative. So, if you purchase this or any of their products be prepared for curt answers if you reach out to them directly—there goes your $36! After using it for over a month, once a day, I had so much in faith in it. But, my fungal acne broke out in just a matter of days and progressively gotten worse; no alleviation whatsoever. I just stopped using it and literally within 3 days my skin’s already doing so much better. DO NOT BELIEVE EVERY HYPE YOU SEE ON THE INTERNET. Legitimately so disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. I have normal but sensitive skin (prone to allergic reactions). This stuff is amazing! It is so gentle, smells great, and doesn't totally dry out my skin. I use it once a day at night followed by moisturizer. I have not found another cleanser that I like more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My HG for face wash. Not too drying, still cleans face, no reaction by my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is super gentle on my skin without completely taking away the moisture of my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this cleanser. I’ve been using La Roche Posay for hydrating cleanser and the CeraVe cleansers for a while now. I got the skin care bug and wanted to up my routine with new things because I’d had the same routine for while. First off... the smell? Amazing. Not really sure how to describe it other than clean and green. You need a small amount (I use one pump for the whole face) and it foams up so nicely but doesn’t make my skin feel dry and tight at all after. I have oily skin but very much enjoy hydrating products. Photo is how my skin is currently doing after using the cleaner for about 2 weeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, oily skin that is prone to breakouts. I have used this cleanser twice a day for two months and I have not had one single pimple. I can barely believe it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this cleanser. It is kinda expensive and I need to see if it can fix in my monthly budget, but it’s worth the buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to daily cleanser. It makes my face feel so clean without drying it out, and is really great at removing all traces of makeup (I do double cleanse with an oil first). Only reason I didnt give it 5 stars is because I don't love the scent - it's smells like freshly cut grass, which isn't a bad scent but not something I want in a skincae product - and because I don't think it's worth 38$. It is a good size though so hopefully will last me a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so loyal to this cleanser, cleans my skin without stripping which is an issue I’ve always had with cleansers in the past. I actually have the full size but bought this mini to travel with! my forever love 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser . Nice lather , light fresh sent, not overly stripping your skins natural oil. My favorite thing is that I can wash over my eyes open them and no running or stinging with this cleanser. Comes in a nice glass bottle and is aesthetically pleasing. reviews.review_title: Really helped clear my stubborn skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying I've never really had good skin. I have rosacea (the kind that gives you small red bumps or pimples all over your cheeks when it flares up), and my face is extremely sensitive so any new product is a huge gamble. I also have kinda oily skin, which is unusual for people with rosacea. And even without the rosacea, I've never been immune to breakouts in other spots. Point is, I have a difficult face haha. During the pandemic, I made it my mission to find better products for my face than the drugstore ones I was using. First I tried Cerave - although it was still drugstore and not 'clean', I heard rave reviews. Within a week my face broke out with massive pimples everywhere, which were even unusual for me. I then tried another milky type cleanser from La Rose Posay, which was also doing the same thing to me, and it took me some time to realize it since I was using a new moisturizer too (lesson learned, don't try two new products at the same time).   Then I decided to try this cleanser. After almost three months of my nonstop breakouts, this cleanser finally helped clear them up. Nothing has ever really cleared up my face in the past - it is VERY stubborn. When it breaks out, or I get a rosacea flare, it lasts for like 6 months. But my face has vastly improved in the few weeks I have been using this cleanser. My skin is not perfect, but I don't expect one product to suddenly give me perfect skin. I think tweaking the rest of my skincare routine might get me there, and that's more hope than I've ever had about my skin. This cleanser is probably not for those with dry skin because I did notice a little peeling once but for my acne prone skin, it's been a life saver. Just make sure you moisturize enough and it's fine. I also LOVE that it's clean/without toxic ingredients, as I really wanted products better for my health and the environment. Such a great product, I hope it never changes :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second time buying this cleanser. It cleanses skin effectively as promised. If you are someone who wears alot of make up, this cleanser will take it all off. It gives you that “squeaky clean” feeling. Your skin will look brighter and smoother after using it. I took off one star, because it’s not very hydrating and that squeaky clean tight feeling may not be for everyone. I wish it was more hydrating for dry skin folks, but that’s what toners & moisturizers are for! I will definitely repurchase though !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a Sephora employee who is really into skincare, you all KNOW I had to try this. People have been talking about it SO much and every single time it comes back in stock it sells out in the blink of an eye. So, after setting my alarm to be notified when it gets restocked, I was one day notified around 4 am that it was back, so y’all know I WOKE UP AT 4 AM TO BUY IT YES I DID. I honestly had really high expectations for this as literally EVERYONE loves it and I was NOT disappointed! It smells and feels so fresh on the skin, it lathers smoothly and is overall absolutely amazing. You also don’t need a big quantity at all, I bought the biggest size (the refill bottle) and thought I would probably run out within 2-3 months but no, you only need a small amount and now I feel like I’ll still have this bottle in 2031! Anyways, you need this cleanser in you life. You do. You just DO.
Skin does not feel clean afterwards. My face feels slimy and oily after.
