reviews.review_text: In my opinion, this cleanser is really overrated. I didn’t expect it to have such a strong scent, firstly. Secondly it was too harsh for my sensitive skin/eyes. Do not get this in your eyes. Really like the glass packaging though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! It leaves my skin so soft after and I feel like my cleans my skin and it feels so fresh after I use it. The only down side is that I'm not a total fan of the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The hype is for realllll. this cleanser is fantastic and so clean. The smell is so amazing and the way my face feels after is priceless. I never have an issue with makeup left over or aggrivated skin, it's so gentle but so strong at cleaning and making your skin look delicious after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: great cleanser cleared acne in a week will buy again when in stock

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser. Not overly stripping. Will purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am using this product from last 3 years and it’s very gentle to my skin. I buy always 8 oz and that’s lasts for couple months. It never gave any problem to my sensitive skins once it’s free of harsh chemicals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this cleanser, but I am super disappointed. This stuff feels like dish soap AND it has fragrance in it. For reference, I am acne prone with combo skin, and this cleanser made my skin burn. I’m giving it two stars because it did clean my face, and I did notice that my face was left kind of glowy, but it’s probably because of how stripping it is. If you have even remotely sensitive skin I wouldn’t suggest using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever used! It leaves your skin feeling clean without feeling stripped and dry. It’s strong enough to break down makeup, but delicate enough to keep your moisture barrier! Also it smells fantastic - very fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my new favorite face wash! i love the glass bottles and that you can buy the jumbo size to refill. smells very fresh and suds and rinses easily. this is actually the first face wash i’ve tried (EVER) that lives up to the promise that it won’t dry your face out / make it feel tight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I keep going back to this! It is very gentle and leaves my skin feeling soft and very clean. I have sensitive skin and am prone to product allergies but this keeps my skin calm. It cleans so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I bought a trail size to test it out and it is great. it feels really silky when washing my face and it makes my skin afterward feel great as well. There is a scent but it is only a hint, but it is not very prominent. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many other cleansers but this one the ONLY one that makes my skin feel perfect after I  use it. My skin neither feels too dry or too moisturized, like it has the perfect PH balance. Now that the weather is drier, this review is reminding me why I  loved it so much and need to purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love it. Definitely will be purchasing again. It makes my skin feel refreshed and clean. Takes all of my makeup off. Just wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Prior to buying this cleanser i used cerave and i realized my skin loved it until i switched over to this. I have acne prone skin and after using this all my acne that cerave took care of, came back but 10x worse and in places i never had acne before. Considering this is really pricey too, this was a big waste of money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, Love, Love The product! I`ve tried plenty of cleansers. I have sensitive skin, so not many products can catch my skins attention. This cleanser feels light and refreshing on your skin. Its like a green smoothie for the skin. Highly Suggest!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to double cleanse when using this cleanser. It doesn't remove makeup and does not leave me feeling clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hand soap. I don’t even want to finish it. Regret purchasing, strips my combo skin bare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Returning after a week of use. Gave me whiteheads everyday! (unusual for my skin type)The pump gives you WAY too much product and will LEAK everywhere when not in use.The wash has a lot of suds and is not penetrating.  PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY AND DO NOT BUY

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never written a review, but this has changed my skin!! I’ve never found a cleanser that had wowed me, this is the best cleanser I’ve ever used! My spouse even uses it & loves it. This cleans my face without stripping it. I will keep repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely adore this cleanser. I previously used the Milk jelly from Glossier, but after finding out about how they treat their Black, Indigenous + racialized employees, I decided to look for a different brand. I had a free skin consult with a professional who helped me choose products for my skin type (I did this through their website) and was happily surprised by their warm welcome. This cleanser is refreshing, takes off makeup and leaves my skin feeling soft and clean! I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The face wash is great, I’ve been using it for about 1 year now. However, ever since I started buying it Summer 2020, the bottle pump has been leaking the face wash all over the bottle. When I bought it last year, it never leaked... It’s wasting a lot of face wash .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so so nice! not at all stripping and leaves your face glowy and fresh. I love YTTP and how their line is so natural and clean. No shock why this is on allures 2020 clean product list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Found this cleanser though Hyram on YouTube. Have not looked back and I keep a stock of at least two bottles. I have yet to have a break out. My skin feels so much smoother. The texture of this cleanser is also soft and smooth. The smell is clean, light and pleasant. I have combination skin type so this works well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is now a staple in my skin care regimen! I have difficult skin, uneven skin tone, texture, pores you name it. This left my skin feeling so clean and clear. I noticed a difference after a week. My skin looked refreshed and didn’t leave me red at all. However I’m giving it a 4 because the pump/packing was relatively difficult to work. I had to look it up on YouTube LOL

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed in this product.... would not recommend to anyone with dry sensitive skin. It left my face feeling sooo dry after using and my face broke out in acne which I usually never get big break outs. One thing I would say I gave to my mom and she had no problem with it and she had normal skin type. The packaging and the scent was on point for those who are sensitive to smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser broke me out and gave me small whiteheads. Think it was the vitamin C in the formula. Vitamin C always breaks me out. Had to return it.

reviews.review_title: if you have eczema/rosacea/ dermatitis RUN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally tried this cleanser at the beginning of 2020 when I was given a sample and loved it. Unfortunately the product was completely sold out for the majority of the year. I finally got my hands on a bottle a month or two ago and was thrilled because I really enjoyed the sample. One review caught my eye, someone mentioned that the new formula is terrible for sensitive skin now. I wish I had listened, my skin was sooo dry and parched it was flaking off. It stripped my skin of any moisture and hydration, leaving it highly stressed and irritated. I finally stopped using it and my skin improved over night. A week later and it’s as my skin never had an issue before. This will be used the clean makeup brushes from here on out!

reviews.review_title: Good but not magical or anything.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations of this cleanser and for the most part it delivered. Although its not magic in a bottle or anything like that, it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was a bit disappointed with cleanser. YYTP has such amazing moisturizers and masks that I guess I expected their cleanser to be of the same caliber but this didn’t quite cut it for me. It is expensive for what it is and actually can be quite drying. Was just meh. Not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the ingredients,love the way my skin feels. Ingredients,ingredients!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It didn't WOW me. It was an alright cleanser. It did clean my face but then sometimes I noticed it was stripping it as well. Some areas felt tight. I have combo/oily skin. I didn't notice a smell so it didn't bother me. I wouldn't buy it again. Sad, I really wanted to like it like the others.  Not my miracle cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal skin type and this product made my face dry. I suggest for dry skin types to not buy this product as well.  Also, why is the consistency of the product is same thing as dish soap? Idk. It’s a nope for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only been using this cleanser for about a week, and I’m telling you right now I’ll never go back. This is absolutely amazing! It foams up and it really feels like my skin is getting a deep cleanse. There’s a slight scent to it but I don’t mind it, it smells like green juice. But seriously this cleanser is amazing, i’ll never buy anything else!!!

reviews.review_title: A must have for my skin routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect face wash for me! I have combination oily skin, dry in the winter, and hunnyyy this has been Godsent! Doesn’t leave me feeling dry at all. No wonder this is always sold out at Sephora! I should’ve bought the refill for back up! Cuz I don’t see my skin without this now. It does have a green, fresh, clean scent but I like it! It smells natural and usually I don’t go for scented face products but in this case it washes off so it’s totally fine. I’ve seen a lot of complaints on here about the pump leaving a mess but I think people are just getting crazy with how they pump it. When I just popped it open I immediately started with a half pump and that’s all I needed! It’s super sudsy which I really like without drying my face at all! I have sensitive skin and I can tell my skin liked it right after I used it. I don’t think I’d ever be using any other face wash ever again! What’s not to love? It’s a glass bottle, great brand that is eco friendly, and makes your skin look amazing! I deal with redness and uneven skin tone and this is definitely the answer to my problems. I actually exchanged my Drunk Elephant cantaloupe jelly cleanser for this and if you ask me, for the same price, this is way better! You can definitely spend way less money if you really wanted a non sudsy unscented cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I loved this I’ve been it two or threes times actually but I have learned over the last few months it is very drying!! & I have oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for almost half a year and I love it! It evens my skin complexion and helped to reduce the amount of acne I had. However coming from an oily faced individual, it is very drying so I only use it at night and use a moisturizing cleanser in the morning. One bottle lasted me about 6 months which I think makes the price worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! I definitely recommend. I suffered from super bad acne on my face, and I started using this in January along with my serum from Curology and it is the BEST duo ever. my acne is gone (besides some dis coloration) Try this out for sure. it really is great :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So far I’ve only been using this to supplement my other cleanser. I have heard good things and I’m definitely not disappointed. My skin feels smooth and clean after using this. Any little bumps on my nose are gone after I use this one, which I appreciate! Since I’m not using it daily I haven’t noticed anything like drying etc, but based on how nice my skin feels afterwards I can’t imagine it would be a problem. I can tell that there is no dirt or grime left behind, though I will say it doesn’t work efficiently as a make up removing cleanser. Of course, that’s fine as I don’t believe it claims to be. If you use a little extra is does fine but I’m not usually removing my makeup with it. Overall it seems relatively gentle but thorough for standard cleansing. I mostly use it in the morning. I think there is a decent amount of cleanser for the price of the 2 oz option. I’ll likely buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Checks all the boxes. Feels naturally invigorating but is gentle enough for sensitive skin. Great lather. A little goes a long way, which keeps the bottle lasting longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin feel so clean and cool, with lasting results. I swear by it. I haven’t tried the associated moisturizer, but I do moisturize afterward with a different product, and it really locks in the soothing effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Deep cleans gently with no residue. By far my favorite facial cleanser!

reviews.review_title: Clears up redness/dullness, acne, and PIHP
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this cleanser after Hyram on youtube raved about it (seriously recommend his channel for your skin woes and Dr. Dray and James Welsh), and I had determined that he and I had similar skin types which is non acneic, reactive, combination-oily. I only bought the small 2oz one to try, and whoooooo boy I kinda wish I bought the bigger size, although I hear there are issues with the pump leaking. There was a noticeable difference in the redness/dullness of my skin after one use! It's also helped to clear up any pimples and post-inflammatory hyper-pigmentation that came up from my skin reacting to The Ordinary Lactic Acid 10%. It isn't stripping, even for someone who has combo-oily skin normally but is drier during the canadian winters. I don't wanna use any other cleanser but this from now on.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: This is my new favorite face wash!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face wash. With continued use, I noticed it really brightened my skin and got rid of my stubborn forhead bumps. I did notice it to dry out my skin a little bit but, like with most face washes, you will definitely need to pair it with a good moisturizer. I will definitley continue to buy this product!

reviews.review_title: Too expensive and not affordable to most
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve heard all the ravings online from a skincare influencer about how great this cleanser is. I finally gave in and bought it. This cleanser is no doubt amazing, it smells really good (which we’ll get to in a second) and it is also very very gentle. My only complaint is that this cleanser is definitely not on the cheap side. 36 dollars, I do agree this is a really great cleanser, but for most people looking for an affordable cleanser, this is not one of them. Also, for the price point, I cannot believe that this has fragrance in it. My skin is extremely sensitive to fragrance (even in a wash off product), however I saw no problem with this cleanser but just beware. Try the vanicream gentle cleanser online, it’s eight dollars and it’s also extremely gentle. I do love this however, and, if I receive it as a gift or whatever I will appreciate it, but I will not go out of my way to buy it again for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell into the hype about this product. It smells great but for my dry skin it was too stripping and not nourishing enough. Would not recommend if you like nourishing cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a week and LOVE it! Like many, I’ve come at hyram’s recommendation and am not disappointed. My skin is soft, brighter looking, and not stripped (I have combination skin). Also, I see some comments that it doesn’t smell great—I personally like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do like this cleanser. I have pretty bad acne and using it made it slightly better. If you do have dry skin though, be sure to use a thick moisturizer with this because it does leave my skin feeling a little dry. This cleanser foams nicely and leaves my skin feeling refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fine cleanser, did not notice anything exceptional about it. I was using it when dealing with acne and did not notice a difference in my breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best cleanser I’ve ever used!! Since the pandemic started my skin has been really difficult (dry and acne spots I never used to get before), I’ve been using this cleanser for only about a week now and there is a NOTICEABLE difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have combo skin that falls more towards the dry side. This cleanser doesn’t strip my skin, so it feels dry. Some cleansers do that, and it’s not good. I like the scent, it isn’t very strong, and it lathers nicely. Try out the small size. Also — it’s a glass bottle, which I really like.

reviews.review_title: Makes me feel like a queen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so fresh !!! I love using this. My skin is usually very dry and this helps to clean my skin fully but doesn’t strip my skin at all. This is my go to cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I have ever used!!!!! It did not dry out my skin. I have very very sensitive skin.It was super gentle on my skin. Affordable price!!! Love love this product ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanses and removes makeup well. Not drying. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser is fantastic. When I first poured in onto my Foreo cleaning brush I wasn't impressed with the gel like consistency. I have combination skin that always thrive on clay cleansers but I gave it the benefit of the doubt and I'm glad I did. My skin doesn't feel tight at all after using this product and it looks great.   CONS -  1. I love the aesthetics of the package but the pump leaked on the first day. I had to clean the whole bottle with my handsoap to remove all the residue.  2. To avoid the leak, I have to press the pump all the way down which means I'm using more product than I need to. (I have a small face)  3. For the price of the bottle and the amount of product I'm using - this is quite pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash! The only reason I give it a 4 is because the pump does not work properly. It allows face wash to accumulate on the neck of the pump and the face wash turns brown bc it’s exposed to the air. Also the face wash that is in the collection part of the pump just below the cap turns brown on the surface which is gross bc that’s the face wash that you use once you pump it. ALSO after I pumped some out, once I released it more came out onto the counter unless I was there to catch it, which is annoying especially since this face wash is so expensive. SO all in all I would recommend using the cap instead of the pump and just pour the face wash in your hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the mini size first and was sold. This product feels like a smoothie for your face. I immediately feel clean and healthy, like my skin is thanking me for washing my face with this. I have seen redness go down since using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In a week my acne has shrunk SO much and my face feels so smooth and clean! This face wash is incredible. And it smells like I’m at the spa every time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a nice, fresh feeling. Definitely worth buying full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: made my face VERY dry- happy i only bought a small one but i tried taking it out of my routine to make sure it was causing this and it definitely was. It caused dry patches to form on my forehead and cheeks and after one day of not using it the patches almost vanished. super sad because i love this brand :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hyram sent me here and didn’t disappoint, absolutely LOVE this cleanser it’s so gentle smells amazing I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, cleanses wonderfully, works into a nice lather

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i was so excited to try out this cleanser because of all the hype it gets but unfortunately it didn’t help my skin at all. i’ve had it for about a month and i feel that i would’ve noticed a positive difference by now but it just made the texture on my skin more visible. i do however have dry skin and based on the other reviews it has worked wonders for people with oiler skin types so just keep that in mind if you have dry skin especially in cold weather!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/normal skin. The face was was really nice and soothing. However for me, I didn’t like the smell and wasn’t doing much for my skin. I suffer with large pore on my T zone and acne if not treated properly. So when I started this cleanser, yes it was nice, but it wasn’t for me. I would recommend this to someone with sensitive skin and someone who wants to maintain the complexion they have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great cleanser for my summer time routine, In (my opinion) it would be better for oily skin without giving you that tight feeling afterwards

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: omg! if you don’t have this you NEED IT i cannot stress it enough, i was having really bad breakouts from the mask and this has cleared it up, my skin feels and looks so healthy and i’m constantly glowing! don’t even hesitate buying this you will not regret it! my skin did break out the first use, and i thought ugh i’m gonna have to return it but i gave it a few more tries and it was worth it! my skin looks brighter, acne scars are improving so fast and my acne has cleared up! this works wonders and is my new holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I have normal skin that is more on the oily side and this cleans deep into my pores without stripping my skin and drying it out. I developed some acne in my twenties after not experiencing it at all in my teens, and this has helped a lot. I use it morning and night. You don't have to use a lot, I use maybe half a pump. I use the ultra repair cream afterwards and my skin never feels dry, but if I don't moisturize, my skin will feel dry. I love how it is a gel that foams and it smells clean. A good price for what you get, much more worth it than the blueberry bounce by glow recipe, which I have tried. I also love the sustainable glass packaging. My only complaint is that it is always sold out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using Clinique cleanser before this which was great but was looking for something new. I decided on this after reading reviews of clean products and I love it. My new favorite cleanser. I don’t really breakout much but I do have fairly texture skin and this just makes my skin look brighter, fresh, dewy, and smoother. It also does not dry my skin out which is great! I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic cleanser! I utilize two different cleansers, this one and one that is a bit more hydrating. I have combination skin so it depends on what my skin needs at the time. This cleanser leaves my skin feeling so clean and refreshed without stripping it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely one of the best purchases I’ve made! Bought this for the first time ever and it leaves my skin feeling so refreshed and smooth, I use it every night right before bed. It isn’t harsh on my skin at all, I don’t think I’ll ever lean off of this cleanser, so worth the buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this cleanser at night after my cleansing balm. It really does give a clean, refreshed feeling which is so nice at the end of the day. I would use caution if you have dry skin though - my skin is combo (leans oily) so it works for me but I can see how it would be stripping for others. It’s a nice gel consistency that lathers well. I only need to use half a pump for my whole face. It kinda smells like dish soap to me but not in a bad way. I haven’t used this long enough to know if it’s helping with acne or redness, but I’ve enjoyed my experience so far and haven’t had any adverse reactions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: II love origins frothy face wash. Use a little, reasonably price and takes it ALL off. Blotchy skin not from face Wash...I noticed my skin getting severely blotchy (this and last year sine pandemic I have not Tanned(I know it’s bad). I needed to do Something with my face as I’m not one to wear foundation. Within one day of using the YTTP face wash ( had to try), the. The origins soothing toner, followed with JLo serum& dewy skin AM and mighty use Kate Summerville night cream with retinal. I was in love. I also alternated with the Origins modern friction for a deep Exfoliating feel!!! I loved The YTTP Burberry cream my skin was Heavenly!!!  I know I’m talking about other products, but this is now my routine bc my REDNESS IS GOING AWAY!!!! Thank you Origins, YTTP, tatcha dewy skin the most! Still drying the JLo serum. So far so good!! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started getting into washing my face (not even skincare) around the time I got this. I first used Glossier's milky jelly, but I hated the rosewater smell. I got this and really liked the herbaceous smell, glass bottle, and cold-pressed antioxidants. I also really liked how I could use half a pump for my entire face, so it was lasting for a looOOOoooOong time. Unfortunately, dermatology vids on youtube popped my blissfully sudsy, green tinted superfood gel bubbles.   I gave it three stars because I really enjoyed the smell and the feeling of doing good for my skin, and I always looked forward to using it and it would've lasted for a while. I discontinued because it was driving up my oil production (although not irritating my skin) and the videos online suggest that the antioxidants in this wouldn't make a skin difference. Without that it is a very basic, banal cleanser for a semi-luxury price. Oh well. Also, apparently perfume in skincare can cause a fragrance allergy, which would suck, so there's that :C YTP is NFM (Not For Me) QQ

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice.  Used it for about a month or more now. Removed makeup really well and doesn't leave my skin right after washing. It lasts a long time too which is awesome.  I plan to keep using this. It's helped a bit with my hormonal acne too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wont use anything else, perfect for oily skin. Dry skin I would stay away might be a little harsh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in store back in June of 2019. This bottle definitely lasted me a while so it’s worth it for the price. Definitely helped with my acne scars fading and healing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So soft on the skin I love it. You can just feel it cleaning your skin it works great and feels amazing. I am on my second bottle and will definitely be buying more when its back in stock. I do find during the winter I can be a bit drying I just make sure to have a very good moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard so many people rave about this product but if your in it to help with blemishes.... ehhhh.  I used it for about a week and a half and I have to say, I did not see the hype. It did not dry out my skin, nor did it hydrate. Green tea helped with some redness but that's about it. Its good if your skin is alright on its own, but if you're looking for some serious help, I recommend looking elsewhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face wash i've ever tried.  I've had acne for 4 years and once i started using this, my blemished started to reduce, and it helps control my oily skin. It's slightly pricey, but it's way worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is most definitely not fragrance free. 3 individual additives on the ingredient list include FRAGRANCE. Also, there are many preservatives used in this. ALSO, there is a coloring substance in this product which is also used in toothpaste... This is NOT Clean at Sephora. Im pretty sure they changed their formula to make manufacturing cheaper on their end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had this cleanser for a few weeks now and I’m really disappointed because I LOVE the cleanser. My skin looks great! But the bottle constantly leaks everywhere and there’s no way to stop it. This means the bottle is always covered in cleanser. On top of that I thought the point of having a class bottle was because you can reuse or recycle it and I would love to reuse this bottle but I can’t because it leaks. I don’t know if I’m willing to buy again because you lose so much product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to get a chance to love this but all together the packaging throws me off. The pump is literally trash i could not get it to work and it is really cheap. I tried swapping one of my old face wash tops but since the product is in a glass container it would not have worked. I will be returning and getting something better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has been dry due to the cold winter in NYC. It has improved dramatically ever since I’ve been using this product. My skin hasn’t been dry since. Pimples aren’t a common thing anymore and my face feels smooth after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser!!! First time I bought the 2oz because I just wanted to try it out. My face is mixed, most of it is dry except my nose, that’s the only oily part. Once you wash your face with this, you will feel extremely clean and relieved, I’ve tried several face cleansers and my face will feel clean for the first few minutes but in less than an hour, my nose starts feeling oily again ( I don’t use any type of make up around the nose area ) and I’m not even using makeup because I’m currently working from home. My face feels so clean and soft so a long period of time, I’m very happy with this. I will be purchasing the full size.

reviews.review_title: Good for those with oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is good for those with oily/acne prone skin or those who just really love a stronger cleanser that gets everything off their face. I have combination skin and I feel like this is just too drying and stripping. Although some say it doesn’t it does leave my face with that ‘tight’ feeling. This is just too harsh for me for daily use-however it will come in handy on those summer days where I’m extra oily. And although it’s too harsh for me on the regular I do reallyyyy like it. It’s just pleasant. I love how it feels, I love the smell (like green grass juice)- I like the whole experience. I just don’t like that overly stripped feeling. I also like how a little bit goes a long way- the smallest drop will lather like there’s no tomorrow. So even though it’s pricier it’s worth it considering if you buy you will be using the same bottle for a long time. So to summarize if you have oily skin- buy it, maybe if you have combination skin depending on your preference for cleansers, but if you have dry skin I can’t imagine you would like this. I wish I could use this more! But despite all this is a very unique cleanser and I’m very glad I tried it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beat cleanser I have ever used. Smells amazing makes me feel refreshed in the morning and at night.  The bottle is so nice I keep it on the counter on my tray with my other products that have nice attractive bottles. Will definitely purchase this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: wonderful product. I have very oily skin and Its hard to find cleansers for me that won't dry me out to the max. I like how this one foams up and its not harsh. will buy full product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser smells amazing and it works for my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give zero if possible, how can a cleanser make you break out to cystic acne all over your face??!!!!, this has been the only change in my skin care and every day I notice a couple more painful cystic acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing gel cleanser that not only thoroughly cleanses your face. It is loaded with antioxidants and does not strip you’re not sure oils and leave your face feeling tight and dry. Probably one of the best gel cleansers I have tried!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was okay but not strong enough fir my oily t-zone. My sensitive cheeks & forehead were just fine.

reviews.review_title: a good option for a facial cleanser!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the reason i am giving this cleanser 4/5 stars is because i feel that this cleanser is a little stripping to my skin. i have combination skin, and i feel that this cleanser strips my face of its natural oil and leaves my skin really dry if i don't moisturize right away. personally i don't see any benefit to this cleanser beside the fact that it cleanses my face really well. however i probably would repurchase this cleanser again because i do like it. i love the aesthetic of the glass bottle, the color of the cleanser is really pretty and the cleanser also has a pleasant subtle smell. it is a good option for a facial cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the best!! Very refreshing & non stripping

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser and I feel good about using it based on its wholesome ingredients. There is no residue left behind and I feel that I truly have a fresh face when I'm finished using it. The smell is amazing, the texture is amazing and I love using it in the morning.

reviews.review_title: Not fragrance free or clean beauty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not clean. There is fragrance added, terrible. I could smell it the second I used it. Do not buy unless you’re cool with putting a laboratory made chemical called “fragrance” on your skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing, the lather is phenomenal and the way my skin feels after a wash is so silky smooth soft and clean without my skin feeling stripped like some cleansers do. My face also feels very hydrating, exactly what I’m looking for in a winter cleanser. I also noticed that my completion was flawless after my cleanse, no redness or irritation AT ALL!! At first I thought $36 was way too much for a face wash but after using this only ONE TIME I am totally hooked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It cleanses for sure, smell is ok, nothing strong, its gentle on skin but it does dry my 40+ yrs skin. But i love using it during summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product but it can be drying in the colder months. I tend to save it for when I need a deeper clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not impressed.   So expensive when drug store products do better work.  It doesn't dry skin, but it also doesn't really help fight acne either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This would be a great cleanser if you have combination or oily skin. I have dry skin and found it to be over-stripping. If you have dry skin too, Piperberry makes a kale cleanser that works so much better at softly cleansing while maintaining moisture.

reviews.review_title: Must Try for Combination, Oily and Normal Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a great cleaner super smooth and soothing but it also pulls all the oil from the face. So someone with dry skin I do not think should try. It’s great for Combination, oily and normal skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin, but it’s more combination in the winter. This cleanser is my favorite I’ve ever used. This makes my skin feel soft and cleansed. Not too greasy or drying feeling. It’s perfect. I will say that for me personally it hasn’t cleared my skin up, but I don’t have much acne to begin with. But, it also didn’t break me out. The glass bottle packaging is my favorite and I love that it comes with the pump separate. The only gripe I have about this is that the cleanser glops around the top of the pump after you use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product but this review is for the bottle itself. It sucks!! It leaks all the time and there’s no way I can find to stop it so the glass bottle is always sticky with the cleanser. For the price of the product you think they’d fix this issue. Really love the cleanser but not sure if I’m willing to buy it again since I’m over the mess it leaves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i really wanted to love this product, but. it was harsh on my face. what really did it for me is that product would leak out from the spout (a whatever issue in the long run) but it ATE AWAY my shelf! like there are little rings in my vanity where this cleanser just burned through paint and wood. def don't want that on my precious little face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and think it’s a great cleanser for the summer! I prefer cream cleansers during the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, all the hype is real. This stuff is great. I bought the full size cleanser from Sephora, and love it so far.  I have fair and normal type skin that can sometimes run dry. This doesn't strip my skin at all, and leaves it refreshed and clean feeling.  I double cleanse, and use the Farmacy cleansing balm first, followed by the YTTP cleanser. It removes the balm easily, and does not sting my eyes at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a wonderful must have cleanser. Gentle yet cleansing and feels amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser, leaves my face feeling smooth & ready for the rest of my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this, loved it, finished it, bought something cheaper, didn’t have the same results, came back, did it again, then came back for the third time and realized my skin needed this in my minimal routine for the rest of my life. I use only one cleanser, and this is it. It’s scent is pleasant, it doesn’t over dry, my skin is glowy and healthy, and absolutely doesn’t break me out. I look forward to washing my face every night with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. My skin is oily, but it loses moisture very easily. A lot of cleansers leave my face feeling tight and dry, but not this one. It cleanses very well, and it doesn't dry my skin out. I will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Why on earth would they make the opening of this refill size a different/smaller size than the regular bottle size?? It’s so inconvenient to not be able to pump and it’s not like going out to purchase a funnel and going through the hassle of pouring this refill into the smaller bottle would be worth the trouble! So frustrating! I eventually gave in and tried to “refill” my other bottle and it was a nightmare; product spilling all over and being completely wasted. This is expensive stuff and I’m not inclined to transfer it over for purely aesthetic purposes. Please make the opening on the refill bottle compatible with the $36 bottle pump!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It smells amazing and doesn’t strip your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite cleanser !! I’ve been trying to get my hands in this for 7 months now ! I usually stock up on it when I buy it because it sells out fast . The smell is refreshing , it gives you a great cleanse without stripping your skin . I usually feel dry after washing my face with other cleansers but this one keeps it’s hydrated .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and this stuff is HEAVEN SENT. I’ve tried so many different cleansers and they all made me break out — I’m not even kidding this cleared my skin completely in 3 days. It’s witch craft. I will never use another cleanser again! It’s a clean product that works amazing, I absolutely love this cleanser as well as this company. 5 stars well deserved!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally got my hands on this cleanser - it often sells out and sells out FAST so recommend not waiting if it’s available and on your wish list.   Pros  - glass bottle and packaging  - ingredient formulation  - gentle, non stripping and foams nicely to remove makeup, SPF etc  - various sizes in the product, which I like!  Cons - cost seems a touch high, for a cleanser  - the scent is fresh and natural, from the ingredients itself, but I don’t love it. I prefer no scent when possible.   A very similar alternative was the Farmacy Clean Bee cleanser and I’m not sure which I love more.. I do recommend looking at the farmacy one if a) YTP is not available or b) you’re not in love with this option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser smells like the best green smoothie or juice ever. It lathers well and actually leaves my skin the perfect balance of cleansed and hydrated. I even got my mother....who would only use makeup wipes to get into skin care and bought this for her. She loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Made the switch to this from Clinique mild face soap, and I can already tell a huge difference in the way my skin feels. It doesn’t feel stripped and dry. It feels clean, healthy and refreshed. So glad I switched.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying and it was love at first pump. I love how this makes my combination skin feel. Im very conscious about eating healthy, and recently decided that I needed to up my skincare regime so that it mirrors my healthy eating habits. This cleanser reminds me of a face smoothie. I love the smell! It's like fresh cut flowers. My skin feels healthy and clean after using it, not stripped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it ! Safe for sensitive skin like mine :) ! Made my face soft and clean clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser. Leaves my skin feeling clean but not stripped. A must try!

reviews.review_title: too drying for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this but it wasn’t a great fit for me.   Likes: amazing smell, it’s like being at a spa, felt instantly relaxed.   Dislikes: super drying! My skin felt uncomfortably taut and dry have using this. Had to moisturize a lot to feel better.   Won’t be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash ever! My skin feels so healthy and glowy! Definitely a must have! leaves my skin super clean,also love that it’s foamy as well ! Smells really good too!

reviews.review_title: The BEST cleanser I've ever used....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, the first one I've used that does not dry out my face when I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It cleans your face without stripping your skin. It also smells so fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: They changed the formula to be no longer fungal acne safe. Added ingredients that are very clogging and acne causing for people prone like me. Had to return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: All around great cleanser! Half a pump is enough to wash my face and neck. Lathers up nicely and it smells good. It doesn't feel too drying (although I do have oily skin) and my skin feels really fresh after.   I took a star off as I've been having issues with a slow leak from the pump and end up having to clean the dried product off the bottle every week or so. Which just sucks bc it's such an expensive face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this. I like the concept, the bottle, and the design. The product feels good and seems to cleanse well. Unfortunately, I was still having breakouts using this and seem to need something a little stronger or with salicylic acid to deal with my hormonal acne. Youth to the people makes great products and if they ever make a cleanse with salicylic acid in it I’ll be one of the first in line to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, combination skin and although I liked the texture and smell of this cleanser, I found it much too drying and irritating to use it as a daily cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good all around cleanser. It doesn't leave my skin dry, it's gentle, and my skin feels refreshed after each use. I have enlarged pores on my nose and cheeks and after using this for two weeks, I can tell there's much less buildup and the pores are starting to look smaller. It also works great with double cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works well, smells nice (green-y), overpriced for what it does though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Face wash is excessively drying AND the pump leaks, even when it’s not in use, which shouldn’t happen when you’re paying $36 per bottle! Almost half the bottle was wasted and it warped my shelf. Buyer beware!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My 13 year old loves this! It has cleared up her skin and made it so soft and beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Disappointing it’s always out of stock

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Doesn’t dry out skin and feels amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very thick and moisturizing i would definitely suggest this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how soothing it is on my dry sensitive skin. My skin gets to be very red and the ingredients are very calming and reducing irritation. It doesn’t strip my skin, but I do feel a bit dry (which happens with almost every cleanser). This is the only cleanser so far that doesn’t make my skin look like a tomato after use. Overall I’m very pleased with it. The entire line is just amazing, especially the dream mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It feels moisturizing and smells great. It’s a spinach-y, natural smell, but not in a bad way. It's super spa-like and I look forward to putting it on.    This cleanser is on the thicker side (think dish detergent), but I find this isn't a problem as long as my face is sufficiently wet before putting it on and rinsed well after I'm done.   Yes, this product is pricey. But because of its consistency, a little goes a long way. I bought the 8 oz in August, use it on my face and neck twice daily, and still have half the bottle left.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. PERIOD. Hands down the best cleanser I’ve ever had. Non foaming, no scent, natural ingredients and takes one good pump to cleanse my face. For me I love that my skin feels hydrated after using it and I actually feel clean. Safe for sensitive skin which I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice cleanser, with the caveat that it’s not the best for super dry skin. That being said, it’s also not terribly drying. You can just do better than this one, I’d you’re looking for hydration. I also am not a fan of the smell. It’s not strong, but it is VERY kale-y, so be aware of that. If neither of these are concerns for you, you’ll likely be very happy with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something that would remove my makeup as part of my double cleansing system, and this is by far the winner. It smells great without being fragranced, and it makes my skin look glowy and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely incredible!!! I’ve struggled with acne and this product helped clean my skin without stripping it, it is super gentle!! Going to purchase again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this from a YouTube recommendation by Hyram and wow my skin loves this stuff.

reviews.review_title: More for combination and oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh Hyram lol making me buy all this stuff I liked this cleanser but it was a tiny bit too drying for me. I think I need more of a moisturizing cleanser. The smell was nice, lightly reminiscent of a kale salad, if you’re into that. It removed the make up and dirt from my face easily and the gel foamed up nicely. I think you would really love this product if you have combination to oily skin. I removed a star because it claims to be good for dry skin.... but I’m not convinced. I don’t think it’s necessarily bad for dry skin, but for me, my face felt a bit tight after drying. It could also be due to the retinol im currently using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The actual formula is good; but not great. If you have drier skin it probably isn’t the best choice.  My main issue with this brand is its ridiculously expensive, and the containers are the cheapest I’ve ever seen. Pump always breaks; u can get a set of 50 of those bottles for around 20 bucks on Amazon. The moisturizer ones are even worse; and the seal is always broken.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really oily skin and this makes it feel so fresh and clean. No more oily feeling and greasy spots on my phone after a call. love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser ever, I have sensitive/acne prone skin and I've had no problems with this! a bit pricey but lasts me a loong time!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I got a sample to try. I wasn’t sure if the smell would be off-putting and it definitely wasn’t. I really enjoyed the natural scent and cleansing foam. My face felt clean but not dry/stripped. I’ll definitely order the full size.

reviews.review_title: great cleanser, takes off make-up, AND smells good
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really great! Gentle but effective. I have oily/combo skin but don't break out when I use this. Smells nice. Extra bonus is that it also effectively takes off make-up. One-stop cleanser for busy folks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been my holy grail since I got it.  I love the packaging  You legit only need half a pump to clean your face and chin  No harsh feeling when cleaning the face either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser so bad! Skincarebyhyram raves about it on his YouTube so I thought I would love it too but it’s just not for everyone. The next day after using I broke out in little white heads all over my forehead and below my nose. Smells a little bit to strong of fragrance and is a little bit drying. It does feel luxurious while using and comes in a pretty glass bottle but that’s about it. And $40 is a little steep for its ingredients. Dr. Dray also doesn’t like it lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this and I did love the smell and texture of the product but it was far too much for my normal/leaning dry skin. It left my face feeling super tight and dehydrated and the longer I used it, the worse it got. I gave it a good try and finished the small bottle because I love the brand and this is so loved by many, just not suited for my skin. Oily skin types will likely love this though and definitely recommend it for those who love gel cleansers and don’t have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little skeptical on buying this since a lot of reviews say it breaks them out or leaves them feeling dry. I still bought it to give it a try. When I opened it , I was surprised it smelled like the shampoo they give you at hotels. The texture is nice, it foams up slightly, and it doesn’t leave my skin dry or tight. This has aloe Vera juice, and I think that ingredient helped with my acne and dryness from acne medications . TOTALLY RECOMMEND

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my holy grail cleanser for over 3 years, until I realized that it was giving me contact dermatitis. My eyelids were constantly dry, red, itchy, and flaky, and I could never figure out why. After 3 years, I tried a new cleanser and my dermatitis went away in less than a week and hasn't been back since. 5 or 6 weeks after I stopped using it, I tried it one more time and the skin around my eyes immediately started to BURN so it was definitely this product that I was having a reaction to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite product to wash my face Leave no dry skin. No film on the face Only cleanser that wont give me acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buy ittttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Listen this is the best cleanser I’ve ever used. It’s smells great and is not overpowering. Haven’t had a breakout since I’ve started using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works well. Definitely deep cleans pores but left my skin a little dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product did a fine job at cleansing and my face felt clean. If i didn't go straight into my other skin care, my face felt slightly tight. I would say this is good for quite oily skin. I have normal skin and it isnt common cleansers make my face tight.  This also has a relatively strong scent. I cant quite put my finger on what it is, but its definitely there.  Glad I got the sample size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to buy this cleanser because of the price, but I went for it and now I'm hooked. This product works so well on my dry/oily t-zone combination skin. Using it to cleanse every morning and night has helped clear up my skin significantly. Absolutely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had this product for about a week and I absolutely love it. I use half a pump and it lathers like crazy. I have sensitive skin & the cleanser doesn’t make me skin feel stripped or dry after using but gives a really deep clean. I will def repurchase after I’m done with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got it as a sample and must say its great product. It's gentle for skin and my skin feels so fresh after i use this. definitely going to buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my second bottle of this cleanser and it is definitely my favorite! Keeps skin feeling clean and refreshed. Doesn’t make me break out or feel too dry. I use it with my Clarisonic in the morning and evening, will probably keep buying this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have to use gluten free products so this was a nice find for me. I also have sensitive skin and didn’t find this irritating at all. The only thing is the packaging....I love the glass bottle but unfortunately it limits where you can use the product unless you transfer packaging...trust me I know because my husband broke the first one. The scent is light but very clean. I actually really look forward to using this cleanser when I wash my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser so bad.. :( After watching so many people rave about how amazing it is! Loved the packaging and smell and everything else but my skin didn’t. I have dry skin btw. After a few uses, my skin got irritated. I’m going to discontinue using the cleanser sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my fav cleanser ever. I have dry, combo-ish skin that is sensitive and acne prone, and my face stays so clear and hydrated with this cleanser. it cleans well without stripping your skin of all hydration and drying it out over time. it also gets rid of redness on my face! it's super gentle and super effective, that's why it's so good. lovvve it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I am sensitive to fragrances but this formula is not irritating to my skin whatsoever! I struggle with VERY EASILY acne-prone skin and so far, so good. Like SO good. This face wash gives my skin such a deep, penetrating cleanse and leaves me feeling refreshed and moisturized! I can’t attribute my skin improvement to this product entirely as I’ve been trying new products, but I will say it has NOT broken me out and feels gentle yet deep cleansing at the same time. I will say if you don’t want a super deep cleanse, you would probably be better off either a slightly gentler cleanser like first aid beauty or the ordinary! I plan on using my first aid beauty cleanser when my skin doesn’t feel like it needs as deep cleansing. Overall super happy with my purchase, definitely going to be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately my skin reacted poorly to this product! Wanted to love it as much as others but for some reason it made me break out like crazy. I have sensitive/ acne prone skin and this was just not the product for me.

reviews.review_title: not good for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a good clean face wash, this one was recommended to me. I have very sensitive skin but was told this would be fine to use. The scent is very strong. I noticed after using it that my face felt very tight & it looked a little red. I soon started to notice breakouts. I used this product for about a month off and on to make sure that it was in fact this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser for any skin type! I use it everyday and it is not over drying in any way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser did not dry out of face.  It smells wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser of all time! She does the trick every time no matter the season, weather, day and night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin feel fresh and clean without totally striping it! I noticed as well that it really gets my face makeup off, and there almost not a need to double cleanse with micellar water afterwards like I usually do. I think it’s definitely a product worth the hype, and a little goes a long ways!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I took the plunge and purchased the value size at my local Sephora after reading the great reviews and hearing what a Sephora advisor had to say. I am in love! It certainly lives up to the hype. This cleanser fully removes my mascara, and leaves my skin feeling clean but not stripped. It lathers well, and has a clean smell of green vegetables. Some may not like the smell, but I don't mind it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first time trying this cleanser and I love everything about it the texture while you rub it on your skin is very nice and leaves your skin feeling soft and clean definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A really good cleanser. Not too harsh for sensitive skin and great for clearing minor breakouts. My skin feels really great after using this. Taking one star off because it smells too much like shampoo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle, foaming, yet powerful cleanser. This is great for your morning routine because of the gentle formula - can work in the evening as well but you’ll definitely have to  double cleanse to break through sunscreen and makeup. I will mention that this smells great and is comparable to the Fresh soy cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! My skin always feels clean and fresh after. This is a new staple in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and most facial cleansers I've used to both clean and not cause me to break out don't usually do too well with cleaning. This is the first cleanser I have used that doesn't irritate my skin and cleans well. My face not only feels clean, but when I use the Peter Thomas Roth Complexion Pads, it doesn't pick up any leftover dirt or makeup, which is a first for me. I love the smell, too! Smells so clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only cleanser that takes away all my blackheads and leaves my skin feeling amazing and clean without the tight feeling.

reviews.review_title: Was good, will not buy a third bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first bottle went amazing I was obsessed and thought this would be my new holy grail. Then I am half way done with my second bottle and it has become more of a meh face wash. It will clean your  skin for sure but I have noticed my skin feels a bit tight now. I have gone to get a esthetician recently and they told me my skin was dehydrated. Thinking about switching back to Cetaphil cleanser or a Cerave one. I just bought this because it was super hyped on social media and reviews. Do not get me wrong this is a great cleanser it just isn't doing it for me anymore. Try it for yourself IF you have the money and see if it's right for your skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very hopeful and excited to get this for my sensitive skin. It was horrible, my skin didn’t feel clean and it smelled gross. Waste of my money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm laying in my bath at the moment having just used a sample, and already I can tell this has stripped my face. Now if I had a face full of makeup or just got done at the gym, I could see a use for this, but even with full makeup, I'd rather use something more nourishing than this, maybe a balm first and double cleanse with this??  Having used Tatcha The Deep Cleanse and Fresh Sugar Strawberry Exfoliating Face Wash previously, this face wash strips too much away and requires me to use more moisturizing product after my shower. I could see how this could destabilize my barrier. It does clean and could serve a purpose in a double cleansing method, so I gave it 2 stars instead of 1. Disappointed, because Hyram hypes this stuff...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hard to wash off, always had foam left even when i was scrubbing my face as hard as I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: eh... it’s a bit too moisturizing for oily skin  i can see this work out for normal to dry skin, but with one full pump being lathered on my face.. the after feel on the skin is still kinda oily (i broke out after a few days consistently). it does smell REALLY good and I appreciate the company’s ethics. the funny thing is.. if you do 2-3 pumps then the oil will be gone and my face is tight and clean, but paying 36$ for a cleanser that takes 2-3 pumps to work? that’s too much money to waste :( i think all cleanser having one pump must be efficient enough to clean your face already..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin reacted terribly to this! Not sure what caused it. I didn’t like the scent at all, and usually scent doesn’t bother me at all. Beyond that, I just thought it was an ok cleanser. I’m going back to Farmacy Clean Bee cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't make my skin red and itchy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this twice a day (morning and night) for a good week and I’m already seeing results. I don’t see any bumps or large pores in my face. My face feels soo smooth !!! I have dry skin so this didn’t strip away my moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser so much! I started using it about a month ago, and my skin has been loving it! I love how it lathers but doesn’t dry out my skin.
