It makes my skin feel so soft and smooth immediately after use (it never feels dry)! It’s small size works as a small gift. Definitely would recommend for any skin type!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “It was good for what it was but it wasn’t all that.” I was nice but I like something with salicylic acid in it. Just thought I’d give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super nice cleanser!! I like cleansers that just leave your skin feeling clean & glowy, this does exactly that! Everytime I use it my skin feels soft, fresh & a little brighter. Definitely just a nice simple cleanser, with great ingredients. This would be your step up from a drugstore cleanser. I’ve never used it to remove makeup since I double cleanse and I’ve only used it on a bare face or with a small amount of tinted moisturizer. A little goes a long way! Would definitely repurchase & recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to buy this for months but it’s always been sold out.  I have heard so many great things about this cleanser through youtube skin care influencers etc. I needed to see if it was worth the hype.  When I finally ordered a bottle...I gotta say after a few days of using it, what a dramatic and positive change in my skin. I have combination skin so it’s tough to find something that covers all the multiple “personalities” my skin has.  This cleanser balances out my oily forehead, but does not dry out my VERY sensitive upper cheek area. I already see that it’s sold out again so I consider myself lucky to have this product. It’s a bit on the pricier side but seriously all you need is one pump to get a nice lather going.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser does what a cleanser is supposed to do! It works very well at cleaning all of the dead skin, dirt and sebum off of your face without overly stripping the skin. I wouldn't recommend this for someone who has really dry skin because I believe it would be a little too stripping. Amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself is great, but I am extremely disappointed because it keeps leaking. It's very upsetting because is not a cheap product and it should have a good quality pomp. I will probably spend less then half of the time I would with this product because more than half of it is going to waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve ever used. I’ve tried to find one that is more cost effective but they don’t live up to this. It’s perfectly simple, doesn’t irritate the skin and I can actually get it my eyes and it doesn’t burn. I would give 10 stars if I could.

reviews.review_title: Forever my first choice out of all my cleansers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will always be a cleanser on my shelf. I really enjoy the foamy texture it becomes and how it makes my skin glow once rinsed off. I bought so many for Christmas gifts this year and everyone got back to me about how much they love it!

reviews.review_title: Forever my first choice out of all my cleansers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will always be a cleanser on my shelf. I really enjoy the foamy texture it becomes and how it makes my skin glow once rinsed off. I bought so many for Christmas gifts this year and everyone got back to me about how much they love it!

reviews.review_title: Now Part of My Skin Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser started off kinda iffy for me, I have combination/oily skin and after my first couple uses (AM and PM) it made my skin feel tight. I now only use it at night as part of my double cleansing routine and my skin feel great!   This cleanser has a mild scent and feels super smooth while using. A huge plus is the packaging; this was my first YTTP purchase and I loveee the glass bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved my first bottle and it was a holy grail for me.  Lasted 5 months!  Well worth it!! No issues with the pump and it was gentle without being drying or ineffective!  That said, just finally got a new bottle after it was out of stock for weeks.  First wash...my skin feels tight and dry.  Absolutely nothing has changed in my routine otherwise.  If they changed the formula I’m going to be super super upset!  This was my everything the last 5 months! :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I’ve ever used. I have combo skin, prone to break outs. I’m super oily by the end of the day & super dry in the winter (Canada gets cold!)   I’ve used Kate Somerville, Cerave, First Aid Beauty... you name it. This cleanser gently cleanses my skin, and stopped my break outs. My skin is perfectly balanced now. I love how this is a clean product and SUPER effective.   I’m so happy with this, going on my second bottle. I’ll never go back.

reviews.review_title: only cleanser that doesn’t break me out !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: also: you literally only need maybe a dime size amount get it a little wet and rub till it foams ! i’ve had mine for a year and i just got to half way ! a little goes a long way   most cleansers break my skin out and give me rashes just because of the products in them, and will continue to do this for the entire duration that I use the product. Because of this I never really used face cleanser‘s I would just wipe off the make up that I wore which was very minimal and use water. after finding this cleanser it has been life-changing for me because it gets all the dirt and debris off my face without causing me rashes or blemishes! my skin is very sensitive and this is one product that i’m confident is safe for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve ordered this twice now and can honestly say I’ve found my first ever holy grail product. I’ve tried tons of face washes for my combination/sensitive skin and they’ve either been too stripping or too light. This is the perfect middle ground for me because my skin feels clean while also not feeling too dried out. I’ve also had zero problems with the pump but that’s just my experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how the cleanser comes in a glass bottle rather than a plastic bottle and comes with the pump separated. I've only used it two times but I'll do an updated review on its effects in a couple of weeks or months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good cleanser, definitely smaller than I’d like for the price but it gets the job done for my dry skin and smells really good. It lathers up in a very slippery watery way if your hands are wet so if you don’t want the product slipping down your arm, make sure your hands aren’t totally soaked!  The reason I didn’t give this a 5/5 is because the nozzle unfortunately leaks and keeps forming a thick ring of product at the bottom even without being used. Assuming this is a manufacturing flaw but it’s disappointing to see the product wasted like this with its high cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: update review! i bought this back in august, and i am barely a 1/3 through the bottle. the pump came weird (wouldn't even fit in the bottle itself), but the cleanser itself is AMAZING. not drying, can use multiple times a day, and has an awesome fresh clean scent, almost like the best green smoothie ever :D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Honest review for people that sweat often (workout
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely has some good ingridients especially if you have sensitive skin BUT honestly as a person that works out 3-4 times a week, after showering after a workout, my face never feels fully clean when using this cleanser. It’s to ... gentle? That’s why I’m assuming it’s meant for only sensitive skin. If you want something that actually cleans your pores deep down I suggest looking elsewhere especially if you sweat a lot because all that does ever sully build up if Not cleansed properly. It’s a good brand but I won’t purchase this again, I’ll try something else

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Love the product but pump is (always) defective
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

Recently purchased my second bottle, I was able to put the pump in easily this time. My only complaint is that the pump has been slowly dripping in the shower every freakin day, there’s been a bunch of cleanser wasted! I just don’t get it, for the price I wished they designed the pump better. Otherwise, product is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this sooooo much!!!! Have been using this cleanser for several weeks now and it looks like this product will be a part of my cleansing routine for a while !!!

reviews.review_title: Pass for winter dry skin, IMO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I listened to skincare by Hyram and bought cerave and my skin hated it, it was wayyy to stripping for me so I bought this and it’s worked wonders. So hydrating without looking oily! It’s really a juice cleanse for the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn’t sure what I would think about this cleanser, but I’m a big fan after using for a couple of weeks! The smell is fresh and energizing so it’s nice to use in the morning to help wake up. Cleans my skin really well, isn’t overly dry after which I like and lathers up really nice.   Only downside is the pump dispenses a lot so I feel like I’ll go through this bottle quicker than other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only negative thing I have to say about this product is that it’s always out of stock :( I’m not one to ever write reviews but this product is an exception. 6 months ago when I started using this product my skin was full blow acne and super dry. I was using cheap drugstore acne washes that were stripping my skin and making my acne worse and worse this product COMPLETELY restored the Ph balance of my skin it’s INCREDIBLE. This product is extremely gentle but still does an amazing job of taking off the day including makeup and leaves your skin feeling fresh and hydrated. I’m obsessed here’s hoping it restocks soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is sensitive and the product is drying it out.

reviews.review_title: It was good unit it wasn’t
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go to cleanser for a while and after several months it started to dry my skin out. Don’t get me wrong it’s an amazing cleanser and I feel like everyone should try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this a week now and i absolutely love it! Tried many brand of cleanser and this one is my favourite! Don’t need to use a lot of it, gel turning into foam and cleans really well. Soft, Doesn’t make my skin dry or anything after rising and drying. Love the smell too. Glad i could get to try it before it was sold out again!

reviews.review_title: Gotta have it! Added to my holy grail products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the cleanest cleansers I found while pregnant. I used this often and loved it so much. It cleans very well and makes your skin feel fresh. I feel like my skin is drinking vitamins while using it. Great purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is such a light but effective cleanser. one of my faves ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the vegan, sustainability and cruelty-free ethos of this small brand but I was disappointed to find out that fragrance was used for this brand. Price is too much for a fragrance cleanser.

reviews.review_title: there’s a reason this is a cult fave
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is my favourite cleanser that Sephora sells. I started off with a sample from my beauty rewards over a year ago and I finally splurged on a big bottle. I have normal to dry skin and I find after I wash my face, my skin is smooth and not tight at all. I recommend trying a sample before you use any cleanser but this is a cult favourite for a reason. Note: I always oil cleanse before I use this for makeup removal. I do not have experience with this as makeup removal only

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser!! It leaves your skin feeling refreshed and doesn’t strip your face entirely. I have oily skin and this makes my face feel really clean. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard this product is amazing so I want to give it a try! It worked well for me and did not cause any adverse reactions, it cleaned my combo skin without overly stripping and left my skin feeling nice and even, but it did not seem to do so differently than other great cleansers I've used! The smell was nice but did seem very artificial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product so much! It's highly Hyram-approved, which left me to purchase it. Thankfully, I purchased the smaller size. I tried it for about 2 weeks and kept noticing that my face felt dry, tight, and was micro-peeling. I switched back to my Cerave cleanser and the problem immediately disappeared. It turns out that this cleanser was stripping my skin and probably doing me way more harm than good. So sad! For context, I have combo skin that leans towards oily, so I thought this one would work out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute best cleanser I’ve ever used. Only one that leaves my skin clean without over drying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this product in the summer and I have oily skin in summer/dry in the winter so, I didn’t love it in the past. Since it has gotten cold out this has been the best cleanser EVER! I love the smell, the ingredients and the way it leaves my skin. I use it more and night, it’s perfect for sensitive skin. I was on Accutane in the past and this have given me no issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean. There’s a reason this is a cult fav.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product lathers nicely, has a mild plant-y smell (which I really like), and leaves skin feeling clean but not stripped. The only draw back is, for the price point, it's a *nice* cleanser but nothing unusually special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser so much, it is the only cleanser that doesn't irritate my skin, or tighten my skin. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and cleansed. I used to have small pimples on my forehead but ever since I've used this cleanser these bumps went away. It's just an amazing product that is clean, vegan, and environmentally friendly. I will probably never change my cleanser ever again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soothing, refreshing, hydrating, everything I need in a cleanser! This cleanser is packed with vitamins and antioxidants, which help keep your skin clear and glowing! It keeps the pH of your skin balanced which is extremely important. This cleanser is extremely gentle, smells amazing, and doesn’t leave my face feeling stripped after use. The scent is subtle, exactly as described and not overwhelming. I love the glass packaging of this as well. This is a great cleanser for all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The very best cleanser in Sephora. The mild surfactants and gentle scent make this an extraordinary product overall. A great option for any and all skin types. Your sensitive skin will love you and your oily skin will thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the glass bottles, this gentle cleanser is pleasant and doesn’t dry out my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, sensitive skin and this has been my go to cleanser for over a year now. I have gone through multiple bottles. When I first started using it I wasn’t sure it was doing much until I went without it for a bit. It never leaves my skin feeling dry or stripped, and I feel like it actually leaves a bit of a glow. Nothing has worked quite like it in my opinion and will continue to repurchase over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gave me small breakouts, cleansing is my favorite part of my routine. I wanted to like this, but not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this cleanser and would use it daily if i could. Sadly, this is definitely meant for more oily skin types. It smells great, lathers nicely and leaves your skin glowing and nourished. It simply cleanses a bit more deeply than my dry skin needs. By no fault of the cleanser, I’ll have to find something gentler, but I will be gifting this for my people who do have oily skin and can reap its full benefits. If YTTP can ever release a product like this targeted for dryer skin, I’ll be first in line!

reviews.review_title: Not for dry skin, strips it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Face feels super clean after using but not for dry skin. My skin feels way to stripped from moisture after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Changed my skin, I’ll never use anything else, I can’t live without it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dried out my skin - the drunk elephant cleanser was a lot better for the price point. Not worth the cost, I’m sure there a better and more gentler cleansers out there. This one made me break out :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser i’ve tried, it really brightens my skin and helps get rid of dark spots. The smell is subtil but great.

reviews.review_title: Great face wash; can't get pump to work
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this face wash, but I think the pump that came with mine is busted. I was wondering if there was a trick to it?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i wanted to love this and i spent a lot of youth to the people and i hate it all. this is one of the worst cleansers ive used. shouldn't have trusted all the reviews. my skin has never looked worse. turned me into flakey central. disgusting. will never purchase again.

reviews.review_title: Best Cleanser (even for sensitive , fair skin)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever used and it will be repurchased for a very long time. I have extremely fair, sensitive, acne-prone,  dry skin and this cleanser is the first one to not make me feel dry and I haven't gotten a reaction / more acne. I love this cleanser SO much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: super good , just have to use a rich moisturizer after or else my skin would be very dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this, and I’m so underwhelmed. The gel did not feel luxurious or special. The wash was meh and it left my face more dry than I expected. I bought the pink cloud from herbivore and that’s much better.   The two stars is for the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this left my face super tight, shiny, and irritated. Probably works for oily skin but too stripping for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser! My skin always feels so soft and clean after I use it and never feels dried out or stripped. I love the green earthy scent it has and I love that I can reuse the glass bottles around my house! I switched over to a fully clean, non toxic skin care routine and my skin has never been better and I truly feel this cleanser plays a huge part in that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells sooo good but there’s no fragrance in the ingredients list. So I guess the smell is from the spinach extract? That’s impressive. It removes foundation, sunscreen, but it doesn’t remove eyeliner or mascara.  And FYI, I have very dry skin so I found this cleanser too dry for me. But my friend whose skin is oily thinks it’s perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: gave me an itchy rash and redness on my face after the 2nd time I used it :( It does contain fragrance so if you react to that, avoid this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this product!! It leaves my face super moisturized and glowy.  Love this brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size just to check it out because I didn't want to waste it if I didn't like it, but that isn't the case. I really liked it and when I run out I will purchase again. It feels as if you were feeding your face with rich essences. It has the slightest of the slightest of scents, it is in no way shape or form bad. It's amazing. The container is a glass bottle. Simple aesthetic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin. Product works well and does not irritate it one bit. It is definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Its light and has a nice green smell to it, not sure ow to describe it but its like a green smoothie for your face. I thought mine wasn't foaming as normal but I watched a video on this and now apply it by rubbing my hair together to get a foam, then applying it to my wet face in circular motions. It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin at all and the pump application is a must have, I wish more cleansers had this. The glass bottle looks great on my vanity as well.

reviews.review_title: One of the Best Cleansers I have used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. I have been using it for about 2 weeks with my cerave moisturizer and it has cleared up my skin so well. It has gone into my eyes and it does not burn. I have sensitive skin and it is very light and not stripping at all. It is very refreshing and smells amazing. You can use a little and after rubbing it in your hands for 20 seconds so much foam is made.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I spent so long trying to find a good cleanser. Smells amazing and works like a charm, I have combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't really like foaming cleansers but this one is great! it foams but it's pretty easy to quickly wash off. smells really good and doesn't leave my face feeling super dry. my skin is on the drier side, especially in the winter I get dry spots and this cleanser helps keep those spots moisturized. I use twice a day, once in the morning and once at night. bought the small bottle just to try it but will definitely be upgrading to the bigger size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! Youth to the People does a great job with their packaging and brand cleansing. I wish it was a little cheaper but still a great product. I feel much better buying glass than plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed by this product. It made my skin so dry that it was scaly and peeling, even with use of a great moisturizer. If you have even the slightest dry or sensitive skin, I wouldn't recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read reviews for this and thought I’d try it as I have oily/dry & sensitive skin. Hands down this is the best face wash I’ve used! My skin has shown a significant improvement in the last 6 months of its use with acne, general oiliness, pore-visibility; it doesn’t leave my skin feeling slightly dry or like it’s been stripped, the scent is pleasant, and you don’t need all that much as it lathers a decent amount. I also personally love that it’s made with ‘real’ ingredients. The only con is every time I think to grab more before I’m out, it’s already sold out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I have very sensitive skin and rosacea and ever time I use this in the morning, I can feel just by the texture of my skin just how clean it really is. The smell is very fresh, as if I am in the garden. For someone who is sensitive to fragrance, this did not sting my eyes! I highly recommend this to those prone to redness and sensitivity. It’s just that good! Your skin will thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this at night in a double cleanse and the way my skin looks after is really incredible. In the morning I use the Pink Cloud cleanser from Herbivore (I have one of those skin types where it constantly changes from dry to combo to oily on a random basis) but this one is so perfect for evening when washing off the sunscreen and pollution of the day. My skin feels so clean without feeling overly stripped and feels comforted instead of irritated. Truly amazing product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: An okay face wash. Really dried out my skin so definitely not for any skin type other than oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This a truly mediocre, overrated, and overpriced cleanser. It gets the job of cleaning the skin from impurities just fine, but there is nothing about this that stands out texturally or sensorially. The only thing I can think of that is memorable about this is that it’s drying and stripping. Other than that, it feels like a million other gel cleansers out there. Also, since this is a wash-off product that probably won’t be on your skin for even a minute, you can forget about getting any benefits from the supposed vitamins and whatnot that’s included in the formula. None of that stuff is going to have time to be absorbed into your skin. This isn’t a BAD product, but it’s not as good as it’s hyped up to be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is the one! It’s non abrasive and is really gentle on the skin and doesn’t dry out your face or make your skin feel stripped. I have repurchased this item multiple times I have gone through At least 4 of the 2 oz travel bottles and I love the formula, smell and the sustainable packaging. I have had way less break outs. I double cleanse so I use jojoba cream to remove my make up and follow up with this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely get the hype! I’ve used it for a few days already and my face feels clean without feeling stripped or dry. I don’t feel like it smells like anything so that’s good. A half a pump goes a long way, directions say 1-2 pumps but I could wash my whole body with that! For the price, I’m glad it has a high concentration and a little goes a long way. I have really soft clear skin so I can’t say it’s a game changer in terms of acne or texture. I’m definitely a goop hoarder though and this cleanser is definitely the real deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! One of my favourites! See many people complain about it leaking but I have had a few bottles now and not one of them leaked

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have this cleanser in my shower, by my sink and an extra in my bathroom closet just in case this cleanser is out of stock. I love it and use it twice a day and my face is still hydrated. Smells nice and a little goes a long way. My skin has never looked better. I used to get little bumps around my cheeks, but after trying this since October my skin has cleared up and haven’t seen a bump since. I have dry and sensitive skin. It hasn’t broke me out and will continue to use it. A holy grail for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser since the day it came out and my skin has never felt better! I struggle with cystic acne and the skin care journey I have been on is still continuing but I decided to use all clean products and it really has been helping my skin! The smell and feel of this cleanser is dreamy. It feels so silky and suds up really nice! I use this for my morning and night time cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If it is in stock buy it right now. This is literally a game-changer, I love it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this cleanser I have combination to dry sensitive skin but I’m struggling with hormonal acne right now due to birth control so finding a cleanser that deeply cleans the skin without overly drying it is extremely hard, I heard about this cleanser from skin care by hyram and decided to give it a try and I am  IN LOVE!!! I love the fresh organic scent packaging is amazing and it deeply cleanses giving me the deep clean I need while keeping my skin hydrating it’s a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a few years now and it is the only product that works on my skin. I used to get bad breakouts and this was the only thing that helped. It makes my skin feel really soft and I haven't had another bad breakout since using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use the DE Cleanser but I got a sample of this once and had to purchase the full sized! I just love it!! It actually even removes (most) of the magnetic eyeliner that I use for my lashes! It leaves your skin feeling fresh, clean & even moisturized but not so much so that you break out (depending on skin type maybe?) Plus you can't beat the natural ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how my face felt after I washed it , felt clean yet not dry like I couldn’t move . Love the glass bottle and packaging. Overall very happy with it . Will update review if needed .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had this for about a week after trying a sample I received. I like it and don’t feel like it’s drying but the pump is very leaky, a generous quarter sized amount leaks out over several hours each time I use it which is a bummer since it’s not the cheapest product out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live by this cleanser. It’s one of the ONLY ones I’ve found that doesn’t give me that nasty “squeaky” feeling on my skin, doesn’t make me flake. It leaves my skin feeling soft and actually clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is such an amazing cleanser for all skin types. similar to the cerave cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LIFESAVER. I had major breakouts for weeks and nothing was working. I used this for one week and my acne was 90% clear. No other product has given me such fast and significant results.   I don’t have issues with a leaky pump like many others have noted. The pump does dispense a lot of product if you push all the way down and I don’t find it necessary so I do a half pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser doesn’t melt away makeup, but it makes my acne-prone skin feel soft and smooth. I don’t like to use it alone though; it doesn’t strip the natural oils I need which is great, but I also don’t feel all the way clean. I pair it with fresh strawberry+sugar scrub and together I love them. My friend has been using it by itself though, and she has very dry skin. It’s been great at keeping her skin clear, soft, and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Very gentle BUT WHY DOES IT LEAK SO MUCH???? Every time there’s always a puddle of product on the counter. This is an expensive face wash so I would like the packaging to be better so that it’s worth the money. So frustrating. Pretty sure more than half of the product leaked out....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle, oil-free cleanser. I use the NuFace microcurrent device, so I need an oil-free cleanser to prep my skin before the treatments. While I think I prefer cleansers that are more hydrating, as my skin is dry, I don't feel the need to have multiple cleansers on hand with this one. I can use this everyday, twice a day, and my skin is still balanced. The eco-conscious ingredients and packaging are also a huge bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It leaves my skin feeling squeaky clean. It has a light natural green grass scent lol. It feel really good on my skin and it doesn't dry out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in LOVE with this cleanser! I have been using it for over a year, have tried others and always end up going back! It's a cleaner formula, with a soft fragrance and a mild lather. It feels so comfortable and refreshing on my face-- I especially like the squeaky clean feeling my face gets while I'm rinsing it off. I appreciate that it doesn't dry out my skin, even during the harsh winter months. This cleanser has never let me down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually went in for a Fresh cleanser that I had been using for a couple of years, and the employee at Sephora asked me some questions about my skin and pointed me towards YTTP!  I have normal/oily skin and I swear this cleanser has really mellowed out my skin. Even with mask wearing I feel like I am not as oily as I used to be. It's nice that this is larger, more affordable, and better for the planet than my previous face wash!   I bought a mini set of this for a friend because I believe in it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite facial wash. It feels clean but doesn’t dry out my skin. My husband shares the same cleanser as me too and it definitely last long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't do anything for my skin. It didnt make my skin any better or worse, just a basic cleanser

reviews.review_title: FIX THAT PUMP AND IT’LL BE PERFECT!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this stuff. I have combo skin that gets dry in the winter and find this cleanser to be well balanced; not too harsh but cleanses deep and thoroughly. Doesn’t dry out my skin like a lot of cleansers do.   However It gets 4 stars (I’m being generous because I was going to give 3) because of the packaging!!!! I’ve purchased this bottle twice and both times the pump has been faulty and caused me to lose product! The manufacturers need to address this, because it isn’t cheap and who wants to lose good product unnecessarily esp after paying for what is supposed to be quality product? It’s frustrating and I decided to turn to other products after having the issue the second time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soooo good ... this is one of the best cleansers out there! My combo very sensitive skin loves it — I have repurchased multiple times and will continue to do so. Was so happy that the 16 oz jumbo size was finally back in stock - just bought it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good. This cleanser has a LOVELY light and natural scent that reminds me of a spa. Kind of smells like a juice bar. The consistency is jelly and foams up nicely. I have dry, dehydrated, acne-prone skin, so this product is ever so slightly stripping, but if you follow up with hydrating products and a good moisturizer, it’s not a big deal at all. I have noticed my acne slowly clearing (it’s only been a week and half). No new breakouts so far and all the active breakouts I had before using this are actively shrinking and some have disappeared completely. I always look forward to using this every morning and night. This doesn’t take off all my makeup (it doesn’t claim to) so I would recommend double cleansing (you probably should be anyway). Lastly, I love the packaging. The glass bottle is eco friendly and it comes with both a cap and a pump to switch out when you travel. Overall, great product. A very gentle and effective cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best. I wish they had a bigger bottle than the 64oz. I'd just stock up for a few months.

reviews.review_title: Helped my acne a lot but out of stock all the time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser and it is the only thing that helped my acne but it goes out of stock so fast and it doesn't come in stock for months - even though on their website for Americans its in stock. It sucks but it definitely is a really good cleanser that lasts for MANY months (2 oz bottles will last a year)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I was super skeptical. I mean, look at that price tag! I had a gift card so I decided to give it a try. I have been using the Origins checks and balances wash for three years, and this face wash is WAY better. It cleans my skin WITHOUT the stripped feeling, and my skin is noticeably softer, more even, and my forehead acne is gone. This is after only five days of using this AM/PM. Hot tip: it says to use 1-2 pumps but a little goes a very long way. I use 1/2 a pump and have plenty for my face AND neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and have never been able to find a cleanser that doesn't dry my skin out or over oil it in some way. THIS CLEANSER SAVED MY SKIN - even during the winter months my skin feels refreshed while using this, and doesn't feel over dry after washing it off. Obviously YES you need a moisturizer, but like...you should be using a moisturizer anyway. I've gone through 2 bottles of this stuff this year and I'm about to buy a third because it's amazing and I have no breakouts and I'm in love with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard good reviews about this project and wanted for try it. Once I tried it, it feels good on your skin-it’s very refreshing. It leaves your skin feeling clean, but also dry. I have combination skin and I would not recommend this product. If you do, I would strongly recommend a moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Caused horrible breakout on my chin and some on my forehead. Kept using because I didn’t think it could possibly be from the face wash because of how bad the breakout was, but immediately after I stopped using, my skin calmed down. I tried it again bc I really wanted to like it and never experienced anything like that from a face wash- but got the same terrible breakout each time- it is absolutely not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorite cleansers. Cleans perfectly without over-stripping. Scent is refreshing for summer too. I’ve used it for a substantial amount of time, and it continues to work well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice face wash, but this is extremely drying. I'm oily/combo, but get very dry skin in the colder months sadly. And of course, hormonal acne to boot. This lathers nice, has a faint fragrance (not overwhelming) and cleanses very well. But have your toner/essence at the ready to put on right after. I've used this 3x times since purchasing it during the Holiday save event. It's not an everyday face wash for me; I leave it 1x a month to use when Lady friend is visiting.  Aside from that, I use a rice face wash bc it's gentler but still cleans well. This would be ideal for summer months (my perspective based on how my skin works with it)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this cleanser! I really only use it at night after using a cleansing balm to break up my sunscreen and makeup, and this cleanser helps gently remove any remaining gunk on my face without making it feel stripped. It does have a scent/fragrance, but it is not overpowering and smells like fresh air in a good way. I cannot recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser, I've gone through about 2 bottles now, it doesn't seem to irritate my acne prone sensitive skin. I like the fragrance it's very clean smelling. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I haven't seen a change in my skin, it's just a good basic cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this cleanser. It left my skin red, irritated and broken out in white heads, clogged pores and under the skin bumps. I thought that my skin was purging, but it was breaking out! So disappointed in this product. I have combination, sensitive and acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product two times because I thought the first time i used it with the wrong products but my skin does not like this cleanser at all!! My skin doesnt feel clean and i always get pimples. Im sticking with my soy fresh cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this cleanser a week ago. I’ve been using it morning and night and my face is so dry now. It is literally flaking. It’s the only thing I’ve changed recently. Super disappointed. Not sure what the hyped about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love. My skin feels so clean with this and didn’t burn my eyes. I love how gentle it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Giving this three stars for the smell and feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself was okay. It kept my acne at bay, but didn’t completely get rid of it. It made me feel squeaky clean (I like that feeling), and the smell was nice. I lost a LOT of the product bc of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

My skin feels squeaky clean and the lather is marvelous. I bought the 2oz one thinking “eh, whatever” but man. I’m gonna be going back to get that liquid gold. 16 oz here I come!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my family’s favourite hand soap! My sister had bought it as a face wash and we didn’t realize. Works great though! Would buy again (as a hand soap, I haven’t tried it as a face wash)

reviews.review_title: Good for cleansing, not for makeup removal

My face feels clean and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very light sent. I have very sensitive skin and this works amazing. More basic cleaners make my face breakout like crazy and fortunately this one didn't!

reviews.review_title: Truly worth it for sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I’ve tried to switch to a cheaper cleanser (and one that is more available cause this thing is ALWAYS sold out) but my skin is at its best when I use this. Even in the cold Canadian winter I can still use this, just make sure to pair it with a good moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have EXTREMELY oily skin. I tried so much different products to help with it. Nothing worked. I watched skincare by hyram and he recommended this cleanser. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Try the mini at least. You may fall in love!

reviews.review_text: Best facial cleanser and I've tried dozens and dozens. I can feel the nutrients absorbing into my skin while cleansing and it cleans so well. My skin feels wonderful afterwards. It lasts forever too. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Do Not Recommend For Dry Skin!

I usually use one after I cleanse but this cleanser made my skin so dry to the point where it was screaming for face cream after. I give it 3 stars because I love the way it lathers up and removes makeup. But if you have very dry skin, do not use this product alone. If you choose to still use this product, be ready to spend more money to double up on moisturizers/serums.

reviews.review_title: Ehhh definitely became popular because of Hyram
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

I didn't notice any really big difference in my skin. I live in nyc and found it too stripping for the winter months. Probably would be really nice in the summer when its more humid and for being anti-pollution. This definitely popped off because of Hyram, but just because it works well for him in Hawaii doesn't mean it works well for everyone. But not bad cleanser, but not worth the hype imho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PLEASE RESTOCK.  I love this cleanser.  It's my OG, my girl, I can't afford to run out.

reviews.review_title: It’s a win win for skin!

It’s win win for my skin!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful skin but a little dry

reviews.review_title: best skincare line I’ve ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this line. My main skin issue is dryness, but these products really go above and beyond. My skin glows without makeup and I’m always being complimented on my skin since I started using it. Saw a difference within a day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: can someone please tell me when this will restocked in Canada, its the only face wash that I've been able to use. and I'm almost out!

reviews.review_text: The HOLY GRAIL of face washes. I cannot express how many faces I went through till I found this one. reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: The only cleanser you will ever need!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i tried the mini size of this product twice, the first time i wasn't sure and returned it. i decided to give it another shot because i learned it was fungal acne safe (besides glycerin). i found myself to enjoy it, but then they changed the formula (no longer fa safe!!) and started charging $2 more for the mini. the other formula was better and i'm very disappointed because i was considering buying the full size because i love the 8 oz and the antioxidants. yttp, go back to the other formula!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It leaves my skin feeling clean, refreshed, and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I have ever used! It’s perfect. Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. Face feels fresh and clean, noticeable improvement on my skin. I hate that it is always out of stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love love this product , it doesn’t leave your skin too dry or too greasy, clean and remove makeup , vitamin B,C , perfect can not be better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Face feels clean but not dry.  Such a refreshing cleanser, light clean smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for about two weeks now, and I don’t think i’m going to use something instead of this cleanser for a while. I have hormonal acne prone skin, so I love how this cleanser soothes my skin and throughout the day my face is never spotty or red. To help i usually steam my pores and use a facial scrubber with this to really get into my pores. Smells fresh and healthy and comes in a very cute and easy-to-use glass bottle. Would recommend to anyone struggling with imperfections, acne and/or uneven skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I recommend it if you're looking for a good quality cleanser that you can use day/night! Reason I only gave it 4 stars is because it isn't life changing but its still a really great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this once every other day and it makes my face soft, clean, and bright after every use! This is my favorite cleanser so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

I double cleanse with Clinique’s Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm and it’s been great at removing everything afterwards. It is pricey but honestly, I give this the credit for keeping my skin in check.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was really looking forward to trying this cleanser as I've heard nothing but great things. To my surprise, it was awful for my skin. It dried it out to the point that directly after applying serums and moisturizers, my skin was still very dry and extremely dull. I'm giving it two stars instead of one because I don't mind the smell and the consistency is nice. Passing it on to someone with combination/oily skin in hopes that they get use out of it since it was pretty expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: great cleanser for sensitive oily skin.

reviews.review_text: its a great cleanser. not too stripping. the kale and green tea are fantastic at controlling oil. works great as my 2nd cleanse. I have fairly sensitive combination skin with a lot of maskne happening right now. I tend to be sensititve to a lot of cleansers, I've tried ALOT. (drunk elephant, clinique, dermologixa the list goes on) usually ill develop a sensitivity after a month or two of using it but my skin still loves this cleanser. I've been using it since January with no issues. the pump dispenses a lot so tie an elastic band under the pump the stop from going down so far and pumping too much. one bottle has lasted me more than 8 months so I don't mind the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Favourite cleanser!! Got the mini version to try it out and completely fell in love. Almost done my bottle, will definitely repurchase.
wayyyy too harsh. got it because hyram suggested it, have no idea what he sees in it! my skin freaked out when i used it!!

reviews.review_title: Never going back to another Cleanser

reviews.review_text: I finally found the One. This formula is so gentle and smells so clean. It leaves such a clean fresh feeling! love that its clean certified as well! always stock up because this product always sells out!!!

reviews.review_title: Best Cleanser I have Ever Used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this cleanser in a sample pack and after the first use I purchased the full size.  This cleaners works really well to clean all the dirt and oils off my face while not overly drying the skin.  I have dry  sensitive skin and this cleanser is so amazing for me.  I will say that now that the cold weather is rolling in, I have taken to only using this at night with my double cleanse and just splashing some water on my face in the morning.  This also smell amazing!  Like the best green juice, I just want to drink it up.  Overall a really great product and I would highly recommend to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of my favorite gentle cleansers. Not only does it have a light refreshing scent but it is so gentle on your skin. I have super sensitive skin and this not only keeps my face feeling clean but it also does not dry my skin out. I have been using this a couple of years now and have not wanted to switch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this I just wish it didn't have fragrance. It smells amazing but I just need my skincare to work, and don't need the added fragrance. I like this for summer, it isn't stripping for a gel cleanser but I'm switching to a cream cleanser for winter. I do really like this brand's commitment to sustainability and I would recommend this product, just be careful if you're sensitive to fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has sensitive, reactive, and stress breakouts. It has been difficult to find a cleanser that doesn’t strip my skin, make my skin red, and cause breakouts from being harsh. I cannot even express how much I love this cleanser! No other compares, even tatcha cleansers. If you have sensitive skin and struggle finding cleansers that are gentle enough, but effective and will clean your skin this is the one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this cleanser, I love its gentle herbal smell, I love how it gets foamy but not too foamy, I love how my skin never feels stripped but comfortably clean. Its a 10/10 for sure! HOWEVER, it pains me to say this, but it is too expensive of a cleanser, wish it was a bit more fair in price. Don’t know if I will repurchase but I surely enjoyed using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little nervous about buying it because of the price. BUT it was amazing it smells wonderful it smells fresh and when you wash your face it it feels great.and the price I wash my face 2 times a day for about 2 or 3 months and I am only about 1/2 way done. If your thinking about it do it

reviews.review_title: Refreshing and great for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! have a great smell and feels nice on the skin. I have sensitive skin and this works well for me. I only cleanse before bed and leaves me feeling very refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the bottle and feel of the cleanser but it’s nothing special and would not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cleanser for about 2 years so yes I was a loyal customer. At first, it worked great for me so I do think it is a quality  product. However, over time I noticed my skin started to break out again into hormonal acne that I used to have in high school. At that point, this cleanser was not fighting my acne at all. It’s not designed to so I switched to a LHA cleanser and this helped me a ton ..anyway I think this would be great for anyone who doesn’t need a strong cleanser to fight acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser so badly I can't even tell you. The fact that it comes in a glass bottle, it's vegan, cruelty free, and chock full of antioxidants. My skin just doesn't agree. My best guess is that it has a strong fragrance but I started getting irritation breakouts immediately after using this.YTTP, please drop the fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! Spreads and foams? Bubbles?! Super well and lathers nicely! Face feels super soft after and it doesn’t have any harsh chemicals to dry your face out if you use every day.  Highly recommended!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive/dry skin - this is THE best gentle cleanser out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser but can be drying. Nice foaming action and removes makeup well. Would love to see them come out with a cleansing oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Everything I’ve read about this product made it sound amazing! Unfortunately, it actually dried out my combination skin. I had dry flaky spots that appeared on my face. I was very surprised this happened based off everything I’d read about Youth to the People products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't even leave a real review of the product as the packaging of the mini version is terrible and unsafe. It is a little glass bottle with a screw cap and no pump. Showers are slippery. When I tried to use it the bottle slipped out of my hand and shattered into TONS of pieces of the floor causing tons of bubbles and mess. When I was trying to get out of the shower safely I got an awful cut on my foot and bled all over my shower. It was awful.   I very much believe in sustainable packaging but please develop a better and safer design.   This is my second attempt to leave this review, unclear why it was deleted or unsuccessfully posted the first time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I genuinely enjoy this cleanser. Perfect for my dry sensitive skin and the overall experience is quite wonderful. Though, I’ve used it for 3-4 months, but haven’t notice enough life changing improvements on my face especially for a pricy cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had an extremely hard time getting the pump in the bottle. Seems like something was off. The pump sucks overall. And, for how much this stuff costs, having a bad pump seems ridiculous. The cleanser itself is fine. Don’t love it, don’t hate it. Will not repurchase due to packaging and cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my grandma got me the mini for Christmas last year and i absolutely  LOVE it, it works wonderfully on my sensitive combination skin and it smells amazing! I've recommended it to lots of friends but considering they don't have jobs and they are 13-14 its a bit expensive for them However no product will ever replace its spot in my bathroom 10000/10 recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! I had put off trying it for so long but some of my friends pushed me to give it a try and I’m glad they did. It’s perfect for my super sensitive skin and so gentle. It was the perfect gentle cleanser when I had a really bad reaction to a sunscreen. My only issue was with the pump. Maybe I got a defective one cause it would not stop leaking product on my shelf. Other than that this cleanser is amazing, probably my new holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for about a year now with no issues. I use it in the evenings after Drunk Elephant's makeup remover balm so I can't speak to it as a makeup remover, but as a cleanser it's perfect.  I have sensitive, combination skin. I love how clean it leaves my face feeling without turning it into a dry, sensitive nightmare. Even in the cooler weather when my nose is raw and dry (allergies+cold don't mix), this cleanser doesn't overdo it on the sensitive bits there. It actually helps keep those areas clean to prevent icky build up/pimples without feeling like I dumped acid on dry/peeling skin.   Love love love this. It is now my go-to cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I try something new, I always come back to this. It’s that good. I use it as my second cleanser after an oil based cleanser and it’s perfect. My skin feels velvety soft and hydrated after and I’ve seen a major improvement in the texture of my skin. I have heard that this cleanser seems to work best for people with sensitive / combo skin. Only downfall is that it does go out of stock frequently. If it’s available, definitely give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Super gentle but cleans really well. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m almost 40 and have used many cleaners. This is my favorite of all time!!! I have sensitive skin and prone to random breakouts. This has majority improved my skin. Feels clean, but not dry! Love love love!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, combination, acne prone skin and this was not the business for my skin. It was very stripping, didn’t effectively remove makeup, and my skin was red after use.  This didn’t work with my skin after two uses I decided not too. I gave it to a friend who likes it but doesn’t find it to be worth the price.  Definitely smells like kale, and fresh.   I would suggest buying the sample size first. To test it out on your skin. I wrote this in hopes that’s someone doesn’t just buy it trusting all the great reviews on others acne prone skin.  Might not work the same for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive acne prone skin and it's really helpful with minimizing breakouts and keeping my skin clean!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After moths of being out of stock it’s back! I still love this effective cleanser years later, and love that it removes everything in one cleanse and is gentle on my eyes. My skin felt refreshed, not stripped and the minus ones star is only for the pump arriving broken. I wish the brand would offer replacement pumps for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new FAVE cleanser! It does not upset my sensitive skin, it makes my skin feel clean/no residue or dry feeling after. I love the smell, & the ingredients! I just wish this size bottle (2oz) was more available!!! It’s always sold out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite and only face cleanser. It never breaks me out, it feels so good and I love that it's in a reusable glass bottle. A+++.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this summer 2019 and it lasted me until winter, it was AMAZING. I have normal to dry skin and was skeptical about it working on my skin as it should, but it toned out my skin without stripping. I use it usually as my second step in double cleansing and I love the fresh-clean-face feeling it gives! Ingredients align with what the claims are, so you know it’s not filled with anything that could be damaging or sensitizing for the skin in the long run. I recommend it to anyone and everyone! Repurchasing because after trying other ones, I still think about this one, it needs to be in my rotation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 4 stars because yes I loved the product but I was one of the unlucky people who got it with the faulty pump. I had it in my shower and I noticed it would have a puddle of product under the pump and started to realise it was just constantly leaking. more than half the bottle of the medium.size literally down the drain. I will repurchase because I loved the formula but won't use the pump ever again super disappointed hopefully this HIGHEND brand does something about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what can be said about to cleanser that hasn’t already been said. It’s a fabulous cleanser that smells great. All you need is one pump to clean your face and neck so I do see the bottle lasting a good amount of time. I also love that the bottle is glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just repurchased my 4th bottle of this cleanser. Before discovering this cleanser, I had been on a hunt to find a cleanser that wouldn’t strip my skin but still cleaned, and couldn’t find anything. This cleanser does exactly that. My skin is extremely dry, to the point where it starts flaking if I don’t use moisturizer after washing my face. But with this cleanser, I don’t experience any stripping or tight feeling on the skin. I would highly highly highly recommend this cleanser to everyone, dry or oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily and sensitive skin; it’s easy for me to breakout and I have acne scarring, dark spots and texturized skin that makes it difficult to find any products that work well for me. This cleanser is a nice gamechanger! Even using it 2x a day, the 8oz bottle lasted me 3 months. It has a nice, fresh scent that’s not disturbing to the eyes, nose or skin. I also love the packaging! Very well done and the pump packaged separately is a nice touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser so much I’ve repurchased it twice already. It works great for a refreshing morning cleanser as well as it removes makeup really well. It also has a very nice, fresh, and clean scent that isn’t too overpowering unlike other cleansers I’ve tried. I have combination to oily skin with acne and this cleanser has really helped my skin be less shiny during the day and has cleared up a lot of my breakouts. I definitely recommend this product!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like a natural clean and does wonders for my dry skin. I use it with dr jart + ceramidin liquid moisturizing toner and the ordinary natural moisturizing factors + ha moisturizer. I find that it adequately removes makeup - including mascara and eyeliner. Definitely recommend (:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very overpriced product that really didn’t help in anyway shape or form. I supposed it didn’t do anything bad either .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST face wash I’ve ever used! I’ve always had very sensitive skin and probed to breakouts! Ever since I’ve started using this face wash my skin is perfect! Especially with the mask wearing we have now a days I was scared my skin would start to react but between this face wash and the lotion that goes along with it, my skin is still amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good cleanser, it has a light consistency and lathers nicely however I would say unless you have the budget a cleanser at the end of the day washes down the drain. So it's best to invest in serums and creams. That said, this is a really nice cleanser (i have oily acne prone skin) and it's one of the first cleansers where if I use it in the shower I actually feel little blackheads come off. I always feel clean but not dry afterward. I will probably purchase again but it is a bit pricey for a cleanser so I've docked off a star for that. But I've yet to find a comparable gel cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I was using a face cleanser that started giving me a lot of having a lot of break outs in my cheeks and my skin was irritated. Once I started using this Youth to People cleanser I have seen a major difference in my skin, it looks healthier, smoother and brighter. I definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best! Have been using for about a year after trying many different cleansers. I have been on cureology for 1+ years and this pairs perfectly with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cleans my makeup off very well and doesn’t dry my face out at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Finally after a decade of trying every face wash on Earth I've found the perfect cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too expensive and broke me out. Really didn’t work with my skin, I got a bunch of little bumps and clogged pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible product for acne prone skin, my skin broke out right away. In addition, who designed this package? This whole product is a joke. Don’t buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this cleanser so far...lathers well & leaves your skin feeling soft, clean & hydrated!!

reviews.review_title: Do not give into the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes since there were many reviews about this cleanser. While I generally stay away from skincare products that have fragrance, I thought it wouldn’t be too bad as it was the last ingredient on the list and had the word “natural”.  I found this cleanser to be incredibly drying and made my acne worse.   Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_title: Love the product, less happy about the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried out the smaller size to test on my skin, fell in love with the cleanser. The scent is pleasant, the product is gentle and doesn't leave my skin squeaky or tight and my skin feels soft and healthy after a week of use! No bad reaction to it at all. The 59mL size lasted me about 2 months. It's a little pricey for the full size so for now I am sticking to my cosrx cleanser after having used this up but if you can afford this product I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldn’t recommend. It isn’t bad, but I think it’s your basic drug store formula. Nothing spectacular.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
