reviews.review_text: This product along with the super berry hydrate glow mask and super berry hydrate oil. Gave me fungal acne, which i hadn’t dealt with for over 7 years. If you have ever had fungal acne, I suggest you steer clear from this. It could possibly trigger it. Yes I have dry skin but maybe this was way too much oil idk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product had great reviews from my favorite blogger. I decided to try the mini version and it didn't do much for me. The one thing that was terrible was the smell. It felt like I was putting a terrible scented oily dish on my face.

reviews.review_title: Would have been 5 if it wasn't glass
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this more than anything I've ever used but... It's glass. I see the value of sustainable packaging but it's highly breakable. Mine broke all over the bathroom floor in the first month. What a waste of money. I was devastated and can't afford to replace it since it's 50 bucks for face wash. I got it for my birthday. Wasted for no reason except that people can't responsibly recycle their plastic bottles.

reviews.review_title: A purchase that shocked and left me in awe
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews but this right here... highly recommended. I brought the $10 size and usually i know with some products, you break out before it finally does what it supposed to do but not with this one. Had not one break put, skin is glowing (even i got my brother who is a bar soap type person using this)  My acne scars also lightened up. Its worth the price in MY opinion. It worked for me.

reviews.review_title: Poor packaging on mini version- safety hazard
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I deeply support the environmental reasons for using a glass bottle- however, then you really need a pump. The mini version's complete lack of closure other than a cap not only makes it easy to waste product, but makes it dangerous.   When holding and unscrewing the cap off the glass bottle in the slippery shower, mine slipped out of my hands and shattered into TONS of little glass pieces. Trying to get out of the shower with the cleanser and glass everywhere I cut my foot quite badly. bleeding all over my shower.  Good times.   I can't speak to the quality of the product as I only got to use it a couple times before it shattered. :-(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just purchased this product about a week ago and it’s one of the best cleansers I’ve used.  I’m in my 50’s, have dry skin and use Tazarotene (a prescription Retinol cream), and I find this to be so gentle on my skin with no drying effects.  I love the smell and how clean my skin feels after using it.  It is a bit expensive, but only takes 1/2-1 pump to do its job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It does a great job of removing makeup and oil, and it smells great. I like that it's all natural. This is my new go-to everyday cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great gentle cleanser. Takes off makeup and doesn’t strip the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I have ever used. My face feels so clean and refreshed after using. I will use this for forever!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It did nothing, I regret purchasing this item. And for the price?! No thank you. It feels like a dish soap. Removes makeup very well though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Decent scent that vanishes when face is rinsed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly really liked this cleanser, but it made me break out SO BAD and I’m still trying to deal with the breakout 8 months later =( literally never had acne in my life before this. Super disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE BEST cleanser I’ve ever used. No redness, irritation, or tight feeling after use. The smell is a little earthy but I’m willing to look past it for the result lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just simply amazing, has cleared my skin so much. It keeps my skin very soft as well. I love it and will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never been clearer!!! I love this cleanser. It smells so good and leaves my skin so happy! I’m 30 with combination skin, some adult acne, and trying to anti-age. This has become a staple in my beauty routine. I basically start my day with this stuff. It has been so hard to find the right cleanser for me but this is my third time purchasing. And I recommend to anyone with the same skin type and or issues.

reviews.review_title: Love the product, hate the restock time.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I find this wash is so gentle on my skin and leaves my skin feeling smooth and clean. I struggle with hormonal breakouts and this face wash has helped with reduce those awful breakouts. I enjoy the soft scent, it is not overpowering or perfume scented. I would give it 5 stars but it goes out of stock very quickly and the restocking time for this product can last for months. I usually stock up on 2 bottles when purchasing but it is always hit or miss on when it will be restocked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for YEARS! I love the company and everything it stands for plus nothing beats it being a clean beauty product. This product is gentle for all skin type! Not scented or stripping but still gets the job done for cleansing. Even my boyfriend loves this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: by far my favorite cleanser. it always makes my face feel so clean

reviews.review_title: Love clean products, but this one not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it is a clean product, and was excited to try this. I've been using for about a month now and have not seen any difference in my skin. I also worry a little about the the bottle being glass, but I do appreciate the recyclability of it. All great intentions, just not the face wash for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is incredible! I purchased this product about 8 months ago in February and have been using it regularly ever since. It does a beautiful job of cleansing and nourishing the skin without being harsh or stripping. I find on days that I wear a full face of makeup I do have to use a makeup remover beforehand but on makeup free days this cleanser alone does an excellent job of making my face feel clean and hydrated at the same time. I have acne-prone, oily to combo skin and used to think that heavily stripping cleansers were the only way to keep the oil at bay. However, as I've gotten older I find that gentle products make my skin much happier and healthy looking. I find this cleanser does have a very slight, fresh scent but I think it is more due to the actual ingredients in the product rather than any added fragrance. Another strange phenomenon that originally put me off to using this product is the texture of my skin once I rinse it off. Before finding the superfood antioxidant cleanser I was so accustomed to having my skin feel stripped to the point of being squeaky clean. With this product, my skin had an almost velvet-like texture. At first I thought that it had left a film behind and tried to scrub any residue off, however it's not a film but softening affect on the texture of your skin! If you are looking for a new, cruelty-free, sustainably minded cleanser then I would highly recommend giving this beauty a try. I also can't wait to finish my bottle and repurpose it to hold my other bath and beauty products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t notice any difference in my skin at all. You’d be better to save your money. It did take off makeup pretty well, though. Maybe it would be a great first cleanser?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product for months now and by far it is my all time favorite. This cleanser is not drying nor has it ever sucked the life out of my face like other cleansers I’ve used in the past have. My skin is always left extremely clean and glowing after one use. It truly has worked wonders on my acne prone skin and has helped a ton with my blemishes. Also love that it’s gentle cause I use it twice a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser because a youtuber I watch raved about how she loved it and would re buy it every time she used it up. I can say I'm not a fan, I didn't do anything for my skin. It didn't really last a long time for me. I feel like a little does not go a long way with this. Therefore I do not plan on buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this cleanser made my skin really soft. You need to activate it in your palms so it would foam I think a lot of users don’t know that but its really a good cleanser. The packaging is environmental friendly too however I’m not sure you can use it for travels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the gift set a while ago, and had to buy the full size of this cleanser. I get bumps along the sides of my face, and after just a couple uses they were gone! I have normal leaning dry skin, and don’t feel this makes me dryer. I absolutely love it. Yes it’s $47 but it will last you a while!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Cleanser is good at cleaning your skin, but I did find that it was a little drying. This is way to clarifying for me to use both morning and night so I recommend only using this at night if you wear makeup after your oil cleansing. For the price I personally don’t think it’s worth it. Don’t get me wrong I liked this cleanser, but I do believe that there are others out there with a better price. I don’t think you need to spend more than $20 on a cleanser. You do get a lot of product, but the ingredients contain natural fragrance and theres nothing really natural about that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Not drying or over stripping like other cleaners are!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really didn’t do it for me. At first I liked the glass bottle but eventually realized it made things awkward (travel, slippery when wet, etc). The product itself just didn’t seem to make my skin happy, which was a shame since it seems so many ppl love this product and I really wanted to have found my new go to cleanser :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this on my double cleanse days only and I love it. It makes my face feel very clean and refreshed. It is a little bit foamy too. I have dry skin and I think it possibly would dry me out if I used it every time I washed my face or without using a hydrating cleanser along with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love it love the smell to it smells like a flower garden and kale at the same time, not harsh on the skin, really recommend if your looking for a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: We miss it!! Been waiting for restock for months and months. This cleanser is amazing, I'm very confused at some of the reviews saying it doesn't foam? It's the most luxurious lather! You NEED to activate it in your palms first before applying. It leaves your face feeling very clean but not tight at all! I have very dry, sensitive, early signs of aging skin and this is my hero cleanser. Right now, I'm using the Pacifica Sea Foam cleanser as a nice alternative, but will switch back as soon as I can!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It's a great 2nd step to anyone's two step cleansing routine. It lathers in my hands nicely and doesn't leave my face feeling dry and tight. My only complaint is the packaging. I love YTTP's stance on wanting to use more sustainable packaging, but the pump that comes with this cleanser bottle doesn't really fit in there... I had to force it in the bottle by hitting it with a hammer... and the pump did not function for very long after having to do that. I had to pry the pump back out 2 weeks later and buy another bottle to put this product in. That is probably due to fluctuations in the inside diameter of the glass bottle opening, I'm sure. But it just stinks I had to buy something else to hold this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ehh... it’s okay. Not horrible, not great, so not worth the price! It smells nice and fresh, isn’t much for foaming which I’m fine with, but since COVID I don’t wear foundation, just concealer and eye makeup and I never feel like it gets everything off. And there is always schmutz on my cotton rounds after I tone, like my face wasn’t clean. I never had that with my previous (but discontinued) cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had purchased a sample size before investing in getting the larger size and I love YTTP!!! I was using Origins for years and started noticing my face was getting really dry. This doesn’t make my face feel tight, or dry patches, the smell is great and the pump is perfect to avoid from waste. They do a great job with packaging in ensuring little waste!! Will be buying the refill option when it comes time :)

reviews.review_title: Google Grinning Cat on Google Android 11.0
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely fantastic product!! It's a tad drying but that is fine for my more oily skin. It really helps reduce redness and fully clean skin. This is my go-to cleanser. I feel it will work on pretty much all skin types except extremely dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It is very gentle but throughly cleanses the skin. I have very dry and sensitive skin, but oily in the summer and this cleanser has worked for me year round. But I am giving it 4/5 stars because it is literally never in stock and I haven't been able to use it in months. I miss it, please come back:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever, i have seen such a difference since using this. I doubt I’ll ever switch to anything else. I have dry skin and this doesn’t dry it out more or make it feel oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honest review from a Sephora employee who bought this herself! I’ve been using this cleanser for about 4 months now and it beats all my other facial cleansers by far!! I used to use Clinique (dried me out), then Origins frothy face wash (dried me out) and First aid beauty (didn’t do much, didn’t feel clean enough), and nothing else compares to this. It’s such a simple face wash and the ingredients are great, but it doesn’t dry my out or make me oily, and my face feels so refreshed and clean afterwards. I’m currently using it morning and night and I look forward to using it every single time! Would definitely recommend for someone with acne prone combo skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had sampled this product from Sephora and had to come back to buy it! It cleans my face so well and leaves it balanced and not tight at all. One pump is all it takes so I hope this product lasts a while!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even though this is kind of expensive, I actually really like this basic cleanser- light, smells good, & feels good! I try not to splurge on face wash but i will probably incorporate this into my skincare routine as my am cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this is the best cleanser I have ever used. I have dry-combination skin. I used to get lots of fabicious filaments and whiteheads even with high-end products and this is what has helped me. My face is really clean and I haven't gotten any white heads since I started using this about 4 months ago.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way my skin feels after washing my face with this cleanser.  Also like the clean scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I've ever used!! My skin truly hasn't looked better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample and loved it...shelling out money for this cleanser which is really expensive compared to just buying derm-recommended drugstore brands like CeraVe was hard. It’s a lot of money for just soap, but it’s worth it. It’s gentle, makes my skin feel clean without stripping and drying it. It feels soft and nourished after, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high expectations but it really didn’t do anything special. It’s a nice face wash but didn’t do anything to help my acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it day and night for 6 months and I fell in love. I’m sad that it’s sold out at the moment because I’m completely out and my local Sephora is also sold out. THE ONLY ISSUE I had: it leaks. It makes a mess and it doesn’t matter if I clean up; by the next morning, I’d have green residue on my sink. Makes me wonder how much was wasted over the span of 6 months. The issue is with the bottle and not the cleanser so 5 stars :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love it it’s gentle and smells good too however I’m not a big fan of scents. I have the most dry skin ever and it’s also very sensitive. I’ve used almost every product from yttp line, so far so good. The only problem I’m dealing with this product is the packaging which sucks actually. I’ve purchased 8oz glass bottle and its pretty but the cleanser leaks from it’s pump :-/ and every time I use it I need to open it and squeeze back the rest of the cleanser from the pipe. I’m really  dissatisfied with that certainly So I guess I’m not gonna purchase it next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice cleanser, isn’t abrasive but can tell it’s cleaning my face. Works up a slight lather/foam but nothing crazy. I think it’s helped with my redness as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this feels as I massage it into my skin. It smells so good and it cleanses nicely. I’ve seen such a positive change in my skin, it looks clearer and more smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was a no go for my sensitive skin and eyes. The scent is pretty strong in my opinion. I returned it after a few uses. It was a good cleanser but the smell is way too much in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing and definitely really cleans your face. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good cleanser ! However, I wouldn't recommend this for anyone who struggles with acne because I don't think it helped with that specific problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product I have repurchased over and over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hyram suggested this cleanser so of course I wanted to love it! The smell is nice and it is gentle on sensitive skin, and it didn’t cause any redness after cleansing either. However I found that it left my skin feeling a bit tight. I won’t be purchasing again given the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this item. I would recommend this item to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: its good. makes skin reallynsoftband feels refreshing. not worth it for the size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i have tried sooo many different cleansers. this one is super gentle, yet extremely effective. does not irritate my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works so well, absolutely love it. It smells really good but isn’t sensitizing at all!

reviews.review_title: great if you want to splurge
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this, and didn't expect much. I don't care for kale as an ingredient, but love green tea. I have sensitive combo skin with rosacea and this cleanser was gentle enough to not cause any irritation, yet effective enough to make my skin feel super clean after without that dry, taut feeling. Not sure if I would splurge on the full-size version because it isn't a holy grail  product for me, but would be happy to buy it during a sale. Extra points for being Hyram approved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I know most people go through the breakouts stage during middle school or high school. I didnt. :/ mine happened on my 20s. I started to get breakouts , blackheads and texture. Especially around my cheeks and chin. I tried lots of cleansers (dermalogica,origins,khiels, laRochePosay), AHAs and clay masks and nothing would help. With covid19 and wearing masks got worst so I went to the dermatologist and she recommended retinol. The first month i wasnt seeing results from it because i know it takes a couple weeks to see results.. so i tried this by recommendations from hyram and let me tell you this is the best cleanser i have ever tried. I saw results the first 3 days. This and retinol have changed my skin completely. I highly recommend it+++++

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/oily skin and am sensitive to harsh products. I only wear BB cream and Clinique moisturizer, so not a heavy makeup wearer. I normally use CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser for Normal/Oily skin and it has been a godsend. However, I saw YTTP advertised and thought..hmm, this looks like it might be a cool new thing, I'll try it out. Wrong! This does nothing. I'd be better off washing my face with hand soap from the dollar store. It doesn't remove makeup, it doesn't foam or lather well, and my face gets oily hours after using it whereas it takes a full day with CeraVe. I could never recommend this for the price. Maybe if it was $5 and someone didn't wear any makeup at all? *Shrug* I don't get the hype. I'll stick with my $15 bottle of CeraVe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally do not spend so much money on a cleanser. My typical max is $25. I splurged on this one because I was curious about what all the hype was about & was impressed it was fragrance free. Now I LOVE this cleanser & can't live without it. Firstly, it smells so amazing and fresh. I don't know how to describe the scent - it smells like fresh lettuce straight from the garden. It smells 'green' in a good way, very natural and leaf-y. The cleanser removes eye makeup without causing any irritation in your eyes. It is so gentle on my skin - my skin was burned from an at-home chemical-peel gone-wrong - and was incredibly sensitive. This cleanser did not irritate or burn my skin at all. Despite being gentle, it has been effective on my sensitive-combination skin - no breakouts and a visible reduction in black heads.  I can't recommend this cleanser enough. I will be continuing to buy it, despite the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin stay away from this! Smells great but completely strips my skin of all moisture. Other than that it doesn’t irritate my skin or anything so is probably better for oily or combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a total waste of money. If you’re thinking about getting it you’re betting off buying something cheap from the drugstore. It does not wash eye makeup off, does not lather up well, and takes multiple washes to really clean your face. Also, the bottle is the worst!! The pump leaks and I’ve lost about a quarter of the bottle already from it leaking. The only reason I give this two stars instead of one is that it does not irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this is incredible, so clean and fresh. It's got great ingredients, and looks super aesthetically beautiful on your bathroom sink. However, if you've got dry skin, this may not be the one for you. I wouldn't say it stripped my skin too much, but it just didn't leave me skin looking as glowy and healthy as I like. I did notice an increase in dryness on my forehead and cheeks the few weeks I used this, and after going back to the Glossier Milky Jelly Cleanser, that issue went away. For oily skin folks, this would probably work great for you. It does a really good job at making your skin feel clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cleanser!! Perfect for my combination/oily skin!! Not overly stripping and definitely gets the job done with one quick wash for me, since I don't wear makeup daily (if you do, remember to cleanse with an oil cleanser THEN follow with this!!!). The only thing I hate is that it's ALWAYS sold out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from using some of my points and I’ve always wanted to try it. I suffer from hormonal acne around my chin and jaw line. While Spironlactone has helped with the cystic acne, I was left with “mascne”. I use a ton of other high end products, serums, moisturizers, etc that also help but since using this face wash, my blemishes have been noticeably better. I’m waiting for this product to come back in stock and then I’m gonna buy a full size bottle and really test it out and see if this was the cause for my acne to go away or if it was just my hormones once again lol  It’s very light, smooth, and just makes your skin feel good and clean. I definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite cleanser to date! I love this cleanser so much after trying the tester bottle I bought the 8oz the following week! It leaves my skin feeling clean but not dry, and its not harsh so I use it on my eyes to clean off any remnants of mascara my micellar water may have missed without any fears or burning! Whenever people ask me what cleanser I use I always recommend this one, I love it. Buy the tester you will not be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most amazing cleanser I've ever used! I've dealt with acne most my life and wow this is life changing! The only problem is that it is always sold out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a person who’s never had a consistent cleanser and now does since finding this one, I say give this one a try. If you like fresh, clean and lather well cleansers this one is for you. This scent is very light (it smells like apples to me) no strong fragrance smell. I highly recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! I bought this originally on sale and it's now a true staple for me. I have oily to combination skin and have never had a cleaner leave my skin feeling so refreshed. It never feels stripped and I noticed a difference almost immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser EVER! I’ve been using this religiously for a couple years now and no other cleanser compares. I have dry sensitive skin, and I always feel clean and not stripped afterwards!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and am prone to acne. This is a gentle, but good, cleanser! My skin was mostly smooth, with a few small acne bumps on my forehead that I struggled to get rid of, but adding this to my routine cleared up those small bumps in a couple of days! It doesn't have a strong scent to me, and I love that it comes in a small glass jar. I can buy the full size and reuse the small one for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product, however my skim doesn’t feel clean after using this cleanser and it’s also drying my skin out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this light face cleanser twice a day; morning and evening for a period of 6 month now, I have sense a difference in the minimization and appearance of fungal acne on my cheeks and forehead. My skin feels refreshed and clean every time I use it. It's safe on sensitive skin and the scent is very pleasant!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this cleanser. It feels so nice and soft on the skin and I love how it turns into a foam like texture when mixed with water. It smells amazing and leaves my skin feeling super soft and hydrated after each use. What I love is that this doesn’t strip my skin like a lot of cleansers tend to. Definitely my new favourite cleanser and would recommend it to anyone looking to try a new one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser but it is a JOKE how much of it leaks through the top over the course of a day.  How can you charge this price and then have a packaging mishap as bad as this? I literally hadn't even realized until I saw it with my owns.  It leaks right out the top all day everyday.  Definitely not rebuying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great Cleanser. Leaves a fresh feeling. Absolutely no breakouts after it. Thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser! My new favorite. It smells healthy and my skin doesn't feel stripped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was just ok as far as cleansers go. It actually irritates my skin immediately after using each time. I’m not a fan of the smell either. There are definitely better cleansers on the market and for cheaper.

reviews.review_title: Perfect cleanser for my skincare regimen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this cleanser about 8 months ago and I'm never looking back. My skin tends to be dry and somewhat acne-prone, but my face feels so clean and fresh after using this. It's not the end-all be-all miracle product -- a cleanser alone isn't going to fix all your skin problems, but in conjunction with some other products, the YTP Superfood Cleanser has helped clear up and brighten my skin. It has a permanent place in my skincare lineup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did nothing for my acne . I bought this cleanser because people where saying it has really good ingredients and I thought I should try it out. I’ve been using it for a few months now and it does nothing for my pores. But the only thing good about it is that it smells good

reviews.review_title: All the great reviews are right
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really amazing cleanser. Been using it for about 2 weeks and I can already see a difference. I feel like I have had barely any new blemishes. I use it twice a day! It s expensive but worth the price in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite face wash! I love how it lathers and leaves such a clean feeling on my face. It also feel refreshing and leaves my face feeling supple (no tightness or dryness). It smells great and I love that this is a clean line. I definitely recommend YTTP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin can not live without this magical cleanser. It is so fresh, the perfect consistency, and feels so nice on my skin. If I could only use one product for the rest of my life, it would be this. Thanks YTTP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It says it’s for dry skin but I found it too stripping. If you have very dry skin, this is not the product for you. Go for CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because of all the hype behind it and unfortunately was so disappointed. This stuff dried my skin right out. After 3 days of use my skin was so dry that it was flaking. After switching back to my previous cleanser my skin went back to normal.

One of the best face cleansers I’ve tried. It’s expensive, but I really enjoy it. My boyfriend swears by this cleanser and refused to try other ones now so I have to continue buying! He has oily acne prone skin, I have combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got a sample of this product and after a few uses I can honestly say that I love it! I've used it as a second cleanse and as a standalone. Both methods resulted in soft and clean skin that wasn't overly stripped! The consistency is nice, allowing for easy product distribution and it lathers to the perfect amount of foam!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this cleanser. In my opinion, it can't get any better than this. It literally feels like my makeup is melting off my skin when I rub it in to create a lather. However, it doesn't work too much into a lather, not a foamy cleanser at all but it works like a foamy cleanser. Gets rid of all the days' grime.  One thing is that I've noticed I have to use a little bit more product than other cleansers I've tried. Prior to, I was using Drunk Elephant Beste No.9 Jelly Cleanser, where I only needed to use a dime sized amount of product. With this cleanser (YTTP), I need to use a little bit more than a toonie sized amount of product which is fine but I'm worried I'm going to run out faster!  Regardless, this cleanser works wonders. I havent broke out since I started using it, and it truly is a deep cleansing yet gentle cleanser! Worth every dollar!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The most amazing gentle face wash. I always broke out with all my previous ones, I’m guessing they were too irritating. This one is my holy grail!! Also love the ingredient list!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I discovered this product watching Skincare by Hyram on YouTube. This has done wonders for my skin. I used to use the Drunk Elephant cleanser which really helped clear my skin, but this has taken it a step further. I rarely get breakouts and my skin is so smooth after I use it. It also smells really good. I highly suggest you try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in my 30's and I have really sensitive skin that very rarely breaks out, and I don't wear makeup.  I've been using oil cleanser with water cleanser (double cleanse) and it was drying up my face so much.  Water cleanser alone wouldn't get the SPF off.  But this works perfectly for both!  It gets the SPF off and gently cleanses the skin and I'm left with a clear, smooth face that doesn't feel tight at all.  I will definitely be buying this again, it's taken a couple years to land on something that would work so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazingly clean face and very nice smell. My face never looked better using this product. I am hooked on this and will buy more when it becomes available again. Thankful the glass bottle I have now. It doesn’t take much product but the results are great. A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i am in LOVE and i will never go back to a different cleanser! i am extremely oily & acne prone so trying new things is terrifying as most makes me break out, but my skin has improved dramatically w this cleanser. the greens help w redness & inflammation. it definitely cleans thoroughly but doesn’t strip the skin. it seems expensive but a very little bit is all you need, it goes a long way!!!!! the recyclable packaging is an added bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really loved this as my morning cleanser for awhile until i realized it was causing my breakouts.  there is absorbic acid (vitamin c) added which i didn’t notice until after i checked the ingredients which can cause breakouts for some but is good for others. a lot of our skin naturally produces enough vitamins (like C/E) already, so when we add more on top it can throw the balance off, causing breakouts.  just something to be aware of with skincare. depends on your skin type!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this cleanser but it’s always sold out bc of hyram lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle yet effective cleanser, at a very affordable price! I’m impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff!  I finally found a cleanser that doesnt irritate my sensitive skin and that calms my rosacea.  I bought a travel size a long time ago but didn't start using it until last week  and now in find its sold out...so sad :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never written a review before on anything, but this is the best cleanser I’ve ever used. I’ve been struggling with acne on my cheeks and around the sides of my nose since I’ve stopped taking birth control a year ago. From pimples, to cystic acne underneath the skin, I wasn’t sure what to do. I tried a lot of products and treatments (cerave, avene, la Roche posay, neostrata, cetaphil, Murad, dermalogica, drunk elephant, the list goes on). Now saying that, I gave each new product I used a month to see the results. Cerave seemed to be the line that kept everything at bay, but no great results (lots of bumps on top and underneath skin). I have combination, acne prone, and sensitive skin. Once I tried this cleanser in their mini pack, I will not go back. Within a week of use I was seeing results. My skin is now healing and my acne is almost all gone. I was quite surprised about how well this cleanser worked. It’s gentle and cleans the skin without over stripping it. I also use this with the superfood air-whip moisture cream. I can confidently recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so gentle and refreshing. I love to use it as a daily cleanser! Luckily purchased before it got sold out, but definitely makes sense why it is sold out! The travel size also lasts for a bit, and personally think this is worth it. I have sensitive skin and this cleanser is one of the few that my skin reacts well to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time purchasing this cleanser! I love it! It perfect for my oily skin in the summer and although it is a bit pricey for me but there is so much product so it goes a long way. And I love how it comes with a pump, so convenient! The glass packaging made it environmentally sustainable and is a bonus. Would definitely recommend if you have a normal to oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so good and fresh like a green juice! Leaves your skin really soft and soothed plus it really seems like my skin has less post inflammation hyperpigmentation in the morning after using this at night. Expensive but honestly worth it to me. It’s my favorite part of my skincare routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looked forward to using this product I purchased the whole line. After 3 days of use my face looked like a pizza with hard red unpopable bumps that were so extremely painful. I stopped using the products and thought they just didn't work for me and gave them to my 14yr old son. The same thing happened to him so these will be going into the trash. I have not had bumps like that since high school so I was very shocked and highly disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is really great for humid weather when I’ve been sweating all day. Probably won’t use this is drier/ colder weather. I thought I was going through it really quickly with a pump a day, but it turns out my BF was using it as hand soap since it wasn’t in the shower (out of my fear of dropping glass). He said it made his hands very soft. Since I found out, it’s been lasting quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Solid everyday cleanser. I use this in the morning and at night to follow up removing my makeup. Gentle and does the job. Nothing insanely special but happy none the less

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and although this works great in my oiler spots (t-zone, under eyes etc), this dries out massively the other parts of my face. From what I heard, although this was a foaming cleanser, it was gentle enough for drier skin but it is not for me. After I use this I get that super dry, crapey feeling on my chin and cheeks and it is not pleasant, only to be relieved by toner, serum and moisturizer. No allergy to the artificial scent (but it is there), if you have oily skin this may be a new fav but not for me. Will be finishing but not repurchasing. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE BEST cleanser ever !! I have combination skin and i was suffering from really bad acne on my cheeks,chin, jaw etc and this literally saved my skin. I started out with a free sample I recieved and I replaced my usual cleanser with it and within a few days my skin was getting so much better !! It always feels so soft and refreshed after using this cleamser and it keeps the oilyness away. Definitely a staple in my skincare routine now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve got the oiliest skin possible...I have been through cleanser after cleanser and I finally broke down after watching so many reviews on this cleanser. Broke down and bought it and THANK YOU JESUS FOR THIS STUFF!! I’ll never change, it’s literally changed my skin-hydrated, less oily by far (I do use a oil cleanser before this cleanser)  but my god just put it in your cart and buy it now. You won’t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I’ve ever used! It had quickly reached holy grail status. Makes my skin feel amazing! It’s a gentle cleanser that doesn’t leave me feeling dried out. I love this stuff so much and can not recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging and how it feels when it’s leathered up, but I started to get pimples after started using it. It leave a film like residue after wash and i need to use a cotton pad with toner to wipe it off. I wouldn’t say it’s a horrible product but feel like it’s not money worthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, mainly oily and dry around my nose. This cleanser left me clean enough to know  the nasty greasy thangs left my face, but did not leave my ashy nose dry. It has the same texture as the neutrogena oil-feee acne wash, but that demon made me break out. To all my oily homegirls, you will love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this cleanser! This was just what I've been looking for. A clean cleanser. and the antioxidants are a plus. I ran out and I had to buy another one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love so much about this cleanser but it doesn't love me back. Ingredients are lovely, no strong fragrance, easy to use with a cleansing device, but left my skin feeling tight and dry, and a little burning around my eyes - but my skin is very sensitive and annoying. give this cleanser a shot!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First strip my skin like other cleansers and leaves it feeling clean and soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is a good deep cleanse for normal to oily skin, it was a bit drying for my dry skin but its still very good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser got my attention because of all the great clean ingredients. People raved and I decided to splurge and buy, unfortunately for me it didn’t work out. I have normal to dry skin, after using this I would feel stripped and dryer than usual. I feel like this would be a good cleanser for oily skinned people. One thing I do appreciate about this cleanser is that it didn’t break me out. Overall I don’t think its worth the price but it might be for someone else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth the hype. Left my skin feeling clean and refreshed. Only down side it’s the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone, sensitive, aging skin. Life is strange when you suffer with both acne, and wrinkles, but I have found that this product works well on my skin. I mainly use Meisler water to clean my face since my face is so dry! But when I do uses a face wash this is my go to. It dose not dry my out, or irritated my skin. It cleans my skin very well. I love the packaging, but what I love most about this product is that it is cruelty free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser... one of my favorites ♥️ Thing is, my skin is oily but it is a little drying so I use a little with a lot of water.  Keeps skin smooth & clean, also smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perhaps the best cleanser I’ve ever used !! Personally, i have oily to combination skin and this cleanser seems to be the only one that refreshes my skin without drying it out. The only reason I give it a 4 star is because over time the pump to the bottom begins to leak and there goes the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells good, it makes the face soo clean. I feel it every time.

reviews.review_title: not with the money - badly designed bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes no sense for a product at this size to have such a finicky pump. You have to set up the pump yourself and I still haven’t been able to do it. They say you need to push down and twist but there’s nothing to grip on to. Super irritating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this works well for my normal skin type. I was looking for something green/clean with a good fresh smell that i can tolerate - especially in the morning.  i double cleanse mostly, but when i was lazy and didnt do an oil cleanser first i couldnt get my eyeliner off with just one wash. since i dc its not a negative for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to get this cleanser but after maybe 2 or 3 washes I got all these small bumps all over my forehead and chin. I immediately went back to my Kate Somerville Exfolikate and after one wash I began seeing the bumps calm down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I used to think that the stripped tight face feel was how a clean health face felt, ITS NOT LOL. This cleanser is gentle and doesn’t strip the oils out of my face. I have combination skin, typically significantly oily in the t-zone. I have gone through three 8 oz bottles of this and i will continue to rebuy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve used! It’s super gentle yet effective and doesn’t strip my skin. I do feel like after cleansing with it my skin is so soft and glowy! Which I do enjoy! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I’ve made it past the age of 30 my new friend fine lines is starting to show. I die a little everyday when I see it. Imagine my pure joy after using this cleanser once and my face looks refreshed, smooth and firm. I looked at myself in the mirror for 5 minutes to make sure I was seeing things. I had to immediately write a review at midnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a lightweight, non-abrasive face cleanser I recommend this 100%. I have combination acne prone skin and using this in the morning and evening has made a significant difference. It also helps that it is very reasonably priced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special. Didn’t do anything to my face. Wouldn’t buy again.

reviews.review_title: brought my face back to life!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After having drab skin for over a month, I finally bought this. My skin has cleared up tons since I started using this- I don’t have acne per say but my clogged pores have decreased and there seems to be a vibrancy that has returned to my skin. Love this stuff   This with the sleeping mask by YTTP is a great pair.

reviews.review_title: the perfect size & amount for trying a cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: one of my favorite cleansers out there! if you’re on the fence about trying this cleanser it’s so worth it to purchase this instead of the full size first!! you honestly get a great amount for the price. i love this brand so much! everything i’ve tried has been amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product feels super nice on my skin, it cleans it without it feeling stripped and I feel refreshed after using it. It’s definitely worth the price in my opinion

reviews.review_title: who would think I'd like Kale??
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: my new go to cleanser.  i received the big bottle on Friday.  love I can recycle the bottle into a hand soap dispenser.  oily skin at 48 is a blessing (no wrinkles) and a curse...blackheads and whiteheads oh my!!  my face feels so clean and healthy but not over striped.  it drank in all thst Kale, green tea and Spinach.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for several months now and it's been great. It's doesn't make my face feel dry or oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a fresh summer meadow, but in a natural and not overly perfumey way. Just a little bit foams up into a nice lather which leaves my skin clean but not dried out. It's a pleasure to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the cleanser isn’t anything special. after using it it makes my face feel dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the best universal skin cleanser I’ve used.  The ingredient list is bomb, and makes my skin feel and look amazing. Absolutely worth the cost!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot stress enough how much I love this cleanser. This product really does work so well. And it leaves your skin feeling so fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have sensitive skin I highly recommend getting this ! Someone recommended it to me for my acne scarring, I'm not sure that it did anything for me, but it did not break me out which a lot of cleansers do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got it and The box is not sealed.. I opened up the bottle to put the pump.. it’s not sealed either  Now I’m scared should I use it or not!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is GOOD!! I’ve had kind of a face wash funk the past few months not loving what I had been using. Nothing truly felt like it got my makeup off well. I got a trial size of this and I was amazedddd. It gets makeup off beneath the surface level and leaves the skin hydrated, clean, and supple. I’m on accutane and it’s gentle enough to not dry me out or cause any dryness. Seriously recommend this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Your fresh feels so fresh and clean after. Also got the amount of product you use, it gives you a lot. 1-2 pumps give a lot of suds to clean your face! Amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ......Refreshing....addictive face wash in shower. A pleasure to use, I wish this was available as a rich shower gel too, Love it lots!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love. Works well and is gentle. I love how calming it is and what it does for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try the superfood cleanser because of the (over)hype and packaging, but it really disappointed me. I have sensitive, acne-prone skin that is combination but tends to be oily. Without altering other products in my routine, this cleanser completely stripped my skin immediately upon rinsing it off so that it felt tight and dry to the touch. I'm glad that I only bought the small size, because I had to give it away and buy a much gentler (and cheaper!) cleanser. I am not sure if it was the cocamidopropyl betaine in this cleanser to which I was sensitive, but regardless, their overall formula was way too harsh for my skin.

reviews.review_title: Very stripping, buy small size to test first
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Due to all of the (over)hype, I was excited to try the superfood cleanser because it had nice packaging, ingredients, and said it was for sensitive skin. It dried my skin out immediately after washing. I hadn't changed anything else in my routine, so I know it was this cleanser. For how stripping and harsh it was, it didn't even cleanse my skin. I'm glad I only bought the travel size because I had to give it away and switched to a much gentler (and cheaper!) cleanser. While I'm not positive, my skin may have been sensitive to the cocamidopropyl betaine in this cleanser, but regardless, this specific formula is way too harsh for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well. Deeply cleans, but doesn't dry out your skin whatsoever. I just wish it wasn't so pricey.

reviews.review_title: Not great. Didnt hurt to try.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im giving a 2 star rating because Honestly this product didnt really do anything for me. But also it didnt damage my kin. You dont feel that clean after using this product. I felt residue still on my skin even after washing my face with this product twice. Very lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a part of a set with 4 other minis. Disappointed. It’s not gel like at all it’s pretty watery if you ask me. This left a lot of residue on my skin that my cotton pad picked up after toning. Usually don’t have that problem after double cleansing with what I already use so stuck to using it only in the mornings. Also left my skin feeling very tight and dry... And felt some burning on my cheeks when toning I have an oily T but dry cheeks so I think this stuff just dried them too much after only 3 days of using it. I have discontinued use and once my cheeks feel normal again will continue to try the rest of the products. This is overhyped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells incredibly fresh and clean, kind of like walking into one of those super healthy juice stores.   As for the cleansing power itself, definitely more for normal to oily skin types but the good thing is that it doesnt leave you feeling overly stripped of moisture or that your skin is gonna crack if you smile. Still should always follow up with serums and moisturizers but this has been my go to for almost a year now.

reviews.review_title: I found my favorite cleanser ever!! A MUST HAVE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best cleanser I've ever tried. I love the soft consistency and it feels incredibly gentle on my skin. It removes ALL of my makeup which I felt other cleansers didn't do a good job of. I'm so happy I found a cleanser that is also not harsh for my dry and flaky skin but can also remove all the dirt/makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping I wouldn’t like this product as much but omg, its amazing. Although its a wash off kind of product, it really leaves my skin feeling amazing and helps it keep acne free. I am definitely going to be repurchasing. It works wonders for my skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin doesn’t feel dry or tight after cleansing. I am free to go without makeup since my skin is clear of redness (sensitive skin) will continue to buy this product

reviews.review_title: Maybe intended for people with oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is normal/combination and not too fussy with products. This cleanser was good when I received a sample and decided to buy a full bottle. Unfortunately, after a few days, I noticed my skin started breaking out and feels dry/tight even after my usual creamy moisturizer. I didn’t remember when was the last time I got acne, but this may have stripped the oil off my skin a bit too much. Perhaps would work better for people with very oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the BEST cleanser. It removes makeup and also smells amazing. Any time my girlfriends spend the night, I make them try this product and they all use it now too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with hormonal acne that I just can’t seem to shake for the life of me. I have tried so many top of the line cleansers/skin care lines, (paulas choice, proactive, etc etc) and none of them have helped the way this cleanser has. You see results after the first use and it’s all natural?? I’ll be purchasing again. Praying they don’t discontinue/change the ingredients like most companies do... truly a holy grail.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a must for me! It's mild and doesn't dry me out, but cleanses really well keeping my skin clean and clear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. I have tried a lot of cleansers and every single one of them burned my sensitive skin, but not this one! I think I'll be buying this forever. Also, I don't have to use a toner with it which makes it 2000x better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GREAT FOR VERY SENSITIVE SKIN I HAVE VERY SENSTITIVE SKIN works great. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Any time I use a new product I expect it to break me out, but I gave this a solid 2 weeks and it broke me out more and more each day without fail. Might work for somebody with tougher skin, but I would not recommend for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

But then I used this, no matter what I use after I wash my face, it always gets a little flushed (I have sensitive skin). This product doesn’t! I couldn’t believe it. This leaves my face feeling incredibly clean without feeling stripped of my natural oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m now onto my third bottle of this stuff and it definitely makes me skin feel so clean and not stripped after a double cleanse w a cleansing balm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this due to frequent mask wearing and recent breakouts. Would recommend to try a small sample size first as it worked fine for me, but caused my boyfriend's skin to breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how my skin feels after cleansing with this. One star was docked because it does not remove eye makeup (mascara and eyeliner) even after two rounds of cleansing. I would buy this again despite it not removing eye makeup because my skin feels perfectly balanced compared to Drunk Elephant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my holy grail cleanser for my sensitive, acne-prone skin! Whenever I try to use another cleanser I always come back to this one because my skin loves it so much. I use it morning and night and it helps keep my skin clear and healthy. It’s not foamy and doesn’t feel too thick, and the smell doesn’t bother me at all. Definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dried out my combination skin too much. Product smells nice and has a nice consistency though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a small collection of high end face washes....I’m kind of addicted to skin care products. This is my very favorite! It removes my first step oil cleanser, but it doesn’t strip off the benefits of the oil. My skin is soft and dewy....a gift for my 59 year old skin. Love the natural “green” smell too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cleans the perfect amount. Fragrance free as well! LOVE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cleans the perfect amount. Fragrance free as well! LOVE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but I really don't.  It's an ok cleanser.  It's very liquidy, doesn't have much foam when you use it and it's drying on my skin.  I have normal to dry skin so maybe this would work well for someone with oily skin but I found it too drying for me.  The smell is nice and I like the ethos of the brand, as well as the glass bottle, but I wasn't impressed with the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser works well for my skin. It doesn’t make my skin feel dry after using it which happens to some of the other types of facial cleansers. Strongly recommend this product to those who have sensitive/dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect summer face wash for my balanced skin. Skin feels clean after using, but not tight or dry, although I do suspect it may be slightly drying in the winter. Has a light, pleasant vegetal scent.

reviews.review_title: I’m a believer take me to church
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously obsessed! I am a true believer of this product and what it stands for. I have sensitive skin and this cleanser does not strip my skin and another plus point it is gentle and the smell is not annoying. Very faint smell and it cleans my eye make up easily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle, feels fresh and amazing. Tired dupes to save money but this is the best. I’ll probably stock up in the next sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleansers for about 5 months now and I love it! I have combination skin and in the summer my t-zone gets very oily before the afternoon. I kept switching my moisturizers and serums thinking they were causing my skin to become more oily than normal. I switched to this cleanse and noticed my skin isn’t oily in my t-zone area by the afternoon!! 4 stars because it is on the pricey side!

reviews.review_title: Overall, good but a little doesn't go a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews, but I thought this product was worth doing so. I have combo skin. This cleanser doesn't strip your skin, leaving it clean and soft. I did noticed that a little doesn't go a long way. I would give two pumps to get a good lather. I wouldn't have known the difference if I didn't try the Krave Matcha Hemp Hydrating Cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this out after hearing the hype and honestly, I get it! It feels great when applying and my face feels clean but not excessively dry. Definitely making this part of my usual skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try this in one of the Favorites bags. I didn't know that I needed a new cleanser until trying YTTP. I'm obsessed! This is by far the best everyday cleanser I've had and I will be a continuous customer unless something else comes along that is better(doubtful). The smell is not my favorite, but I don't expect roses or chemical fragrances in something labeled like this. The health food scent is not strong and it doesn't stay on you so that's far from a negative. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted it to work for me but I think my skin is too sensitive. Feels like I'm using dish soap on my face and started breaking out. RIP

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a free mini bottle of this and used it for about a week. I didn't notice any difference in my skin compared to my normal Aveeno cleanser, and the latter is much cheaper so I don't think this is worth the price.   I did love that a little goes a long way, so if you're on the fence, get the mini and check it out--it'll last longer than most samples!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have really, really oily skin, and this removed the excess oils without stripping my skin, but I imagine it could be stripping for drier skin types. It also helped to reduce redness. I took a star off because it did make my skin purge for the first few weeks of using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fresh, light, clean. I really love this cleanser. I use it night and day, and have noticed my skin is more balanced and calm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this product as it had so many good reviews and the fact that it’s a “clean” product. However, after a month+ of using it I noticed I started to breakout all over my face. As soon as I stopped using it and started using my Kihels face cleanser my breakout went away. I don’t have sensitive skin either so something in the YTP cleanser didn’t agree with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice and cleans/foams up well, without stripping my face. need a bit more of this product to get the job done than others, but it works so. A little overpriced though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cleanser as a sample and I got in love, so I ordered the regular size, very happy with it. Takes away even makeup.

reviews.review_title: Best Make Up Remover I’ve Ever Had
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even when going thick with the make up, one or two small pumps takes it all off. Your skin feels clean after using this. Lathers very easily, and you shouldn’t ever need a lot. If I have one problem with it, it’s the smell. Reminds me of blowing bubbles, like the ones from most of our childhoods? Lol. It doesn’t linger after rinsing it off though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that leans toward the oily side during warmer, humid months. I really like this cleanser because it balances my skin - it absorbs oil from my T-zone and manages to not overstrip my drier, eczema tinged cheeks. It's pricer than the drugstore cleansers I used to shuffle through, but to me, it is worth the price because it doesn't leave my skin feeling tight and dry (though if price is a concern, the CeraVe foaming face cleanser is the most similar product I've encountered). The 8 oz YTTP bottle also lasts a while. I've been using it morning and night for about a month and I'm a third of the way through the bottle.

reviews.review_title: Nice but NOT for dry skin types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first time used it left my skin feeling super clean but not dry and soft. Unfortunately, the second time used it left me with dry, irritated skin. I think this cleanser is best only for oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea why I didn’t write this sooner. I’ve been using this product for about a whole year now and as long as the formula stays the same it will forever be my cleanser. I have had problem skin my entire life and this cleanser is the #1 reason for improvement. My esthetician has told me to never stop using it and I feel so confident even without makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great for anyone with oily, sensitive, and acne prone skin. The green tea and spinach vitamins help balance the skin wow the keto helps with acne or blemishes on the face. It definitely changed my skin care game. It took my skin to sensitive eczema prone and acne covered to cleared and less oily. I love this product so much and would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using this has improved my skin so much. It does not leave it feeling dry, but it certainly feels clean and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent cleanser - works even better when you follow the instructions and run it on your hands first to create a lather instead of putting the gel on your face directly. Maybe the lather helps activate the ingredients? Not sure - either way, great cleanser really happy with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a little bit to adjust to this cleanser but now that I have I am in love. It has really helped balance my skin and I haven’t been breaking out as much as I used to. It does not remove makeup.
