reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Took a week or so to realize my skin was not happy with this stuff. “Natural fragrance” was probably the irritant that made my face bumpy

This stuff is amazingg!! The most amazing cleanser that I have ever bought!!!! It strips your skin and leaves it squeaky clean if that’s what you’re looking for then go for it! Other than that, if you do not want your skin squeaky clean then that would not be a good match for you.  However note that it does NOT strip your skin from your face so it won’t cause any irritations from the “squeaky” clean feeling.  All in all great product, BUT THE RESTOCK OF THE BIGGER BOTTLES IS VERY SLOWWWW!!! I’ve been waiting on the bigger bottles to be restocked but it hasn’t happened yet not online nor in the stores around which is pretty disappointing to have to buy the minis all the time..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really dry, sensitive skin, acne prone.  I use this cleanser every morning and my skin has been clear and balanced! It’s light and gentle enough, has a great smell, and has now replaced every other cleanser I’ve used!

reviews.review_title: Not that great (hyram fans listen up)
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, not great. By chance if you’re here from skincare by Hyram then you’re probably as pumped about potentially purchasing this as I was. I have combo-dry skin and since it’s a gentle/light cleanser, I thought it would be good. But it made my skin SO dry - didn’t help with any bumps on my forehead and didn’t feel it clean my face well (not in the stripping sense just legit the bare minimum). I used 3/4 of the bottle too.   The positives are that the ingredients are great and the packaging is awesome. It just didn’t work for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product! I had really bad acne breakouts for unknown causes and this tamed down the redness and diminished the active breakouts in just a week ! It also made my face feel super clean without the over drying feeling! Highly recommend (:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is great. Not harsh and still leaves your face feeling so clean. I double cleanse so not sure about it removing makeup. A lot of products break me out, but this face wash doesn’t!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so hydrating and gentle yet effective and very cleansing. I have dry skin so a gel cleanser scared me but after trying the mini I was hooked.

reviews.review_title: an easy go-to, so fresh and so clean.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No matter how many clean cleansers I've explored, I always come back to this one and this stuff solidified my trust in Youth To The People.   It is the only no muss, no fuss cleanser I've found that always leaves my skin feeling deeply clean, fresh, and replenished, without being stripped and slightly softer than before I washed it. It's gentle, lightweight, and the smell is subtle.   Best of all, a little goes a long way. I initially bought the mini because I didn't want to overpay and quickly, I was surprised by how much lather I could get out of just a droplet. While I wouldn't call this anything miraculous, it's consistently reliable and does what it says it does.   That's miracle enough for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever!! It cleared up the random pimples that kept reappearing and made my skin glow. Love the clean ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell of this cleanser! Also gentle on the skin and a great buy for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is the best I used at least once a day and is good for my skin...my skin is so sensitive that even that brands that said are approved by the eczema dermatologist etc makes my skim super irritated I not only have dry skin but also dermatitis and this cleanser is gentle on my skin and doesn’t leave it too dry of course I always moisturize after every use.So I would say this one is probably really good on oily skins .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing. I have combination, acne-prone skin, I have been using it for almost two weeks. This face wash has cleared up almost all of my breakouts without overly drying my skin. It is also super gentle on the skin, smells great, and comes in eco-friendly glass packaging which is a huge plus in my book.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i wanted to love this way more especially with how many skincare youtubers love this cleanser. but for me this kinda broke me out and left my skin a little dry. my mom is finishing it off bc i jus couldnt n she rlly likes it and she has an oiler skin type. but in general i have a hard time with water based cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like so much this cleanser, it make my skin feel clean but not dry, I get the mini to try it and I’m definitely getting the full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. I try many cleanser but didn’t work out, until I started using this one by HYRAM’s recommendation and it help my skin a lot.  It does not irritate me and didn’t strip my skin, since I have combined skin more Oily than dry it help to reduce my oiliness and hydrate my dry parts.. love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I’ve been using it for about two months now and I’m very impressed. It doesn’t make my skin feel stripped, just soft and clean. And it does a great job of taking my makeup off. Will definitely repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so heartbroken to see that this cleanser didn't work out. I have sensitive skin and rosacea so I should've seen it coming. It did feel pretty nice on the skin but that same day, I got two little bumps on one side of my face. On that same side, my skin got extremely irritated the next day. I guess it just wasn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin feel so refreshed, and clean! It also smells amazing. Its also very gentle, so it's perfect if you have sensitive skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. I love the scent and it made my combination  type face nice and clean without completely drying it. I HATE the pump though because there was always a puddle of product spilling out of it. The remedy is to NOT use the pump and just pour it into your hands. Or I wish the company would just get a new pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is soooo good. My face feels so clean after and it cleared up most of my acne. I actually look forward to washing my face with this cleanser. I gave it 4 stars because this thing has not been in stock for a while now. So now that I’m almost out of this product what am I suppose to use? Guess I’ll go back to the drunk elephant jelly cleanser. I find that it works similar and atleast it’s always in stock

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I’ve tried a lot of cleansers and this one by far has calmed down my redness. It leaves my skin feeling so smooth and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser! Not overly stripping, extremely refreshing and leaves my skin feeling so clean. For a while I was only able to get sample/travel sizes and was so thrilled to see the pump size available. Only reason for 4 stars is the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product cleared up all my acne and almost got rid of all my blackheads.  It is a bit drying on my combination skin, I just try to not use it everyday and use a lighter face wash on the off days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice well rounded cleanser. Didn’t leave my face feeling dry, but left me with a nice “clean” feeling! The only complaint I have is that I lost a LOT of product via the pump that is included in the package. Every time I came to the bathroom there was a puddle of product that had dripped out. Good product, bad pump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the absolute worst cleansers I have ever used. I have combination skin (more oily during the summer months) and this dried my skin out so bad it peeled. I used it less than a week. Don’t waste your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t waste the money. Plenty of other drugstore face washes available that will do way more for far less money. Watery consistency and did nothing for my skin. I think this caused a breakout . Do not recommend .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best cleanser i have used for oily skin! i usually wake up w/ a very oily face but when i use this product that rarely occurs! 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for combo skin! During the first week, my skin felt tiny bit dry after using this cleanser, but after my skin got used to this product, it just got perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great cleanser!! It got rid of my textured skin, especially around my cheeks. I love this cleanser so much it makes my face feel so clean and refreshing yet it’s not over stripping my face. I think everyone will love this product as much as i do!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great cleanser that removes makeup after a long day. It’s the right consistency and lathers beautifully. Doesn’t irritate my eczema prone face. The smell is very subtle also. Great packaging also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this cleanser but I don’t think it’s quite worth the price. If it wasn’t so expensive I would definitely be repurchasing. It also doesn’t work to remove makeup great if that is what you are hoping to use it for. Was awesome for my skin though. Very gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it dried out my skin and I started to breakout, sadly not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It makes me skin really clear! Only downside is it does dry my face out a bit but I still love it I’ll keep using it! Smells good and makes me face smooth even without using a scrubber!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combined skin and it has been perfect. Doesn’t dry my face nor leaves it oily. Also, I’ve been using it daily since December 2019 and I still have a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cleanser! At first I was skeptical because I do have sensitive skin so I didn’t want something that would have a negative effect. This cleanser did not turn my face red after first like the other ones. It leaves my skin smooth and looking very clean. The best cleanser I ever used. I will never stop using this cleanser it gives me the clean feeling & look I’ve always wanted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good cleanser. It is not harsh on the skin at all and leaves the skin feeling really soft after every use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a gentle cleanser, this is one of my favorites and even though it does contain fragrance, I'm obsessed with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I have ever bought. Clean my face without feeling dry and tight. It has subtle fresh fragrance. Cleanser comes with pump separate and seal, so no leak at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Also recommended by skincare by hyram so :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried that this wouldn’t work for me but I absolutely LOVE it. After the first use my skin felt so soft and really did feel clean. I would highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. Gentle on skin for daily use and does it’s job perfectly. Foams up and skin feels smooth refreshed Nd cleansed right after. Would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: YTTP listened to the pump issue - maybe the product design change hasnt caught up with all the stores yet? but no more wasted product :) beautiful glass container that doesn't strip too much away, and feels so good to wash your face after a long day out. if you're in LA, you can return clean and dry empties to TARE for $2 off of YTTP products that they carry in stock, and the packaging will go back to YTTP (i think!). great initiative and looking forward to an expanded program!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so this cleanser dosent clear my acne but when paired with the toner it is bomb and the thing about it is that when you wash your face if dosent feel stripped it just feels clean and my oily skin is less oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these products but I can't give it 5 stars because the pump leaks! I've had 2 bottles and both leaked. I may have lost at over a quarter of the product through leakage.  I'm waiting for the refill size to come back in stock since it doesn't have a pump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great gentle cleanser only giving 4 stars because not a big fan of the fragrance. It doesn’t bother my skin even tho i tend to breakout from fragrance i think it’s just a weird smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this product out since it had glowing reviews. I'm someone who wakes up with dry skin and throughout the day my skin gets very oily. Yet, this cleanser completely dries my skin out. However, I can really feel like my face is clean after using this product, so it does the trick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the cleanser did a great job as my second cleanse. The smell is nice and clean. I didn’t like that the cleanser was very runny and thin. But, I could love with it. I will not be repurchasing because I bought an 8oz bottle and half of the product leaked out through the faulty pump. The bottle was sitting straight up, and cleanser was constantly dripping out in large amounts. It was a waste of product and money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good and the dispenser is cute.  Won't buy again.  Don't feel like it was worth the price or the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’m on my second bottle of this cleanser and I love it. Cleans my skin very well and doesn’t dry me out at all. I have sensitive acne prone skin and this does not break me out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin does really well with soapy cleanser in the summer season in S.Florida. However, I found this cleanser to be a bit drying. I had to moisturizer more than usual and with a heavier moisturizer vs. my lighter ones I use during summer months.  This gives you a deep clean and I wouldnow only use it once a week with my clarasonic.     Any more than that would just be to much. I don't think I will purchase this again. I am really grateful that I chose to purchase the 2oz for a trial over the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great cleanser that never leaves your skin feeling stripped or dry at all. Even my blackheads weren’t as apparent in my nose which is really impressive. I would totally recommend the full size, specially for the price and the amount of product you’re getting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It does a great job removing both face and eye makeup. I have sensitive skin on the dryer side and I find this dries out my skin a bit. It has a nice light scent and a little goes a long way. However, I haven’t noticed much improvement in my skin texture or clarity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my fav cleanser ever. Literally feels like my skin is drinking it! Worth the $$ for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went in feeling doubtful since I have sensitive skin that has broken out with everything I’ve tried. But this turned out to be the real deal. It’s been two weeks and my skin has improved beyond my hopes. Not only has this prevented any acne, it’s also helped with issues I’d accepted as a permanent part of my skin. The large pores on my face have reduced in size. And the blackheads on my nose are nearly gone for the first time. New skincare must.

reviews.review_title: Stop reading reviews & buy this cleanser!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best cleanser I have gotten my hands on. It’s very gentle yet so effective. The first time I used it I saw immediate results - my skin was so much brighter, my acne shrunk in size, most of the redness on my face disappeared and it’s not drying whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Due to the times I've been wearing a mask and have started to get horrible maskne.  So I started adding some new acne treatments to my routine, specifically some AHA and BHA treatments. I noticed my cleanser, which had salicylic acid in it  was starting to dry my skin out too much. Since I was getting a good result with the treatments I switched my cleanser to this (thanks Hyram) and saw an overnight improvement, not just in the dryness but my acne as well! I couldn't believe it! I always thought I needed a cleanser with acne medication in it to help my skin but I am just so happy with this cleanser! I've used it for a week now and will not be going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You’re running through a forest, the grass is greener than ever, the air is crisp and invigorating. That’s what this cleanser feels like.

reviews.review_title: Prob good for oily skin—not so much for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very pleased with cleanser initially, as I have very reactive, sensitive skin, and I’ve had a difficult time finding a water based cleanser for my second cleanse step. For three months, I had a generally good experience with this cleanser, but when I started retinol, I basically had to start over with every step of my routine and try to heal my skin barrier. I’m now trying to use up this bottle, while avoiding using it on my face, as this cleanser is now causing irritation. I imagine this is a good cleanser for people with oily skin who live in humid climates. For me, it’s become too stripping and too harsh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to love this product but it drys out my skin. Maybe it works better for oily skin. Love the way it smells though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cleanser for about a month and really enjoyed it. It made my skin feel soft and smooth but eventually I started noticing more texture than usual. I have dry skin and I think this cleanser is way too harsh for my particular skin type. It does foam up when lathered on the face, so if you are more combination to oily, you will love this cleanser. Way too harsh for my dry skin and unfortunately! Still giving this product 5 stars due to the ingredient list!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! I have sensitive skin and I love that it doesn’t dry my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly so nice. Never broke out with this and smells good!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! My skin is very acne prone and I get most of my acne combatting products from my dermatologist, so when I’m looking for a cleanser I want something that either helps or doesn’t interfere. My skin has been doing great and I have been using it for a few months! I can’t say that it is specifically from this cleanser but I can say that it certainly hasn’t caused breakouts (which a lot of products do on my skin). I would definitely recommend !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best face cleanser I have ever tried! I had cystic acne and that left behind some scarring and blemish on my face. This cleanser has honestly helped in clearing my face and I wake up everyday in awe of its magic. It's seriously the best! My face has healed and it's smooth and feel so fresh after applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Knocking down a star because of packaging!  Don’t get me wrong, I love the cleanser! It’s super refreshing in the morning! HOWEVER, I bought the small size so I could travel with it!  In my toiletry bag, I kept it nice and secure, but, the plastic top broke in the most inconvenient spot and it bled out.  Also, it’s a nice heavy glass bottle, so if you accidentally drop it on the bathroom floor, it could break. Luckily mine didn’t break, but it could have.   I suggest replacing the plastic top with a metal one so it doesn’t break so easily, and it’s better for the environment than the plastic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used a sample size that came as part of a mini-set. It came as a small glass bottle with a twist cap so I didn't have to deal with the faulty pump as I've read in reviews. I used it as part of my morning cleansing routine and LOVE IT. It didn't dry my oily skin out and the subtle smell was refreshing first thing in the morning. I can't speak for its effectiveness in removing make-up as I never used it for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For me is one of the best cleansers that I’ve found !  I so happy w this purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this because of the reviews but I didn’t love it as much. It made my skin really dry after each use. Giving it three stars cause it could of been my skin. Not necessarily the brand itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This helped my skin SO MUCH. My skin is so acne prone and is really sensitive to cleansers in particular and this one really stepped up the game, incredible formula. Makes my skin so clean and soft - prepping my skin for the rest of the routine.

reviews.review_title: best cleanser no matter your age
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The go to cleanser in our house bar none. Both my teenage daughter and this muddled aged lady choose it over and over again amongst the multitudes available and believe me, we’ve tried hundreds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever used.  Gentle, non-drying and even reduces redness!

reviews.review_title: THANK YOU YOUTH TO THE PEOPLE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve ever used, I heard about this cleanser from Hyram a great educational channel about Skin Care. Back to the cleanser of course it is so good really cleans your skin without over stripping it I noticed that my sebaceous filaments are mostly all gone when using this my pores from my nose look smaller it’s great for many skin types I bought the little bottle first to try it and my sisters tried it as well they have oily skin and one has dry skin and it worked wonders for both I would definitely recommend this product it helped with my skin a lot general thank you so much youth to the people.

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of the fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the mini size. Overall it was too irrating for me. Most ingredients are decent, except for the following: Tocopheryl Acetate; Phenoxyethanol; Sodium Benzoate and a few others. The added fragrance didn't react well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST! My skin gets more oily in my T-zone in the summertime, so I'd be curious to try this in the winter. However, I am loving it now and noticing obvious results. Less oil production and my skin is looking more clear and glowy! I definitely recommend this. Also, the trial size is only $10, so I picked up in the store and thought it came with a decent amount of product for the price and quality :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started seeing results as soon as 3 days. My skin was noticeably clearer. I’ve struggledwith acne for so long, this cleanser is a miracle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanse is great in summer time! Isn't too drying but feels like it takes away the day! Great for sensitive dry acne prone skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cleanser! It leaves my face feeling clean and refreshed, especially when paired with the Superfood Airwhip Moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve struggled with acne ever since i could remember gone through countless dermatologists and tons of skin care brands. I know the price is off putting but personally this is the first face wash I can say it’s fully doing something to my skin. I used to use the Ole vitamin c serum and i thought that was helping to brighten acne/scars but after i stopped and starting using this it’s gotten BRIGHTER?! Plus it just gives my face a glow but not a oily glow because i’m SO oily but one that makes you feel really awake and fresh. I also recommend getting the travel size to see if it works for your skin if you’re debating :) PLUS you only need a small pump! 11/10 Worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Way too drying for me. My face felt super tight after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser in the world I have really dry skin and this helps so much. Would definitely by again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The consistency is a very thick gel. You definitely need a good amount of water to make it start bubbling. It is very gentle, moisturizing but best of all actually leaves my face feeling cleansed! I love it.

reviews.review_title: Leaves skin breakout free and glowing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I spent a long time debating if this product was worth the price, let me assure you it is! I bought the mini bottle to try and it really did make a difference. I normally have 1-2 breakouts on a day-to-day basis, especially when I’m about to get my period. This made the pimples I did have smaller and not last as long. Since those initial breakouts I had when I bought this I haven’t had any more, even during my period! The ingredients in this bottle really are worth the price. I also don’t normally use gel face wash but I enjoy this one, it’s gentle but still removes my makeup and sunscreen. I’m purchasing the bigger bottle! My skin tone has also been better, less redness!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: refreshing scent and feel. I have combination skin and this prevents pimples without over drying. Love that it's anti aging too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash. It works well with my oily skin, very hydrating. The reason that it lost a star is because it does not remove makeup well. I don't wear makeup often but when I do I have to triple cleanse because this face wash does not remove makeup well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have switched all of my skin care to clean products and this is the face wash I've been using everyday. I use an oil to remove my makeup and follow with this cleanser. it leaves my skin feeling a bit stripped but other than that I feel like it cleanses good. I have oily skin but I'm not sure if I would recommend on dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent and a gentle cleanser to wash away make-up at night or wash away oil build-up when you wake up. So refreshing and leaves you feeling smooth and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, works great and leaves my skin feeling fresh and cleansed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn’t lather a lot, which made me think it wasn’t working, but it’s actually super gentle and gets my face clean and oil free. As far as $36 cleansers go, I’m more comfortable spending that level of money on a product like this, knowing it won’t contribute to irritation and you’re paying for a list of beneficial ingredients/antioxidants than many other cleansers in this price range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great natural fragrance ( no synthetics or essential oils), no foaming, and leaves my skin perfectly balanced! Will definitely re-buy.

reviews.review_title: It's okay but not my favorite
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I watched a lot of videos and reviews on this product which lead me to buy it. Well, I think it's a decent product but for me not the best I've tried. It really makes my skin feel nice and smooth and soft after application but I don't feel the freshness. like I'm used to using cleansers that after application not only does you skin feel fresh and rejuvenated my skin glows and feels great. This product after application i don't feel the fresh and rejuvenation part of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product helped my skin glow and reduce redness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This absolutely changed my skin. I had so much eczema and irritation on my face and this is the only face wash I’ve ever used that doesn’t make it inflamed. It protected my skin barrier while cleansing and all the little blackheads I had from not cleaning my skin properly. Also removed the rest of my makeup and coconut oil after oil cleansing. It’s a good cleanser to use that just calms the skin for days between stronger cleansers or masks or exfoliating. Repurchasing forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS CLEANSER!! Bought this because of Hyram and it’s definitely worth it! The scent is so subtle yet very refreshing. I would especially recommend it to those who have combination/oily skin but it’s a great choice for anyone because it deeply cleanses your skin without leaving it dry or tight. A little bit goes a long way; I’ve already used this cleanser for a month and I can tell that it will definitely last at least 3 more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because it’s cruelty free and I genuinely love it.  The wash leaves my face feeling clean but not stripped.  I also like that the bottle is glass so I can recycle it when the product is gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not too striping but remember to foam before using

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loooove the natural smell of this product, my face always feels so clean n fresh after using it. Definitely noticed a difference in my skin and only been using it for about a month. Does a great job of deep cleaning my pores!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser!  So gentle and doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry. Definitely my new go to.

reviews.review_title: Exelent Product But Change the Pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a great product but they should change the pump. If the atmosphere is warm (like steam in the shower) the products tends to run through the pump and spill out. I think I've lost a pretty decent amount little by little for this reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like a lot about this cleanser. It's a glass bottle - awesome as it's not plastic, also makes me nervous to have glass in the bathroom since I am good at breaking things - and a nice consistency. I like the amount of foam and feel. My skin felt good after. However, for all it's amazing ingredients, it made me break out. I wasn't able to pin point what exactly in it didn't work with my skin.  I'm thankful for Sephora's return policy so I was able to take it back and get something that I didn't react to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whenever I have breakouts and want to *really* clean my skin, I use this cleanser. It is not moisturizing, but it is also not drying. This cleanser reliably removes makeup and is highly effective. I think the price is high, but if you use a small amount at a time (you don't need a lot), it lasts for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite cleanser! A little goes a long way and my face always feels so clean after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has quickly become my favorite cleanser. It smells and feels really good. I like to use it every morning because I know I don’t have a lot of products on my face, and I love how gently it cleans my skin without drying it out. I wouldn’t recommend it as a makeup-removing cleanser, but it’s an excellent cleanser for a feel-good or light wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this product for 2 years now. Absolutely love it. Leaves my skin feeling clean, fresh and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face wash! I use it daily and it feels great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cleanser!! After I use it my face is noticeably softer and shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite cleanser. The key is that it's not overly stripping and keeps my skin feeling fresh, clean, and hydrated after each use.  I use this after cleansing with an oil cleanser, but anytime I travel, I don't like packing too much stuff so I just take the mini bottle with me and it does the trick! It is super light and feels like I'm rubbing velvet on my skin. The scent is very faint and fresh. I haven't experienced any sensitivity, break-outs, or any issues.  I've experimented with a LOT of cleansers but this one actually makes the cleansing process enjoyable!  I gave it four stars because I think it's a pretty high price point for a cleanser... BUT, considering there are so many pros, I would definitely repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not surprised this cleanser is always sold out. It works great and is gentle on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing! I can practically feel it cleaning all my pores, and it leaves my face feeling so fresh. I have pretty sensitive skin, and finding a cleanser that doesn't leave my skin either dried out or upset is rare, but this stuff is gentle and effective! Huge bonus that its ingredients are super clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought it because Hyram had recommended it, but now it’s become my favourite cleanser. I absolutely love what it does to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free trial of this product and have been using it for about two weeks, and personally I believed that this product gives a similar result to that of the average drugstore cleanser. Plus, it broke my skin out and I was not a fan of the smell.

reviews.review_title: the final step that helped me clear my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay this is going to be a long one but please bear with me. I used to get such bad pimples and acne breakouts to the point where i had to strip down my skincare routine and had changed everything, i got a silk pillowcase, used non irritating moisturizer that were fragrance free, changed my diet,changed my makeup routine and product, wore sunscreen, stopped exfoliating everyday etc.., and of course thoses helped my acne reduce by a lot, but i still got 1 pimple per week, I then as a last desperate step changed my cleanser(something i never really paid attention to because i didnt really leave it on my face for long) and i swear my face cleared up, now i can go 2-3 weeks without pimples (except for my montlhy time and when i mess up my diet really badly). Ive finally moved onto just clearing my acne scar and hyperpigmentation, i never thought that i could get here by this year. Im so happy for my skin, and i just want to say that i absolutely love this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing, it cleans my skin without stripping it completely and without leaving my skin screaming for moisture. I ran out, so my fave currently is having a panick attack and breaking out. Definitely will be purchasing over and over until I find something else that works better for my skin .. which I doubt I will find.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love it, really helped with my complexion. was introduced to this produced by Hyram, check out his YouTube channel for great advice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All I have to say is this is the holy grail of cleansers. My skin is acne prone and ever since I started using this I rarely get a pimple and the condition of my overall skin has improved drastically.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser works amazing on my combo skin. It leaves my face feeling soft and radiant. It has a subtle smell, and a little goes a long way! Will definitely restock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in tge little minis kit when i wanted to try out the brand. This was the first product i fell in love with because i have very combination skin. Im super oily in some spots but super dry in others. This face wash works good enough to keep my acne at bay but its gentle enough that my dry skin isnt irritated. Its also quite moisturizing. I never get that tight feeling like a lot of salicylic acid cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Noticed a slight glow, and softer skin. It hasn’t exactly cured my frequent blemishes, however I haven’t experienced any purging with it. Defs gives that clean feeling.   Love how it applies, and how little you need. Will buy again but will disclose that this is not a “miracle” product if that even exists. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to combination skin and this product works great for me personally. It has a very natural smell that isn’t overpowering or artificial. It removes my makeup easily. A little goes a long way and I find that is lasts a long time. I wouldn’t recommend for dry skin, I think it would be too drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good product for cleaning skin. Especially if you have a bit of dry sensitive type skin. I use Retin A every other night and this does not irritate my skin. It is a large bottle, so a little goes a long way. I like that it comes in glass. It has a tad bit of earthy smell that does not last and I do not mind. One issue is you cannot travel with it even though they give you a cap. It just makes too much of a mess. Now, depending on how you use it (twice a day for me usually), it will last a while. I just feel for what it is, that it is a bit expensive. If you have extremely dry sensitive skin this could work, but it may take your face a bit to get used to as it did for me. Should be a bit cheaper though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it very much, in just two weeks the amount of fat on my face has helped favorably, the skin feels fresh when I use it, I also like that with just one drop it cleans the entire face very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After the sample I knew I had to sell my first born for this products. The first cleanser that doesn't leave my skin feeling tight after use, smells fabulous and a little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don’t write reviews, but I absolutely love this cleaner! It made me break out the first month after starting the product, but eventually that went away and left my skin clear. It smells wonderful and feels so good when applying it in the morning! It’s amazing at removing makeup after one pump, and I do another half pump after to really make sure all my makeup is gone...and it is! Lovely product and I love how it comes in a glass jar. Would highly recommend using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become my holy grail cleanser. Feels lovely and leaves skin fresh and clean. Love the large size and the inclusion of a pump and a cap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail cleanser. I look forward to cleansing my face every night and morning with this. The scent is heavenly, it's so gentle, and my skin feels clean but soft after rinsing. If you're debating purchasing this, just do it...before it sells out again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser over a month ago for my acne prone skin and I haven’t had a breakout since I started using it! It feels so clean and I love that it’s all natural. Also removes makeup pretty well. I will definitely continue using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My first time using this product. It is thick syrupy a small amount to clean your face goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: Good, but the price doesn't justify another bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this face wash. It was effective and smelled great and my skin didn't react in any negative way. However, it didn't do anything my La Roche Posay Effaclar didn't already do for 1/3 the price. It's good, but meant for people with $ to burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have dry skin, and this cleanser has never dried me out. It leaves my skin moisturized. I will continue to repurchase. It's nothing special, and don't expect a miracle treatment, but when you find something that works stick with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product literally wasn’t it sis. It made my skin flaky and I broke out in places I’ve never broken out in before. My skin never felt clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first this products broke me out a little on my jaw and cheek areas, but that is expected with a new cleanser since the skin is purging itself. The amazing things about this product is how it cleans my skin and removes impurities and dirts and sebum, without stripping my skin barrier. It doesn’t leave my skin dry as heck, and now I need almost a fourth of the moisturizer I used to use, because my skin barrier is actually starting to get better. I also like the fact that this had good surfactants (meaning it doesn’t have SLS—sodium laureth sulfate), and is good for the environment too. However it is not my favorite cleanser, which is why I can’t give it a 5 stars, but for the price and size it’s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this product. It’s amazing to remove make up as well. It’s a great first step to double cleansing. Love the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product. The smell is amazing and clean and I appreciate the glass bottle. Only rating 4 stars because the pump was very difficult to open

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after hearing such high praise of it, which lead me to be rather disappointed. It's an okay cleanser, that's it. If you have no skin concerns I'm sure this would be great for you but I continued to have regular breakouts and blackhaeds. It made me feel clean without stripping which is a plus but that's about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it suds and cleanses, and knowing it's pulling toxins makes me feel good about using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser Make my skin very clean and not dry  I love it so much I buy 2 full size of it

reviews.review_title: Very hydrating and skin feels clean
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating. Does not make your skin feel stretched. Very good for dry skin. Its a very similar texture to neutrogena hydroboost with hyaluronic acid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decent, still not the holy grail I hoped for my sensitive combo skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After couple uses i noticed my skin more healthier glowing soft and i have oily sensitive skin!! Its been helping keep some of my lil breakouts under control i usually don’t stick to a face cleanser cause i don’t like them but this one im definitely sticking to and recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great cleanser!! not stripping and very gentle to skin (i have very sensitive skin) .. the scent was very mild and refreshing and gets all the dirt out leaving you with a clean but still moisturized feeling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is amazing! I look forward to washing my face just for the scent. The wash also isn't drying so your face doesn't feel right after wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have searched high and low for a face wash that I can see and feel results...this is it!! No harsh chemicals, no outrageous cost, love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product for price! Makes your face feel so clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure if it advertises this but it fights acne!!! Any stubborn blemish was gone within a few days. It calmed my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best, but not bad. Does not strip my skin, nor do much for my skin. The scent is fresh. I use a lot, maybe it’s the type of pump, maybe it’s me. Won’t buy again, but glad I tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice cleanser, but not my favorite. I have oily skin and I think it’s a good fit for my skin type. My main compliant is that I have to use more product per cleanse than I do with other gel cleansers. Still a good cleanser, not stripping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: God bless Hyram for introducing me to this product! This is the holy grail of cleansers!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this facial cleanser! It is so fresh, smells great, a bit foamy but not too much, never dries my skin (and my skin is pretty dry), and removes makeup residue. After my first bottle I swapped it for the Summer Friday brand and after using it I went back to this one because they simply cannot compare. My skin feels so fresh and clean after every wash. I 100% recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use a very harsh cleanser because I have acne prone skin and thought the stronger a product, the better it worked. This product changed my whole mindset. About a week in and the majority of my acne was gone and my skin didn’t feel so dry and tight! Had to buy a full size one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and for most of my life I used hot water and Vaseline to get makeup of because all facial cleansers burn my cheeks. This one does not. It doesn’t dry me out and it is such an amazing find for me! It’s soothing and I love the smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how it doesn't make my skin feel dried out after use, but it definitely feels cleansing and refreshing. I like everything about this product, even the bottle is aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to try to see what all the excitement was about. Impressed right out of the box by the fact it was a glass container! I've been using it twice a day for the past few weeks. Scent is clean. Used only 1 pump of product. Foams nicely. Face felt clean. With regular use I noticed that the pores on and around my nose appeared smaller, perhaps, cleaner? My imagination? Either way, I enjoy this product and am glad I also had ordered the refill size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i don’t wear makeup very often  so not sure if removes makeup but it’s a nice cleanser to use daily without feeling like your face is stripped of oil afterwards. Love the glass bottle and the pump!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOOOVVVEEEEE!  This is an extremely effective and gentle facial cleanser. It is not very, if at all fragrant. I love the glass container (good for the environment!) and there is a lot of product, lasting me months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down one of the best cleansers I have ever used & I’ve used A LOT of them! Cleans my face really well without stripping my skin & making it feel dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m usually more focused on serums and creams but wanted to try a new face wash. WOW! I tried it first in the Play kit by Sephora and immediately bought the larger size. It’s amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and I noticed an immediate difference using this for the first time. My skin felt clean without being tight or dry, and the smell is really nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works exactly as described. Feels nice on skin and effectively cleanses my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started going to a new esthetician because I was breaking out. So frustrating because I’m 33 and haven’t worn makeup in months. She told me to ditch my current drugstore face wash bc of the ingredients. She recommended ingredients to avoid, which led me to checking out some of Hyram’s recommendations. This face wash fit the bill! It leaves my skin so soft and no residue. Along with recommendations from my esthetician, my skin has cleared up so much. I’ll be getting the full size soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for three weeks and think it's an excellent cleanser.  It smells great and leaves my skin feeling clean.  Has not changed my life over, again, the last three weeks, but I definitely will keep using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never thought I’d be so committed to a cleanser. My combination skin wasn’t awful to begin with but definitely dehydrated and produced too much oil. I knew I needed a gentle non-stripping cleanser. I can’t speak on heavy makeup removal, because I haven’t worn much of that since March! I love the ingredients and appreciate the mini size for testing/traveling since the full size bottle is not travel friendly. Don’t forget the 60 second rule!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IN LOVE!!! My face feels so clean after using and not tight as if product is sitting on my face. It’s also so safe and doesn’t hurt my eyes if I accidentally get some product in. I love this cleanser and will be buying more when I run out. It’s also amazing to know it’s sustainable and vegan!! Love love love

reviews.review_title: Great for dry and sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE! I got this product as Hyram recommended it and am I looking for cruelty free and vegan products. I was worried cuz a lot of reviews for this product are for oily or combo skin, and mine is very dry. I would add too that my skin is also very sensitive but this product is amazing for it. I skin does not feel stripped or dry after using this. I use this as the second step in my double cleanse. I have been using this for months and have already repurchased

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser. i first received the sample in sephora favorites and bought it immediately. I dont even want to try other cleansers becuase immediately after trying this one my rosacea went down my skin was visibly smooth and felt like silk while also feeling hydrated and plump. It smells so good to me and makes my skin feel clean without stripping it. I love this definitely recommend a little goes a long way as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I liked the cleanser. The ingredients are great and it made me feel like I was really doing a favor for my skin because of the green tea and kale (which I love). Although I don’t think it made a difference on my skin. I’ve used CeraVe for years and switched to this but I feel like the CeraVe wash did a better job. Loved the smell but it is kind of expensive. I’d give this product a 3 1/2 stars if I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I repeated over 3 times! I really love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is life-changing. I have never really struggled with ance until recently and used to just use whatever I could find at target. I would have never spent this amount on a cleanser but I was desperate. After two days my skin was practically clear. I have dry skin and this doesn't feel stripping at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot speak to the cleanser yet but only to the packaging. Very difficult to open pump top. I can imagine this would be impossible for people with arthritis etc. I had to use a wrench open the pump. Ridiculous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before trying too many real cleansers, I thought this was a pretty amazing product, which it is a good cleanser with great clean ingredients. This would be fantastic for those with sensitive skin. But it's just way overpriced for what it is, and part of it is you're paying for the glass packaging, which I hate anyway and have dropped tons of times. The gel texture has a gorgeous soft feel that is gentle and the smell is pleasant like a green smoothie. But, I don't see any benefits like some other cleansers I'm using. So for those reasons, I don't see myself repurchasing this. Definitely try it still, at least the mini one, it's just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily combination skin and surprisingly this was way too drying. My face felt extremely tight and when I put my toner on, I realized how dry and ashy it was. Which is unfortunate because I was really looking forward to using this for the ingredients.

reviews.review_title: Avoid getting this near your mouth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think in general this is a good cleanser. It does it's job, foams up nicely, and doesn't overly dry my skin. Only thing is it tastes like soap and the taste (and it's smell) stay with my for a while after washing, that's why I rated it at 3/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: only been using this for a couple weeks but i love this cleanser for nighttime after using my makeup remover. leaves my face feeling clean without drying it out. i've gotten some in my eye before too, and it didn't sting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm on my third bottle of this goodness. I absolutely love it. Fits perfectly with my skin/face's needs and concerns. Lasts for two months with everyday morning and night use. Very gentle cleanser. Smells great too and I've definitely seen its benefits on my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best facial cleanser I've come across in a long time. I've switched around many times and have used cheaper brands all the way up to higher end brands and figured I'd give this a go. This has by far been the best for my skin. I'll continue to be a long time customer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty useless face wash, My skin was breaking out and I felt like it wasn’t worth the $

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing!! I’ve struggled for a long time to find a face wash that really cleanses the skin but is also extremely gentle. This face wash definitely succeeds in doing exactly that! I can’t recommend enough!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and have used it a few times.  It’s a very gentle cleanser but does a good job.  My skin doesn’t feel dry after washing and it has a very light clean scent.  I may end up buying a full size bottle to use once I am done with my current cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was one of my first purchases through Sephora. I was late to the game, I know. But I can’t tell you how much I LOVE this cleanser. It helped my acne prone skin. I recommended this to my brother and best friend to use as well and it’s helped both of them too! While it’s not the magical answer to all my skincare problems, it’s a fantastic step in my skincare routine and I will never purchase another cleanser again! Not over stripping and leaves my face feeling great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good! If you’re wondering, yes Hyram brought me here too. I just bought the mini sized bottle to try it out and it’s already helping with my acne and overall skin smoothness. Does not dry out my face and leaves my face feeling fresh. I just wish it bubbled up a little more. I plan to purchase the larger sized bottle next time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, but I only like it. It’s a good cleanser, but just prefer cleansers that will make my skin soft and moist. It’s a matter of preference. But it’s a good cleanser and makes my skin shinny and bright after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m an esthetician with super breakout prone skin and this cleanser in combination with a retinol (I’m on prescription Retin-A) and plenty of moisturizer has rescued my skin. Not too stripping, but I still feel clean. A little goes a long way, you don’t need a full pump to cleanse your face! Also great with a Foreo or Clarisonic.

reviews.review_title: I love the texture and aroma
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the texture and aroma.  I love how I didn't break out and how my skin wasn't greasy or over dry.  I *didn't* love that my face never felt clean.  I might try it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser to wake up to. The smell is refreshing, it’s gentle, and it makes my skin feel so soft. I’ve definitely noticed a better complexion after one week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is one of the best cleansers I have tried, I have been using the Philosophy purity made simple cleanser for years and decided to switch over and try this one, and this one won me over. It takes off makeup so well without stripping your skin, and leaves your skin feeling so clean and fresh. I have dry skin, and even while taking accutane this doesn't dry my skin up at all and is really nice for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Balancing for sensitive skin but not a holy grail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product as a step up from a Neutrogena basic cleanser. I have sensitive acne prone skin and I always feel it’s cleansed, and not too dry or oily afterward. I don’t think it sweeps everything away because I see dirt from a follow up toner, but generally it cleans well and makes me feel better that it’s less harsh.

reviews.review_title: Made me breakout, doesn’t remove impurities
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like it. I love the smell, but after using a sample for a few days, my skin broke out really bad even in places where it _never_ breaks out. I have a drier/normal skin, so blemishes were not even a concern before. Besides, I get a little paranoid about using a tiny glass bottle in a shower. It’s just one step away from being a disaster when the bottle slips from my soapy hands and shatters in the bathtub. Sorry, I’ll pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was having such a hard time with my skin after I switch from the pill to an iud. Anything I used to use wasn’t working for me anymore. I got so greasy and ended up with a bunch of pimples. I just couldn’t get it under control! This stuff was a game changer for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Surprisingly great for my dry and acne-prone skin! Just be sure to moisturize soon after

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for about 2 months and saw ZERO results..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoying it and my face feels nourished after each wash! lathers so well too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this cleaner but it did make my skin dry in some places so I recommend using this cleaner on your oily places but for your dry places just use a different one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally really like the smell of it and even though it’s a bit pricey for cleanser, it’s worth it because everything about it is immaculate. One of my favorite cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve used by far.  Very gentle and doesn’t smell perfumy like most cleansers. It actually smells exactly like kale, green tea, and spinach. I have very sensitive skin that’s very prone to getting ezcema and rashes so it’s very important that the products I use on my face are gentle. I bought the 2oz vile just to test it out and been using it everyday for about 6 weeks now. Plus I still have more than half of the bottle left so you don’t even need to use that much per wash. Once I run out, I’m definitely purchasing the full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this cleanser at first, but then I ran out of the cleanser I normally use, and decided to give this one a try. The texture of the gel cleanser is very nice and foams up well. It smells like greens and does not over dry or strip your face of natural oils. Overall it performs and cleanses well and it’s great for dry, oily, and combination sensitive skin. It did clear up my pimples and even my skin tone as well. It’s not a dramatically changing cleanser but it takes my makeup off, cleanses my skin, and balances my oil production to a normal skin type. I really love this cleanser and truly recommend this to all skin types, including sensitive and acne prone skin. I use this to double cleanse daily and I know I can rely on this product compared to other cleansers in the industry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves your skin feeling soft and fresh through out the day with no drying! Bought the sample first and have been using ever since!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this a 5 star but the price point is just kind of ridiculous. I love the ingredients and the smell. A little goes a long way! My skin is happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product after reading such great reviews but it’s just okay. I’ve used this for more than 5 weeks now but there’s definitely no skin improvement and I keep waiting for that clean feeling. I actually have consistent bumps under the skin all along my jawline which I didn’t before. I have fairly clear combination skin that’s not too fussy, I’ll be going back to my origins cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever tried! It smells delicious and cleans my face without stripping it. I have seen such a difference in my skin since using it and I just love it!❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS! I've used a few different cleansers, and I was looking for a new one because I never found one I was in love with. This is awesome! It's gentle, the smell isn't anything overwhelming, and I love that it has a pump. By far the best I've ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it broke me out and I didnt feel like it cleansed well enough. there would still be dirt or residue on a cotton pad after toning and using the cleanser with the clarisonic. really bummed it didnt work out for me, went back to ole henricksen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the 0.5 oz bottle of this in a subscription box, and let me just say I'M IN LOVE, within a few uses this cleared my forehead (Fungal) acne up with no problem! (I should've known bc Hyram said it is amazing!)  Definetly a new fave of mine! I also love the packaging!!!

reviews.review_title: Oily, sensitive, scene prone... YOU NAME IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was looking for a great cleaners that didnt strip my skin or have a ton of chemicals. I decided to purchase the mini after seeing reviews. SO GLAD I DID! this greeny-gem cleans without drying, Balanced my oil, and isn’t packed with harsh chemicals that usually burn my face.  So when I saw the reg. Size was restocked I BOUGHT TWO!! Get it before it’s gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mmmmmmmm I loooooove this cleanser!!!!!!! It has changed my skin! It feels so nice and gentle on my face, but gets allllll the dirt and makeup off from the day. I have noticed a major difference in how my skin looks and feels as well. I have combination skin, with a few areas that I consistently get little bumps and breakouts, and after a few uses the little breakouts I had were gone (and haven't come back), redness was reduced, my skin felt super smooth and happy, and looked bright and clean! Another big plus is all the great, clean ingredients. I am SO happy with this cleanser and will absolutely be buying it again and again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gets points from me for how clean the ingredients are and the packaging being nice but honestly past that I can’t say I like it. It was incredibly drying and I really wasn’t expecting that seeing as I’ve seen so many positive reviews and I saw it recommended on the skincare guru Hyram’s YouTube channel. I’ve liked most of the things he’s recommended so far but this was kind of disappointing. Wondering if the fragrance in this caused me to break out as well because I did notice more breakouts during two weeks of use. (I’m very sensitive to fragrance). I’m sticking to CeraVe...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WHEN WILL THIS BE BACK IN STOCK!!! First time I ordered only the mini size was in stock so I settled for it. Just finished it recently and my skin is breaking out... CAN SOMEONE TELL ME WHEN THEY'LL BE BACK?!?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this cleanser, I bought the mini one because i didn’t want to commit to the full bottle if I ended up not liking it but the mini one still lasts quite awhile! it feels very nice on the skin and I’ll definitely be purchasing the bigger bottle once it’s back in stock, I really like the ingredients & the brand, highly recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hyram put me on this cleanser, and it is TRULY worth the hype. My skin is dry, sensitive, and acne prone, and this cleanser is truly the best I have ever tried. So good!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: best cleanser i have used so far a little goes a long way with this one. just just a pea amount and u'll be good.
