reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product it works so well for my skin and uneven skin tone. I have been using it for about one month. Surprisingly I used it also in my underarm and it seemed to have  brighten up the dark areas :) I would definitely purchase this again .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So gentle and smells good too a small mount goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 4 stars for product only,,,,but its keeps dripping ..this isn't something you can throw in your back and go,,,being on high side of price I am disappointed...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this because of all the raves over the product between my friends and the great reviews. I have religiously used the fresh soy face wash for years and switched to origins balanced face wash for the summer/oiliness. I got this to try because I love the YTP superberry overtime leave on mask but i haven’t seen any significant differences with the cleanser. Yet, I do have sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate my skin which is a plus. Smells nice.

reviews.review_title: I love it and it does not dry out my skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am 13 years old and with oily and acne-prone skin. When I started using this I noticed that it did not dry my skin as other cleansers do, I use this product every morning and every other night, so far I´ve noticed a big difference in my skin. The main reason I bought this cleanser is that hyram (a skincare youtube) recommends this cleanser all the time and I see why.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just a normal cleanser. It has a good smell. Not my fav.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty decent cleanser.  I don't think it's good for very dry skin as I can see how it'd be stripping but in the summer, when my skin leans more on the oil side, it's quite good.  I do a double cleanse so I can't speak on the ability to remove makeup or sunscreen or whatever but it does get off any remains of my cleansing balm.  I like the smell and I like the consistency.  For me it lathers up a decent amount and I don't feel a need to use a whole lot, but I also admit that I don't care for products that lather a whole lot in the first place.  One of my biggest complaints is that it does tend to sting my eyes so I've just learned to be a little more careful when using it in my eye area.  I also love the packaging.  I know some people are worried about breaking glass bottles but honestly, the packaging is cute and very sustainable which I do like a lot.   Overall, it's a pretty good cleanser and while I do wish it were cheaper and wasn't as prone to stinging my eyes, I still think it's worth it's price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: my HOLYGRAIL cleanser. i have acne-prone and oily type skin and honestly i hated the idea of using a cleanser w/o salicylic acid. but i found this. it leaves my skin feeling so clean but not stripped and it makes my skin so glowy. even though it has fragrance it never irritated my skin or make me breakout. i 100% would recommend this product to a fellow skincare lover. and it might be a little expensive but a little goes a long way and there’s A LOT.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the few skincare products I’ve purchased more than once! I’m an aesthetician, and I can confidently say that the ingredients in this product are perfect! Not drying, nor stripping to the skin, leaves my skin feeling clean and healthy. Love YTTP as a brand, as well. This is a product you can feel good about using, and have amazing results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: J’adore !!!  Pas besoin de beaucoup à chaque utilisation ! Ma peau ce sent propre et fraîche

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product.I've very sensitive skin and this product is perfect for my skin.It really cleans my face,don't dry skin and feel fresh.Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle. Doesn't dry out my face, yet provides a fresh, clean rinse.

reviews.review_title: Exactly what I've been looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser because it's light, thoroughly cleans, and leaves no residue. Perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so i was previously using proactiv for years. switching to this cleanser has done WONDERS for my skin. it is not as oily and my skin feels clean and fresh but not stripped. i also LOVE that they use glass packaging and many natural ingredients. this is an ethical and sustainable company that i will continue to support!! (thanks to skincare by hyram:))

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin. I started using all YTTP products and my skin is amazing. I find this cleanser makes my skin feel clean but it doesn't dry it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had seen all the reviews and I need to see what all the excitement was about! I can officially say I’m obsessed with the product. This cleaner cleans your skin without striping, the scent is fresh and leaves your skin with a radiant glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and use this morning and night. It cleans well, does not over dry. Its my go to but its always sold out :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldn’t recommend using this product if you have dry skin around the mouth. I have been dealing with either eczema or perioral dermatitis for the past year. I’m not sure which of the two it is that I have yet, since my dermatologist was unsure about that as well. I’m currently on prescribed lotion, though, so there’s that. I bought this about two months before I received my medication, I tried it on then and I was very regretful. So, for the past two weeks I’ve been wearing my prescribed lotion and I figured I would give it a try again since my skin has (for the most part) cleared up. Unfortunately, the skin around my mouth and nose feels so dry and tight, and now I know for sure that this cleanser is definitely not for me. It’s very drying and definitely not meant for sensitive skin (although it’s marketed for that). I’m not sure if anybody’s struggling with either or of the two possible diagnosis that I have, but I want to save anybody who does the pain of paying for an over-priced cleanser. I gave it two stars, because the rest of my face feels fine. If it weren’t for my eczema/pd, I might have considered sticking to this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! I have combination skin (oily nose, dryyyyy everywhere else) so I just use this on my nose. It's a miracle product for me! It cleans so well and leaves my pores tight! I've never been so happy with a product before. Will definitely re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand the reviews that complain it is “ drying, stripping “. I have super sensitive skin ,I’m in my 40s And I absolutely love this product! It is NOT drying and certainly not stripping. It feels great , and smooth on the skin. I use it after showering and washing my face and still you can see impurities being cleaned. I’m buying again, and again..

reviews.review_title: Drying, there are better cleansers out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not horrible but I found this to be very drying and the packaging of the smaller container is super inconvenient, it’s hard to pour the right amount out and I felt like I wasted a lot of product. Also not a fan of the glass jar because I was always scared of knocking it off the shelf in my shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample of this and now I know never to purchase. I guess it cleansed fine but it was a tad stripping. It also has a really bad smell. Even if this was the most amazing cleanser, I don't think I could get past the smell. I had to hold my breath the whole time I was cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not good for combo/dry skin. It is very soapy and refreshing but as soon as skin dries up you feel it striped away your natural oils. I bought it because I thought it was as gentle as Fresh Soy Cleanser, but it is not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it didnt really do anything for my skin. it doesnt get makeup , to where i have to scrub it off. it also is kind of drying for my face. and i have oily skin. for the price i think you can find a better product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The biggest disappointment with this product is that the bottle leaks everywhere. I’ve lost most of the cleanser to a constant drip out of the pump and onto the counter. I’m not sure what causes this to happen — maybe a combination of light and humidity? But this is an expensive product to waste. The product itself doesn’t seem like anything special — the fragrance is light and the cleanser doesn’t do anything for my skin. If anything, my skin never quite feels clean after using it. I wish I had returned this as soon as I noticed the leak. Needless to say, I won’t be buying it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and hydrated! Would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this cleanser, it smells so good and feels amazing on your face! highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good cleanser!!! Very gentle an not over stripping for the skin! Great ingredients an not a bad price for what you get

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was an incredibly drying cleanser. The first night I used it, I was shocked immediately after I washed off the residue. My face felt really tight, I needed to use a lot of moisturizer to help rebalance my skins' moisture. After the third night, I noticed dry patches on my chin and cheek area. By the fourth morning, I was breaking out. The formula felt refreshing and moisturizing when I was massaging it into my skin, but the aftermath was the polar opposite of what's promised. Would not use it again or recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. Best cleanser I’ve tried. And I’ve tried a lot. I bought the mini size and it lasted me a long time! Absolutely loved it so I picked up the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so nice! I use it with my Cleaning Me Softly facial brush from Sephora, and it lathers you so nicely— but only if I use the brush. It comes off clean and doesn’t leave a weird film on my skin. I feel refreshed and clean after using this cleanser. Will have to buy the big one next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle on the skin without making it feel stripped. It smells good as well! It doesn’t take away waterproof make up but would be a good second step cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A sephora employee recommended me this when I told her I have acne scars, redness, and pores. I decided to give it a try. I use it daily every morning and every night. I tried it out for a month and it worked but when the second month rolled around, it didn't work for me anymore. Instead, it gave me more breakouts and made my skin really itchy. I have sensitive combination skin. I actually have to double cleanse with a different cleanser because this cleanser just from 1 wash actually doesn't remove any of my makeup at all and it still leaves a lot of residue. I don't recommend buying this cleanser because it's more of a cleanser you can use if you need a wakeup call if you're pulling an all-nighter. It only leaves the face refreshed for like a few minutes and that feeling disappears. It didn't really soak into my face but instead laid flat on the surface and then disappear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: loved it, smells good and feels great on my skin. definitely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t  feel freshness or clean skin. Unexpected results from the huge amount of reviews

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love YTP. From their founders, to their brand values, to their formulas, etc. This cleanser has to be one of the most gentle cleansers I've used. I am super picky with cleansers, so I was SHOCKED when I finished my bottle (on #2 now!)  This cleanser leaves your skin feeling clean, without it being stripped down.  I love that it's also super effective in removing makeup. The consistency is really unique.   Gotta love the bottle too! Eco-friendly <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t get the hype surrounding this cleanser. I didn’t feel clean after I used it. I felt like my skin was still dirty. I used TO glycolic toner after I washed my face, and the amount of dirt that came off after using the cleanser, pretty much confirmed it’s not for me. My African black soap does a much better job of removing impurities and dirt. It’s a pretty generic cleanser and cerave foaming cleanser in my opinion is better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! This cleanser has became a staple for me as I stopped seeing results in my Origins face wash. I’ll start by saying it’s extremely light weight and that’s been the most important factor to me, as I have a pretty lengthy routine with serums and treatments. This face wash doesn’t overwork or irritate my skin and works well when paired with other skincare lines. Now the bad: it has little sud and I feel as if I use much more product to wash my face well. It does burn my eyes. And the general availability of the product is frustrating and makes it hard to form a regular routine. Overall, I would recommend if you’re testing the waters.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in a hunt to find a good cleanser. Reading good reviews and also taking advice from a YouTuber young man, Hyram. I bought the small bottle to try. It is AMAZING. My face does not strip, and it removes everything. Like I mean everything! It smells so fresh like real veggies and it works wonder. I love this. I will buy the bigger bottle now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very good product it doesn't strip skin . I will be buying this product again .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this with my points and fell in love! Ended up buying the full size and replacing it as my cleanser! Smells like fresh squeezed veggies and makes your skin feel clean without drying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! I have combination-oily skin and it doesn’t dry out/tighten my skin like some cleansers. It’s saved my skin. Lastly I love that it comes in a glass container and how eco conscious  Youth to the People is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really recommend this cleanser, it is the best cleanser i have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Deeply cleans the skin. I can feel the skin a little tight after use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for 2 years and I am started to age in reverse... My face is brighter feel from blemishes . I also use the moisturizer cream. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is ok for me. I have oily skin with a few normal/dry patches depending on the season. This cleaner dries my skin out after each use (I only use a 1/4 to 1/2 pump), so I have to really make sure to moisturize my face. Sometimes I feel like the product doesn't fully wash off too because when I putting on a mask after completely washing off (or so I think) and drying my face, the mask will start to suds up a little as I apply the mask around. I don't hate this cleanser and I'll keep using it. Maybe I'll buy it again because the ingredients are clean. It's just normal nothing special for me. I think I would still recommend it though because of the clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using it for a week and love love it! I have dry sensitive acne prone skin and this leaves my skin clean smooth and hydrated. I feel clean and fresh after this. Amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: -Good ingredient list -Reusable container -didn’t make my skin feel tight or dry -kept my face pretty clean and clear  Cons: -smells weird. I know a lot of people love it but something about the combo is off-putting.  -theres def cheaper alternatives  That’s my opinion, I’ve been using for about a week now so not that long

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! I use it every morning and it leaves my face feeling clean and refreshed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash. Seriously a little goes a LONG way. I bought two of these minis, one to use daily and one to leave at my boyfriends. I also bought the larger bottle to refill these small ones when I’m done. But so far I’ve had it for well over a month and there is still tons left! Oh, also my sister and brother loved this face wash too so they each also bought one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little hesitant about buy this product at first. I never used it before and it was a little pricey. I decided to buy. I love it! A little bit is all that is needed. I love the way my skin feels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face wash!! it's become my absolute favorite. I love how it gently foams and it's not too drying. My skin is rather reactive/sensitive, so finding a face wash that doesnt burn or dry my skin has been a struggle. This wash is gentle and doesnt burn and smells great! Also less is more, so just because the mini bottle is mini, doesnt mean you'll run out quickly. I usually make the mini bottle last 6 months but I wash my face a few times week so how long it last may change depending on your cleansing habits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i bought the small size of this to compare to the glow recipe's blueberry bounce cleanser and decide between both. i liked it so much that i decided to use this as my morning cleanser as it is super gentle and refreshing, and keep the glow cleanser as my night (after makeup and pollution of the day) as i find it is more effective in clearing my skin. this cleanser is as gentle as it gets, but if you want something for acne get the glow recipe. for me, to keep a balance in my routine, i use both and my skin is loving it.

reviews.review_title: Great clean feeling cleanser. Mild but effective
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser, very gentle and doesnt burn my eyes. I have combination skin and wear makeup and my skin loves this stuff. I also get a little hormonal acne on my chin and cheeks. I am very clumsy so I worry I will break the glass bottle.  I havent tried any of their other products.  I met with one of Sephora's skincare specialists to clear up my skin in Jan 2020. If you havent done this, definitely make you an appointment. I only tweaked one item. Shhh! Don't snitch. lol. My skin looks and feels great. Soft and clean and no more congested pore. I do use the First Aid acne pad 2xdaily, two moisturizers, yep 2 by Belif(Hungarian Water Essence and Pore Cleanser Moisturizer)!!  Plus an under eye cream, and a weekly peel.  So you can't just stop at cleanser sometimes. If youre not getting it right on your own, seek help. Everyone should feel flawless.   Once this cleanser is back in stock, I'm definitely getting for my older teen boys.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best cleansers I’ve used. This is actually one of the few items I actually used up completely instead of throwing away! It did irritate my skin when I first used it, but after using it for some time, skin got used to the product. It helped clear my acne and really do a good job of cleansing it thoroughly. Highly recommend this and FAB cleanser for sensitive skin! Product also lasted for a while, about 4-5 months (if you get the largest size). Will be buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I have combination skin (a little more on the dry side though) and it was super gentle and didn’t overly strip my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted  to love this product as it was very highly rated. I love the packaging, the smell and the consistency. It felt really nice when applied onto the skin however it really dried my skin out and I broke out ALOT while using it. I'm not sure why but it just did not work for me

reviews.review_title: Not as Great For Oily Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a 2.5 for me. I have hormonal teen skin. I liked the scent of this product and the feeling it made my skin afterwards. However, I feel like it wasn’t drying enough for oily skin. Many reviews on here says it works on oily skin, but for me, my oil only increased. Maybe in the wintertime when my skin is drier it would be better, but in the summer my skin is so oily only a few hours after using this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a cleanser as good as this. I used to be a firm believer that cleanser was the step to save money on in a skincare routine, but after hearing Hyram rave about it so much, I decided to give it a try. This cleanser makes your skin feel so clean without feeling tight and dehydrated and it eliminates so much redness on my face. It's made such a difference in my acne and redness. The price may seem steep but the bottle lasts forever. I've been using this for four months now and I'm only halfway through the bottle. The icing on the cake is the glass, reusable packaging, which looks nice on your shelf and feels nice for your conscience!

reviews.review_title: GREAT PRODUCT soft and delicate but really cleans
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It doesn’t strip my skin, leaves a very clean and fresh sensation and I feel like is very subtle. I love the way it smells it’s such a natural fragrance. I recommend this 100%

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This honestly hasn’t done anything for my skin neither in a bad or good way. The smell is nice but it kinda makes your skin feel dry, and when I go with toner after using this the cotton pad is FULL of makeup, it doesn’t really do a great job cleansing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this cleanser feels! It's one of the best cleansers I have ever washed my face with. It did take me a while to transition, but it was understandable. (I had started breaking out but I was doing a completely different skin care routine than the one before).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good! Nice and foamy and I def felt like it was doing something, unlike some sensitive cleansers which I feel like do nothing to my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my cleanser for life. It gets the job done efficiently without leaving my skin feeling stripped. It's perfect for people with sensitive skin like me and I love the green tea and antioxidant rich ingredients.  If you need any more convincing go watch Hyram's video on it on Youtube. He's the man, he totally fixed my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser ever. I’m not even kidding. I ordered the biggest size and my order just arrived today. I don’t use other cleanser because this is THEE CLEANSER. I love this so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AMAZING and I love that it is vegan and cruelty free. It’s a bit expensive but as a luxury skincare purchase I would say it’s a very nice product. I have combination skin and this did not strip my skin at all. My only complaint is that I feel like the product runs out so fast, but maybe I’m just noticing that more because of the price! The glass bottle feels very luxurious and it is refillable, which I love for the environment. Overall I would say that this is a nice product and if clean beauty/sustainability are important to you then this is a great product, but if you are less concerned about those things then you could probably find a cheaper product that is very similar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am 36 with super sensitive acne prone naturally oily skin that has started getting dry about 4 years ago.  I breakout when I try to address the dryness so its been a bad cycle. I have used cytophill and cere-ve for years but still struggled. I started with the mini set and for the first time in 5 years my skin is clear and hydrated. Added bonus it glows and my creppy under eye area is no longer visible. My skin redness has gone down and my broken capillaries are less noticeable. This full coverage junkie stopped wearing foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this as a daily, morning cleanser. Feels fresh and cool on my face, foams well, and my skin feels brighter and refreshed after using. It is a teeny bit drying for me, so I also use a moisturizer in tandem. And I also don’t get pimples/breakouts as often as I used to, which is a big plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser for dry skin. Really in love with this cleanser !! Must try for dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Effective cleanser for certain skin types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is pretty nice. I think the ingredients are probably overkill in something that's meant to be washed off. I prefer to have Ascorbic Acid in serums, and the kale and spinach likely just function as antioxidants, so I wonder why it isn't packaged in opaque glass. The natural fragrance which consists of fruit extracts can still potentially irritate the skin, though it didn't irritate mine as it doesn't maintain contact with the face for that long. It smells strongly of yuzu and leafy greens, and is actually quite pleasant. The foaming action is middle-of-the-road. I feel like it's not that harsh, but I definitely have more gentle foaming cleansers. There aren't many hydrating ingredients so the skin will feel clean and a bit squeaky after. I'm alright with this as I have oily skin but it might not be optimal for drier skin types. Overall, it's a pretty nice cleanser that I definitely enjoy, but the smell is pretty strong and the foam is a bit stripping for certain skin types.

reviews.review_title: Tried as a sample, now I'm hooked
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great everyday cleanser, very foamy and smells so fresh. It does a great job of cleansing without completely stripping the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve heard so many good things about this product so i decided to get it and I love it! It’s so refreshing and gentle and really cleans. It also smells great! The ingredients are good and I will definitely be repurchasing!

Very good! Left my skin refreshed and clean. It also smells amazing and has a good texture. Don’t expect it to solve any major issues, but it’s great as a pre-treatment cleanser. I also love the ethical and sustainable commitments YTTP is making! A little pricey, but worth it for most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have super oily skin and this helps me a lot. 2nd time I’ve purchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea why I hesitated for so long to try this! My skin feels so fresh and clean afterwards, but not tight or drying at all! My combo skin has never looked better and have been on the search for quite some time for my HG cleanser. This is it. I don't recommend it for makeup removal, but otherwise, I don't think I can go without ever again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really refreshing cleanser that doesn’t dry me out or break me out. I’m surprised at how big the 2oz bottle is, you’re getting a lot for your money.

reviews.review_title: Works for My Dry Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far this cleanser has been pretty great! I got the sample size first and then ordered the full size. I haven't been getting as many pimples, even around my period, and I don't find it to be drying or irritating to my dry sensitive skin. I find the smell to be just okay, but that doesn't really matter if it works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Big no for me... Broke me out and dried my skin out very bad...

reviews.review_title: I love it, my skin loves it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It effectively removes the makeup I’m wearing and leaves my skin feeling soft and clean! I can get dry skin and breakouts from heavier cleansers, but not this one. The water-based formula cleanses without stripping moisture. I only use it at night, as I don’t generally wash my face in the morning. I use this in combination with The Ordinary niacinamide And zinc serum and it has done WONDERS for my skin. My complexion is bright and clear and always feels so fresh and clean after cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great product cleanses and I know its good for my skin! not stripping and doesn't leave me oily!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it but it started giving me dry patches over my chin/mouth, nose and cheeks. So I had to discontinue use. I even tried using it only once a day. I also tried using it with my heavier night cream and the patches shined through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser. It cleans so well but my face doesn’t feel dry or stripped at all. It also smells really good. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hyram got me here :)  I got this two days ago, love the brand and what it does, ingredients are great and overall look is approachable. When using it, its very gentle on the skin, has a lovely organic smell that isn’t strong. When I’m washing it off, it leaves this clean matte  texture on the skin and doesn’t dry it. Highly recommend going in with a toner after

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good. I love the natural scent and I like the fact that the bottle is made of glass. I like using it, feels nice. I still don't know how it will goes on my skin, how much it can help me but I feel like my skin has became less oily so yeah,.. I'm still new at using it so Im looking forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought the small size and I recently purchased the larger size. It’s a great cleanser: doesn’t leave your face feeling tight and it’s fragrance free. I use a toner after cleansing and I never see left over residue from dirt/oil or makeup on the cotton ball and I have tried cleansers where they don’t clean as diligently regardless of how great you cleanse. I knocked off a star due to its price; it’s a bit expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I've been using it for 3 months now and I love it. Great for oily/dry skin. My only issue is I wish there was an option to opt out of the pump when you order! I don't need a new one every time I order a new bottle. Waste of plastic.

reviews.review_title: Mask Acne is gone!! (this product is amazing.)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ATTENTION: If you get surgical mask acne!!  I am an essential worker and I wear a face shield so my forehead would breakout soooo bad. I started using this in my nighttime skincare routine and now I never breakout.   Of course that’s not the only reason I bought the cleanser, I wanted a good skincare routine and I had never really looked into it much before. @SkincarebyHryam recommended this one so I thought I would try it because I have struggled with cystic and hormonal acne since I was 11. I must say that this cleanser works very well. My skin never even broke out after I started using it (which is very impressive).  Also, there is something that feels so good about putting something on your skin that smells natural.   I will permanently be leaving this in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping this would work for my oily skin but unfortunately it is too stripping and drying. I really tried to like it/use it but my face was SO tight and dehydrated after using.  I like the consistency and it has a pleasant light smell but it just didn't work for me. I appreciate the glass packaging for recycling and reusing purposes but other than that, it is just not worth $47. I will be returning!

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice that this comes in a recyclable glass container (which I've repurposed for serum samples).    This is a nice, non-drying cleanser, doesn't foam too much,  does a good job removing dirt & makeup. Leaves my skin feeling okay. That's the upside and I can see how some would adore it. It's main advantage over my fave Fresh Soy is a cleaner profile, and maybe with regualr use, it would have better anti-aging benefits. But it's not the same wonderful cleansing experience: unlike Fresh Soy, after the first use, I didn't look forward to using it, didn't feel that freshness of my skin afterwards, and it doesn't rinse clean quite as easily. Good stuff, glad I tried it, won't be putting it into my regular rotation, though I may use it again sometime.

reviews.review_title: Great product!  Bought the whole skincare line!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 28 years old and have combinaton skin. I love this cleanser. It leaves your skin feeling clean and smooth. I wouldn't recommend if you are looking for a moisturizing cleanser but I prefer a clean smooth almost tighter feeling to my skin after cleansing which is what you will get with this product. I have pretty clear skin to begin with but it helps with breakouts! Has a light refreshing smell. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser!!!! I can never find any cleaners I actually “love” and do what I want them to do but this one does it. It’s so light, smells nice, leaves my skin feeling so fresh and clean but not stripped. I have pretty sensitive skin, not necessarily breakouts but just redness, texture, and irritation easily from certain products. I also get pretty oily around my nose but every where else is normal, and this cleanser has helped balance the oil around my skin so much. This cleanser hasn’t given me any issues, any redness, and has kept my skin feeling super relaxed and healthy. Don’t get me wrong though, still keeps the glow on 10!! I’ve gone through almost a whole bottle, about 3/4ths of the way and no issues whatsoever. Purchasing another one because I can’t get over how great it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am 27 years old and have been plagued with acne since I was in my early teens. I am halfway through my first bottle and since I started using this I have not had ONE new pimple. Also, it makes my face feel really clean. I just purchased 2 more bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for 8 weeks now! I have huge pores and oily skin. I was on the fence about buying, since most cleansers make my skin more oily. But this is the first cleanser I have ever used that makes my skin feel so clean after use and decreases my oil throughout the day. Have not noticed a difference in pore appearance, but they feel more clear! I love it, will definitely be repurchasing in the value size and its a clean product which is a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to try this mostly because almost everything I used makes my skin breakout... but I took the jump and I’ve never been happier in a couple days all my acne was gone, I think this product is really good at cleaning your skin without overly stripping it. Leaves your skin feeling cleanly and not that uncomfortable itchy tight feeling some cleansers leave. If you’re hesitant to try this DO IT!!! It smells super fresh and you can tell the smell isn’t from fragrance but rather just the smell of the natural ingredients in the cleanser!! This paired with the ordinary niacinamide serum is a dream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. I had received a travel size as a promo once and couldn’t wait to use my other cleanser so I could make the switch.  It’s super clean,  smells really fresh (like green juice) and I love that it’s vegan. Leaves my skin feeling very fresh. The only thing I don’t like is the large size (the refill size) doesn’t come with a pump so I’ll be putting it in an old cetaphil bottle just to have a pump in the shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is a very good product..a little goes a long also...refreshing  ,,,but am very disappointed with the container ! its purely MADE UP OF GLASS, EASILY BREAKABLE IF FALLS DOWN ACCIDENTALY  AND IT HAS NO PUMP OR ANY OTHER OPENING !! you have to directly pour it on your palm, very difficult to use,, otherwise i wld give it 5 on 5 :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most appealing part of this product in the clean ingredient list with antioxidants. It works well for me bc I also use the drunk elephant vitamin c serum to help even my skin tone. I didn’t give this 5 starts bc it’s not as clarifying as I thought/hoped it would be, but that is probably a plus for people who need a gentle cleanser for sensitive skin. My face does feel clear and clean after using it with my Clarisonic and there isn’t any harsh fragrances, it’s lights airy and clean.   I’m also black, I know that’s helpful for some people reading reviews

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it because of Hyram with 0 disappointment.  Not stripping and leaves my acne prone/sensitive/combo skin feeling incredible.  1 pump is enough.. a little goes a long way.  My skin has improved tenfold with his recommendations.  The glass container is luxurious and now I want all my products to be this way (bonus it is better for the environment)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is gentle enough where it won’t dry you out if you forget to put lotion on. I love the smell of it and feels like I’m really getting everything out of my skin. The only thing that sucks is the bottle is made of glass, so it an be hard to travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It makes your skin dry and causes breakouts.  I don't know why ppl rave about this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, only cleanser that cleans my face without drying it out and breaking me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the best face wash!! smells amazing and fresh!! pairs great with a cleansing balm before to remove makeup and dirt! Love this and will purchase again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i use this once a day at night and have noticed a significantly less amount of pimples ever since i started using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the bottle that it comes in. The glass makes it all the more classy. While the packaging is very snazzy, and it smells so clean and vegan, I’m  it seeing much of difference in my skin. Regardless it does leave my fave clean and it doesn’t strip too much moisture. I have been using this product for 3 days since I got I’m willing give it a chance

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don't get me wrong, this is a good cleanser....but honestly for the price, it's not worth it. I used it morning and night every day until I finished the bottle, and while it does a great job a cleansing your skin, I did not see any other noticeable results. You can definitely find something for a cheaper price....I switched to a $20 drugstore cleanser that I have been loving. I like to spend my money on products like serums and moisturizers that sit on your skin....not something you wash off after 1 minute. This is not worth the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m about half way through the mini size. I wanted to change things up and use a different cleanser in the AM and PM so I added this one to my PM routine. It’s a good product, I love the ingredients and that it helps balance PH. Perhaps it’s a little too gentle for me, I’m looking for something a little more intense for my evening routine to penetrate pores and really get in there. Super great product for sensitive skin and overall skin health though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: initially loved this product, but after continuous use i've found it to be quite drying for my skin. I wouldn't recommend this for someone who has combination or dry skin. It's also pretty expensive and honestly, CeraVe has great options that would do the same job if not, better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the Sephora Beauty Favorites. You get a nice sized sample of this & I've been using it for the past few weeks. The price isn't bad if you factor in how many oz it has. The brand has good intentions, a focus on good ingredients, & sustainable packaging. Although I like the glass packaging, I haven't found many uses for it. If someone could make a post on what they use the jars for, that would be great! I've seen talk of them creating a refill option for this which would be really cool. I will say though that due to the glass packaging & not so sturdy cap, I'm not keen on using this cleanser to travel. But back to the actual product itself: this isn't a magic cleanser or anything. I really don't get the hype & rave over this product. The only thing I really love about this is the smell. It's HEAVENLY. It smells like a fancy spa treatment & it enhances the experience of using this. The only reasons I could see someone loving this is if they have oilier skin or they just love the brand. Overall, not a massive fan of this product but it gets the job done. I actually stopped using this cleanser in favor of the Krave Beauty cleanser (unfortunately you can't get it at Sephora). It's a bit cheaper but it's a completely different experience. The KB cleanser feels soft, creamy, & so good on the skin. It feels really moisturizing & that's the focus of the KB cleanser. I think the YTTP cleanser's goal was to not be overly stripping but to still feel cleansing. The YTTP cleanser will probably work better for you if you have oilier skin but if you have drier skin, try the KB one. Should also note that if you are a frequent makeup user, I have seen many people recommend that you use this alongside an oil cleanser because this isn't good at removing makeup & sensitive skin beware: there are people who have been broken out by this! I don't think I'll be buying the full size but I enjoyed sampling this cleanser without having to take a leap by buying the full size.

reviews.review_title: The best cleanser i have ever tried! GAME CHANGER
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser i have ever tried. A skincare specialist and youtuber named Hyram recommended it and my skin has been super glowy and soft ever since i started using it which was a few weeks ago. If you wan to buy it but have second thought, i personally think you should go ahead and make the purchase because it really is a game changer. I had a couple of pimples on my face before using this product and after a few days the pimple completely disappeared. This is a cleanser that i completely recommend and will continue to purchase/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's a good trial size for an affordable price. I read the reviews that said it was good for dry, sensitive, rosacea skin so I tried this product as a new, more gentle cleanser than my previous one. Unfortunately after using it once a day for 4 days it made my skin much more dry, flaky and sensitive to my other products. I'm assuming it's much better for combo/oily skin types, so I'm going to try it again in the summer when my face is more oily. But in my opinion, it's quite harsh on dry, sensitive skin :(

reviews.review_title: Ok cleanser, not ok on price.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the hype in my opinion,  price point is way too high for what this cleanser does, just cleanse. you're better off witg holifrog or korean cleansers like purito or heimish. 3 stars because the texture is nice and the smell is ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea and I had just been using drugstore face wash and exfoliators, but a dermatologist let me know I should be using products w/ antioxidants. This, then, is the holy grail product. I LOVE the smell and it just makes me feel so fresh and clean. This, combined w/ my other recs for Rosacea (some of the Dr. Andrew Weil products from Origin + Tatcha Indigo Soothing Cream + Metronidazole (prescribed by doctor) and Eucerin redness night cream) has made such an improvement to my skin. HIGHLY RECOMMEND FOR SENSITIVE SKIN AND ROSACEA!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser. I’ve been a devoted cera-ve user for probably 10 years but after some skin issues decided to give this a try. It has a great smell and didn’t cause any reaction on my sensitive skin. My biggest issue is the screw top is annoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing. I have oily skin with rosacea and this gives me a fresh clean feeling without over drying or affecting my rosacea aroundmy nose. I've  been using it for over a month now & noticed I have had alot less breakouts as well (even the monthly hormonal ones go away quickly) well definitely be repurchasing, I also like the fact it comes in a glass jar to be more environmentally friendly. worth thr price

reviews.review_title: not for sensitive skin- smells like essential oils
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser so much after hearing the good reviews and Hyram talking about it. It takes away all the excess oil and makes my skin feel clean, BUT I think it’s making me breakout. I think there may be a bunch of hidden fragrance/essential oils in this product. If your skin is sensitive to fragrance like me, I would avoid this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best cleanser i have used. Doesn't dry your skin, smells great, maintains oiliness throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The pump leaks a LOT - it's unacceptable considering the price they're charging for a cleanser. YTTP needs to fix this asap. You can see the streak on the bottle in the attached pic. I've tried leaving the bottle tilted, loosening the pump but it kept on leaking. Finally had to remove the pump bc I was losing so much product.

reviews.review_title: Face broke out in small skin colored bumps.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is great and it does make my face feel refreshed, but thats the only pros for me. As for quality and effectiveness, I can say that I dont know what happened. Days after I started using this product my face broke out in skin colored bumps ALL OVER my face. I bought this cleanser based on all the positive reviews and now im really disappointed.

Unfortunately, the glass bottle and water do not mix well. Three days into using this product (which was highly recommended by a friend), it slipped out of my hand and shattered all over my shower floor. I had ordered the mini as the standard size was sold out, but am incredibly disappointed at both the loss of the product and the breakage that could have resulted in serious injury -- thankfully I was not cut by any of the glass shards, but it was a close call. Does the standard size also come in a glass container?

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the hype- if you have dry or sensitive skin, this isn’t the best choice (it stung my skin after a couple of uses). This would definitely be better for oily and acne-prone skin types, but completely not worth the price in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

Only gripe is the small bottle has that screw cap and well that's just a mess waiting to happen now is it ?

(the lack of a pump is the only issue with this smaller size).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t dry out or irritate my very sensitive skin, also really helps to bring redness out of my skin! I have a very red nose and cheeks and this cleanser has really calmed that down in only a few days! Absolutely love it

reviews.review_text: This cleanser is literally the best and it. doesn’t strip your skin.

reviews.review_text: I really like this product! My skin always feels fresh and clean after each use. I also have sensitive skin which it didn’t irritate it at all. This wash does a wonderful job of cleaning off all the dirt and makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this cleanser, which cleaned my skin thoroughly without overstripping it.  I have combination skin with my t-zone becoming pretty oily in the summer months with my cheeks becoming a little dry in the winter.

reviews.review_title: not good for my dry, acne-prone skin + rosacea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell and ingredients in this cleanser and I'm glad I tried the mini version. I have dry, blackhead-prone skin with rosacea. Some products cause the little bumps on my face to raise and unfortunately this cleanser did that. I like either super hydrating cleansers or something that will tackle my acne, and this didn't do anything particularly great. I think it would be great for some people, but I felt like there was missed opportunity in my routine to add something more beneficial for my acne or dryness/rosacea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Couldn't say more nice things about this cleanser. Makes my face feel so fresh and I feel good about using it. Love that its all natural and food based, just really worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a points perk sample of this cleanser a while ago and I have been re-buying it ever since! it's not drying, removes make up and smells good, leaves my skin looking a feeling great! I am glad I finally bought the eco size, they were always out. the small bottles are ok but not to travel as the lids crack and leak so I put it in a different container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the greatest face wash I have ever used! It leaves my skin feeling so clean without drying it out. My skin looks bright and revitalized after cleansing! The bottle itself is so refreshing, being made of glass makes it feel more luxurious and I could definitely reuse the bottle! So impressed with this product! It’s going to be my new regular face wash. I took a chance switching after listening to Hyram rave about it so much on YouTube, I’m glad I did.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST CLEANSER I HAVE EVER USED
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING product! Love the smell and it is super gentle! Helps my acne prone skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing special  I have acne prone skin and I’ve been using this for 3wks and haven’t seen any difference. Not bad but not my favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Initially, I didn’t really like this product, but when I started pairing it with my Foreo Luna Mini 2, it was absolute bliss. Within a couple days, the blackheads that kept popping up on my forehead were disappearing, and I started getting fewer breakouts overall. Will continue to purchase, especially since it is a clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite face wash. Gets off all my makeup and best of all does not irritate my sensitive skin. I have used a lot of different facial wash and this has been the best for me to use regularly without issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
