reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! It cleans my oily skin without leaving it feeling overly dry afterwards. This hasn’t broken me out which is a good sign and I feel like my skin behaves better when I’m using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great!  I love the texture, the smell, and the way it makes my skin feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite cleanser. This cleanser was so good and I still have so much left after using it for about 3 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! The skin is so soft, right after using this cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this and fell in love with this cleanser.  Removed dirt and oil without over-drying. Aroma is wonderful too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It was my first time using it and I’m patiently waiting for the full size to be restocked. I have combination/oily skin and it lathers nicely and cleans great! A little goes a long way. It’s gentle and hasn’t irritated my sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is everything you ever wanted and needed! I have tried numerous over the years for my mild rosacea and combination skin...well, I am almost out of this bottle and I can say this one is a game-changer! This has helped calm my skin down in many ways including less redness, fewer breakouts, less oil, and just an all around clean feeling. It doesn't lather like other cleansers I've used in the past but it doesn't matter because it does the job! I just placed an order for my second bottle. Highly recommend giving this a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great face wash that my spouse and I can both use. It's especially good for the oily parts of the face. Maybe a little much for my dry cheeks. I love the glass bottle and the dispensed amount is perfect. Overall, a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever. Does not leave my skin feeling tight and gives squeaky clean feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great but expensive. Mini bottles should also have free pumps.

reviews.review_title: No what I expect at all!! A great facial wash..!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has such a beautiful fragrance nice and light ...,, leaves my skin so clean. I love it thank you!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser! It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! It makes my skin feel so refreshed and clean after using it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a cleanser that would make my skin feel fresh and soft.  This one does it all.  I really feel like I'm doing something good for my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cleanser - it’s non-irritating, it doesn’t leave your face feeling dry after washing and does the job. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clean feeling without drying out my skin. Light, fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is awesome. I hope I don’t jinx myself cause I only have used it once. I had a bad reaction to a product and broke out everywhere. One use and my face felt so clean and the next morning was clearer and brighter. I understand the smell people are talking about but I don’t think it’s bad. I mean it has kale and spinach in it. Doesn’t bother me enough to not use it! I unfortunately only ordered the mini because I was scared of having a reaction. I’m already going to buy a full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good face wash. It doesn’t leave my combination skin feeling dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was iffy because of the price. It was definitely worth it!!! The bottle being glass was a plus. The smell is great! I have super sensitive skin and no reaction so far!  I even have my husband using it! Will be repurchasing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! It smells amazing and leaves my skin smooth, I love the way it foams and a little goes a long way. Only four stars because since using it a few weeks ago I have broken out on my cheeks and my neck!! I never have break outs! I’m not sure why. Im unsure whether to buy more and keep on trying it or to try something different all together. It’s a shame because it is a really nice product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this as a recommendation from a guy I love on youtube. some may have seen his videos (hyram) anywho, I fell in love with this. I don't break out, my face feels so clean after and the other day my boyfriend had asked if I had a good face wash and I had him try this. now, he has some seriously sensitive skin. everything makes this guy breakout including his own facial hair lol but he used this and nothing happened. no rash, no redness, no bumps just a nice clean face and he liked the smell of it too. now he is making me buy him a bottle because this is the first facewash that didn't cause problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Over all a great cleanser. I like how it doesn't leave my skin feeling tight and stripped of everything. Haven't noticed to much of change in my skin which is why I gave it 4 instead of 5. It does the job but isn't the best I've used. Especially considering the price of the regular bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin type is oily t-zone with some normal to dry areas else where. This cleanser is more of a gel consistency,  has a clean smelly but is not perfumed,  and a little goes a long way. Half a pump is enough to cover my face and neck properly.  This cleanser does not lather so if you want something to foam, this is not for you. I also find that after several uses the side of the cap will leak product, but its easy to clean up as it is only a little bit of product that leaks.  I find this is cleansing enough for my oily t-zone yet gentle enough on my dry areas especially because I do cleanse my face twice a day. The regular sized bottle typically lasts me 3-4 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever!!! My skin has never felt healthier. It smells wonderful and there is absolutely no bad ingredients in this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed!! This cleanser not only feels so nice on the skin, it also smells so fresh. I was very hesitant on trying a new cleanser, as my face seems to breakout anytime I try something new. I love the glass bottle! I’ve been using this for a few weeks now, morning and night, I feel like it has even started controlling my oily skin!! I have purchased the mini one and will FOR sure be purchasing the 8oz!! Don’t hesitate! Buy it! Try the mini one, if you want to make sure it works for your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i wanted to like this product bc of all the positive reviews, but unfortunately i am disappointed i paid for the full size.   the glass/bottle pump is nice, but my skin has been braking out all along my chin/jaw line. (which is surprising bc i barely break out). i have been using for ~2 weeks.   it has a nice lather and a small pump goes a long way. however, the scent is very strong smelling, very very kale like.   after i shower, i don’t really get the “fresh” feeling when toweling off. i cannot comment on if it removes makeup, as i have not been wearing much in these times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A gentle cleanser that doesn’t strip the skin. Smells pleasant, not too fragrant and gets the job done. I purchased the smaller bottle and loved it so much I got the largest size possible. I have noticed my face feeling smoother after regular use (I’ve been using this product for 3 months nightly).   I double cleanse, using an oil based cleanser to remove my makeup and then use this to remove any residual makeup.   I rarely repurchase cleansers more than once (shiny syndrome) but the fact that I’ve repurchased this in the larger size is a testament to myself of how much I like this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser came highly recommended by a really sweet employee at Sephora. And my god it lived up to the hype. It’s so gentle and foamy but leaves my skin feeling so smooth and clean!. No irritations or breakouts and I’ve been using it for two weeks now. I have combination skin and I have not noticed any of that skin tightening dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using biotherm which dried up my skin so much. I switched to this product because of the clean ingredients and it’s amazing. It’s so light, has a natural smell and doesn’t leave the skin dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews but I love this cleanser so much! I've tried so many cleansers from drugstore to high end. I have combination acne prone skin and this stuff is AMAZING. I believe I was using cleansers that were too harsh and this one is so gentle. It leaves my skin feeling clean and soft, but not stripped of its moisture. It is also a way better bang for your buck than other cleansers I have tried from Sephora. I tried the trial size first and loved it so much I purchased the 8 oz. TRY IT!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried many cleansers that not only cleans the makeup off my face, but also the oil (I have oily skin). This cleanser has a fresh and clean scent and does a great job in cleaning my face throughly without drying it. I have the regular size for home and the mini for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this cleanser everyday, a good gentle cleanser for everyday use. And another thing I like about it is that it’s is a very light scent. Doesn’t dry out your face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! Leaves my face feeling clean without drying it out too much. When I don’t wear makeup I only have to use half a pump. Smells refreshing as well. Only problem for me is the price, it’s expensive. $36 for only 8oz makes it $4.5/1oz. Would make more sense if the size was 12oz or the price was cheaper.

reviews.review_title: Nice cleanser, don’t like the bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleans nicely without leaving my skin too dry or with any residue.   Pleasant smell; like light citrus mixed w/ gentle herbs.  Lathers smoothly (unlike others cleaners that are too frothy or do not lather enough).  I like the idea of a glass bottle, but I do lose a bit of product when nearing the end.  Have to turn bottle upside down & wait until it flows to the opening.  Frustrating when I just want to do my am/pm regimen quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best face wash I have tried. I’ve been using it for a year now, and I love it. It does not strip my skin or make it dry or red. I have very sensitive and acne prone skin and It has not made my skin sensitive or breakout. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product and the reviews for it were so good, but it broke me out like nothing before. I have never had breakouts this bad, not even when I was going through puberty. I eliminated everything in my skincare routine before discovering this as the culprit. It's been about a week of discontinued use and my skin is still not completely back to normal. I would recommend trying the smaller size before committing to the larger one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I held off on trying this cleanser because I thought it was just a trendy product but I was so wrong.  I used this cleanser twice daily (using my Foreo at night) and my skin looked amazing.  It was gentle enough that my skin didn’t get dried out but powerful enough to get out all of the dirt and grime in my pores.  I will definitely buy the full size of this cleanser the next time I need some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this product! have been using in the morning and night. I can see and feel the changes in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite cleansers I’ve used. My face feels clean and smooth after using it. I love the smell, just like a kale/spinach smoothie.... it smells healthy haha. I also like what the company stands for. I only give it a 4/5 because the price makes me unsure if I will repurchase. I use this both morning and night, one pump each time but I’m not sure how long the standard bottle will last me. This is one of those items I would definitely purchase if it’s on sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: really helped with making my skin healthier! gentle but does the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SUCH a huge fan of this cleanser. ive repurchased twice & i could not say enough good things. it basically melts makeup off your face and you can tell youre getting a really thorough cleanse but it is not stripping at all. after you rinse your face youll be amazed how soft and supple your skin is already even w out moisturizer. so amazing! a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best cleansers I’ve ever used. Gel to foam. Nice scent, light, doesn’t dry out skin. Good for everyday cleanser! Bought mini size and bought full size shortly after trying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product. Didn’t make my face squeaky, tight or dry after use. Takes makeup off very well as well. Will be purchasing again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First, I LOVE THIS CLEANSER.   It smells so clean and refreshing, it’s so gentle, and it’s great to use by itself or with a cleansing brush like a Clarisonic because it foams really easily.   It is definitely expensive, but the packaging is beautiful and to be honest it really lasts a long time. You don’t need an entire pump each time you use it so my bottle is 3/4 full and I’ve had it for at least 2 months now using it once per day (Used to be twice, but you know how quarantine goes). As far as the product itself goes, I do prefer the fresh soy face cleanser but it’s very expensive and the tube doesn’t last very long. I’m sticking with this one because it’s clean beauty, it does the job, it smells fantastic, and it lasts forever. Not to mention I do feel like my skin has improved in its elasticity since I began using it.   My only con is that because of the size of the bottle and the fact that it’s glass, it’s tough to pack in your bag even for a weekend trip. Other than that, it’s a great product and I 100% recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product!! it helps dissolve all makeup residue. it also is a great gentle cleanser and your skin will feel amazing after using it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. It smells so fresh and doesn’t strip my face like most cleansers. I have combo skin and this cleanser gets rid of all the oils on my face without leaving that “tight” feeling that you can get from cleansers. The consistency is a bit more watery than what I am used to but it foams up surprisingly well. Would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face wash it cleared my skin in the matter of weeks and always leaves my skin glowing and healthy looking . it’s not drying either like other products and it lasts a very long time . DO NOT HESITATE TO PURCHASE THIS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually switch up my skincare routine fairly often.  Had purchased this cleanser along the way and then switched to a few others.  I've repurchased this and will say I've decided I'm sticking with it! Nothing makes my skin look more clear and glowy then when I use this product.  Bonus perk is that it smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I’ve ever used! This cleanser leaves my face feeling so clean and healthy without that awful right feeling you get with so many cleansers! And they use environmentally sustainable containers so it’s a double win. I will never use another cleanser again, this is my MVP in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lives up to the hype and will be the only face cleanser I buy from now on! I use it with my clarisonic and it lathers up nicely and smells amazing! I use it twice a day and it's not over drying.

reviews.review_title: Skin feels great after using this.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For someone with acne-prone combo skin, this did a lot of heavy lifting, and realy helped clear up my skin. Also, it's like a smoothie for your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about it at first because it’s expensive compared to my drugstore brand facial wash. I use this to wash my face when I wake up, and it IS JUST GREAT. It leaves my face feeling fresh and bright. It just smells like you slapped some greens in your face lol. I highly recommend this product once you’re willing to invest in your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First time I used I was like OMG!!! WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE! I definitely recommend this Cleanser! I will continue to buy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gently cleanses the face without stripping out, leaves skin soft and fresh! Can't say much about the effect of antioxidant stuff,still a nice daily cleanser mostly for sensitive skin.A little goes a long way, well its not any miracle cleanser but won't disappoint!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buying this cleanser I was hesitant, but after trying it for a week I saw a huge difference in my face. not only did it make my skin clear and look fresh, it just feel really good too! No breaking out, softened my skin as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I literally never write reviews but I am so upset and don’t want anyone else to make my mistake. I bought this cleanser to be my nighttime cleanser as I use a salicylic cleanser in the morning. I just wanted a nice gentle cleanser to use after my balm. After 3 uses it has stripped my skin. My skin is so textured and dry, which has never happened to me. I have combo skin and this was just not it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this because it was a “clean” product but it completely broke me out horribly. Would not recommend for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how clean and fresh this product is. I’ve been using it for almost two years and I love it. Found a perfect cleanser that suits my skin and needs.

reviews.review_title: Love the clenser, just hope they fix the pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the actual clenser! the only issue I had was that the pump leaks, I thought someone else was using my clenser but realized it was just dripping from the pump. Such a shame cause I feel like I am wasting at least a full pump every week :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for a couple weeks now and am loving how fresh and hydrated it leaves my skin. Feels like a good deep clean, but not too harsh. Isn’t a product that will help with blemishes or anything but a great gentle cleanser to use along with the rest of your skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini size to try it out. I have to say after the first use I am impressed. My skin has an amazing even tone and texture after using this cleanser. I will likely buy the bigger size one I am finished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS FACE WASH!!! I used to have really bad tiny pimples all over my face and my pores were super visible. I’ve been using this product for about 6 months now and my skin has never looked better. It’s definitely worth the $$ $ I recommend this to all my friends and family when they are looking for a face wash. Also comes with a pump and a free sample of another one of their products and who doesn’t love free samples!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely an all in one package super cleanser, makes me skin feel all new and fresh whenever I use it, visibly tightens my pores, reduces the look of redness on my cheeks, it’s literally a miracle i’m so glad I tried the sample first, immediately snatched myself the bigger bottle right after I finished the small one! Tighten

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Does not strip ur face, great for oily skin, and it’s really helped with my acne! My fav cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has officially become my new favorite cleanser. It hasn’t stripped my skin and I find it smells quite nice, but the smell might not be for everyone. I have dry sensitive skin, and would highly recommend it to anyone else with this type of skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and always made my skin feel clean and fresh after a wash, never stripped. Helped with minor blemishes and discolouration

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great gentle cleanser. It lathers up really nicely and leaves your skin feeling soft and clean but not stripped of moisture. The bottle lasts a while too. I've had mine for over two months and I still have just under half a bottle left. Half a pump is all I need for my face so it'll last a long while. I also love that it comes in recyclable packaging and a glass bottle. I heard that the writing on the bottle is vegetable-based ink too, so you can scrub it off and reuse it, which I definitely plan on doing. A definite repurchase for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My God! Like, best purchase ever! :O I was looking for a gentle cleanser to use daily that wouldn't be too stripping. This is it! I have sensitive skin and this product does it for me, it is soft, smells so good and does wonders for my oily skin. A little goes a long way too! Def gonna buy the bigger size one once this one is empty ^^  Also gotta love the fact the bottle is made of glass :O Love love love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first heard about this product through Hyram on Youtube! I have been looking for a new cleanser and I have fallen in LOVE with this one. It has a very light, almost earthy, very natural scent. It feels incredibly clean and lightly lathers. After I rinse it off my skin feels clean but not overly stripped. It has really been an awesome product and I love that it comes in a glass bottle. I use a small dime size amount and it goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do not use this if you have ever had a reaction to skincare products. My chin had hive-like bumps all over that took days to go away after using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser. I’ve been using the fresh soy face cleanser for the longest time and it was time for a change for me. I ran into this product as I was browsing through some cleansers and the fact that it is vegan and also it includes all the HEALTHY products for your skin regardless of your skin type really encouraged me give it a try. And let me tell you it’s literally one of the best cleansers I’ve ever tried. Completely alcohol free, cleans your face without drying it out. It is very gentle and you definitely feel how nicely it cleanses your skin. I will be using this product for a very very long time if not forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HOW IS THIS PRODUCT EVEN REAL!?!?!  It has given me the best skin of my life. Perfect skin when I have dry spots and an oily T zone. It is light and smells clean and earthy. TAKES OFF MY POUNDS OF MAKEUP I WEAR. If it came in gallons I would buy it. It is expensive for a face wash and then you try it and realize that it was made with magic from wizards and unicorn tears so it is literally worth it. I love you face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING, I have senstive skin and this is amazing I’m definitely buying full size but in this you get so much product for $10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it dried it me out a bit but i believe its a great product but not suer i will be repurchasing it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely the best cleanser ever, I first purchased it because I needed a quick cleanser and this one was just the first one I found but I absolutely love this one, I’ve  been buying it nonstop ever since.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally received this product as a gift from a friend, and within two weeks I was in love. Bought the full size and never looked back. Some noticeable changes I've in my skin since using this product:  -Glowier -Skin tone has evened out -Softer and more supple -Breakouts have minimized, but when they do happen they heal significantly faster than when I was using other products. I have combination skin, and have spent most of my life alternating between products (a regular cleanser and a salicylic acid cleanser that often dried out my skin) to achieve manageable skin, so it's a relief to finally have a product that does it all for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. I have normal to dry skin and was looking for a cleanser that wouldn't strip my skin. I'm also getting into clean/vegan products. I bought it after watching a couple of YouTubers (regular folks, not influencers) who kept raving about it. I also read the reviews on Sephora's website before purchasing. I received it last week and WOW! I love it so much. My skin reacts badly to a product almost immediately if it doesn't like it. That's why, when it reacts well, like with this product, I keep it. That is exactly what I plan to do. Will definitely repurchase. Very satisfied customer :).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This worked for me! I thought I had oily skin before using, but afterwards I realized that I actually had combination skin and this helped to balance it out. It's an investment, but it's something I would definitely splurge on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard about this brand through my favorite YouTuber and he constantly raves about it so I thought I would give it a try. This is the only cleanser I've tried so far that doesn't completely strip my skin but also doesn't feel like it does nothing. My skin felt so soft and thoroughly cleansed after just the first use, and I also noticed that the redness in my skin was significantly reduced. I will definitely be purchasing the 8 oz. size and I am really looking forward to trying more products from this brand.

It’s a complete dud and it doesn’t open. I have to pour the cleanser out to use but it doesn’t bother me much. Otherwise great product!!!! Will repurchase this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The best part is that it really cleans the skin yet doesn’t feel tight.   The refill size is an amazing value. I hope they continue to offer it.

reviews.review_text: I cannot even put into words how much I love this cleanser! First of all, the ingredients are amazing and secondly, it leaves my skin feeling super but NOT stripped at all!! I also love the light lather of this cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

YTTP: Please include a pump in the large size cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: The BEST face wash. I have oily/combo skin, as well as acne, and this has saved my life. I have tried literally everything else & nothing works like this.  It lathers well & even takes off mascara.

reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this cleanser! It cleanses your face but does it very lightly. No harsh chemicals to irritate your sensitive skin. I even got my daughter using it now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. It makes for a good every day cleanser. It smells green, makes my skin feel clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. I used a mini one I received in a Sephora sample pack and immediately bought the 8oz. Leaves skin feeling clean but not stripped of nutrients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is so dry. Was looking to find a cleanser that had minimal ingredients. It was a toss up btw two and I chose this one. It is something about this product that I love so. The light scent smells good as if at a spa. It doesn’t foam too much. Been using this for 2 weeks and My skin looks and feels so clean (No residue left after using toner). Skin feels soft and skin doesn’t feel dry. I will purchase full size once done with mini.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love it but
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted so badly to love this.  I mean, it isn’t the worst and I might repurchase it but I did notice my skin flaking my forehead and a bit near the eyes.  It does feel very clean and a little goes a long way but I have pretty oily skin and this still seems harsh for me.

reviews.review_text: I used this product every day until it was gone. Unfortunately it made my skin feel tight, very dry, and flaky right after washing, causing my skin to produce more oil. I didn’t notice any positive changes in acne breakouts and clogged pores, but it at least didn’t seem to make them worse. It also feels like I can’t quite rinse it all off. Not the product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I reeeeallly enjoy this product after a chemical exfoliation as it is light and leaves my skin feeling wonderful and clean. The ingredients are just amazing and the sustainable packaging makes it all worth it. I deducted 1 star only  because I've tried removing my makeup with this and I hate to say it didn't do the best job. However, when I wear makeup I wear quite a bit and I'm sure it would be a different story wearing very minimal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this because of my bad acne and acne scarring that i’ve been struggling with for years. I had trouble finding a cleanser that was gentle enough for my sensitive skin but also works well and cleanses. I absolutely love this cleanser and how it makes my face feel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I have ever used! Amazing and clean ingredients! Really washes my face in a gentle way but VERY effectively. The smell isn't my favorite but that is probably because it doesn't have any synthetic fragrance, which is really good because synthetic fragrance is very irritating. I don't even wanna try any other cleanser after using this! The best!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended to me by a Sephora sales associate and I’m so glad he did. Let’s start with the smell - it’s green in a comforting, healthy smoothie sort of way. It has wonderful lather that really makes your skin feel clean without drying it out. It’s particularly good for oily/combo skin like mine. There’s something about it after you pat your skin dry - like it really gives your skin a chance to breath. The regular size bottle lasts ages btw. No wonder it’s constantly sold out.

reviews.review_title: GREAT product, GREAT bottle, fragile cap ):

While I love the glass bottle, the small white plastic cap broke when I was screwing it on tightly. Now I have to keep it in a plastic bag but besides that I LOVE this cleanser and already bought another bottle before finishing the first!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly amazing like I’m genuinely in awe for how amazing it’s been working for me. This stuff really has unclogged my pores, brightened my skin and significantly reduced inflammation and redness of my acne (I have hormonal acne on my cheeks). An absolute game changer!! Disappointed because I would love to purchase the 8oz bottle so I guess I have to keep buying 2oz in the meantime

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have sensitive skin and I found that this cleanser does not break me out! I love the texture of the cleanser as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is very very good. It has a great texture and the feeling in your face is the best. Smells soft and washes easily. I tried a sample and had to buy it because it is the best. Highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have acne prone skin, and this cleanser is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: That’s a big ol nope from me, boss.   There are a ton of reviews that say it’s super, and if you have oily skin or lots of makeup, this is your stuff, but if you’re not that big into the makeup or have normal skin...oh lord just use dial soap.    It DOES clean, I’ll give it that.  It also made my skin dry up so fast I could FEEL stuff starting to crack *as it dried off*.  Left me scrambling for a serum.     Use wisely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many facial cleansers. Most don't clean fully, leaving a weird residue, or they burn my extremely sensitive skin. This cleanser is so spectacular I don't even know how I've survived trying brands like laroche posay, tatcha, countless drugstore brands, countless Sephora brands. It's that good. I have tried some luxury brands and honestly even the ingredients don't justify the price. This product has better ingredients than luxury brands, better cleansing agents, AND it's not super expensive. It cleans so gently but so effectively and it has eliminated my chin breakouts. Plus it smells like a dewy rainforest. Absolute DREAM! ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used many cleansers on my face but none like this one! I have very sensitive skin that gets rashes almost every time I switch up my routine but I haven’t had any breakouts and my pimples have all disappeared since using this cleanser! It doesn’t strip the moisture from my face like other cleansers do and no matter how long you run this into your skin it won’t dry it out in the slightest! I love this and can’t wait to buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really love this product! my skin feels so soft and clean but it doesn’t feel tight or super dry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eco conscious brand absolutely kills it with this cleanser. It is amazing, it cleanses without feeling like your face is striped from all it's moisture. I'm a bit acne prone, and this cleanser really helped my skin clear up. I just feel like my skin is perfectly balanced and correctly hydrated after using this cleanser. I will say though if you wear a good amount of makeup I would suggest using a double cleansing system! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! Did wonders for my skin, made it feel fresh and clean- would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Makes my skin feel so clean and soft and doesn’t irritate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, decent sized bottle, very gentle. My skin has stabilized since I started using this and I'm on my second bottle. I love how clean my skin feels and the texture of the lather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It doesn’t dry out my skin like other harsh face wash products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the small 10ML to see how well it works. It worked well on my skin. I bought the bigger one. The product itself clean. vegan and environmental friendly. Although I dropped the glass bottle twice by accident it didn't break. very happy with this brand

reviews.review_title: the only cleanser that’s every ‘wowed’ me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever used, it is refreshing and only foams slightly, leaving my skin feeling clean and hydrated rather than tight and dry. It is great for taking away the excess oils in my t-zone while not over stripping the dry areas on my face. I use this in the morning and at night, after a double cleanse if I was wearing any makeup, and before all my other steps. I will be repurchasing this even though it is a little pricey, a little goes a long way and it’s definitely worth it.

reviews.review_title: Didn't live up to the hype for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser, but for me it was a bit too drying for my skin. I do love the smell, the consistency and the earth-friendly packaging. Another plus is that I do think it cleans my skin well.  But I'm in my mid 30s (just for reference) and have combination skin (maybe a bit on the dryer side) and found flaking dry spots after using this 2x a day for a few weeks.  I had to cut down to using it in the evening and had to find a different cleanser for the morning.  I also found that it didn't seem to decrease my pore size or my break outs and it didn't minimize my fine lines. I'm in the lookout for something more gentle and hydrating for my skin.  Too bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ladies and gentlemen...this is seriously the best cleanser I have ever used in my entire life. It is non striping, EXTREMELY gentle, and barely foams so you aren’t left with that horrible tight feeling. I have sensitive, combo, acne prone skin and the second I switched to using this cleanser my acne immediately started going away and it also helped with my oily t-zone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser and I was so happy to see the large refill bottle at Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it cause of the hype, keeping it cause it's amazing. I have combination skin, with very dry winters and kinda oily summers, I've tried my fair share of cleansers and this is the first one that doesn't leave my face dry. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I’ve ever used! I’ve had mild acne pretty much my whole life and I haven’t had a single breakout since I started using this cleanser in the beginning of March. 1000000% would recommend to everyone with all skin types, it’s doesn’t leave your skin feeling overly stripped and dry and it feels super gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just switched over to this cleanser! It works great and is super gentle.   What I love most is the glass packaging! That is what made me switch to this from fresh's Soy Face Cleanser. Glass is more sustainable and recyclable than plastic! I'm looking for more glass options at Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is amazing and I reccomend people to give it a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hear its a good product. And it is. Its just Not for me.  It strips my skin too much and it feels reallt dry.

reviews.review_title: Super good cleanser, but not for my skin type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this cleanser was amazing at what it does. It effectively cleanses the skin. But, I would not recommend this for combination (more on the dryer side) and dry skin. I have combination skin, and it was overly stripping to me. I’m going to finish the bottle, since I got the mini, but I don’t think this is specifically for my skin. I do recommend this for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is truly amazing for my combo skin. I tend to get super oily on my forehead, around my nose and chin. My cheeks and the bridge of my nose tend to be on the dryer side. I have struggled with face washes being either too stripping or they feel like they don’t clean the oily spots on my face enough. This face wash feels like it gives me a deep clean and does not strip my skin. It kind of just smells like regular hand soap( not super fragranced) and you get so much product for the price. I have seen that people have issues with the pump leaking. I personally have not had that problem thus far. So maybe it was just a bad batch that went out before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot speak highly enough about this face wash. I have super sensitive skin. I have tried hundreds of face washes, and my face is always blotchy and red afterwards, no matter how gentle they are. It’s also oily, so most gentle cleanses left me feeling greasy. It got to the point where I had decided my water’s pH was the problem. That’s how many failed face washes I tried. “It can’t be all of these! It must be my water!” Washing my face made my skin so irritated, I’d even stopped doing it twice a day. I bought YTTP figuring I might as well support an ethical company, if nothing else.  After 1 week of using this, my skin is so happy. It’s not red and irritated after washing. My oil level is unbelievably better. I honestly can’t believe it. The first time since childhood that I’ve been comfortable without foundation.  Big plus that the packaging uses minimal plastic, as well! I’m super happy with my purchase. The price tag is a little hefty, but I’m happy to pay it for something that’s made such an incredible difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST PRODUCT EVER. on my 2nd BOTTLE. Makes you feel so clean and refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money. Did nothing for my African American skin. Nothing at all I did not even have that refreshed feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is fair, normal/dry, rarely have breakouts, and am in my mid 20's so take this review using that context. I use this with my Foreo Luna device (for normal skin). I really like this face wash because it is natural, in a glass pump bottle, doesn't leave my skin stripped or dry at all, and lathers really nice. Yes, it's pricey but you get quite a bit in the reusable bottle. I find it important to use quality, natural beauty products so this face wash is a win for me. I'd recommend trying out the small one to see if you like it, but I really enjoy it. I wash my face twice a day without fail, and a little goes a long way. It has lasted about 8 months and I probably have another month I can get out of it before needing to replace. I very rarely repurchase beauty products because I like to try new stuff but this is one I am seriously considering getting again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My skin is super sensitive and some of the most sensitive cleansers can can leave it red after but not this product! It always leaves my skin feeling clean. The only problem I had was the pump would not work however I just use it without.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!!! It's not stripping my skin nor does it feel dry and tight after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser cleans pretty well but really doesn’t do anything for my oily, acne prone skin. Doesn’t perform better or worse than any other run of the mill cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its a basic face wash, not much special about it. It smells nice and doesn’t dry out the skin which is nice. It Doesn’t do anything for oily skin or acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super simple and super clean cleanser. I have generally sensitive skin and this was non irritating and not even a little bit drying. I didn't love the feel after using it though because I prefer things that feel more hydrating and this didn't quite offer that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love leaving your skin feeling smooth, clean, and hydrated then this is the product for you! This lightweight gel cleaner leaves my skin feeling amazing. It’s not harsh on the skin so you can use it everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is super oily and on the more sensitive side and this cleanser has done wonders for my skin! I'm prone to breakouts and for the months I've been using this product, I've noticed that it's really helped clear my skin. It can be a bit drying, so I'd mainly recommend this product to others with oily/acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Completely cleaned my face, and made me feel very fresh after using but was VERY drying. Now I have dry skin, when I never did which is annoying.

This cleanser is too gentle if you have acne. It really did nothing for my acne. My face still felt like it wasn’t clean after using it. I do appreciate the ingredients and the sustainable packaging. I would recommended this to someone who has good skin already and needs a gentle cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product gave me the worst cystic acne all over my chin. I maybe get one of these type pimples on my cheek once in a blue moon. I currently have not one but SEVEN of them on my chin from this product. Absolutely will not be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing cleanser. It’s good for any skin type and you don’t need to use much. I use it a lot when I don’t wear makeup and want to wash my face in the morning, evening and even after a workout. I love how it has a pump and makes it easier to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this cleanser because ppl rave about it so much and because the packaging is beautiful. Sucks that it literally made me break out when I never really suffer with acne and by using this a couple times I had pimples on my face! Sadly I will not be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. Cleanses without drying out skin. My first time trying this brand and Im excited to try more from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: YESSSSS!!! I actually see a difference in the softness and the brightness in my skin when I use this. I use it with my clarisonic and it bubbles up nicely and doesnt make my skin feel tight and dry. Amazing product, but I honestly dont love the packaging. I 100% see why it is in a glass jar and I commend the company for being so environmentally friendly, I am just so clumsy with heavy glass bottles. I still love it so much though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing - I would go as far as to say a new holy grail item for me. I have combo skin: super oily nose and chin, pretty normal/ sometimes dry cheeks and forehead. This has cleared up a lot of discoloration and bumps that I get on my cheeks, while not making my skin extra oily in problem areas.   I use the Clinique Take the Day Off Cleansing Balm to remove makeup before I go in with this, as the YTTP product is not quite strong enough to remove concealer, but it cleanses the skin perfectly and leaves it feeling soft and moisturized.  I follow with the Superfood Air Whip Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer and I swear my skin has never felt better!  - almost no smell to this for anyone who's sensitive

reviews.review_title: favorite cleanser. Will shell out for this one.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser. Takes off the makeup, cleans the skin without leaving it tight and drying it out. Smells fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! This cleanser is my absolute favorite! I use this every day and wow my skin lives for it!! This cleanser is very gentle and does strip skin. It really refreshens skin and feels so soft after. This cleanser has a delightful scent that’s not overpowering very light. I love how the bottle is glass and reusable. I am on my second bottle and will continue to repurchase! BEST CLEANSER EVER!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser but not good enough. It cleans very well without leaving my skin oily or overly dry but for the price point it works the same as other cleansers I've used from the drugstore. For that I rather just save money and use the cleanser from Target

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: ABSOLUTELY amazing. Removes all traces of makeup and impurities. Left my skin feeling healthy and even!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: makes your skin feel clean without being overly stripped

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. I first heard of it from a video on YouTube from Hyram, so I had to try this for myself. I love how transparent the brand is and the ingredients are plus I found it to be very effective as a cleanser as well. Smells natural and is not overly tightening/drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin (non-acne prone) typically in the T-zone and this didn't really work for me. After about 2 weeks I didn't really feel a difference as my skin still felt oily after washing. I do believe you should give a product of about 4 weeks to allow it to work and adapt to the skin overall but I had to discontinue using after 2 weeks. Maybe this would work for someone else but not the best cleanser compared to other clean at Sephora facial cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have oily/combo skin, you NEED to buy this. It leaves your skin soft and makes your skin feel clean. Took off a star because I don't like the smell. That's just a personal preference. If you're in the market for a new clean cleanser and don't mind the smell of of veggies, go ahead and take the splurge!

reviews.review_title: This cleanser is gonna save your skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with this cleanser, I got this as a sample and I  immediately bought it and this helped my skin reduce all my dark spots and dullness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! I used the whole regiment of YTTP products and my face looks and feels amazing. I started with Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser, then used Yerba Mate Resurfacing + Exfoliating Energy Facial with Enzymes, followed by Kombucha + 11% AHA Exfoliation, and finished it off with their Adaptogen Deep Moisture Cream with Ashwagandha + Reishi. My face is actually smooth and fresh. I spend a lot of time out in the sun and sweating so my face tends to be rough and at times leathery. It’s definitely worth the money I spent and a little goes a long way. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is super gentle to my sensitive acne filled skin. i use this after i pre-cleanse and love it. smells so nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because it is part of the clean line but hat ever is in it made my face so dry to the point where it felt as if it was cracking. I already have sensitive skin and this was suggested to me. I really did wish it would have worked out as I liked the consistency and the smell

reviews.review_title: Great for combination to oily skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I've been using this product for almost 8 months now and it has helped to reduce my redness problems. I have combination skin, but more on the oily side and this product is one of the few cleansers that don't make me break out. I just don't really like the smell, it reminds me of hand soap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love YTTP products but this one was just okay, wouldn’t repurchase. Don’t see improvement in my skin compare to when I use other cleansers. I have combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love YTTP products but this one was just okay, wouldn’t repurchase. Don’t really see improvement in my skin compare to when I use other facial cleansers. I have combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have SUPER sensitive skin that is prone to acne and clogged pores. I tried this cleanser and my skin loved it. I sometimes try other cleansers because I think this is a little too pricey for a cleanser... But I always come back to this one. Every time I use this cleanser, my face is calm, clean, even, etc. I would highly recommend this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fairly dry skin, so i stick to cleansers that are very gentle and dont overly strip my face. After using this, my face felt clean, just EXTREMELY dry. I normally use my glossier cleanser, and my face looks amazing. This cleanser was very hyped about, it just wasnt for me and my dry skin. However, i can see this working for oily skin people, and it smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever! It will literally wipe the day away and it’s like you’re reborn again. This is magic in a bottle. I swear by this product and this company!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t see much of a difference using this cleanser. It did leave my skin feeling amazing, but after over a month-2  of use I didn’t see much change. I have a break out each month and it didn’t help to reduce that. Still amazing just didn’t do much for my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have used, I have used so many different ones over the past few years, this one does not leave my skin dry or stripped, it makes my skin feel clean and nourished. My skin as looked so much better since using

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser! I like to double cleanse, so first I use my tatcha oil cleanser and then go in with this and my face always feel so clean and fresh afterwards! I’ve been trying a few cleansers and this one is my favorite one! I totally recommend!!! I’m going to buy another one after mine runs out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this well enough. It is a really good cleanser, but I wasn’t necessarily wowed by it. I bought the smaller size to test out, and I really didn’t like the packaging. I think I will like this more in the summer months when my skin is slightly oilier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: NEW FAVORITE CLEANSER! I am a long time Cetaphil user and wanted to upgrade my routine. I have been using this cleanser paired with the adaptogen moisture cream for a month now and have noticed a significant difference in my skin. I am very oily and acne prone and this product line has been great to me. It is a a a bit pricey - but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Go-to cleanser. I have normal to dry skin and this feels amazing! Does a fantastic job at removing my makeup with only 1-2 pumps and my skin feels refreshed and nourished after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorite cleansers! Smells amazing and leaves my skin bright and totally clean without stripping it, I don’t have that right skin feeling after I use it which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great. I originally got it as a sample and loved it as soon as I used it. It is very lightweight but it leaves your face feeling deep cleaned and smooth. The scent is flora-esque but the scent doesn’t linger. Great for a morning face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does exactly what it says!  First, there is a natural scent! It reminds me of the herb garden I keep in my kitchen. It smells green and fresh, but it is far from overpowering. It creates a pleasant spa-like experience while cleansing. This does not foam up very much which was strange to me at first, but it does not have an effect on how well this cleanses my skin.  I start with my Green Clean makeup cleansing balm from Farmacy to remove my makeup and then I follow up with this cleanser. My oily T-zone feels balanced and I have noticed a reduction in oil production when I wake up in the morning. I am much less shiny and oily. The dry patches I have around my chin and between my eyebrows are not stripped of moisture and the breakouts I have experienced have been fewer and farther between since I started using this cleanser.  I would highly, highly recommend this cleanser. The Clean at Sephora approval and ingredient callouts are also a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased a mini size of this cleanser and regretted only buying that size! You honestly don’t need to use much of the product to lather and wash your face/neck area which is a huge plus! The scent isn’t something that bothers me, but it isn’t a scent that’s common within skin care products, so maybe watch out for that for yourself. My skin doesn’t feel tight or stingy post wash and actually it feels healthy and nourished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product - this has made my skin so nice after just a couple weeks of using! definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. Good for my sensitive skin. Made my skin purged a little bit at first, but that’s normal. Now my skin looks fresh. My skin can also get super dry and this helped combat that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Could use more cleansing agents. I wish my cleansers to do their job effortlessly. This cleanser requires some serious elbow grease. But it is very calming, not noticeably hydrating or brightening but at least it’s non irritating. Didn’t break me out so that’s a plus.

reviews.review_title: Really gentle, good for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the best cleanser I've ever tried, cleaned my face without making my skin feel taut, itchy, or dry. i've never tried a low ph cleanser before, they really work & i love this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually love this cleanser!! I use it once a day at night and my face always feels clean without feeling overly dry or stripped. Definitely a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells fresh, cleanses without drying, and you get a lot of product for your $

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing and isn't drying! This little bottle has a lot more product than it seems. Will def be buying full size when I finish it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. I have sensitive skin baught the mini to try it out and will be buying the larger size when I run out! I’ve had the mini for 3 -4 weeks now and am barley through half the tiny bottle. It last a long time so I think the larger size will be a great price for how long it lasts. Love the smell and doesn’t leave my skin super tight. My face feels clean and soft after and I have started using it morning and night I love it so much. It is a lighter cleanser so when I feel I need a deeper clean I follow with a gentle exfoliating scrub and my skin glows. Would defiantly recommend. I also have oily skin naturally and this has been great at balancing it. Very impressed with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like the smell and did not like how it cleaned my skin. Also causes breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal skin and I love this cleaners. It has a very faint scent and lathers really nice. Learning about all the benefits the cleanser has to offer makes  me so excited to use it. I use a very small amount. Not even a full pump. And it cleans my skin very well and doesn’t leave it dry. I can imagine it making your skin dry if you use a lot or if your skin is already very dry. My blackheads are almost gone! It really goes in and clears them out. I also use a AHA toner a few times a week so I think that’s helps too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I bought the mini size to try it out after hearing such good things and it definitely lives up to its reviews. I like that it doesn't leave my skin feeling dry or tight after cleansing and it doesn't break me out. I actually think this has helped in clearing my skin, I've been using it for a few weeks and I can see a noticeable difference and less break outs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t dry skin out, leaves you clean, soft, and feeling nourished, truly see the difference in my skin. Rarely any breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST literally any cleanser makes me break out and this one did some miracles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell and the effectiveness of this product! Foams up very nicely and leaves skin feeling very nourished and clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I switch from Cetaphil to this cleanser because of its clean ingredients. I usually have non problematic skin with no breakouts but the entire time I used this I had acne on my chin and lower face. It took me some time to realize and as soon as I switched back to my old cleanser it cleared up. I wouldn’t recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for months thinking it was doing something for my skin. After i would use it my skin almost felt stripped of moisture and felt like it had a film on it. at first i liked it but after i used it awhile i noticed a change in my skin that wasn’t beneficial. my combination skin became more oily. my makeup would come off from me becoming so oily and my skin never felt extremely clean. wouldn’t recommend personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good cleanser but it just isn’t that beneficial for my skin type I guess. I had a cleanser I use prior to and I felt more different with that compared to using this one. Smells.. green too lol which I don’t mind.

reviews.review_title: Works well, a little bit stripping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very fresh and green! Packaging is really minimalistic. Cleanses thoroughly with oil and makeup, I still needed eye makeup remover. Found that my skin was kind of stripped and dehydrated which made me follow up with more moisturizer.   Will purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I tried this in a sample I received and I've been using this for the past 5 days. What a difference I've seen! I only use at night time when I'm taking off the day and my make up and then follow up with a second creamy wash for dry skin. I haven't broken out either. If you love the Drunk Elephant Beste Jelly cleanser, you will love this one the same if not more!

reviews.review_title: Smells amazing and makes my skin breathable again!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so fresh and clean and helps my skin feel like it’s breathing again! Super expensive but I think worth the money given that it makes the skin feel really good. If the colour green had a smell, this cleanser would be it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a face cleanser that was super low in chemicals and quite simple and I found just that. I like that it’s a gel cleanser because that helps with moisture and that it foams up because that helps me see exactly where I am cleaning on my face. A little bit goes a long way.   It is really good for people with dry and sensitive skin, but that doesn’t mean it is not good for all skin types. I have oily, acne prone skin and this works for me. I will admit though you will not see dramatic changes in a day. Clean and simple ingredients are best for your skin, but only heavily processed and chemical filled products will show over night results.   This cleanser does live up to the “clean” name. I did see one ingredient that scared me which was “natural fragrance.”  The word “natural” has no legal definition in the food/skincare industry and fragrance is a known skin irritant so to find out more I emailed them and they reassured me that the “fragrance” comes from the foods found within the cleanser and are not chemical. I also dug through several YouTube videos to make sure this was correct and it is.   So if you are looking for a clean low chemical face cleanser I do recommend this. I believe in the long run of using this product it would benefit anyone’s skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has got to be my all time favorite cleanser. It leaves my face feeling clean and soft, without stripping or tightness. I like trying different cleansers and products, but I always end up coming back to this one to soothe my skin if I have a bad reaction to something. For the price, how long it lasts, and the quality this stuff is unbeatable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser. Doesn’t strip your skin and is gentle. My skin feels perfectly cleansed and refreshed without that super tight feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I have ever used! My face has never felt sooo soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: very nice clean gentle cleanser. smells amazing, leaves my skin feeling moisturized

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Enjoying this cleanser. Leaves my skin feeling clean and fresh w/o feeling dry and stripped. Happy I got the lager bottle

reviews.review_title: Perfect for Dry and Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I have very dry and sensitive skin so I was a bit nervous to try this however, I have always loved YTTP. This cleanser is perfect for my dry and acne prone skin. After using it for a week, I have had noticeably reduced redness and blemishes. I also have not experienced any dryness.A little bit goes a long way which is great. I highly recommend this if you have sensitive but blemish prone skin. I also used the YTTP night time mask a few times a week too, which pairs well with this cleanser. Highly recommend!! It always leaves me feeling refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly amazing! It has that cool effect afterwards ( sometimes people feel like it’s stripping based on reviews) but it’s not that’s the spinach even says in the details! My skin feels very fresh i use this cleanser in the morning and feels amazing. My  PM routine I use the Tatcha deep cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with everything about this cleanser!! I have oily, acne prone skin and it leaves my face cleansed without stripping all the moisture from my skin! The smell is heavenly too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry skin and I found that this Cleanser was pretty good in getting rid of any acne or scarring that I had. The ingredient list is clean. The only negative thing I can say is that it really dries your skin out, so make sure you have a good face moisturizer.
