I can't say that I am sold on this product because it seems to be pricey and I'm sure there are cheaper alternatives. But so far so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite cleanser! It doesn’t burn when you get it in your eyes and it smells amazing. The only thing that I dislike is that it strips the skin but, it’s very clean afterwards and you can use a regular moisturizer to fix that problem!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser, my face feels so clean after using it without feeling tight/stripped! My skin is sensitive and this doesn't irritate it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash ever. Super bubbly and smells refreshing! I would highly recommend this!

reviews.review_title: LOVE IT! Good to try at least once
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I have combo skin and I have tried many face cleansers and this one does not dry out my face or have any breakouts after using it like what most of the other products do. My skin is very sensitive and will turn red and breakout if irritated and this cleanser was perfect for my skin. It cleaned my face very well after using it. I will definitely be buying the full size for my next purchase. I recommend everyone to try the smaller size when trying it for the first time since everyone skin reacts different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: most gentle cleanser I've used and gets the job done. Has never caused a breakout. By far my fav cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product sooo bad. But unfortunately, it did nothing for me. I didn’t see any difference in the amount of breakouts or cleanliness of pores. It was just a basic cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing to rave about nothing to complain about. Wouldn’t buy again but didn’t mind using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love using this cleanser--it resulted in drastic differences in my skin and I always feel so clean. The wash isn't harsh, so I do not use this as an exfoliation (I use other skincare to exfoliate). It works great, especially in my nighttime routine prior to using my retinoids and vitamin C!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser out there, you can really feel it cleaning the impurities without stripping away your natural face oils. Clean ingredients and does the job better than anything else I've ever tried. Worth every dime!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is bomb!!!! I just started really getting into skincare and trying to restore my skin barrier and health. I saw this recommendation on Hyram’s channel and I got it and it leaves my skin SO soft after. I do not feel dried out or that squeaky clean feel. It’s a staple. FYI the smell is something you have to get used to after many uses I just got used to it and it almost smells good to me hahahah. I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I have really dry sensitive skin and I am prone to acne. This gets all my makeup off! I use one pump and rub it into my face kind of loosing my makeup. I wash it off and then repeat. At most I have to use three pumps if I have a lot of makeup. But it doesn’t dry out my skin and I never feel my skin tightening like with other stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super fresh cleanser! Very gentle and a feeling of nourishment on the skin. I received the mini size twice in sets of Sephora fave sets. I plan on buying the full size as soon as my minis run out. That being said, the mini size does not run out quickly! You do not need much of it. It is not a cleanser that foams up much (not problematic for myself, just something to note). I gave a full five stars because I appreciate the glass packaging as a more sustainable option than plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It makes my skin super soft and it feels very gentle and nourishing, leaving my skin moisturized but not oily at all. I have oily/mixed skin and this works wonders for me. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this face wash for a year. It is gentle and removes all of my make up without needing a make up remover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me, this cleanser was just okay. It suds really well and leaves your skin clean without being overly drying or stripping. My sensitive skin also enjoyed that the scent was very subtle and natural (it smells earthy, like veggies). Sadly, I didn't find that my skin really benefited from adding this product to my routine. I did prefer using it in the morning as it was refreshing and gentle. It didn't work for the evening because it doesn't breakdown makeup and didn't work as well when paired with my oil cleanser. I would still recommend this cleanser to sensitive skin types and those who wear minimal makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this cleanser. It smells amazing and my skin feels so clean afterwards. It doesn’t not strip my skin of its natural oils like some other cleansers I have tried. Leaving my skin flakey and tight. This one cleanses but still keeps it hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for a few months now. I’m on my second bottle and I absolutely love it. It is gentle enough that it doesn’t dry out my face but strong enough that it takes away any makeup and sunscreen worn throughout the day. I love the clean ingredients and the fact it’s a glass bottle. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: just amazing. i’m so mad i waited so long to try it! seriously, after a week of using it i could see a difference in my skin - my pores looked smaller, my acne was less inflamed and my skin just felt clean. i struggle with finding a cleanser that makes my skin feel clean without feeling stripped - i have dry skin but i like it when a cleanser foams up and feels like it’s actually cleaning my skin and this is just perfect!! seriously - believe the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is not great. I do feel like it cleanses my skin well, but it also leaves it feeling stripped dry. After a few uses my skin started to feel a little grainy. Wouldn't recommend for dry, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used one cleanser since I began taking care of my skin as a teen.  Anything else I ever tried to use would make me break out.  I had to switch things up because the old cleanser was starting to make my face dry and flaky.  With this cleanser, I have had no breakouts and my skin seems more even, and I am not nearly as dry. I have coupled this cleanser with the fresh Lotus Youth Preserve Moisturizer and it has proven to be a great combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the same face cleanser for the past five years and every time I would try a different cleanser, my face would react poorly. I recently received a sample of this YTTP product, and it has been the only cleanser which has been comparable to my other cleanser (which is Arcona's White Tea Purifying Cleanser). I am looking to purchase the full size of this once I'm done with my other, not only due to the great quality but it's also a great price for the amount!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, only a week in and I can feel a difference. Doesn’t dry face up after cleansing, which I love!! makes face feel very soft after rinsing product off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My brother and I both use this. Have bought like 5 bottles of this. He has oily skin and I have normal to dry skin. It's a nice gentle daily cleanser. Foams up and skin will feel clean but not dry. A simple got to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La liste d'ingrédients est tellement intéressante! Probablement le meilleur nettoyant que j'ai utilisé!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! Your skin feels so clean and healthy after using this. I have sensitive and acne prone skin, this has worked wonders!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product did not help me at all. I know have huge acne scars on my cheeks and my face looks even worse than it did before. I’m extremely disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really liked this cleanser and I am on to my second bottle :) It leaves my skin feeling fresh and it has a great scent to it. It also lathers up nicely. I took off one star because I noticed that cleanser was spilling from the bottle. I think it has to do with the pump. Every time I would pick it up there would be cleanser on the side of the bottle and residue on my shelf.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely in love with this cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little expensive but so worth it. It washes away the grime and makeup without over drying, and doesn’t leave my skin feeling tight. The scent is so light and amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash ive ever used. Has lasted me around 2 months of twice a day everyday use. I will definitely be repurchasing!!  FIX LEAKY LID BY NOT SCREWING IT ON SUPER TIGHT! Glass bottles suck in the air so all you gotta do is not screw the lid on tight so the product dosent leak out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser now! My face glows after each use! I use the drunk elephant cleansing balm to remove my makeup first and then this for squeaky clean skin. I have never been committed to any cleanser until now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dries out skin. Wanted to like this but unfortunately, it isn’t gentle enough for those of us with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Not overly stripping while still deeply cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just left my skin feeling blah! Did nothing extraordinary that a drugstore bought cleanser could not do. A little expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser actually smells of greens. I like that it's a clean product but I didn't feel anything extraordinary after using this cleanser. I bought the mini to try out and I probably won't be buying it or the full size again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: hands down one of the best cleansers I have ever used, it leaves your face feeling smooth, clean, and healthy. it just leaves your skin glowing. def recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have spent more dollars for worse brand so I can actually say that although this is definitely not the best but this face cleanser brand is far worst than some that are high end. I didn't see a drastic change after use  but it reduces the pores  on my nose area in a minimum way and I like the cooling effect plus it definitely does not make me breakout which I am glad for. This to me is a good daily cleanser if you're looking for something to use on a day-to-day basis with the thought of just removing dirt and not have a negative after effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it for my mom for Mother’s Day. she said it smell good and it’s very bubbly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just OK. I don’t notice a difference when using it, face feels no different afterwards and doesn’t look any different. Can’t wait till the bottle is finished so I can buy something else. The good thing about it is that it’s gentle on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! My pores have become so much smaller since using it. Had to buy the full size after finishing the smaller size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED! Leaves my face super clean, fresh and soft. It's so difficult for me to find skincare products that don't make me break out or have a funky effect. This cleanser is officially my favorite.
I love this. It’s gentle and not drying. And I bought this multiple times

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like everyone loves this product and raves about it, but when I used it I had such bad breakouts the next day. Lots of little acne spots just all over my face. I used to have acne in high school and now I’ve had clear skin for about 2 years but for some reason my skin just did not like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have oily skin, this would probably be great for you. If you have dry and/or sensitive skin don't even bother. After washing my face I had buts of dry skin flaking around my nose and my forehead was so irritated that I used aloe just to calm it down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just came in, and the unboxing had an unpleasant surprise. So much for paying premium. Giving it two stars because I have hope that the product will do my skin good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser, leaves my skin really soft and clean. Whenever my face gets angry I use this and it instantly gets better. It works great for calming my skin, will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_title: the detox you were looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The smell just wakes you up in the morning, so fresh! Also doesn’t dry my face up like many cleansers for acne-prone skin do. I’m pleasantly surprised that although this doesn’t have the typical acne-fighting active ingredients, it really helped calmed my face down. Guess that’s the power of veggies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite cleansers! Does not dry my skin out and my face feels clean. The glass bottle is nice but I usually wash my face in the shower at night so I wish it was in a lightweight, plastic container where I won't feel bad if I dropped it. It also leaked all over my bathroom sink so I had to put it in a little bowl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally received this product as a sample and after one use my skin felt noticeably cleaner. After using for about a week all of my acne that I have struggled with for 6+ years has cleared up and my skin looks naturally glowing but not oily. This product doesn't dry out my skin and also smells so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Youth to the People Superfood Cleanser is probably hands down one of the best cleansers I have ever used. It has become a new staple in my skincare routine. The consistency is almost like an oil and this cleanser froths up so you know which parts of your face you are cleansing. I really enjoy using this product both day and night. It has truly changed my skin for the better. I tend to be more oily in my T-zone and pretty normal-to-dry in my cheek area, so this cleanser is perfect for me. Using this, I have also noticed a significant improvement in my overall complexion. It seems brighter and healthier, which is a major plus. I also love YTTP and the morals that they stand for. Skincare for everyone, regardless of race, gender, skin type, sexual orientation, ethnicity, etc. This brand is a pioneer in the skincare industry, and I cannot wait to try more of their products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot stop rebuying this product. It smells amazing but not too strong where you feel like it is just drowning in fragrance, it leaves my skin feeling clean but not tight which is hard to find with many cleansers and I feel like it lasts me such a long time! The glass bottle makes it sustainable which also is a win win for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite cleanser. I’ve repurchased more than a dozen times. Not too harsh and Gresham for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this cleanser, it's super gentle on the skin and doesn't dry it out! I wet my hands and lather the product before washing my face. It becomes so smooth and foamy and feels really good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Helped my acne so much and i love the natural smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m absolutely in love with this wash. I bought mini sizes of several washes to try as it has been a struggle to find the right one. I have acne and the acne targeting washes I’ve tried caused a ton of irritation and redness. I’ve been using this wash for about 10 days now and all my redness and acne has cleared. I can’t remember the last time my face looked and felt this good. Definitely buying the full size when it’s back in stock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I appreciate that this cleanser is very moisturizing. It is great for morning washes. Furthermore, in the evening after a deep cleanse. It adds the moisture back into the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great if you wear a lot of makeup and need a cleaner. Personally I don’t wear much makeup, just moisturizer so I find it drying on my skin and use it once every other day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and love this cleanser. The scent, the texture, the foam it makes on the face when washing, the texture of my skin afterwards, the fact that it's a clean product... honestly, I love everything about it, it's the best skincare product I have purchased since a long time. I use it with my Clarisonic brush and would highly recommend this combo. Will buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this cleanser! Having struggled with acne for years, I’ve tried everything from drugstore to high end cleansers. There seemed to be no middle ground between extremely stripping products that made my skin feel dull and dry and ones that flat out didn’t clean my skin.  I was convinced that nothing on the market was actually going to heal my skin problems until I found this cleanser!!! This actually feels like it’s cleaning deep within my pores, but I don’t have to rush to put on moisturizer right after :) It foams nicely without having harmful sulfates. It’s the best smelling face wash i’ve ever used while being free of harmful fragrance and essential oils. Perfect for a gentle but effective double cleanse. Bonus it’s fungal acne safe!! My skin has been clearer than ever and I don’t need to use makeup anymore to cover my redness thanks to the green tea and vit c! My only ailment with this product was that the spout constantly leaked and I would lose a lot of product over time, but they have since replaced the spout and completely fixed that issue! Thanks YTTP :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SKIN: DRY ACNE PRONE  AGE: EARLY 20s This is honestly my fav fav cleanser. I just love how once I wash my face with this cleanser it feels so refreshing. It takes out my makeup, strips all the dirt but somehow my skin is still hydrated, smells fresh, the price in my opinion is perfect, get much less ml with this price if we compare it to other brands. FRESH SOY cleanser is also one of my personally fav it’s very close to my heart but that one is a lil too expensive for the amount of product we get so I just keep purchasing this one. This is what a cleanser is supposed to be like. Honestly please try it! Your skin would love it! I am currently on my second bottle rn!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser that I have used thus far! Cleans my sensitive skin and still leaves it moisturizer with a nice glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m officially converted to this cleanser and have bought the full size a few times now after trying a sample. I was a little reluctant to spend this much on a cleanser vs a serum or moisturizer, because cleansers don’t stay on the skin long enough to penetrate, but the results and the clean ingredients convinced me! I use this at night after melting off makeup with Drunk Elephant’s Slaai Makeup-Melting Butter cleanser. Gets the right amount of lather without feeling too stripping or drying. Bonus - smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So impressed with this stuff. Really bad ache prone skin. Cystic acne. Started using before I got on accutane and it was so gentle on my face, never made it feel tight or stripped. I also am using this on accutane and it is so amazing. Definitely get a good clean refreshed feel but it doesn’t feel like it’s taking more from my skin than it’s giving it. I’ve tried soooo many different face washes that’s the one thing that’s not consistent in my routine and this is by far my favorite I’ll be using this for a while.

reviews.review_title: Daily Driver for Over a Year
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't write too many reviews, but I figured I'd write one for this, incase anyone was thinking about taking the plunge. My advice? Do it!   I've been testing this product for over a year and it's one I haven't switched up on since I discovered it. Thats saying a lot because I'm a skincare junkie and love trying new stuff.  It is very gentle! Does not feel like it strips my skin dry. Never leaves any sort of residue. I've never broken out with this or felt like it gave me any issues. I feel like my face is gently cleansed and refreshed after each use. Honestly can't say any negatives! It would take a miracle product for me to leave this one behind. Give it a go:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 1st cleanser I found that truly leaves my skin and pores SUPER clean. After just using the trial size I saw a difference. 8 only use clean products and I can say without a doubt, this is my favorite so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this cleanser! It’s so gentle and doesn’t strip my skin but does a great job of cleaning it. It has a great thick gel consistency which i love, and It has such a light pleasant smell, just smells like dark leafy greens. Great for any skin type!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t ever leave reviews, but this is my holy grail cleanser! I love the fresh scent and it’s great at cleansing my skin without leaving it feeling dry or stripped of moisture. I use the Farmacy green clean cleansing balm first to remove any makeup from the day and then follow up with this. My skin feels so smooth, clean and refreshed afterwards! This is the first cleanser that I’ve really loved- I’ve always felt kind of “meh” about cleansers in the past and have never been excited about one until now. YTTP has slowly started to take over my skin care and it’s all thanks to this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome, gentle daily cleanser! It it has a super light scent, nice consistency and leaves your skin feeling squeaky clean, but not dry! Definitely a good addition to your routine if you're looking for a clean-ingredient, everyday cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing to my skin! When I started using it I had some darker spots on my face that were taking a long time to fade & after just a few washes they drastically reduced and now are basically gone! So glad I tried the BeautyReward - definitely will keep buying again & again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry / acne prone skin. Unfortunately this cleanser is not for me. I found it to be extremely drying. I'm now sticking to mainly oil/cream based cleansers and alternating with exfoliants instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive acne prone skin. Most cleansers Ive used either has a product I’m allergic to (my skin gets very itchy with bumps) or I’ll end up breaking out. I tried this over a year ago and so far I’ve bought 2 travel size, 2 8 oz and now I just purchased the 16 oz so I’ll never run out. My skin feels clean but not dry. I’ve tried other cleanser but usually can tell by using them once that they’re not as good as this one. This isn’t going to target any problems specifically but it won’t give you any issues. The only problem I have is the pump, it leaks and can be a major waste for product. So I just wash and reuse the travel size glass bottle instead. If you’re thinking about it, buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best cleanser I’ve used thus far. It doesn’t dry out my skin and leaves it feeling clean without any weird residue. I have combo skin and this works perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser that clean the skin, smell good, and still leaves the skin moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. My skin is combined and this product cleans without drying. This is my second bottle and will buy again. I recommend it 100%.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, I’ve been looking for a cleaner that would dry out my skin. This does the job, my face feels clean but not dry. I will try some of their other products because of this cleaner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product! after reading so many reviews I decided to purchased it and I'm so happy I did. I have oily, dry, sensitive skin so I have to be careful with what products I use. This cleanser left my face feeling super clean and fresh, I use it in the morning and night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great natural cleanser with excellent results. Youth to the people products are wonderful. This cleanser doesn’t really lather up, but it gets the job done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It fells very fresh on the skin and has a nice liquid/gel consistency. It leaves my skin feeling clean but not dry ou tight. A little bit goes a long way and I'm pretty sure that the medium size bottle (8oz) will last me about a year (I use it once a day, sometimes two). It's a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this stuff it agrees with my skin It make my skin nice and clean I’m very sensitive nothing Rarely agrees with me not even Clinique so I was shocked that this stuff didn’t irritate me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I think it’s a good cleanser if you have super oily skin. I have combo skin and it worked well for my oily t zone but it made my cheeks so dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser on earth. First and foremost it does not leave your skin dried out after use. It hydrated and left my skin feeling vibrant and refreshed.  My skin is normally dry and I’ve always had problems finding the proper cleaners and this.is.IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best gel cleansers I've ever tried! This product is super effective and does a great job at cleansing my skin. It is a gel cleanser that foams up but this does not dry out my skin or compromise my moisture barrier. I use this as a second cleanse in the evening mostly. The value refill size is a great deal as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is bomb for oily skin. You would not regret buying this....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily/combination skin, also acne-prone, and purchased this cleanser after seeing so many positive reviews and hearing Hyram rave about it. I like that it has no fragrance and leaves my face feeling clean without any residue. However, my face feels pretty dry/tight after cleansing and like I have to immediately moisturize. This makes me think that this cleanser is a bit too stripping/harsh for me, even with my oily skin. I purchased the mini size and will use that up to not waste it, but after I'm done I plan on purchasing the Krave Beauty Matcha Hemp cleanser instead as I've heard that one is less harsh/stripping.

reviews.review_title: Good, but a little too stripping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily/combination skin and am acne-prone, bought this cleanser after seeing Hyram rave about it and reading so many positive reviews. It didn't cause me any irritation or breakouts and my skin definitely feels clean afterwards. However, taking off 1 star because after I wash my face, it feels dry/tight and like I need to immediately moisturize. This makes me think that this cleanser is a bit too stripping/harsh even for my oily skin. I bought the mini size to try it out and will finish that, but am planning to try the Krave Beauty Matcha Hemp cleanser afterwards as I've heard that one is gentler and good for all skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The reason i have to give 3 stars is because of the packaging. Why would it be in a glass bottle? So easy to be broken & I dropped it a week after buying it and shattered everywhere. Very disappointed about this. Other than that, good cleanser and works well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells nice but unnecessarily strong like luxury hand soap. Make my skin dry The pump leaks every time I use Don’t think the ingredients are good for sensitive skin Don’t recommend this...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have a combination skin, it's just a okay cleanser. I like the ingredients and the fact that it's clean at Sephora but it doesn't help me with acne or dryer spots in my face. The smell is great but I don't feel refresh like the Tatcha enzyme powder (deep), the boscia black cleanser or the Amore Pacifics gentle cleanser (for dryer skin).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser my skin feels so hydrated afterward. The only thing I don't like is that I've noticed it has started leaking a lot.

reviews.review_title: I keep gravitating back to this cleanser!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly sensitive and dry skin which results in a majority of cleansers making my skin feel dried out and 'tight' after I cleanse. I try out a lot of different cleansers that are supposed to be geared towards people with dry and sensitive skin and this is the ONLY one that I keep gravitating back to! I  use an oil cleanser first then take a small amount of this cleanser and rub it in between be hands until I get a gentle foam and then use that to cleanse. It's quite gentle and has not irritated my finicky skin. Highly recommend this cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Zero regret of buying this product! Clean and non drying cleanser. So good that my fiancé stole this from me to his bathroom! This won’t remove your makeup but it’s a good daily cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! It feels so hydrating and you can just feel the difference! It actually feels refreshing on your skin and you just know that it deeply cleansed your face, I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hyram introduces me to this product in his Youtube videos and I just wanna say... I see the hype!!! I’m obsessed with this cleanser for my sensitive skin and it’s really made a difference with my uneven skin tone as well. I know the price is a bit intimidating, but it’s worth every cent! This is my go to cleanser now and this brand is flawless!

reviews.review_title: The BEST out there, hands down!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (Background: The Fresh Soy Cleanser was my HG for so long due to its gentleness and the amino acids however when my skin started having problems, it didn't work so well. Imagine my shock when it starting stinging and inflaming my face when I was using it!)  I don't have the best skin out there, but I do my best to make sure it is hydrated and protected. One of my favorite Youtubers gushes over this cleanser and I bought this along with their Vitamin C serum immediately after my irritating  cleansing fiasco.   After the first use, I immediately fell in love. It calmed my redness, evened out my skintone, made my skin super soft, and hydrated all of my dry areas.  I am on day 4 of using this in the AM and PM and my skin has been looking so much better. I have tried other cleansers before, but this one takes the trophy and my HEART. It is now my holy grail and I recommended this product to friends already!  YTTP cares about their brand and the values of their customers which is something I admire. Clean beauty is so important and their eco-friendly packaging gets an A+ from me. I am looking forward to trying their moisture cream next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has saved me. I used to suffer from acne breakouts all the time and on my nose I had blackheads that I could not get rid of. But now I have super clear skin that makes me not feel insecure about myself. I now don't have to wear foundation everywhere I go. Strongly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cleanser because when you first put it on your face it smells more like cucumber, spinach and green peppers mixed together. It was a good smell and after applying it on my face it left it shiny. As I rinsed it off it felt like a layer of dirt came off with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have super oily skin and this is great for my every day use! Doesn't dry out my skin but I can feel that my face is clean after each use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever, I’ve been looking for something that helps with my sensitive skin, due to stress I get breakouts and dermatitis and this baby took all the bad things away. It’s worth every penny, just don’t drop it because it’s a glass bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Hyram for recommending this product. This cleanser do all it claims to do: Deep cleanse your face but still gentle enough to not strip your face. Using this aside the Paula's Choice BHA literally clear out my skin from those tiny little bumps on my face that I've been struggling for years. It also gives my face a beautiful glow when I wake up in the morning. LOVE THIS SO MUCH!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not the best constancy, made my face feel weird and break out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is perfect for every day use. Removed makeup decently well, leaves my skin hydrated and soft. I’ve tried fresh soy cleanser and philosophy and this is by far better at truly cleaning the skin and removing makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! It has a nice, soft smell and feels fabulous on my skin. It’s gentle enough to use two a day. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely disappointed in this product. I have dry skin and never have acne. I can count on one hand how many times I break out a year and this product made me breakout with pimples and cyst all over my face and neck. I gave it one month to let my skin Purge and see if anything changes ...it just kept getting worse. I have Never seen my face so dry after using this face wash. The smell I liked because it gave a very clean scent, it does remove makeup and the bottle is nice , this is why I gave it two stars. In my opinion I felt this face wash really stripped the oils from my skin and I do not recommend this face wash. There is definitely better with a much more worth of that price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews for products unless they're straight-up amazing. And this is AMAZING! If you're hesitant to buy it, do yourself a favour and purchase this. This is the one cleanser where I have examined my skin and said wow. I bought this as a trial size late last year after watching and reading hundreds of reviews. I'm never going back. It's not stripping, drying, harsh or anything negative. It has no fragrance which is amazing because fragrance in skincare is usually a big no-no. It is a gel consistency and cooling on the skin. It cleanses the skin so deeply and thoroughly yet there's no heavy stripping. I have oily skin and wow this is just amazing. I can't speak highly enough about this cleanser. Would rate it 10,000 stars if I could!!! Thank you, Youth To The People!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is so finicky.  This cleanser does the job, smells good, and is perfect for my HM skin.  I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal-ish skin which is a little more dry in the winter. This cleanser feels and smells wonderful but is definitely too drying for my skin in the winter. I may give it another go in the summer before I finally decide to not use it. It was nice that it was a clean product and that it did not irritate my skin or break me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It has completely replaced my daily cleanser which is amazing! Could rave about this item even more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product works great! It leaves my skin completely clear even if I use it to wash off makeup and is super gentle feeling and doesn’t hurt over irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was confused with the refill size bottle. I thought if you buy that bottle you could go in store and refill it once you are done with the product instead of buying more bottles?  Anyways  I’m buying the 8 oz to try it out. Seems good... Spring sale yey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite cleanser! It is made with high quality ingredients without all the additives that shouldn’t be in skincare products. It does a great job at removing any remaining cleansing balm left over from removing my make up and leaves my skin feeling soft and fresh. There is no “tightness” after using like I have felt with other cleansers. I don’t feel like I have to RUN to the moisturizer after using. I have naturally dry skin and follow this up with a select few serums, high quality moisturizers, and end with a night cream. I have not had any issues with dryness with this cleanser, but my routine is packed with well thought out hydrating products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have acne-prone, sensitive, combination skin. this cleanser is perfect for me because it cleans thoroughly without stripping my skin. i love the ingredients and i think this is definitely worth the price. i’ve already gone through countless bottles of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i heard so many great reviews, but this dried my skin out so badly! i have really oily skin, and this just made it do a full 180!

reviews.review_title: Best Facial Cleanser for Sensitive Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me, this is the best facial cleanser for my sensitive skin.  It is gentle, it doesn't strip the moisture from your skin after washing and it also give your skin some good stuffs like vitamins. And most importantly it is a clean product at Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and it’s hard to find a face wash that is good but doesn’t leave my skin feeling tight. This is a really good face wash compared to other ones I’ve tried. Sometimes I have to use 2 pumps to get off my makeup but that’s when I wear a lot. On days I don’t wear makeup or just mascara, half a pump works. Probably my favorite face wash I have used so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: BEST CLEANSER EVER!!!!! This product has completely transformed my skin! It cleans the skin beautifully but does not overstrain. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was trying to find a new clean cleanser from Sephora. I have combination oily, acne prone skin. I heard about this product from the YouTuber Hyram. I bought the full sized and used it for about two weeks. My skin started to have dry patches and would flake off. My skin became really dry when I usually have more oily skin in my t-zone. My t-zone started to become congested and I started to get little pimples and clogged pores. I love how this company is very eco-friendly and conscious about the environment, but this cleanser was too drying for me. I would recommend getting the smaller size before purchasing the whole thing.

reviews.review_title: Nice scent, non drying, clean product.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in one of the Sephora Favorite during Christmas and I loved it.  The same kit also has the Glow Recipe Blueberry Cleanser.  Both cleanses really well however I find the Glow Recipe is very drying.  It leaves my skin feeling tight and dry after, and thats on my oily skin so its a big no.  This YTTP cleanser does not cause dryness and my skin is less oily after using it.  It also smell amazing and a clean product so why not.  Appreciate that it comes with a pump as the sample size(a glass jar opening) was hard to dispense.  I hope they will come up with refill pouches so I can reuse this glass jar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I love this stuff. I've bought several bottles. First off, it's CF, so that's a plus. This cleanser is great for removing makeup, even mascara, although for waterproof mascara, I still need a micellar water product to get everything off. This has a cooling and comforting feeling when I put it on, and it doesn't irritate my sensitive, acne prone skin. It has a light smell, that doesn't linger. I wish they had the pump for the jumbo bottle like they had for last year's Earth Day, but I'll keep this stocked no matter what.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry sensitive skin and this was refreshing, I could feel it cleaning my skin. It left my skin smooth but dry and itchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is just OK. It doesn’t leave my skin super hydrated, but doesn’t make it feel super stripped either, it just doesn’t do much for my skin but the scent is pretty nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this cleanser so many times. It is my all time favorite. Super gentle and doesn't strip the skin while still removing all of my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My search for my forever cleanser is over. This product has been game changing. It's gentle and leaves my skin feeling clean. I don't feel dry after using this product like I have with others. I love that this jar is glass and can be recycled or used for something else in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So gentle and makes my skin feel toned. Less aggressive than the acne control cleanser of Clinque...love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this product: my face felt clean after using it and I appreciated that it was “CLEAN AT SEPHORA”.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I've ever used. Cleansing without drying or stripping the skin dry. This is my forever cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample with my last purchase and I'm in love. Beautiful texture and leaves my skin feeling nourished and comfortable. Make sure to massage in the skin for 30 seconds for full experience. Will definitely buy full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BUY THIS CLEANSER. I have struggled with acne for years now and this cleanser is amazing. Super gentle, non stripping, and helps keep my acne under control. When I ran out of my first bottle I was without this for about a month and I have never missed something more! All my acne came back, my skin was dull, and I had more discolouration. Just purchased my second bottle and it’s starting to help my face again :)

reviews.review_title: Great Product but Sephora Increased Price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is normally $36, they jacked up the price to $47 during the sale! I love the smell of this cleanser, I first tried with a sample. It makes my skin feel great however save your money and buy elsewhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before I buy anything I always read all the reviews so if you're like me reading the reviews right now - BUY THIS CLEANSER!! You will not regret it, I have been struggling with acne for many years and after the first use of this cleanser I noticed huge results. Will buy this cleanser again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over a year now, and I love it. It has cleared my complexion up since using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to do a refresh of my skin care routine and stumbled upon this cleanser. Previously I was using the philosophy clear days ahead cleanser which I found to leave my skin tight and dry during the winter months. This cleanser is a new favorite for me as it’s a clean product, doesn’t leave my skin feeling stripped but instead it feels refreshed and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've struggled with acne for many years and once I tired out this cleanser it really did change my skin!! It's great for really sensitive skin and dry skin. I absolutely love and recommend this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i liked it it felt nice on my face but too expensive dont think i will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Switches from Dermalogica to this for a more clean product and did not disappoint does a great job.

reviews.review_title: I like it, but full size is too expensive!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the 2oz  size of this cleanser the Sephora Clean Favorites box, and I really like it. It is gentle, has a light and pleasant smell, does not leave my skin feeling tight, and most importantly has clean ingredients. However, I cannot bring myself to spend over $40 for a cleanser that doesn't wow me, when I can get something similar for $20-$30. Would have loved to purchase the full size, but it is just too expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this after using the Glow Recipe blueberry cleanser for some time, but that just became too harsh for my skin. This YTTP cleanser is amazing. It is gentle enough to not strip my skin or leave it feeling right, but effective enough to thoroughly clean my skin. I have acne prone skin and I find this works really well to keep my skin balanced and clear. My skin is definitely combination (dry cheeks and chin, oily nose and forehead) so I would definitely recommend this cleanser for any skin type. I have purchased several bottles of this over the last year and I will never switch to anything else because this is the most effective yet gentle cleanser I have found. You should buy this right now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially got this as a small sample, and really liked it. Couple months go by, and I was running low on my old cleanser when I remembered this, so I purchased it. I had dry skin turned dehydrated/oily. I have a very good olfactory sense, and this turned me off just a bit with the spinachy scent. It didn't strip my skin or make it feel too tight or dry. Rinses off wonderfully and didn't sting near my sensitive eyes.  If you have allergies to botanical extracts, however, maybe stay away. The ingredients are lovely and I wish I could've continued using this, but I developed texture, tiny bumps, and itchiness on my face. If you don't have flower allergies though, I'd highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cus it really cleans deep in my skin & makes my skin so much smoother! I have really dry skin like flakey dry but this product doesn’t dry it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Already purchased my second one! Mom loves it, I love it and even boyfriend loves it!!! And I’m sure you will love it!  Lathers very nicely and leaves skin feeling awake and refreshed! It’s a healthy smoothie for your face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleaner doesn’t do anything to wow me. It has a nice clean scent, gets the job done, but nothing that another face wash can’t do. THE PACKAGING IS A WASTE. I put this bottle in my shower, as I mostly wash my face while I’m in there. The hotter the shower gets, the more the product leaks out. Most of the letters have come completely off the bottle, and it’s a waste of product. Won’t repurchase again for this reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new holy grail! I have struggled finding a good cleanser since I started washing my face, but this one is truly so good. So fresh smelling (not in a fragrance-y way, just natural) and so gentle on the skin. If you have sensitive and acne prone - it’s definitely worth the investment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is good but it didn’t wow me. The smell is a little odd. It did leave my skin feeling soft and hydrated. But a better cleanser for me is fresh soy cleanser. That’s my HG cleanser and nothing has come close to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite cleanser. For glowing skin you don’t need harsh cleansers and this perfectly cleans all the oil and dirt from my face, but leaves it feelings amazingly soft (without feeling oily) and leaves it glowing. I bought the tester size at first to try it (along with 6 other different cleansers) and this one was my favourite, just purchased the full size. The only downside to the tester I had purchase was that it had a screw on lid and leaked quite a bit and was hard to not get a lot out of the bottle at once so I ended up using it up really quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, it is on the pricey side but SO worth it. I use it in the morning, and at night I use it after my Josie Maran oil cleanser and it is just divine! On its own it removes makeup pretty well, but you should still use a makeup remover prior to using this cleanser.   I wash my face for about a minute, and it foams up really nice. After I rinse my face it leaves my skin feeling plump and smooth. This product is one of my alltime favs, and I can't imagine this not being in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite cleanser!  It smells super clean and organic like spinach and my face feels so perfect after using it.  I do not like that the pump cannot be closed after popping it, SO IT IS NOT TRAVEL FRIENDLY, which is my only complaint.  I have bought it twice now and have now bought the big refill bottle as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loooove this cleanser! Not stripping and yet efficient, leaves skin soft and clean but not dry. I alternate between this one and Glossier's milky jelly, this one's less stripping. I don't really believe in their claimed benefits in regards to spinach and green tea effects on the skin, but it is a really great cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cleansers! Smells and feels amazing. Does not remove makeup well. If you have a full face of makeup, remove makeup first, and double cleanse! The mini is great for travel, but definitely invest in the full-size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Every time I use this my face feels so clean and refreshed after. Definitely a go to everyday cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves face feeling fresh and clean, doesn't really help with acne.

reviews.review_title: Its Expensive But Does Its JOB. The right one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I Have tried so many cleansers where they would make my face super dry and weird. This was just beyond amazing! when i put  1 pump of this cleanser on my face for  1 min in circular motion and washed it off i did not feel any dryness i felt it more hydration. I can see my acne fading away little at a time. Overall i feel like it does its job better then other brands i have tried. Get a sample and for sure try it out!  DOWNFALL: its so expensive !! i only get it on 20% sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. I have very dry and sensitive skin, since I started using YTTP products my skin started to look so much better. Definitely will buy forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a really good cleanser. Won't strip your skin and your face feels super clean afterwards. I just don't personally love the smell, it has a very earthy smell to it which you would probably expect due to the ingredients. However, overall super good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! It’s a gel and it smells good. I have super sensitive skin and I was accutane twice, but this cleanser didn’t cause a bad reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leave my skin fresh and clean, helps a bit with my acne. It's a good eco friendly option!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: HOLY GRAIL. I love this cleanser so much, I am literally on my third bottle. It is perfect. It makes my face feel super clean and refreshed without overly drying and I can't use anything else. a few weeks ago I ran out and had to use another cleanser while this one shipped and my skin was not even close to as good. This is so gentle but effective with awesome, soothing, superfood ingredients and I just love it. Also, the packaging is recycled and the glass bottle is recyclable (much better than plastic) also it's vegan and cruelty-free and the bottle lasts me (I use it once or twice a day depending on what my skin needs) about 3 months, so it lasts a long time for the price. JUST FYI this is not a makeup remover and I would use it as part of a double cleanse system with cleansing oil or balm if you wear makeup or sunscreen :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t dry out my skin or cause me to break out. Improves the overall shower experience with a lovely scent. Very cute bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had been a longtime user of the Fresh Soy face wash but recently discovered the brand is not cruelty free so I've been looking for an alternative. I like how this product feels and smells natural. I like the pump because I find I use less product. I'm not sure that it leaves my face completely clean so I always follow with a micellar water, especially to wipe off eye makeup. But then again, that's not really what it's for. Overall I like it, I've just tried natural cleansers that work the same and are cheaper so I'm not convinced I'll repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this cleanser it cleans my face really good and doesn’t overly strip my face it’s a little over priced but it is my favourite thank u Sephora for showing me this product for my face I have struggled to find a cleanser that cleanses my face very good and doesn’t make it dry thank u yttp

reviews.review_title: good but happy I only bought a mini
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser most nights and I do have to say I like it. It makes my skin feel nice and clean without being dry. Don’t know if I like it better than my glamglow or my drunk elephant that I use daily but it’s definitely a good cleanser. I’m happy I only bought the mini size as opposed to the large one to say the least but it’s definitely good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING! the best products out there for any skin type. I am obsessed with using this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product does a fine and clean job of cleansing.  I take issue with the dispenser.  The temperature in my shower fluctuates widely, causing the product to flow up and out through the pump, dripping onto the shower floor.  It's a total waster of an product.  I won't buy it again for this reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I've been using it for almost 2 months now and it hasn't made my skin breakout or dry me out, which is key for me because my skin is suuuuper dry. I got the travel size one to try out but its been almost 2 months now and I'm only half way through it. $13 for that is awesome. Great deal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this product it doesn’t irritate my skin or break me out and my skin overall feels pretty clean and not stripped after washing off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used up most of this product and it did nothing for my face...I was talked into it by a Sephora employee that the natural ingredients would help my sensitive skin and help my dryness.  It didn't help even after 3 months. I wouldn't recommend to anyone that is dry.   The scent does smell nice but I feel like you will get better results with Josie Maran's clean @ Sephora line.

reviews.review_title: Its a good cleanser, does what it should do
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i’m not sure why this product is getting a couple negative reviews, I thought it was pretty good. Sure it doesn’t do anything miraculous to the face, but it does want a cleanser is supposed to do; which is clean your face. So it leaves my skin a bit dry after washing, but you have to make sure you use a toner and then a moisturizer after. I like that its a ‘clean’ product because i’ve used other cleansers with lots of chemicals and added scents which irritated my skin a bunch, so finding this cleanser really helped my skin a lot. I’ve been using it 2x a day for about a month and a half and its almost halfway used, so I would say it would take a little over three months for it to be used up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although it smells super nice, it did nothing for my skin, I would recommend it as a body wash but it did nothing for my face. I had such high hopes for it as I’ve heard only good things, I’m not sure if that’s why I’m disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this a little under a month, twice a day everyday. I bought it in place on origins - zero oil wash. I l loved zero oil, but it’s too drying for winter and early spring.  Unfortunately , this is just as drying. I will resume using it once it gets a bit warmer out. It’s keeping my face clear though FYI

reviews.review_title: STOP READING REVIEWS AND ORDER IT ALREADY
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this! it cleans my face without leaving my skin feeling tight, and reduced the appearance of my pimples after one wash. it makes my skin feel so healthy, so stop reading comments and buy this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this is one of very few cleansers I have tried that actually removed all of the oil from my face. Jelly cleansers always leave some oil on my face and this does a great job of thoroughly cleansing without over drying my face. It has a very light, natural scent and looks cool, I do not use the pump, I refill my smaller bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product removed and cleanses very nicely, plus I love the glass packaging. But it leaves my skin so dry! I’m disappointed, because I liked the feeling of that cleansing when applying it. Well, too bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever used. It cleans off all my face make up and doesn't leave my face feeling dry like most cleansers too. My skin feels really good and clean after I use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this because I needed a travel cleanser for my trip to Hawaii, now that my plans have been delayed due to sheltering in place I have tested out the product at home. I must say, I am pleasantly surprised with the results of this cleanser. I'm not a huge fan of oil cleansers but have heard good things about this brand so I figured I would give it a go. I now am contemplating on buying the full size cleanser because I am really enjoying how my skin feels during and after cleansing. It doesn't have a potent smell and no oily residue after cleansing. I have combo skin and this gives me the oomph I need to get my day started! =)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first started using this product, I was worried because my skin started breaking out. Little did I know that it was actually from a different product. (Paula's Choice). This cleanser is awesome, it takes my makeup and sunscreen off without needing to double cleanse. It does not dry my skin out too much considering how dry my skin is naturally and the packaging is really cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! To me is very similar and in my opinion an almost exact dupe of the La mer cleansing gel .Fresh clean feeling afterwards, doesn’t dry out face, feels very nice and very nicely scented not strong perfume. Very mild face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best product ever. It really cleared my pores and make my skin shine. I usually have super sensitive skin, but this product was really perfect! A must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I first got this as a rewards and I noticed that it helped maintain my acne. I stopped using it for a while and my acne got worse (due to many factors). I decided buy the actual product and it really does maintain my acne. I have hormonal acne from my BC. I use this as a morning wash and at night I would use an acne wash. Having this has a gentle face wash really helps to not strip and over irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this cleanser as a sample a few months ago and noticed an improvement on my skin right away. After going back and forth between a couple other cleansers I landed back on this one. It lathers up well and make my face feel so soft and clean! So far I have not experienced any dryness after using. I follow with the YTTP adaptogen deep moisturizing cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I know most products say to test out in a small area before using but I've never had a reaction to any product ever. I washed my face with this product and I ended up getting super red and swollen, which took a couple days to subside. I loved the smell and I like supporting green companies and I wasn't 100% sure it was because of this product. I tested it out again a week later (smaller area) with a similar reaction. I returned the product. I didn't want to give it a low review because there are great things about this product but unfortunately it's just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with acne and for a long time, and all I have to say is this works wonders! My breakouts basically stopped and it cleared my skin.  It leaves your skin feeling light, refreshed, and moisturized. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail!! I’ve purchased this 3 or 4 times now and every time I end up using another cleanser that I’ve received from another brand as a sample I end up going right back to using this! It does lather a bit but does not leave my skin feeling dry or tight after

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lathers good and my face feels clean. I have sensitive skin and I’m very leery of putting anything on my skin. Being that this was a clean brand I gave it a try. I’m glad I did. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEEEEE!!!!!!! This is a must have.  I’ve used Image Green Tea Cleanser for use so adding this into my routine was a stretch.  I’m glad I did, it’s amazing.  Gives skin a natural glow.  I use with the silicon face scrubber (also purchased from Sephora) and it makes such a difference.  Actually gets into my pores and deep cleans.    I always run my purchases through my ESTHETICIAN  first for ingredient reviews.  Contains Vitamin C and Chamomile!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the clean ingredients and how clean my skin feels! I also love the glass bottle and I think the packaging was recyclable! I use a bunch of (clean) products and this is my favorite part of my multi-step routine because it’s gentle, foams up the perfect amount, and calms down any redness and inflammation I have. I’ve been recommending this to everyone I know!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED!!! I have very normal skin with tough redness along the jawline and on cheeks.  This cleanser thoroughly cleans while leaving my skin feeling soft and hydrated and greatly reducing the redness! Bought the trial size and now I'm hooked

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this out..I loved it for the first few times but like other reviews, it’s drying. It definitely stripped my skin of natural oils and I will be exchanging this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Environmental friendly glass bottle.. great product. you get what a high-end cleaner gives you for a fraction of the price.. very please w/ this purchase will order again :)

reviews.review_title: Best fave wash I’ve personally tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite face wash. I’ve tried a few other high end ones and wasn’t wowed so I just used cetaphil or spectrogram for the last couple of years. This is such a pleasant face wash to use. Smells great, foams up nicely, and easy to rinse off. I use micellar water to remove makeup and then I use this and rinse off. Makes face washing more enjoyable for me so I’m likely to buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail. Love it. I keep repurchasing. Super gentle but also leaves my face completely clean. Does not break out my cystic acne prone skin even when pregnant. It can be hard to get as it flies off the shelves but worth the wait.

reviews.review_title: The search is over for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty sure I’ve found my life long face wash. I’m always in the market for finding holy grail items, and I can be honest and say this will be a staple for me. It’s refreshing, light, and clean. I’ve even got my boyfriend to skin care because of this. Will never go without. I love the glass packaging too, makes me feel luxurious in a way. I’d say if you are on the fence, ask for a sample and you’ll know right away if this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my 2nd purchase of this! The glass bottle is gorgeous, the smell is clean and green. It has a nice thick gel texture so a little goes a long way.  It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and nourished. Not drying at all!

reviews.review_title: Love that you can purchase a small one to see if y
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Anoher go I clean makeup, smells good, feels refreshing and now I can switch It up with philosophy cleanser. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this when the idiot skin tech who did a chemical peel on me told me that after three days I could continue to use the medicated face wash I had been using.
