The next morning my skin was so unbelievably dry and cracked and bleeding in some areas. The temperature had also dropped about ten degrees so my already tortured skin was just crispy - it was awful.  In addition to finding medical grade strength moisturizer safe for acne prone skin (I used belif brand cream and gel layered together also bought from Sephora) I needed a gentle face wash that would still keep my acne prone skin clean during the peeling process. I chose this one and just prayed and thankfully it worked. It was so gentle on my compromised skin and was so effective that I still use it now as my regular face wash. I double wash with my medicated cleanser and this does such a good job I only follow with the medicated one twice a week. I will see in summer when my skin isn’t so dry if this still goes the job (I have combo skin very reactive to the weather) but for dry winter chapped skin this is gentle and effective at getting skin clean.

reviews.review_title: Lots of Hype, Very Few Benefits
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product, as I am a fan of the Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Mask. However, this cleanser was not very kind to my skin. I used it for about two weeks, and saw a noticeable decline in my skin's texture. Although I have somewhat blemished skin, the surface texture is generally smooth (so long as I stay hydrated.) This product seemed to cause a bumpy texture, so I was forced to discontinue my usage.   This cleanser is very lightweight, and lathers minimally. I found myself using a large amount of product, because I struggled to feel sufficiently cleansed when using a dime-sized drop. It is not over-drying, which is an aspect that I liked about it. I have had worse reactions to other cleansers, but this is unfortunately not a product that I will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Espectacular! Deja una sensación de bienestar en el rostro.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Little goes a long way. The scent is great and it doesn't make my face feel tight or dry afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really really wanted to love this product :( A skin care specialist at Sephora used it, along with many other products, on my face during a skin treatment. She highly recommend it so I got a sample and tried it at home. After using it my skin was feeling dry and breaking out. I went back to my drunk elephant cleanser after finishing the sample. My skin rebounded and I forgot about it. When I ran out of my tried-and-true DE cleanser, I wanted to try something else. I love the way the super food cleanser smells and despite how many people complain about the packaging  I love it. The pump bottle is attractive and convenient and it comes with a screw top for travel. So despite my experience with the sample I gave it a go. My skin started looking worse within a couple times of using it :-/ I’ve experienced face washes that don’t necessarily improve anything but never one that made my skin worse. I wanted to love it so much but c’est la vie. It seems to work great for some people, I’m just not one of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: People's gushing reviews of this product are, frankly, baffling. At best this product can be described as functional. It comes in a nice glass bottle and has an inoffensive smell of crushed greenery. That's about where the list of good qualities ends.  I bought this product as an upgrade from my drug-store brand face wash I've used without issue for over a decade. It has actively and noticeably made my skin worse in the full month that I've been using it. My face skin has tiny raised bumps that are new since starting use, and there's a noticeable increase in redness all over my face from before I started using it. I've removed other products from my regimen thinking it was them causing this, but after swapping things out over time I've realised this product is the culprit.   The product is runny and doesn't foam when rubbed in your hands or applied anywhere. I find I have to use far more of this face wash as other brands of face wash to get any kind of foam in my hands before it runs off  I am looking forward to switching back to my simple and affordable drug-store brand face wash and getting my unruddied and smooth skin back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! This is the only safe, gentle cleanser I've found to use on my 5 and 9 year old sons. Initially, the packaging is why I bought the product (it's stunning!) and then after discovering how wonderful the ingredients were and using it for myself, I started using it on my sons. It is perfect for them. They do not need strong actives at their age. I love using this with my inflamed, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It never drys out my skin, it smells great and I like the ingredients. It's great on full makeup days or no make up days. Nice lather and nice packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the best cleanser I've ever tried. Gentle, not stripping and hasn't made me break out since buying it a month ago

reviews.review_title: Great! You don’t need too much of it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t used it enough yet to know if I LOVE IT love it but so far it’s great, cleans really well, if I don’t use too much of it it doesn’t feel like my face gets too clean and too dryed out, its very concentrated which is good but don’t take too much of it a little goes a lobg way on this one. It feels really fresh and clean. Smells good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down best cleanser ever. I get that clean feeling without drying my face out. Has a very light natural smelling scent. I recommend this to people who have a bad skin barrier.

reviews.review_title: normal to dry skin holy grail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this product for myself but I’m struggling with acne and had to switch to something else. My boyfriend still uses this and loves it. If you have normal to dry skin this cleanser is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser as a daily cleanser. I will continue to buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the feel and smell after using this for some time. After a double cleanse I love using this, leaves my skin feeling hydrated, smooth and plump. Doesn’t feel stripping at all. Also noticed it helped brighten my skin (along with my vitamin C serum).

reviews.review_title: Good product, but evaporates in bottle after use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself does a fine job at cleansing my face. I gave this cleanser 3 stars, though, because of packaging issues. I keep this cleanser in my shower, and I have noticed that after every hot shower I take, the product evaporates. This is an issue as I paid for the full amount of the product, expecting to be able to use every ounce of cleanser sent to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only cleanser I have tried that prevents my horrible acne and doesn’t dry out my face!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Pricey but it is worth it if you have problem skin like me. I’ve had acne since highschool but my skin has never been better using yttp products. This wash is definitely a staple in my skincare routine and I would highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love love love this product!!! It’s incredible! I love everything youth to the people stands for and they make a darn great product
Does not dry out my skin and cleaned my skin excellent. Very good for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. I have sensitive dry skin, and this product works perfectly for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s my fault cleanser, gave it four stars bc it’s a good cleanser but it does not have any WOW factor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleaned my skin okay, but definitely not my favorite or not the worst one I’ve tried. The smell is nice though. 3/5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love! It leaves my skin clean without feeling stripped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this cleanser! I recommend it to anyone.  It is not over-drying and leaves your skin with a gorgeous hydrated feeling after you rinse it off. I just bought the full size one after trying this mini size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this with really high hopes, but I was a little let down. It smells great and doesn't leave my skin really tight after, like most face washes do, but that is about it. My skin does not feel thoroughly cleansed and I have been breaking out the past few months which was not the case prior to purchasing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this product! It is very kind to my sensitive skin, does not leave any residue or leave my skin dry. I will definitely recommend to someone who has sensitive skin and is recovering from a bad product experience.

reviews.review_title: Good cleanser for makeup but doesn’t help acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and used it for two weeks. It cleanses my skin nicely and removes makeup, the smell is nice and gentle but it does nothing for my acne prone skin. My acne is just as bad while using it which for me is something I also want from a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really looking forward to try this cleanser after all the good feedback I’ve heard about it. I heard it’s supposed to be really gentle cleanser which it is, but unfortunately it does leave my skin very dry... I know it had worked for other people but I’m not one of them.  I would still say it’s worth trying but have in mind if you have a very dry skin like me it might not work for you. :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product so badly, but I don’t. It doesn’t lather at all, which makes it hard to feel the product on your face when cleansing. I don’t necessarily feel clean or refreshed after use either. It’s so meh. I do like the smell and the bottle, but that’s it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok product, was neither impressed or disappointed in it. Does the job of cleansing but I didn't notice any changes in my skin. One frustrating thing is that it drips out of the spout for a few minutes after using. Will not repurchase, there are definitely much better, higher quality products out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the small one to test it out, It works wonders for my combination skin. I have now bought the biggest I could get before I run out of my old one because I can’t take a shower without applying this now. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a really big fan of this cleanser. I don't necessarily have sensitive skin, but sometimes I do react to stuff but this cleanser was a win! If you're unsure I would definitely recommend buying the mini version to test it out. The only thing I wish was that it was in a plastic bottle as opposed to glass because I would like to bring it in the shower. I'm afraid it'll break if I do!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a good cleanser and skincare routine for years! I have a bad habit of trying a product for a while then moving on because I'm not satisfied. Thats not the case here. I went through a whole bottle and repurchased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really into this product.  I have really problematic skin.  Blackheads, pores, cystic acne, redness, and to top it all off, my skin is dry and sensitive.  You don't need a lot, I use about a pea-sized amount.  I find that it cools, tones down the redness, and helps decrease the amount of acne that comes up on my face.  It lathers nicely, and it removes makeup very well, especially with a double cleanse to remove any face makeup.  The only reason I am taking off a star is that I find my face is a little tight, but again I do have dry skin. I combat this by using warm, not hot water, and it's not too bad.  Then  I follow this up with a moisturizer, and it's not a problem for me.  I strongly recommend getting at least the mini size to try it out and upgrading to the larger size if you find it works for you.  It's a little bit pricey for me, especially compared to other drugstore brands and face cleansers, but I have yet to find a drugstore brand that compares to this, so I am willing to pay the extra few dollars for my skin.  Again, strongly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can blame this cleanser for my clear skin. Before I started using it I would get breakouts on my chin and cheeks and they would often leave scars but now the pimples and scars have vanished! I will definitely repurchase this product again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great , gives a fresh clean without drying out my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this, I mix in a little tea tree oil and my skin is flawless and so clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought the mini to try after a recommendation from a friend and I loved it so I invested in the full size cleanser. I have acne prone combination skin and it has done wonders for my skin! I use it in the morning and night, it is the perfect cleanser for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good and did not make my skin so dry at all. Love it, good for dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this brand and I live of the Hydra firm eye cream. Unfortunately my skin had a bad reaction to this face wash. It was gentle and smelled good. I though maybe it was a bad skin week but the breakouts continued after a couple weeks of using this. I would still recommend others to try it, but by the $10 mini first and test it out.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST CLEANSER TO FEED YOUR SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive and combination skin. this cleanser has been amazing! I use typically a dime to penney sized amount both morning and night and work it into my skin for about 30-60 seconds. Theres no sent and it does lather a bit. my skin is so sensitive that i basically get small chemical burns if i don’t use the right stuff and i’ve NEVER had an issue with this cleanser. 10/10 i recommend this to anyone with any skin type!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best cleaner i’ve ever used! it doesn’t leave my skin tight or dry after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is absolutely a life saving product. Seriously I can’t use any other cleanser since I have a very sensitive skin type. This makes my skin feel extremely soft and prevents from acnes and redness. Normally any other cleansers make some burn when I  wash my face but this one not! You only need a tiny amount and it will spread through your face perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing cleanser! you can tell it's strong but not stripping to the skin. I have semi sensitive acne-prone skin and this works wonders for my skin. definitely one of my favourites

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had the perc facial with this cleanser before and seemed to really like it. I loved how it was very natural. The smell is amazing, but unfortunately it has caused a bad reaction to my skin. I have used for about 2 weeks...my skin is breaking out like crazy. Just the small surface level ones, but normally I have perfectly clear skin. My skin texture is also very dry and the texture of my skin is no longer soft and supple. I have combination skin, but it still takes away too many oils from the skin.

reviews.review_title: In regard to the Refill size 16 oz.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Took one star off because last year when a 16 oz. size was released for Earth Day, this cleanser was $54—now it’s made a comeback as a refill and it is $64. That’s a $10 jump ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product soooo much I will never go back to another cleanser. It is so light and refreshing and smells amazing. Cleans without making the skin feel stripped or tight. I do have pretty normal skin without many specific concerns so it might be better for that skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The concept of this is great - a clean, light cleanser. However, the execution is horrible. It is incredibly drying. I use this only when my skin is makeup free and extra oily because that’s the only time it doesn’t feel stripped after. If you wear even the littlest bit of makeup, you have to double cleanse with this. Definitely stay away from this if you have dry or normal to dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not mad but expected more(GOING BACK TO DRUG STORE COEANSERS). I bought this expensive cleanser expecting it to be a holy grail cleanser and I can ditch my other ones. Not the case, this cleanser is decent, seems more for oily skin because it is a bit stripping without the satisfaction of feeling well cleanser. I struggle with acne and this did not help at all. My drug store cleansers do a much better job keeping my skin looking good. (Heard of this from hyrum but def overrated)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I died and went to heaven and the angles smelled of spinach and green tea, THIS is what they would smell like.  I am extremely picky about fragrances.  This is so delightful, that it makes me wash my face at night, even when I'm tired, and I don't feel like it.  And yes... the cleanser is also nice. ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I normally use cleansers from tarte but I wanted to try something different. I luckily only got the travel size. First, I want to point out that this comes in glass, which I did not know. As I was using it in the shower, of course I dropped it, and the top half shattered. Now, I know that's my personal problem and not the reason for the 1 star. The reason for the 1 star is because this is a bad cleanser. I did get to try it a few times before I broke it, and every time it did not remove makeup or impurities well. I would follow with my toner and there was all kinds of stuff left behind that the cleanser did not get. It also left my skin feeling very tight and stripped. So not only did it strip my face of moisture, it left all the dirt behind. Do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this product didn’t work for me! I have skin that is sensitive and slightly on the dry side and it leaves my skin skin red and feeling tight. When I try put moisturizer on after using it, my skin burns.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A nice non-stripping cleanser but doesn’t necessarily help my skin or change my skin in any way.

reviews.review_title: Definitely a WIN for the SKIN!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love thew smell of it and the after feel. My skin feels soft and smooth so I need only little moisturizing afterwards. It doesn't foam as much as some other brands but it definitely is easy to spread around the face. I found it a little harder to wash off however, but it definitely leaves this fresh feel afterwards. But I definitely like this product and will be likely ordering more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most amazing, non-stripping, clean ingredient cleanser out there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to this after using the Soy cleanser religiously for two years. I appreciate the light smell and gentle lather of this product. it cleans my normal-oily skin without drying me out. No noticeable difference in my skin after months of use. My only complaint is that I feel the formula of the mini is different from the full size. I purchased the mini twice before biting the bullet on the bigger one and that formula seemed to be a thicker gel with a frothier foam. Aside from that I find that the pump delivers way too much product. Half a pump is more than enough to cleanse the face. Not sure if I'll be rebuying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive and dry skin but like to use several makeup products and am a skincare junkie and go through a skincare ritual every day and night to ensure my skin stays supple.  This product does the job as a gel cleanser, doesn't irritate my sensitive skin and is a good bang for your buck (compared to the fresh soy cleanser, extremely comparable). The smell makes me feel like i'm throwing a bottle from the pressed juice 3 collection onto my face. So if you hate juice cleanses, you might get irritated from the smell~ but i'm in love.   This product would've gotten a 5 star from me BUT THE PACKAGING IS A MESS. I didn't understand why it was always so messy at the bottom of the bottle with a rim of product dried but I realized the pump leaks every so often and drips down the center of the bottle. LOVE the product but they have to fix their packing ASAP ~ gets messy after awhile and wastes product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the mini size to test out about two months ago, since I had heard so many good things about this cleanser and wanted to see what the hype was about.  Pros: It is very gentle. I don't wash my face in the morning, but if you do, this is a nice gentle option that won't make your skin feel stripped and dry first thing in the morning. It has a light, non-perfumey fresh scent; this might sound weird, but it smells like a green smoothie. Either way, it's a nice scent that is not harsh at all.  Cons, and why I won't be buying the full size: It is very gentle. If I put makeup on, I double cleanse in the evening and I've found that this cleanser is not enough to completely get off any extra makeup or residue left from the cleansing balm. I have to triple cleanse in the evenings after washing off makeup, if I'm using this cleanser. For the price, I want this to be able to at least get leftover makeup off my face after already going in with a cleansing balm and this cannot do that.  Overall, it is a very nice gentle cleanser and I do like using it when I'm not washing off makeup. I just personally don't like having multiple cleansers when I know I can get one that does it all, and at a cheaper price point (I've used the La Roche Posay Toleriane foaming cleanser and the Simple Moisturizing Gentle cleanser and both are great options, get makeup off perfectly fine, and are at most groceries and drugstores).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The actual product itself is great - it was gentle on my skin, and I did notice a difference in my skin being clearer after using it.  However my biggest complaint is the packaging.  The pump leaks (seemingly randomly) so I would constantly have to clean the spot where the bottle was sitting and wipe the bottle itself.  I’ve seen this on the tester bottles in Sephora stores too, so I know it’s not just mine.  Definitely product that has been wasted which is unfortunate and I won’t likely buy it again because it’s such a mess.  If they get a new pump system then I would happily repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for 3 months and Ive notice a difference. Lathers really nicely. Gentle on the skin. Doesn’t irritate your eyes. Leaves the skin feeling clean and fresh. Doesn’t leave your skin feeling stripped and dry. Has my approval!!!

reviews.review_title: Gave me dry patches and burning
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to make this cleanser work for me, but when I used it for the first time tonight,  my skin had dry patches and had a bit of a burning sensation on my cheeks. My skin is dry but a bit oily in the t zone. I’m giving it 2 stars because the smell is just so fresh and clean I was obsessed with the way this smelled. But, unfortunately, it didn’t work out for my skin at all. If you have dry skin, stay away from this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying that I’m a skincare junkie. I’ve tried face wash cleaners from Tatcha to Drunk Elephant, and this is by far my absolute favorite. The smell and the results are like no other.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first got this in the trial size and then bought the full bottle. As someone with acne prone skin this product doesn't do it for me even though it may nourish my skin. Basically a normal cleanser for double the price. I only recommend this if you just want a very basic cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cleanser. It’s light and smells fresh. It pumps out a lot of product and you really only need 1/8 of the pump at a time. You can lather a small amount and it really goes a long way. I have sensitive skin and I haven’t felt dry or red at all from using this. I guess the only reason I don’t give it 5 stars is it didn’t blow me away... can a cleanser do that? Either way, I like it and will probably purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser work perfectly with my normal to oily skin type. It is soft and gentle and leaves my skin feeling refreshed without feeling dry. I recommend to all my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes. This is the one. Perfect magnificent I love it

reviews.review_title: stop reading reviews and buy this already
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a gentle cleanser, but it doesn't dry out my skin. I'm such a fan!!!! quit looking at this and buy it!!

reviews.review_title: Smells/feels like a green smoothie for your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in the love with this cleanser initially from the natural fragrance which smells clean and free of any toxic, strong-smelling perfumes which is often in other cleansers. Smells kind of like spinach, kale, and celery? It lathers up very nicely and felt light on my skin. I also love how it has a relatively small list of ingredients that I can still pronounce and is clean. My skin didn't feel tight or dry after using (which happens with almost every other cleanser that I've tried). I have the sample size that I received with my Sephora points and absolutely loved the recycled packaging that it came with--the glass container was nice since it allows me to get every last drop to use. I'm a huge fan of YTTP and I'm really happy on discovering this natural and healthy-feeling face wash that smells delicious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly nothing special. Overpriced what it is and I wouldn't say it upgraded my skincare regime after months of use. I will stick to my Clinique cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Le produit sent très bon, mais je n'irais pas jusqu'à dire qu'il est différent des autres savons doux que j'ai essayé...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice gentle cleanser. It smells like celery but it doesn’t bother me. My tip is to use half a pump. Seriously that’s all you need! It’s lathers a lot with just half a pump. You’ll be saving money that way as well. I love that this cleanser is simple and doesn’t have any bad ingredients in it. I will be repurchasing with the 16 oz soon once I’m finished with this bottle :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. Cleanses my face gently and I love the fresh scent it has. Definitely not overpowering and it’s just such a clean leafy smell. Leaves my skin feeling plump afterwards too. Like it’s not stripping or drying in any way and it just feels nice and healthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it was too drying for my sensitive skin, flared the eczema on my forehead

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Saw a major difference in my skin in a matter of weeks! It didn’t strip my skin or make it feel tight, it made my skin clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i have been amazed how clear my skin has gotten since i got this cleanser. i use day and night, and it makes my skin look and feel so amazing. my brother has cystic ance and he borrowed my cleanser and even after first use, i can already tell his skin is getting so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got the mini version of this wash last year and never looked back!!! My skin was getting dull with other cleansers and this product saved me! I hope they never change the formula, it feels so fresh and silky and leaves my face feeling clean and not overly dry. A little definitely goes a long way with this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST FACE WASH EVER!!! i had been looking for a good cleanser for my face for 4 years. this is gentle and after i wash my face it feel soooo clean. my acne is completely gone. my mom, brother, and sister also went any bought it.
I got this for my 12 year old. She loves it. Super gentle on your skin. Doesn’t leave it feeling dry at all after. Also smells wonderful. I’m going to get one for myself too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love the product, gentle vegan cleanser. I use it every other day with normal skin. Reason I gave it 3 stars is the packaging. I find product leaking down the side and green rings on my counter. Frustrating with little kids in the house. I actually contacted customer service and they sent me a new pump. Same problem. Heat in the bathroom causes the pump to leak. not worth the purchase when a quarter of the product ends up on the counter.

reviews.review_title: The Only Facewash You’ll Ever Need!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m normal to dry and wear a decent amount of makeup every day. This face wash is non-drying and gently removes every trace of makeup leaving my  skin feeling hydrated and refreshed.. I have repurchased this cleanser probably 5 times at this point and I suggest it to everyone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got a small bottle of this on one of the Sephora Favorites boxes. I used to have a facial scrub as I felt that it was the only way to get my face “clean enough”, but no, this cleanser is amazing! Doesn’t dry out my face but it leaves it so clean and refreshed. I ordered the 8oz bottle and it goes a long way, worth the price. It has become part of my daily routine ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a rewards sample and was hoping to love it, but it was such a waste of points! I used this several days (twice a day) on make up free skin before going back to my regular cleanser. Product did an incredibly poor job, even after double cleansing. I would not purchase.

reviews.review_title: SAFE for my dumb sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fully removes makeup ✔️ leaves my skin feeling fresh ✔️ doesn’t aggravate my eczema ✔️ smells amazing ✔️ my skin has never looked or felt better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much.  A YouTuber I watch always raves about it so I bought this off his recommendation and how high it’s always rated.  TERRIBLE.  I have sensitive acne prone skin and After two uses I had a scaley texture, discoloration, and redness to my skin.  If you want to try it and you have sensitive skin try the small travel size first.  Such a disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been longing to find a cleaner that doesn't dry out my skin and I've finally found it. I love this cleanser and it's not harsh on my face at all. I used this cleaner two times a day for 3 days and my face already feels soft. A little bit also goes a long way! I used about a nickel size of cleanser and massaged it into my skin for 60 seconds. #60secondrule  Ps - I love the glass packaging... just have to be a little careful with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got it in rewards. Very impressed with how clean my skin felt after using an oil cleanser. Used it as face cleanser.  Will  be purchasing the large size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just as the headline says, this is my favorite cleanser ever. It smells fresh and SO good, they finally changed the pump so it locks (as mine got older the pump started to leak), and this cleanser is great for removing everything without stripping my skin. At first I wasn't sure this was good enough for me because some days my skin is super oily and other days it's normal, but I figured out it was the way I was cleansing for that day ( oily days get the clarisonic, normal days I just use my hands now). Worth the higher price point, smells amazing, and will continue to buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for 3 weeks now after ditching a cleanser with salicylic acid and let me tell you this is so much more effective on my acne than my previous cleanser and way less harsh. I honestly love this product so much and can see a huge difference in the texture of my skin and my breakouts are almost all completely gone. 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think it’s a good product. It does what a face wash should do. It is definitely not worth the huge price point and was not anything special for me. It performs like the Cera Ve hydrating facial cleansers. Nothing wrong with the product but not worth the price. It may be amazing for someone with very sensitive skin who can not find any other cleanser to work for them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Gently cleanses the skin without being overly stripping. A first I thought it was nothing special but then after a couple of weeks I noticed the redness around my nose area had gone away! This product was recommended to me by @Hyram on youtube!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll never use another cleanser, this is 100% perfect for my dry sensitive skin. Absolutely love the glass bottle and pump!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this cleanser for a while now, and it’s incredible! It’s great at removing sebum and buildup without over stripping the skin. If you’re interested in this product, I would definitely give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this company and this product! I’ve been a fan of the Superfood Cleanser for several years, and I won’t go without it. It is so light, refreshing and foamy, and it doesn’t leave skin feeling dry or stripped. I love that it comes in a glass bottle, and I can recycle it when finished. The next step is to create a recycling program where we can reuse the plastic pump—I’ve hear they are working on it yay ♻️! YTTP has an awesome mission and so far I haven’t met a product of theirs that I didn’t love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been buying this cleanser for over a year and still love it! I have oily skin and this is one of the few cleansers that I feel actually cleans my face but doesn't completely strip it dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser lathers up nicely and my skin feels clean but not dried out. The smell is very fresh and vegetably. I love how it softens my skin as it cleanses. I look forward to washing my face with this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser so much, bought the mini to try it out but can’t get enough! On my second bottle! Recommend to anyone that needs a good cleanser, leaves my skin so clean and soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cleanser I've tried so far, it's worth it.  Love the ingredients, has a soft smell, the consistency is thick, it doesn't make much foam and you feel it cleans your face perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser!  It’s gently yet effective and fantastic at removing light makeup.  My face never feels dry or right after washing morning and night.  The reason I only gave it 3 stars is due to the packaging.  The plastic pump leaks and I always find product down the side of glass bottle and on counter.  In addition, I don’t like that the container is glass.  I do appreciate being able to recycle it, but it is not safe with children and elderly people on household.  More than one bottle been dropped or knocked over and broken in the shower or on sink.  Would love it if cleanser came in flip top recyclable plastic bottle.  Safer and easier to dispense without leaking.  I’ve gone back the DE Bestie cleanser because of better packaging, but like YTTP better.

I love this gel cleanser so much!! It is very gentle and very rich, my skin definitely looks calmer and more moistureized after using this product. If you have sensitive skin I recommend this for you. I use this cleanser with another cleanser that is made for acne. Because this alone for my skin didn’t get it as clean as it should be. The smell is so good!! It smells really clean and like green tea. Also this is really really bubbly. The dispenser that it comes in is made of glass so they are reusable. But it’s hard to get the letters to come off. I use a cotton ball and some nail polish remover, and it works pretty well. And another plus is that when you purchase the 237 ml bottle it come with a free sample of the super greens moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is oily. Recently is so sensitive to any product. This cleanser has been so helpful to combat my sensitive. It makes your skin sooo clean I just love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser! It’s so gentle yet so effective. Cleans my skin well without drying it out. Both me and my boyfriend (who has very sensitive skin) love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don’t leave reviews but I’ll leave one here. This is a good product, cleanses face well and leaves you feeling fresh! Great smell and overall feel like my skin has a nice bounce to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG best cleanser! It really cleans your skin even when you have makeup on but it doesn’t make your skin feel dry. skin feels really refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product broke me out. Kinda oily on the skin. I think this is meant for people that have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OK so i never write reviews.. this product at first I LOVED it. I thought it was amazing and finally found had found the best cleanser.. until a few months of use and I started noticing my skin her extremely irritated after washing it with this cleanser. it was super dry, red matches, ruined my skin I had to apply moisturizer right after and after a few hours the redness would go away. basically do not buy this cleanser if you have sensitive/ dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted SO badly to like this product. I was looking for a new cleanser for my oily acne prone skin and this came so highly recommended. A skin care YouTuber I watch has recommend this product probably 1000 times on his channel. I was a tad worried after buying because I had seen a few reviews saying this product ruined their skin but these reviews paled in comparison to the 5 star reviews saying this was a holy grail product. The first time I used the product within a week my skin broke out like nothing I had seen before, my cheeks were COVERED in little red spots of what looked like hyperpigmentation. At the same time I introduced this cleanser to my skin I started using a peeling mask and I assumed that was what was causing my issues. So I stopped both products and went back to my normal cleanser (First Aid Beauty) when I ran out of that and was unable to purchase a new bottle (corona) I started using the YTP cleanser again and within probably 2 days my skin broke out in Cystic Acne like I've never seen before. I've used less than half the bottle so I'll be returning it to Sephora asap. I'm extremely disappointed by this cleanser. Also side note it smells exactly like Dial hand soap (???? weird)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cons:  -The first time I used it, it dried up my face so much so that you could see my nose flake and peel -After a week, my eyebrow starting to flake and peel  -Left face a little tight (don't mind too much) -Very runny, I lose product because of how slippery this stuff is in my hand  Pros:  - Love the glass bottle - Smells nice - Made my skin feel refreshed after using it  I recommend getting the smaller bottle and test run it on your face before purchasing the larger one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I read a lot of good reviews on this product. It's recomended for oily skin and supposted to get rid of blemishes. For me it caused cystic acne that i never had before, also caused blackheads all over my forehead. I had a blackhead in every single pore on my forehead. It ruined my skin. My skin had a negative reaction to this cleanser but it will maybe work better for you. A lot of people seem to like it so give it a try since everyone is different. I wouldn't recommend this product for someone with acne prone-sensitive skin. But if you have normal-dry-combo skin, i'm sure you will be fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I got it in the mini size just so I could try it out and I will be buying full size next time.  The only thing I’m not crazy about with this product is the smell. It’s smells like green tea which I have never been a fan of but I can barely notice it. The results of this product are so good that I don’t care about a tiny hint of a scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far loving this cleanser! Feels soft and smooth on the skin, has a nice smell and gives the skin a cooling effect. Seems to be doing a great job at cleaning the dirt and oil off of the face, would definitely recommend.  FYI, I have sensitive combination dry/oily skin and tend to react to products easily but no adverse reaction whatsoever from this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I received it with a purchase and fell in love. It is the best. Its the only cleanser I can double wash my face with. Which means I can use it first to remove my make up and wash my face again without it drying out my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do NOT recommend if you have dry or acne prone skin. After just TWO days of using this product my skin started peeling and getting incredibly itchy. I was beyond disappointed as this face wash did have a descent amount of good reviews. I will NEVER even consider repurchasing this product since nothing has ever made my skin look as gruesome, abominable, horrific, repugnant, sickening and disturbed. I never write reviews but this product was just awful I needed to warn potential investors. I would give this negative starts if possible. DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought in the small jar first and absolutely loved it. I had another cleanser that I needed to use up first before purchasing the large. I did just that and won’t be turning back! I have dry combination skin and this cleanser rocks for it, not to mention it gets all traces of makeup off

reviews.review_title: Not good for red or sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, since it’s vegan and clean. But unfortunately, my sensitive skin proved otherwise.   At first, I thought it was amazing, but after a week, I noticed that my skin would stay red all day. Then I started forming tiny bumps on my forehead that weren’t there before. I gave it a month before I knew the wash was just not for me. Maybe it works better for less sensitive skin, but if your face tends to be red or acne-prone, I’d try something else.

reviews.review_title: Good Cleanser, but it doesn't last that long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is very good. My face feels clean, but not dry. It has an almost watery consistency, so make sure you rub it in your hands a bit before you put it on your face. I use 1 pump in the morning and 1 pump at night, the bottle lasts me 2 months. For this price, I expect the product to last at least 3 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product about a month ago looking for a good clean skincare product, it seems fine but lately a combination of that and the matching moisturizer caused my skin to be dry and has been breaking me out. I have normal skin and it’s not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly love this. I have noticed my skin clearing and looking sooooo much better! I suffer with acne and while using this, I have noticed a big change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever. My skin has truly never been so clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser keeps your skin smooth and does not strip it down from its natural oils. My skin does not feel tight or dry after using it (and i have dry skin!) Not only does my skin feel clean and refreshed after cleansing, it had a huge impact on reducing my blemishes. Ive used great cleansers from Fresh and DE, but none had the effect this cleaner had on my skin in terms of clearing it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this cleanser. I have sensitive skin. Like even if I spend too much time in the sun I’ll break out . So I like products that are both gentle and effective. My combo skin feels refreshed and non- greasy after I wash my face. My skin is also always soft and smells amazing.

reviews.review_title: Great gentle cleanser for acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination/oily skin with dry patches on my cheeks but lots of different types of acne across my face. I love this cleanser! It really helps calm my acne prone skin. After I wash, my skin doesn't feel stripped AT ALL and it smells really fresh like green tea. At first, I thought this cleanser was bad and didn't help my skin at all, but I started rubbing more gently and washing my face with this cleanser for AT LEAST 2 minutes - I know that's long but just put on a video and time flies - and those two tips helped my skin so much. It also helps with hyperpigmentation and calms inflammation, redness, and most of my acne. For when I have fungal breakouts (like deep cystic acne) I would recommend using this, and then following up with a stronger treatment, as this cleanser essentially only calms skin. It has made the pores on my cheeks a little smaller as well, but that was with continued use, and isn't what the product claims to do.

reviews.review_title: Works great for all skin types!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is awesome. I purchased it a few weeks ago, after it being suggested to me, and I LOVE it. It is a lightweight gel wash that slowly foams up as you work it into your skin. Then when washing it off it bubbles and foams more. I was worried because usually foaming cleansers have completely stripped my combination skin, but this one was surprisingly great. After using, my face feels clean and soft, without being tight or overly dried. I love the packaging, too. 5/5!!! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a 10$ sample of this with my recent points and purchase and it did not disappoint. I love it. My face feels so clean and I was skeptical about a face wash that was this type of consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As another review wrote, this cause a terrible flare up in my Rosacea. Stay away from this is you have any sensitive, dry or rosacea prone skin. Not a bad product, but not for all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this was so bad for my skin. i have sensitive, dry, rosacea, & acne-prone skin & this stripped my face a lot. I can see how someone w oily skin may like it bc it literally like dries your face out to be matte. but i have dry skin and it made my rosacea flare really bad and broke me out. I returned it asap, it was so bad. stay away !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have gone through 2 bottles of this cleanser. I heard it is one of the best cleansers with the best ingredients and formulation. So of course I was trying it now I’m not saying it is bad but I feel like it doesn’t clean my skin properly. It is very watery when it comes out and slips through my fingers so easily I feel like I’m losing money on this product. It seems like a very healthy cleanser for your skin but I don’t know...I love what this company stands for too but this cleanser to me personally doesn’t feel like it’s doing the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite gel cleaner! A little goes a long way. I was hesitant to buy because it’s really expensive but it lasts forever as you only need a small amount. It’s so frothy! This is the only gel cleanser that doesn’t make my skin feel tight. I love it.

reviews.review_title: Good, but not for acne prone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really great cleanser for sensitive skin. It makes my skin much more hydrated and smooth. The only downside is that it doesn’t control breakouts. I get hormonal breakouts around my period, and I tried using this alone as a cleanser and my breakouts were much worse. I’ve started washing the areas I break out in with a cleanser with salicylic acid prior to using this, and that has worked well. I really like the smell too, it smells really fresh and not artificial in any way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVED this cleanser, as it made my skin feel fresh, clean, soft, and rejuvenated!   Found that a little goes a long way, and using it daily helped improve the appearance of my skin, by making it look softer and more hydrated, and lessened the appearance of break outs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First at all, it is too expensive. Second, it made me breakout, and not only me, also it made my sister breakout so bad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! I've bought this multiple times already. I love that it becomes this nice luxurious lather after working it with a bit of water. My skin feels clean but not overly dry or stripped away. This is great for my oily skin, and my go-to cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this product, my face felt really clean after

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First good cleanser I’ve ever used that didn’t leave my face feeling dry or cracked!! I’m instantly in love and wish I got the bigger size off the bat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I found out about this cleanser through Hyram's channel. I have to admit, my skin loves this. It feels so soft after this cleanser. It contains lots of good ingredients so I try to massage this for around 1 minute for the ingredients to absorb. I was skeptical after Dr. Drays review so bought this mini size to try out. Apparently, the fragrance component that se was talking about is the alfalfa extract which is not artificial or essential oil, so personally I don't see any problems with this product. I use this in the evening and Krave matcha in the morning, and honestly my skin feels even more hydrated than the Krave one. Will definitely purchasing the full size. Also I think this is a great price since for $36 you get 237ml.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Removes makeup well and is good for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many, many face washes. I am not a fan of face washes but this has become one of my all time favorite skin care products ever. While it is not a cure all I love that it cleans my skin without over drying and leaves my skin in a most natural state. Within days of using I found my skin glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought my second bottle of this stuff and I LOVE IT! So many cleansers bother my skin and make me breakout but this one is incredible. Also, thank you for changing the pump to one that allows for better travel :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first review and I thought it would only be fair to rate my favorite product from YTTP. This cleanser does such an amazing job of removing makeup, dirt and oil while also making your face feel hydrated and smooth. I LOVE IT SO MUCH!!! I have bought it 5+ times. only problem I have is the pump leaks.... a lot. not sure why and it happens with every single bottle.

reviews.review_title: Great alternative/not my long term cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, but didn’t see the benefits from it. Got some breakouts, left my face dry after some uses. Feels good after washing my face with it, but I wouldn’t know the difference between this and soap.  Too expensive for what it actually does. Love the packaging and smell, but that’s about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product because of the excellent ingredient list and the earth-friendly packaging. However, after every use, my skin felt a little dry, but since my old cleanser was supper stripping, I was fine with it. Weeks later, my skin had that tight, squeaky clean feeling after cleansing and I decided to save it for the summer when my skin would be oily. I recently started using it again as the weather is warmer and my skin is more oily and I no longer get that stripped feeling. If you have dry skin, stay away but those with oily skin would probably love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 50/50 on this product. It’s a good face wash but I haven’t notice any other benefits from it. It’s supposed to be calming and a few other claims but for me it’s not any better than my normal face wash. I have sensitive skin and I am prone to turning red and breaking out. I have not noticed any calming or soothing properties. I will use it until it’s gone but I don’t think I will purchase it again. It’s not a bad product it just doesn’t work like I hoped it would on my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to leave this cleanser just an average review, but as a consumer who relies heavily on product reviews, I feel an obligation to share the aspects that cause waste and frustration.  In order to do that, the packaging has to be considered.   The formula of this cleanser is great.  It contains great ingredients that my skin loved.  It was effective at removing dirt and unwanted oil from my skin without stripping it or leaving it feeling dry.   The scent was barely noticeable and not offensive at all.   However, I must share that the pump leaked quite badly and caused significant product waste.  This is not a cheap product which is fine.  I’m happy to spend money on products I love that work well with my skin, but I do not like feeling like I’ve washed my hard earned money down the drain and that’s exactly what happened with this cleanser.  The pump leaked out product constantly no matter what I did to try to stop it.  I have no idea exactly how much was wasted, but I believe it was significant.  As a result, I will not repurchase this unless YTTP addresses the problem even though I quite enjoy the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I’ve repurchased this twice now and I don’t think I’ll ever go back to another cleanser. It’s so gentle and leaves my skin feeling clean but not overly dry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don’t write reviews on a product. But this cleanser has completely changed my skin. I am in love with it! It doesn’t strip or dry out my skin, and with sensitive skin that is very hard to do! I also love the glass packaging because I can reuse it for something else other then the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it leaves skin feeling soft and awakened. I totally recommend buying because it also helped slow down and minimize my breakout and redness on my skin.

reviews.review_title: the best cleanser i have tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser really helped with my skin texture and breakouts. When I first used it, my skin kinda went crazy with pimples but after a couple weeks of using it, my skin calmed down and I really love it! Plus if you have a clarisonic it foams up lovely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite cleanser I’ve tried to date! I have combination oily skin and I’ve always struggled with the occasional breakout. I’m a fan! This cleanser cuts oil, deep cleans and doesn’t over dry my skin. I’ve been using this product for over a month and my breakouts have drastically decreased and that’s even after an active makeup lifestyle lol. I love the smell and the lather consistency is also great, all in all I’m loving this product so far! I’ll be ordering the full bottle size next xD

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first, this facewash felt so great and very clean. However, after about a month my face got extremely dry and I have the worst breakout I've had in a long time. My skin feels so dehydrated and irritated. I'm really disappointed because I heard such great things. I don't recommend this for combination, sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: mini but MIGHTY Travel Sized Cleanser!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, and bought the mini version to try product out. I loved it so much I bought the full size within a week! It washes off makeup pretty well (not waterproof makeup though) and helps your face feel clean and smooth. Only a little drying (I have combo skin) so definitely recommend a moisturizer after. I use a very minuscule amount of this cleanser in the morning (less than a pea size) and then a little more at night. It's very convenient because you can leave it in the shower and wash your face. I love the simple packaging and most of all the clean ingredients. If you're on the fence whether or not to buy this, don't be...it's worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product when I double cleanse. It removes all oil residue and smells so refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried because I was having a reaction and my skin became so sensitive that I had a soreness.  This product was so soft,  not irritating at all.  Gave me a much needed break and cleaned my skin very  nicely.  A little tiny drop is more than enough to get the job done

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am purchasing my second bottle which is rare because my skin is so freakin picky that I usually have to keep switching it up. I’m not sure how but this cleanser is like a PERFECT match for my skin! Cleanses makeup off like it’s nothing, my skin feels so smooth and clean and soft, I do not have any oily or tight dryness afterwards and it doesn’t irritate my skin AT ALL!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's so comfortable and I can see the difference, like less blackhead and the skin tone is brighter. Will keep using everyday

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, combination skin that is extremely picky. I tried a small bottle of the stuff and my skin instantly fell in love... Pores clean, redness down, hydrated af!!!! Such a great product that I bought the big bottle.  My face loves me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice and calming and really clean deep in your pores without drying it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good cleanser for sensitive skin, did not burn or break my skin at all , very light feeling.   I did not notice a change in my skin since I used it, did not seem to do much more me. I wouldn’t recommend for dry skin.   The packaging is very pleasing though love the glass bottle avec the colour of this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gave me the biggest breakouts ever, I couldn’t even use this for more than 2 weeks. Defiantly upset such this was heavily recommended to me and didn’t work out :((

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin that gets very dry in the winter. This face wash leaves my skin feeling refreshed and clean! Love the slight green scent. Removes makeup and rinses off easily. For the winter months, I typically follow this up with moisturizer before bed, otherwise my skin feels a bit tight. I used to use Korres Greek Yogurt cleanser and then it stopped working for my sensitive skin. This is my favorite face wash ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product, works wonders on my face. Washes makeup off with just a small amount, will need to use moisturizer after but love the simplicity of the ingredients and packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser of all time. It leaves my skin feeling clean & refreshed without drying, which is amazing because my skin is so dry & flaky with pretty much any other cleanser I’ve tried. This is the only cleanser I trust with my skin now. I also LOVE that it has glass packaging to minimize on the plastic :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is my absolute favorite, and I’ve tried quite a few. It’s just tough enough to get off every last bit of makeup residue at night, but gentle enough to keep my skin feeling clean and refreshed. Adding this to my routine has helped me to finally start cracking down on the clogged pores on my nose and forehead without drying out my sensitive cheeks. Its non-abrasive scent is an added bonus :)

reviews.review_title: Great ingredients but it is missing hydration!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings about this product. I always look up ingredients on products I am new to trying to see if they’ll work for my skin. I have combination skin that leans on dry if I over do the facial masks (not hydrating ones) sometimes. Like clay masks (very drying on skin) more than twice a week. So I do want my cleansers and moisturizers to be very hydrating. I have also incorporated the Farmacy honeymoon serum into my skin care regimen about 3 weeks ago and have been using it 2-3 times a week, now twice with this cleanser. I was using a moisturizing cleanser with the Farmacy serum and now using this one in the past 2 weeks. The ingredients are ALL good for your skin!!!! Literally every single one!!! This is actually hard to find in a cleanser. Youth To the People has some really great products. When I first started using this cleanser my skin did feel a bit tight and I noticed some dry patches. I amped up using my hydrating masks during the first week and a heavier moisturizer at night and that seemed to be working so I continued to use those into the next week. I wanted to give it time because with any new product your skin needs to adjust. After two weeks I started to noticed the skin around my lips (that have been really dry and chapped during this winter) turn into scabs, which was very alarming. After I put my heavy moisturizer on it healed it up. This is chalk full of antioxidants which is great for your skin! I just think it is missing some moisturizing ingredients for balance. If this would contain hyaluronic acid or sodium hyaluronate it would be one of the best cleansers I have ever tried! I am going to continue to use it to see if my skin just needs to adjust more unless it makes it too dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Describes as a powerful gentle daily wash. Powerful, yes. Gentle, no. It's so powerful it leaves my skin very dry and dull. I had to go back to Cerave. Thank goodness this was a sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have somewhat sensitive skin and have tried soooooo many face cleansers... I heard a lot of people raving about this one in particular on youtube and decided to try it since each person was talking about the ingredients and their benefits. I absolutely LOVE this cleanser & have seen such a positive change in my skin since I started using it!! I will definitely be ordering again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very gentle on the skin! I absolutely love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually magic in a bottle. I bought the mini because I didn't want to fully commit to a new cleanser right away and this product is heavenly! You only need a small amount and it feels super refreshing. I've been using it daily for three months and I still have product left! It also comes in a small glass bottle that's perfect for recycling for other products in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It leaves my skin squeaky clean and has a nice, light scent. It also never stings even when I use it on stressed skin or sun burn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On of the best cleansers ever last a very long time. I’ve hav it for over a month and have use 1/3 of the bottle with 2x day use. Definitely recommend for any skin type this removes oil gently. And is still great for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DO NOT USE THIS CLEANSER. After using this cleanser morning and night for two weeks - my skin barrier got completely wrecked. This cleanser is way too overstripping and harsh for the skin.  I switched to using a more gentle cleanser and broke out instantly with inflammation and redness. I am extremely disappointed and have to work on restoring my skin barrier from now on out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very nice i thought it was going to be oily but actually it has a very nice texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I’ve used in a looong time! It claims to remove makeup and oiliness, soothe skin, and prevent breakouts—and it does all of those things very well. So if those are your main concerns, get this cleanser!  It smells like a sweet green smoothie (more like green tea than kale or spinach), it lathers well, and you won’t have to double cleanse to remove your makeup. Unless you’re wearing very heavy eye makeup and full coverage foundation.  I have dry, sensitive skin and usually it turns red with the wrong product, but this cleanser didn’t cause any redness! However, my skin still feels dry and I didn’t notice any difference with my fine lines/wrinkles or texture.  This mini bottle has lasted me 1 month cleansing 1-2 times a day and I still have 1/4 of a bottle left, so it’s definitely good value for money. If you have sensitive, normal, combination or oily skin, this will probably be your holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a mini size just to try it out. It feels so good on my face! I don’t feel stripped after or dry in the slightest. It leaves me feeling clean and refreshed! I’m considering buying the larger bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this after watching a YouTube on skin care and I have to say this is the best cleaners I’ve ever used. It doesn’t strip the skin and leaves my skin feeling fresh and Dewey and not dry!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: had this as a sample and my skin felt smooth and evened out my skintone, will reccomend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever tried. It leaves your face feeling clean, and also doesn’t dry you out. The mini one lasts for a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser feels so refreshing!! I use it in the morning and it just wakes up my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this face wash. However, I have eczema on my face wash and it just stopped agreeing with it so I had to forcefully stop using it. I will still give it its props though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
