reviews.review_text: I love love LOVE this product and this brand! Sustainable, reusable, recyclable packaging with clean, impressive formulas. This cleanser is my holy grail. Great for all skin types I hear too, so really, try your very best to find a flaw in the product, I’ll wait.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried so many cleaners at Sephora but this has got to be one of my favourites. I have combo skin that dries out easily right after washing my face. Most non-strip cleansers actually strip my skin, but this one doesn’t do that. It leaves my face feeling fresh with no residue!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! I am so happy it has great ingredients yet is super effective!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this cleanser so far! I’ve been using it for a little over 2 weeks now and my combo skin is loving it! Fresh smelling scent and its one of Sephora’s CLEAN brands (huge deal to me). My skin looks brighter and more clear. I had bad congested skin along the side of my face and it has improved SO MUCH!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good! I use it with my foreo in the shower and my face feels super smooth and soft. It doesn’t leave a rubbery feeling or too dry. The smell is nice and not overly fragrant. The packaging is also nice. I appreciate a pump rather than a tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and I love this stuff. It cleanses without stripping my skin of all moisture and I really like how fresh it smells. I also think it should last a while because I only need one pump to remove all of my makeup. I also like that it doesn't sting if you get it in your eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product removes dirt and it’s just ok. I really disliked the way it stripped my skin so bad, my skin looked dull. I will Not be buying this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: We are on our 3 bottle of this amazing cleanser.. my boyfriend and I share this cleanser and it works well his dry skin and my sensitive skin! We have notice a much brighter, smoother, and hydrated complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It ok ok product , don’t understand why so much hype. Very very very mild cleanser. May be good for super sensitive skin. For an oily combination skin like mine , I don’t think it’s good enough. Honestly, I don’t feel like it’s cleaning my skin at all. I will definitely not waste my money on this. Cetaphil or cerave  is way way way better than this .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this cleanser! so gentle and it makes my face feel so clean without making it irritated or dry. the smell is also not overpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has become the go to cleanser for everyone in my household (different skin types).  It’s light, non-irritating and hydrating. It removes dirt without drying out my skin.  The scent is pleasant and doesn’t overwhelm your senses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff, gets off makeup and leaves skin feeling clean. I've had far fewer pimples since using and the ingredients are great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination, sensitive skin. I have tried many cleansers and I keep coming back to this one. Doesn’t break me out, smells good, my skin looks so good and even that I don’t need foundation anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it for my oily-sensitive and acne-prone skin. No irritation, breakouts, and other issues from this cleanser. I will be repurchasing this.

reviews.review_title: Easy to Lather; Easy to Rinse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this cleanser because it doesn’t sting my eyes and is an easy to lather, easy to rinse off product. Cleans my skin without stripping it. I do feel that it isn’t so “life changing” though, it is definitely effective and it works, but there are other cleansers that do the same job at other price points. I’m not too worried about beneficial ingredients in cleansers like antioxidants that are going to be rinsed off my face anyways. Don’t feel like you absolutely need this particular one, you just need one that works. I will say that I am ok with paying more as I know sustainable (glass) packaging is more expensive to make and ship. I would repurchase this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got the sample size for $10, and have no doubts about getting the full size once I finish the bottle! I have dry skin, and cleansers have always been a balancing game between wanting to cleanse effectively, and not stripping my already dry skin as well. This cleanser doesn't make my skin feel tight after washing, and noticeably has not caused any irritation either. If you're looking into this product and are uncertain, the sample size is definitely your go-to! Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: the key is to not use too much product !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: at first I wasn't thrilled about the product because I felt it didn't wash away thoroughly (I was putting the gel directly on my face and tried using both my hands to foam it up or my foreo). Then I tried using less product (pea size, literally) and foam the product in my hand before applying to the face and then use foreo and I'm truly in love with it!!! It leaves the face feeling clean and plump, no tight feeling after, feels like a green smoothie for the face and I really enjoy it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time finishing a bottle of this and all I can say is wow. My skin type is combination, and because of this product I haven’t had a zit in sooo long. I used to have some texture as well, but I’ve noticed I don’t have as much anymore. I do feel like it dries my skin after but usually you should put a moisturizer anyways. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell of this cleanser. It’s gentle and it does the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser. Natural and gentle but deeply cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face cleanser, I’ve been on a journey to find products that are not to harsh on my skin and something that is natural and when I came across this inside Sephora I thought why not. I looked up a few reviews and I noticed that a lot of people were saying that it dried them out. Not me I’m oily and this product does wonders for my skin. I feel like my skin is so much more smoother than it was before. I love this product so much that I’ve already got my replacement coming and I’m not even finish with the first bottle yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for sensitive skin, did not cause redness. I would not necessarily suggest this product it you have dry skin as it left my skin feeling a little tight.   This is perfect if you want to try the product without buying the full size. Although I do appreciate a glass bottle it was not the most fun to use(with a top pump cap like the full size would be better.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser ever. Makes me feel squeaky clean without feeling stripped and tight after. Best for my second cleanse, isn’t meant to remove makeup. Really refreshing, smells great and as an esthetician I am really pleased with the ingredients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On my third bottle. I have dry, sensitive skin and this cleanser works amazing for me. After cleansing, my skin doesnt feel super dry like most cleansers do and if it gets into my eyes it doesnt hurt at all. Really cleans my skin without stripping all the moisture out. I'd recommend trying the mini size first like I did to see how it is before investing. Packaging is also super cute and clean and the bottle is glass. just wish they had some sort of incentive where you can just refill the bottle but the product itself is AMAZING

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay, didn’t break me out, but didn’t do much of a difference either. Doesn’t take off makeup so make sure to do it before cleansing. It isn’t bad, just okay. I prefer feeling clean and tot when I’m done cleansing and definitely don’t feel that way with this cleanser. Would recommend to someone who literally has nothing wrong with their skin and just needs a cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Replaced the DDG cleanser in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size in January because I wasn’t sure if I’d like it. I used to use Dr Dennis Gross’ cleanser but I wanted to test out the YTTP line. I bought a 1oz glass bottle with dropper and I fill that from the travel size bottle. I’m about two-thirds through my purchase.   I use one dropper full on my Clarisonic twice daily. Very pleased with the results on my 38 yr old combo skin. I accidentally used it on my hair on the weekend (I have the same siZed bottle but with shampoo I use for travel) and my hair felt amazing!! So I suppose if you’re in a pinch it doubles as shampoo?  I highly recommend this product as a nice daily vegan gentle cleanser! Smells light and does the job. My pic shows the bottle I decant it into. By using a dropper I don’t use more than I need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser! Leaves your face feeling clean, but super soft and not stripped. I also have sensitive skin and it doesn’t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before this product I used the cetaphil cleanser and before that I used st Ives (I know it’s cringe) but actually I think this product does the hijab for cleansing, I think it also helped in evening out my dark spots. Great and simple product. I think it’s pricey since I can’t afford to buy the whole entire bottle I buy the travel sized one which las about three months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the cleanser itself but the bottle wastes so much product for the price. Leaks everywhere feels like a waste of money :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a huge fan of this product. I don't think I used it enough to comment on its effectiveness, but I didn't like the consistency of the product. It doesn't really lather and I feel like you need a lot of product to make it feel like its on your face. It has a very thin consistency. Didn't really give a super cleansed feeling like other products do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mini face wash while being on a week long business trip and I was amazed! It’s light but gives that clean, fresh and soft feeling afterwards. Noticeably smaller pores after use. I would also note I’ve had it for 6 months and it will probably last another 2 (using 2x a day).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my face feeling fresh and clean every time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel that this is a good everyday cleanser for someone who has normal skin and doest have many skincare concerns. For me personally, i feel it doesn’t do much for me. I like for a cleanser to make my skin feel fresh and clean after using, an this just did’t do that. But on the plus side it didn’t brake me out and seems safe for people with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. Not only is it cute but it is one of the best cleansers ever. It doesn’t strip my face, and it doesn’t make my skin feel tight. My skin is super soft and glowy. It also has this really nice fresh smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is honestly my favorite! I have tried so many from La Mer to Shisheido, Lush, Kiehl's, Tatcha... This cleanser smells so fresh. It leaves my skin so soft, fresh and not dry at all. Though I usually like my skin to feel super clean, this one not only makes my skin feel super clean but it doesn't dry it out. I've first got the sample with my points and bought the small size. I just bought 2 big bottles (one to leave on the counter and one in the shower). Try this out! It's so worth it and from a great company!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Recently, I’ve been suffering from Acne Rosacea.  This face wash has changed my life.  I pair this with Drunk Elephant Lala Retro Whipped Cream and my skin is so happy and hydrated.  I will never stop using this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser cleared my skin, I haven't had a cystic pimple ever since. I've never been more confident ❤

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Cleans the skin and makes it feel amazing. I hate how it’s packaged. The pump leaks so all your product will drip out. I thought it was a problem with the first one but now it’s my second bottle and it still leaks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, very nice to the skin, cleans without striping, doesn't irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how it made my face feel clean and fresh! got it as a sample in my PLAY box. Bought it because I loved it.. I even refilled my sample bottle for my daughter to try it. she loved it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought a mini size last month and I still have it now, about more than half of the bottle left. It thoroughly removes make up while not stripping my face after a wash. I’m definitely going to buy a full bottle once this one runs out . Such great value!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great not only to give you a fresh feeling everyday, but it also removes your make up so easily at the same time it cleans your face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really helped clear my skin. Good ingredients and the price is reasonable. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent second cleanser if you wear makeup or first, if you don’t. Multiple advantages.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this cleanser!  Makes my skin feels smooth and slowly attacks my blackheads. I am getting less irritated skin and pimples. Doesn’t leave the skin feeling dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser, its very gentle but really leaves your skin feeling clean. Has good stuff in it and im on my second bottle!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is amazing! I have combination/acne prone skin that has been more on the dry side due to it being winter where I am. It has been a bit of a struggle, since most face washes I was looking into either had some kind of ingredient that didn't agree with my skin or it had kaolin or another type so clay, which is obviously going to be drying. That's when I finally decided to spring for this wash and I will never look back. It cleanses so well, leaves my skin feeling fresh and never dry or squeaky clean (which is not good either.) My skin has been clearing up and I no longer have that horrible dry skin tightening feeling. I highly recommend! And even though the price may seem like a lot, a mid-range drug store cleaner would typically cost $12 for 4 oz, so for 8 oz this is a pretty fair deal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seems to be a cleanser, it has a clean scent. But was way too drying for my skin. I’m going to stick with oil based cleansers for that reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i really wanted to love this cleanser because it came highly recommended by a skincare youtuber i watch, but it sadly dried out my skin really badly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was intrigued by this cleanser because of the nice ingredients, but it is incredibly drying. It left a tight feeling on my face which was an indication that my skin was over-stripped. Although it does have a lot of antioxidants, I don’t think it did anything for the redness in my skin but I didn’t expect much from something in a cleanser form. I wouldn’t recommend this cleanser unless your skin is really oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loveee this cleanser. i’ve always struggled with texture problems and breakouts on my forehead, and i saw a huge improvement after i started using this. my skin always feels super clean after using this and it never dries me out. a little pricey, but definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice and very clean smelling daily cleanser. It’s a little pricy for me so I probably won’t purchase again but it’s a good product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily and sensitive skin and this is the first cleanser that removes all the oil of my skin but doesn’t leave it dry. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So far I’m really enjoying this product and my skin feels super healthy after using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No words can explain how much I live for this cleanser! It has changed my skincare game and oh my god!!! My skin in the mornings is amazing!! Makeup has gone on so much better and smoother!! Like yessss!  The smell of the cleanser is also a bonus too! Smells like kale.  Great for all skin types!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for about a month now and I absolutely love it! It is super gentle and makes my skin clean without feeling stripped. If you need a moisturizing cleanser I would highly recommend this one! I use their superfood cream as well at night and it keeps my skin moisturized all night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product!  Doesn’t leave my skin feeling dry or tight and completely removes all my makeup. Plus, the bigger size has lasted me almost 6 months!  Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started buying this because Hyram recommended this product and WOW. Firstly, it smells so refreshing and makes my face feel so clean and doesn't dry my cheeks out (combo skin here). I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser. It leaves my face feeling fresh, and doesnt over dry my skin. I just use 1 pump and it goes a long ways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great face wash! Lathers up well. I especially like the ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cleanser, works amazing for every skin type. Also for the price you get a lot of product which is always good. I don't think that with this cleanser you would see any dramatical changes in your skin, but it won't strip it or anything like that. It's a great option to start or for the morning cleanse. Regarding makeup, it won´t take all your makeup off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible! Cleared up my skin in just a week. Has a great smell and leaves skin feeling smooth, not stripped. Comes in a glass bottle. Worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this I have normal skin and this cleanser is amazing , it also even my skin tone as well .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have parts of my face that are oily and some very dry. This is my favorite face wash by far. Doesn't make my face dry up too much or get too oily. It is perfect for you mild face wash everyday. Definitely recommend for skin like mine or for strictly oily skin ! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hey! Do you wish your face would feel slimy and unfresh after you cleanse it, like your face is now less clean than before? Well try this. It has the most unappealing slimy gel texture and my face always felt filmy after using it. The only plus was that I enjoyed the herbal smell of it but o always felt like I needed to clean my face after using it. I would never buy this again and only used it up out of necessity of getting my money’s worth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn't irritating, but even after lathering it for 30 seconds and washing my face I wasn't left with the clean feeling I was after. I started using it as my second cleanser (using micellar water first) and that worked out okay). Wasn't too big a fan of the smell and the bottle (the mini one) isn't too gym bag/travel friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's light and not overly drying, a decent second cleanser but nothing really spectacular. I like the glass bottle, and the amount of product is a good value. Unfortunately, something in this causes very stubborn, tiny breakouts. Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't remember if I got this with a gift with purchase or whatever but it's been in my cabinet forever. I started using it about 3 weeks ago and holy crap!!!! I wish I used this sooner! Of course when you start something new you will experience a few breakouts, but this is what is supposed to happen, my skin was congested... The last week I was at the point where I didn't need any foundation. My skin is that smooth. I can feel it! My moisturizer goes on like butta! My pores are noticeably smaller and my skin is glowing. As you can see the bottle is gone and I ordered a full size today! I cannot go without!

reviews.review_title: Eat Your Greens and Wash Your Face With Them Too!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin feels so clean and fresh after using this cleanser. I love how it cleans my skin without stripping the moisture.

reviews.review_title: Gentle but didn't feel clean and created breakouts
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I typically use Boscia as my cleanser but decided to switch it up. I like the consistency of this cleanser and it gives you a lot of product in the bottle, but it unfortunately caused a lot of tiny breakouts on my face after using for 2-3 weeks. I double-cleanse with a makeup removing oil but I didn't feel like my face was well-cleansed after. I really wanted to like this product but I will be switching back to Boscia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this cleanser so much! it smells amazing! it smells like a green smoothie you’re rubbing on your face. it’s also super gentle and not stripping to the skin. it’s gotten rid of the bumps right under my chin and made my skin feel super soft and clean. it also doesn’t sting or burn when you get it in your eyes, but i use this as the second cleanse in a double cleanse and don’t rub it into my eyes as i do the first product.  a nice bonus is the packaging is glass and completely reusable!!! it looks so cute with a single flower sitting in it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good natural product. The only product that works for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently purchases the mini size of this facial cleanser just to try it out and it works wonders for my skin. I have dry skin and its very light and moisturizing and doesn’t leave my skin flaky. I will be purchasing the large bottle soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not work for me. I was excited to try it given all the positive reviews but it broke me out. I usually don’t suffer from break outs but after using this I broke out horribly. I would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: good for a cleanser, i bought a mini and when i run out i will buy the full size bottle, i have oily/combo/acne prone skin and i havent broke out from it and ive been using it for about a month now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite face wash ever. I suffered with very oily combination skin. I also had large pores and blackheads. This facewash not only has somehow reduced the pore size to not even noticable it also removed my blackheads. My face is not oily at all anymore as well! This is a gentile cleanser that actually cleanses unlike the cera ve. The only porblem that I have with this is its made out of glass so if you accidentally drop it it will shatter. But other than that it is definitely worth the some what expensive price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I can use it twice a day with a moisturizer and my skin doesn’t react to being dry or anything! I don’t have much experience, but I love what’s on the label! I have sensitive skin and eczema and this is a cleanser that my skin doesn’t react harshly to. Great for daily use and multi day use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Vegan and cruelty free! Like a healthy quench for your face.  This cleanser is amazing! My skin dries out as well as breaks out very easily  so I am very cautious about what I use on my skin. This product is a very light yet powerful liquid that lightly lathers as you wash. Very clean and healthy smell that leaves your skin feeling amazing. I will definitely be ordering the full size bottle soon.

reviews.review_title: bless the Sephora employee who recommended this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works perfectly for me but I think it is partially because I do a 2 step cleanse. Step 1 is a one-minute massage of pure hemp seed oil into my skin to remove sunscreen and the very small amount of makeup I wear. I remove the oil with a hot wash cloth, I use a new cloth every night, never re use one. Then I wash with this cleanser.  I have pale, sensitive, combination skin. Without the oil I think this would be a bit too drying for me.  The scent is lovely and fresh, the bottle is glass, the ingredients are safe, the brand is cruelty free. I will continue to buy and use this as long as it's available. Wish the price were a bit more reasonable but it is good quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best vegan/cruelty-free cleansers out there. Amazing ingredients list, the scent is light and naturally occurring.  I found this to be very soothing for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. Does the job beautifully, does not dry my skin, and it smells so fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Smells great to me and cleans but doesn’t strip my face. I use it every night for a month, have not Broken out to this. I still have some leftover too:-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to LOVE this product since it's green but I think it's average. I work in the forest so I have to reapply sunscreen at least twice and needed a cleanser that would help remove the sunscreen and dirt build up. I didn't feel like it was an amazing cleanser. It also didn't remove non waterproof makeup. On the surface level, it made my face feel soft, tight, hydrated. I felt like it didn't penetrate the skin though.

reviews.review_title: skin is best it’s ever been
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don’t write reviews... but this stuff is awesome. I’ve overall had clear skin and really had no issues except the pores on my nose needed extra attention now and then.   The first week or week and half, my skin purged when using this product but I decided to wait it out.   Now... my pores are smaller than they ever have been and my skin is brighter and clearer. I’ve received multiple compliments from friends and family that I look brighter.   I highly recommend, it really cleans your skin without drying it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oh I love it make you skin very Soft and gently really working

reviews.review_title: Too drying for my combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This left my face feeling way too tight. It did a good job of cleansing my skin--it felt clean--but immediately after rinsing my face tightened up and felt completely stripped of any and all moisture that was previously there. I have combination skin and even my T-zone felt too stripped. I gave the rest to my boyfriend who uses it to wash off his zinc based sunscreen, and although it gets every last bit off it's just too drying for my everyday cleansing needs. A massive round of applause always to the clean ingredients and minimal plastic packaging, though!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does what it says I like it. But I expected more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally tried this cleanser after it was recommended by a ton of people. Most people love it, it left my skin feeling super clean and I love that the ingredients are also clean & it smells good. The only con was that if you have super dry skin like I do it can be drying and leave your skin feeling super tight and dehydrated after using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves my skin very soft and smooth. I noticed that when I skipped this product my face feels a little rough and patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i wanted to find a face wash that had little to no fragrance, be alcohol free and wouldn't dry out my skin. this product does just that! i started out buying the smaller bottle and it lasted a long time for how little it is. my skin tone is even and my pores are smaller and it washes my make up off very well too. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super gentle on the skin. Avoid your eye area. Leaves skin feeling hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite product! Doesnt strip my skin,smells pretty good and is very effective. A little soaps up a long way and the mini size has lasted me quite some time. Ill be purchasing the full size without a doubt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally love trying out new cleansers from Sephora and heard this was supposed to be an awesome product and I love the glass packaging cause it’s more enviro friendly. I recently purchased an AHA and BHA peel and was using it along side this when I randomly got an acid/chemical burn on my chin. (I’ve had the burn before it just gets itchy and patchy, be careful when using acids) I assumed it was just maybe too high of a percent for my skin or I forgot to wear sunscreen which will cause a reaction. After the burn was gone I tried to use my peel again and noticed no burn or irritation it was actually helping which I knew it would I’ve used them before and then yesterday I used this cleanser on its own just to try it out without mixing it with the acid and it totally burnt my skin idk what’s in this that my skin hates but clearly this is not the product for me so be sure to do some research on the product or keep your receipt to return it if it doesn’t work for you. I also found this super strange as it is marketed as being gentle I really haven’t had this happen to me before from a cleanser acids I understand but a gentle everyday cleanser I would assume wouldn’t burn my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had very high expectations of this cleaners and so far I’m very disappointed. My skin feels super tight and stripped after using. And I have combo/oily skin. I’ve also started breaking out all over my face. I’m not sure if it’s the cleanser or something else. I doubt if I’ll by this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super clean, light, foamy, fresh/subtle scent, great amount and price.   A good face cleanser is very hard to find. I know a lot of people don’t care about what they use for a face wash. But I always see a difference between products. This was a great Clean find. It doesn’t strip your face, omit leave any harsh residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this product. I’ve been on the hunt for quite some time for a new cleanser that would leave my face clean and not strip all the natural oils in my skin.  This product definitely achieves that and more.  Definitely found my new staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This claims to remove makeup but even after scrubbing my face with this I had quite a bit of makeup remaining. My face doesn’t feel particularly clean after using it. Not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very gentle, and smells amazing. I wanted a second facewash to use in the morning while I use my Glamglow facewash after work at night. It always leaves my face feeling fresh!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so nice and leaves your skin feeling great. Absolutely in love with this product and this company.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser got rid of my (minimal) makeup and sunscreen from the day, but did not overly strip my skin. There is no essential oil, but there is a pleasant, herb-like scent. Love the company and its business model. So glad Hyram recommended this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this cleanser! It foams and smells refreshing. My face was visibly brighter. Only downside is they don’t offer an in between size from the sample. It lasted for months, which could work for some, but my skin enjoys frequently using different cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser turned completely turned my skin around. I had been having deep cystic acne out of no where for months and I bought countless new products and tried new routines but nothing seemed to help. Since starting to use this day and night I have stopped having those deep breakouts. I still do get smaller normal acne here and there, but I'll take that for what my skin was before this. I'm only giving it 4 stars because I can see how it is a little stripping at time. I have oily skin so it usually does not leave my skin feeling stripped, but on some of those super dry winter days it can. I don't see that being an issue at all in the summer months, but if you have dry skin I'd definitely recommend getting a small bottle to try first and using it once a day to start. Love this and am already planning to repurchase so I never run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because of all the rave reviews online but I’m glad I only bought the mini. Everytime I used this my skin broke out. I only could use it for four days before I had to give up and toss it. As soon as I went back to my normal cleanser everything cleared up. A co-worker who also bought it had the same issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Is good but I couldn’t  feel a deep cleansing of impurities  .... I love it didn’t burn my skin and felt more like a jelly instead of a soapy texture that makes your skin dry but definitely not my fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the 2oz size to try and I really like it for my dry, sensitive skin. It is not drying and my skin feels good after being washed. The reason I’m on rating it 4 stars is I can’t use it in the shower because of the glass bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser ever,clear my acne,remove my redness,doesnt dry me out,the scent is amazing,i really this brand

reviews.review_title: Nice but not for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the glass bottle and it was a nice cleanser. It did make my skin squeaky clean and with dry skin, that isn't a good thing. I dont think I woukd repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This broke me out super bad!! Be careful if you have sensitive skin, try this first

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product alone has changed my skin. I owe it all to Skin Care by Hyram on YouTube for pointing his followers to this company and product! This is a life changer for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Only used it a few times and it didn't really do anything for my skin. My main issue with the product is that it comes in a glass bottle that is hard to hold in the shower, so of course I dropped it and it broke. Wouldn't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has saved my skin! It takes off all my makeup, smells great, and doesn’t dry me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m surprised to read all the reviews about this giving people bad acne. This actually had the opposite effect on me, before using I was breaking out like crazy and my face was so gross and oily. I was rinsing it with water like every 15 mins throughout the day to wash off the oil and cleansing twice a day and still I was getting these annoying pimples. Then I tried this and my skin is waaaaaayyyy less oily and it finally stopped breaking out. It SAVED my skin I can’t believe how much better it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry and sensitive skin. I have been using this cleanser for two weeks now and absolutely LOVE IT!   It lathers and washes off very easily. I can feel it doesn’t strip off my face’s natural barrier. Most cleansers I have used made my face feel tight and dry after no matter how gentle they claim to be, but not this one!   The redness on my cheeks have improved. I also really like the refreshing herbal scent. Overall I’m pretty impressed! A bit on the pricy side but I think it’s worth it. Will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely have acne, I deal with more uneven skin.  I wanted to like this product so bad because there were so many good reviews about it.  I had cystic acne all around my jaw line and broke out in my t zone, I gave this product 2 months to just see if I was purging and once I got off of it, my skin has started to heal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is now my favorite cleanser. I had been searching for a good quality cleanser for months, and this works really well and smells fantastic. It is easy enough to lather, so only a small amount needs to be used, which makes the bottle last longer than I expected. Well worth the price.

If I could give 0 as a rating I would. My sister used this product and caused her major cystic acne. This girl was beyond perfect skin and barley ever in her life gets a pimple. She got huge red pimples all over her face that didn’t disappear for over a month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This definitely removes my makeup  You can smell the natural ingredients & also your skin won’t breakout  10/10 Highly Recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: got this for my boyfriend. and it's the first cleanser he actually uses on a daily basis. he loves the smell and how it makes his skin feel. although he was bad adult acne. this stuff isnt helping get rid of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just okay, I was still breaking out with this drying my skin out. Also the pump is terrible after one use it was leaking all over my counter... i even tried pumping what’s left in the pump back into the bottle and it still forced the product up and out of the bottle..best thing to do is not use the pump bc it probably wasted more than I actually used. I switched to dermalogica clearing skin wash and my skin has been break out free ever since. The best thing about this skin cleanser is the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product only if you have OILY skin. My skin is dry-ish but it gets oily during the day on the T zone. But when I started using this cleanser my skin would literally peel off. I honestly recommend it only for very oily skin, as it does dry up your face quite a bit.

reviews.review_title: Face feels so soft - New Holy Grail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought I would try this on a whim and I am so glad. I have dry/dehydrated skin and many products people love for their dry skin I hate and in fact make my skin dryer!  I love to watch get unready with me videos for ideas of products and one of the beauty experts used this. I purchased a small trial size and LOVE IT. My skin is soft and feels clean without stripping. The smell doesn't wow me but I can get past it.  I recommend purchasing the small trial size and take the chance. I know I have found my holy grail 2nd cleanse face wash by taking the leap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle and effective, removes all of my makeup without drying my skin.

reviews.review_title: Great Long Term Effects From Using
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only have to buy 2 bottles of this stuff a year. I always feel like I’m getting what I’m paying for. This is my go to cleanser. If I ever try out different products and break out, I can always go back to this and it calms my skin down. I have combo acne prone skin and it’s helped my acne a lot and acne scars. Texture of my skin is smooth too. I always recommend this to friends it’s great. Give it time to work before you hate it, it’s done my skin miracles in the long run.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Half of the bottle leaked out of the pump onto my marble countertop, which caused a stain. What a mess! I emailed YTTP to mention the issue and they said “they are working on the packaging.” Until they do, I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser I have been searching for. Literally changed my life. I have tried too many cleansers to count for “sensitive skin.” Yet some how I still break out. I Typically have dry, moderate acne prone skin with redness. It’s been a few months now and all of those problems are gone. I will never use a different cleanser again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells soooo good and left my skin feeling super fresh! i'd make sure to have a decent moisturizer to go with it (or use a serum and a moisturizer) if your skin dries easily, but overall i really love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing; almost like an aloe-vera scent, but not too harsh. The container is made of glass, so if you prefer a plastic container (for safety), this one isn't for you. I have sensitive skin, and I have tried many cleansers, and this one did not make me break out. The product does make your skin feel somewhat clean, but for this price, I'd say look elsewhere. But overall great for everyday use if you are willing to buy it!
Smells good but WAY too drying! The cleanser creates a beautiful lather, unfortunately it left my skin tight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this product. I bought the small bottle in case I didn’t like it since it’s my first time trying it. First few nights it made my face very dry although I have combination skin. It surprised me since it’s on the more natural ingredients side with no alcohol. I started using it only if I wear make up, I have noticed it doesn’t dry my face as much. I never get that clean feeling. I have to wash with excessive water in order for the slime feeling to go away. Gave it two stars because it does bring a lot of product for a small bottle ($10).

reviews.review_title: OK cleanser but bottle constantly leaks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: mild cleanser that lathers well and leaves skin feeling clean without overstripping it of moisture. It has a light grassy smell and goes away soon after you lather it into your skin. It did not irritate my sensitive combo skin nor did it break me out, which is a plus.   Cons: the packaging is awful. Like several of the previous reviews, the product constantly leaks and it's such a waste of product, especially if it costs $36 per bottle (and I really dislike wasting product). I would give it 4 stars if it wasn't for the defective packaging. With so many other options of cleansers that are available, I would most likely not be purchasing this product again. I also didn't really see a significant change in my skin after using this for the past few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser. I bought a mini size but is soon as I run out I will be purchasing the full size. It makes my skin so clean and soft. And I really like the smell of kale green tea and Spinach.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser.  It’s super mild, but cleans effectively.  It doesn’t irritate my skin like some cleaners.  It’s a gel that has little too no scent, but lathers really easy.  A bottle lasts me forever.  Even though I use it twice a day.  The best part it doesn’t dry my face out!! It’s really a mild cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin loves it and so does my wallet. It’s a quality product that’s goof for your skin without being overly pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the First Aid Beauty Pure Skin Face Cleanser for a long time and found my skin hasn’t been feeling as clean lately. I’ve been testing out new cleaners through a long process of trial and error for about a year and a half. This is the first cleanser that hasn’t caused major dryness, redness, or patchiness. That’s saying something for the winter months in Eastern Canada! My skin has been feeling great and I love the scent of this cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve generally avoided foaming cleansers because they always dry me out but not this one! This is a cleanser that can be used as a second cleanse or just by itself. Clean fresh scent, doesn’t strip your skin out and doesn’t irritate sensitive skin either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did love it and it didn’t break my face out. However, I hate the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using Belif aqua cleanser and it broke me out. I tried this bad boy (recommend by Hyram) and I gotta say it got rid of my breakouts and made my face smooth. It's stripping like some of the other cleansers I've used. The only thing I don't like is the smell. I feel like I'm spreading a salad on my face!( I know I don't eat enough greens but this is ridiculous!) I'll continue to use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I am overall disappointed with this product. I started using it everyday for almost 2 weeks and I broke out! I normally have good skin and don't break out. The product left my skin feeling too dry. Definitely, not worth the money! It's overly price.

reviews.review_title: Didn't want to love it but ...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't want to like this product to be honest because of the price point, however, as fate would have it I'm in love haha. It's the best cleanser I've tried so far, and I've tried a lot. I have Normal-dry skin, the dryness depends on the time of year mostly. This cleanses my face gently, but does get all the dirt and makeup off from the day. And it doesn't leave my face feeling tight like a lot of others, and it's so soft sna smooth. Love it! I bought the little bottle to try, but I'm going to have to give in and purchase the big one. In love. The only thing I don't like is the price, especially since it's something that's only on your face for a minute or so before it's washed off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is amazing it foams well on fingertip is them I apply it on to my face and cleanse for a couple of minutes... I found it very good for my skin... it does not leave me feeling dry ... very light light scented... leave me feeling clean...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive/acne prone/combination skin. This cleanser did not help nor make my skin worse. I was honestly hoping for some change, since the cleanser was highly reviewed on YouTube. I’ve also lost a lot of the product due to the packaging constantly leaking. Overall not really satisfied. Bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash I have used! I went into my local Sephora looking and the consultant turned me on to this face wash. My skin is combo but changes with hormones and stress. This face wash makes my skin feel clean but not stripped also gentle enough not to cause irritation. This is my holy grail face wash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this cleanser. I love the simple ingredients and the fact that it's a gel cleanser. I appreciate the fact that it doesn't dry out my skin. I find that it does a good job taking off makeup but I always remove my makeup prior because I wear sunscreen too. I have acne prone skin, combo that is prone to dehydration. I feel like this cleanser helps balance my skin a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome cleanser, cliche but I have dry skin and its just enough to clean off the days skincare and spf without absolutely stripping skin. Try the small size first, but this is just a very basic “ideal” cleanser thats easy to recommend since it is made for practically all skin types and its really just a cleanser. It does its job perfectly and has surprisingly helped shrink pore size, help keep pores clean and prevent acne regardless of being a simple cleanser w minimal/no active ingredients. Its a good “deep” cleanse for people with dry skin, but could definitely be a nice gentle cleanser for people w oily/combo skin. Appreciate the company’s efforts in sustainability. Simplicity is actually its strength.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been through so many gentle for sensitive skin or all skin type cleansers, and by far this is the best one. it doesn't feel likes it's stripping my face, no irritations or burning sensation, no scent, easy to use, and the ingredients are pretty much all familiar. I'm in love with this and will 110% be making this apart of my daily routine. bonus, it's actually affordable compared to other all natural or vegan cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First things first, this is a CLEANSER and NOT a makeup remover. C'mon folks, it's 2020 and we need to double cleanse and no face wash is going to remove all traces of makeup. okay...  Secondly, this is hands down one of my absolute favorite cleansers not only because it's a Clean brand but because it's soo nice on the skin and does not irritate it. It does have a green scent but it's not overwhelming but rather mild and pleasant.   Thirdly, I'd just like to say that it's worth mentioning that when you buy the cleanser, one does have to assemble the pump oneself. For those having issues, maybe they didn't do it right? Idk, I'm on my second bottle and I've had ZERO issues. Also, the bottles are so cool and they are totally reusable. Love, love, LOVE this brand.   Bottom line: Clean ingredients, good for you and  eco conscious, great price point. 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Liked this cleanser until half the bottle or more leaked out of the pump! Huge waste of money. I did like the product. Lightly scented. Felt fresh and clean after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had purchased a set of trial YTTP products. I didn't even get through the whole tiny bottle of this cleanser and already purchased the full size. I love the way it gets everything off without stripping my face. I have incredibly dry sensitive skin and this cleans it perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been continuously using this cleanser for two weeks now and needless to say it’s my new holy grail cleanser. Before I say anything else I would like to point out that sometimes when you get a new cleanser you will break out b/c it is bringing your impurities to the surface and increasing cell turnover, also called “purging”. This only lasts for a week to 4 weeks depending on the person, and this is a good thing b/c the cleanser is doing it’s job. That being said, I noticed my skin purging for about a week after using this product. However, after the purging subsided my skin is looking healthier and clearer than ever. My once dull skin is GLOWING, minimal acne, my oiliness isn’t as bad as it usually is, and my blackheads are vanishing. I love this cleanser so  much! So worth the money and smells so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser smells like my veggie garden, I get that it's clean but, c'mon. Beyond that I broke out horribly after using. I love other YTTP products, this one just didn't work for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice face wash. Lathers well and rinses off without leaving a residue. A bit drying overall. I alternate with my Marcelle creamy face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser after reading all the positive reviews, but it was not a good match for me. It didn't remove makeup, it seemed to leave a film on my skin, and the bottle constantly leaked. For this price point, there are much better clean cleansers out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good cleanser with terrible packaging. It leaks all over the place and becomes a sticky mess. I’ve had two bottles and the same thing happened to both. The pump just leaks face wash. The cleanser is nice, but needs different packaging. It’s expensive for a simple cleanser that makes a Mess. Smells good.

reviews.review_title: Packaging is horrible, Product is mediocre.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Mediocre cleanser, the product LEAKED out through the bottom of the glass so it was money wasted down the drain. There are so many other better options than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love YTTP, but IN MY OPINION this cleanser is not worth the money. My personal experience with this product is that is too harsh for my SENSITIVE/DRY skin.  The product itself is not bad and I use it once a week or only when I wear heavy makeup because otherwise it will dry my skin even more. I recommend using a hydrating product after cleansing with this. I have also used it to clean my makeup brushes and it cleans them instantly and completely. Even though my experience is not the best, is not the worst either. Maybe for other skin types it will do better. I just think that for the price I would expect it to perform better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this item and so far I love it. I’ve been using it twice a day and after thoroughly cleansing my face my skin feels very smooth. 2 pumps of this product gives me a good lather. I believe it really cleans my face very well. I love the glass bottle ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way my skin feels when I use it. Depending on whether I use makeup or not, I use it with my Clarisonic. Not gonna lie, I prefer it without the Clarisonic. It foams too much and I end up tasting it each and every time. I don't have that problem with other cleansers. Even with that, it is still worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cleanser for about a month and I absolutely love it. I have noticed smoother skin and not going to lie I obviously still get blemishes, but the number of blemishes has decreased since using this product. My skin can be more on the dry side, especially during winter and this cleanser really helps to hydrate my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it but it dried my sensitive skin out so bad!! The consistency is a really nice gel with a gentle scent. Had to return it unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the 2oz bottle of this cleanser to try it out because I heard such great things about it. My skin has improved but one thing that I’ve noticed is that even if I use makeup remover first, my eyes still are a tiny bit black from my mascara. Usually every other cleanser can fully take my makeup off. This makes me wonder how well it actually cleanses your face or takes off your makeup. But overall it’s a pretty good product! I don’t think I would pay $50 for the full size though.

reviews.review_title: wanted to love it, unfortunately caused breakouts
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this product. YTTP is a phenomenal brand, with excellent products - the super berry hydrate and glow oil, super berry hydrate and glow mask, and the deep cream moisturizer to name a few. I have VERY dry and sensitive skin, unfortunately this cleanser caused me to break out. I am thinking it is due to the alfalfa in this product. My skin usually never ever has breakouts, so I’m very disappointed to say the least. I have these teeny tiny bumps all over my face. On the contrary, I will say that this product DOES remove makeup very well. That is why I gave it three stars. I’ve been trying it for about a month now and I’m finally calling it quits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My sister recommended this cleanser (it's the only other cleanser she'll us) as I was looking for a cleansing staple. I love the smell of it, it's very light, and refreshing! I haven't really noticed a difference in using it though, but I will say it doesn't dry out my skin like others have. :)   Packaging-wise, it comes in a glass bottle and I love that I'm able to recycle it as soon as I finish the product. Some people have complained that excess product drips from the pump, but I haven't noticed that problem-- I keep it near the bathroom sink, away from the shower where water could probably get in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great, is refreshing, and the mini size lasts for a super long time... bUT. I really haven’t noticed any difference in my skin after almost finishing my bottle. If you  read the info on the product it doesn’t say it’s targeted at acne and for me it didn’t do anything for my bumpy skin to clear or flatten it out. You could probably find something more effective at a lower cost. If you just want a nice refreshing boost and don’t have acne as a concern this might be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a fine cleanser, but it has a smell.. The fragrance, whether natural or not, is too strong for me. I dont like skin care products with any fragrances! They irritate my sensitive and acne/rosacea prone skin. I ended up using only half of it and dumping the rest. There are good gentle, fragrance free alternatives out there for a better price as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser. I’ve only purchased the mini size but it’s lasted me a while. I like to experiment with face washes and have a variety in use at all times. The only thing I don’t like is that the lettering comes off the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gets off all my makeup with no issues. It has helped transform my face into something smooth and bright. Definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell but unfortunately it was super drying for my normal type skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product. Gentle on your skin, non-irritating, lightly scented.  Every time I use it, I ask my daughters to feel how soft my cheek is :) Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best cleanser I’ve ever purchased. It doesn’t dry my skin out. I feel like my skin is very balanced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had the HARDEST time finding something my skin isn’t allergic to but also makes it feel clean and not oily the next day! I LOOOOOVE this product so worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After getting a sample of this this was my first convert to a larger size Leaves your face clean and fresh without overdrying I have combo skin that changes with the seasons and in winter this did not dry me out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didn’t like this product, I received a sample. It doesn’t lather very well and I feel like you need a lot of this product. But it makes my skin so silky smooth. I ended up buying a full size bottle. A side note, glass bottles in the shower aren’t very user friendly. But again. This stuff works and that’s what matters.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: unfortunately very stripping on my skin. my skin reacted very bad to it and turned super dry, red and bumpy on some spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best cleanser I’ve ever used. I originally got it in the mini bottle at checkout on a whim and was shocked by how much it cleared my skin up. I bought the big bottle and haven’t looked back since, now this is the only cleanser I’ll use. I used to get little pimples all over my forehead and ever since I started using this (a year ago) they went away and haven’t returned. While I can’t speak for everyone’s skin, this was a miracle product for clearing my complexion and soothes my facial redness each time I use it. Im in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this doesn’t work for everyone. I used it once and woke up the nxt day with 5 pimples, used it again, and again, and again but woke up with more and more. Finally i couldn’t take it anymore, I stopped using it, went back to my cerave hydrating cleanser- and Bam! My skin was clearing up every day after that. I suggest getting the small bottle to try it out first. Remember everyone’s skin is very different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cleanser!! i love the packaging on this even tho my first bottle slipped out of my hands lol

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser from a great company!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love all things Youth To The People! This cleanser smells fresh and light, the ingredients are fantastic, and they are cruelty-free! (A quick google search of any brand will tell you if they're actually cruelty-free, don't just trust what a company says on its site, there are very loose rules about a company being able to claim they're CF on their marketing material) I use Farmacy Green Clean to thoroughly remove all my make-up before using this, if you wear long wear makeup you may want to do the same. I follow with their Dream Mask at night and Tatcha Dewy Skin Cream or YTTP Adaptogen Cream in the am. I recently moved to Chicago from California and my newly dry winter skin is happy once again :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had a trial size of this and was obsessed. My skin feels so clean and looks great. The soap is not harsh and smells nice. I bought the biggest bottle and it’s worth every cent.

reviews.review_title: Not great. Better cleaners out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is nothing great about this cleanser. I got the small size bottle to try out and would certainly never spend my money to buy this. It did remove my makeup so this got 2 stars instead of one but it did nothing for my skin. In fact I had some uneven texture after using this for a while. There are much better cleansers out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been trying this cleanser for about 3 weeks now and it’s not for me. I’m so glad I only bought the small bottle as this product broke me out. It’s the only new product in my routine so I know it is this one causing the break outs. I also just didn’t feel as though it cleanses very well anyway. Just a waste of money tbh. And now I have breakouts around my nose and my chin to deal with... great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: loveeeeeee this cleanser. Leaves my skin smooth and lighter than my old cleanser. Would highly recommend, the small bottle lasts me forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like the fact that you do not need to use a lot to wash your face.  Smells nice and my skin feels good after I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it so far! Doesn’t feel stripping and smells really nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with this! First of all, it comes in a glass bottle which is nice because I can reuse it for other things once it’s finished. Secondly, it smells like what it’s made of which for me is great. Lastly it leaves my face feeling fresh and clean. Totally worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser because I heard it was very good for your skin. It has good ingredients in it, foams up and doesn't dry out my combination skin. I've been using it twice a day and my skin doesn't ever feels stripped or irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second time purchasing this cleanser! Highly recommend if you're looking for something gentle and good for the skin. Also the price isn't so bad as this will last you a pretty long time, it also doesn't dry out your skin and has a pleasant smell. DID NOT BREAK ME OUT !!!! I used to have cystic acne, still do (not as bad) and occasional pimple breakouts after I started using this my skin REALLY calmed down .

reviews.review_title: 30 year old with severe textured skin and acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, Since the first time I washed my face with this product, my skin has cleared up so much! I look beautiful in every mirror in any lighting! My skin is 90% clear and I’ve only used it a week. The bottle is glass. Definitely luxurious!! I would recommend this to anyone who’s tried everything! I’ve used it all from high end, to low end!

reviews.review_title: Worth every $ for this acne/blackhead prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin, big pores, clogged pores. I get white heads and black heads all the time. My skin is picky. Rice cleansers tend to clog my skin. I was using Sunday Riley's Clay Cleanser (used it for 6 months) and my skin wasn't looking any better. I thought it was just my skin. Sephora had a little set for 200 pts so I got this and the AHA toner. OMG. I went back and got another sample. Then I bought the full-size, absolutely skin changing. I get multiple compliments about how my skin looks radiant, clear and my blackheads on my nose are disappearing. I've never been so happy or satisfied with how my skin looks till I started using this daily (2x a day).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new go to - I love this product.  The soap feels light and leaves my skin soft and clean in a effortless way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have used by far I have acne prone oily skin and after I use i feel clean and doesn’t dry out my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I found this cleanser when my skin started breaking out with cystic acne, I was looking for a cleanser that didn't foam and was vegan (surprisingly difficult). This is my new favourite cleanser, it doesn't dry my skin out or cause me to break out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleaner I’ve ever used. Gets my face nice and clean without stripping my face. My only con is the packing due to the cleanser leaking from the nozzle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
