reviews.review_text: I received a tiny tester of this product from another beauty box subscription last year. I feels good on the skin, especially around my eyes and even on facial irritations (acne, acne infections, etc).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There are Pros and Cons to this cleanser! This cleaner I believe is a game changer for someone who needs a morning cleanser or someone who is a no makeup - light makeup person but if your someone like me who is a medium - heavy makeup person then this is not for you. It barely removes your makeup, you use way too much when washing your face and you end up not feeling like your face is fully cleaned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this! I use it AM and PM and love how my skins been looking and feeling recently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells good, the glass bottle and pump are great and it does a great job at removing makeup. I took a star off because it's not meshing well with my dry winter skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this I can actually see and feel the difference in my face having less breakouts and my skin is more radiant!! This will be a regular purchase for me now! I have bought and used so many different face products that have just had ok results. This one stands apart from those hands down!

reviews.review_title: Gave it a shot and that's it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used it for 2 weeks. Haven't seen any difference, haven't felt any difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best face wash ever! It’s super gentle and cleans extremely well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser is my go-to favorite cleanser.  I've had several bottles of it over the last 3 years, and will continue to buy.  I even got my Mom addicted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second purchase. I found it to clean makeup off well and doesn’t make skin too oily nor dry.   Great purchase for price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! Has a super light, beautiful clean scent, don’t get this if you’re looking for fragrance free. Foams just enough to show you it’s working but not SO sudsy that my skin feels stripped. Overall great, effective yet gentle cleanser if you’re not wearing tons of makeup (I use this as a second cleanse after removing makeup). Solid plus is that the glass pump/packaging is gorgeous on a bathroom vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser for a few reasons. First and most importantly its free of sodium laureth sulfate and other harsh surfactants which are irritating over time, also no essential oils or artificial fragrance. Second its in a glass bottle so it can be recycled an infinite amount of times and the pump locks for travel so you don't lose any product. finally youth to the people does a lot of great things as a brand and while I don't like the 36$ price tag I feel its justified because im sure its not cheap to be ethical nowadays. Overall I've been using this for about a week after receiving a sample and it does great to not strip my dry winter skin. I use it after a micellar double cleanse at night if I wear makeup or on its own in the morning or if i'm barefaced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! It is sooo light and smells so lovely. It suds up really easily but doesn’t dry my skin out. I keep going back to this over less expensive cleansers because I honestly love it so much. The trial size also lasts me about two months and is super convenient to take on the go, as I travel quite a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it. It cleans my skin without drying it, and it feels super soft afterwards

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a nice face wash, it feels refreshing after I use it and my skin is loving it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice cleanser keeps skin hydrated but not oily the glass bottle feels luxurious I am here for brands caring about the environment !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never had a proper skincare regimen but decided to make a change. The Sephora rep was so great with all of her recommendations but this was by far my favourite product. My face just feels so very clean and refreshed after using this cleanser. It’s light and pure but so effective - I’ve fallen in love with this product and will be restocking in the full sized version and also checking out other products from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser. Got the mini and then repurchased for the larger size. Gentle for every day use and the rosacea on my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t Irritate my skin, but I do still have acne. A good gentle cleanser. A little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gentle yet effective cleanser for my dry, sensitive skin. Very clean felling as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best non-exfoliant deep cleaning cleanser that doesn’t strip your skin of its natural oils. *note - your skin might feel tight, but make sure to follow with a good hydrating moisture after. I have tried so many cleansers but this is the only one that seems to actually remove dirt not only above the surface, but underneath too. I see a different on my silk pads when I apply my toner. No left over dirt or makeup. (I follow with a moisturizing toner by fresh). Kinda smells like a salad but it’s not strong enough to be a bother.

reviews.review_title: Good for sensitive and combination skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser after reading about several recommendations for oily/combination skin. It took my skin about 2  weeks to adjust to this cleanser, I was using a CeraVe cleanser beforehand. Initially, it dried my skin out so much that I had to use twice my normal amount of moisturizer and serums. I was tempted to stop using it immediately but decided to see how it would play out over time. Once my skin adjusted to the cleanser I've noticed my pores generally look smaller, my skin texture is smoother, and my skin is far less oily. If you're looking for a cleanser for sensitive   oily skin that reduces oil and improves texture, I would highly recommend the YTTP cleanser with a regime of good moisturizers and know that your skin might take time to adjust to the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Takes off mascara with ease, keeps my skin feeling so clean. If you’re looking for a gentle yet powerful cleanser, this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s light and doesn’t have a strong smell. It also didn’t dry my skin and helped make it look much healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I started using this cleanser my pimples stopped appearing! Not sure if it was because I stopped using my old cleanser (Caudalie) but this has certainly helped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just turned 30 and now getting cystic acne. This cleanser is the only one that keeps it away! Never will switch!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only gave it 4 stars because I’ve only been using this for about a month and it typically takes longer to fully see results. From what I’ve seen this last month, I really do like this product. I like the clean ingredients. I’ve switched around cleansers because I hate the chemical  smell since it irritates my skin and makes my eyes water. This product does not do that what so ever. It smells good and works well with my sensitive skin. I use it morning and night; and at first it dried out my skin a bit but I’ve been using the dream mask too, which they work perfectly together!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was my first time using this brand, I totally loved this one, it leaves my skin feeling so soft and moisturized! No breakouts whatsoever, I would definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Scent is OK,  feel film left on the skin after rinse. When looked at ingredient list,  you can see it's just a synthetic surfactant based cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Definitely going to purchase the full size!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. This cleanser is ideal for those who double cleanse with an oil cleanser or if you don't wear a lot of make up or use another product to remove your make up and then wash your face. This isn't a one step removes make up and cleanses product. I love how gentle it is. It never leaves my skin feeling dry. It gets the job done and after trying a deluxe sample from a YTTP set, then picking this one up, I will definitely purchase the larger size when I run out.  It's not a miracle worker and most cleansers aren't but it does it's job and doesn't leave my skin feeling worse afterward. I think a lot of different skin types would enjoy this product.

reviews.review_title: Deep clean, but not for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser! So great for deeply cleansing the skin and really soothes any irritation or redness I have. However, I have  combination skin and this slightly strips my skin and leaves it dry, but nothing a good moisturizer can't fix. Also, with the amazing ingredients, this product can't be beat. Lasts a long time too so It's worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal to dry skin and wanted to love this cleanser but it really dried out my skin and caused it to over produce oil. Had to go back to a more gentle cream cleanser. Love the FAB Pure Skin Face Cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 1st bottle no problems, this one i dont like. Left  my face slightly itchy after washing off. Small bumps like a heat rash appear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product but the bottle leaks like crazy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I’ve used! Previously I loved the IT cosmetic cleanser (I know I know not the best) because it was so gentle but then I found this cleansers. So gentle but really does cleanse deep down. I have combination skin - extremely dry sometimes throughout the winter but still oily and this cleanser has caused no issues. Also the bottle is recyclable, comes with a pump and the words wash off easily so you can repurpose the container. Good for your face and the environment.
